As a 30 year software engineer I am NOT looking for one more thing that needs constant attention to keep running. So far after one month I've not had to do any of this for either Kindle. We use them for Internet access, reading, weather and they more than meet our needs. It is really nice to be able to wander around the house without the weight and awkwardness of the laptop. We find we are charging the batteries about once a week so battery life has not been an issue either. The performance has been stellar and the screen display is amazing. I am looking forward to many, many hours of use and fun.

Reviews.Title: I Just Got It
Reviews.Author: J. T. Baker
Reviews.Content: I just got it the other day and am still playing around with it.  I did read the reviews before I bought it and it helped me decide on this purchase.  I'm definitely not a techie person so the reviews helped me ... not in the technical sense but that it seemed like a good buy for what I wanted.I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 without offers so you can imagine my surprise when I got an offer while playing one of my games.  I connected with MayDay to ask "How come?"  Man, that is a very cool item.  A real person comes on ... a person I can actually understand (no outsourcing).  After explaining my question, she said it was an offer that is built in the game I was playing.  it wasn't a Kindle offer.  Okay, that explained that.  Bummer, though, that I will still get offers I don't want to be bothered with.  I love the MayDay option.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joyce Bailey
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is a beautiful package.  I have only had it for 10 days so I have only touched on the capabilities, but everything I have done so far has been great.I'm very pleased with this new unit and very glad that I purchased it.  I bought one as a gift and that person loves it as well.I would most certainly recommend it to anyone considering it.

Reviews.Title: Problem solved, and love it!
Reviews.Author: hilldoc
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 was apparently defective.  Half way through the first day I tried to use it it failed to function in some areas. Then the great Kindle help kicked in and after talking with several help persons on Amazon, a replacement was suggested and the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 arrived free of charge and with free shipping about 18 hours later.  I had previously owned a first generation Kindle Fire and the HDX is marvelous in every respect.  I rate this product as a five because my replacement is excellent and in particular, the cameras are excellent--better than that on  my wife's new Apple I-pad Air.  Available help and service are always important I think, and Amazon excels in that area!  I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: So light and great improvements
Reviews.Author: Gramma
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this new version. It is much lighter than my original Kindle Fire. I like the Swype usage on the keyboard. The nighter screen is great. I don't like the search engine, only because it crashes so often. In fact it kept crashing and I was told while on my desktop to push the "er" button, aka. MAYDAY. Kind of impossible when that's what keeps crashing. I did get through VERY QUICKLY to a live person, twice, but obviously couldn't accomplish anything since it kept crashing. There are still a few bugs, but overall, this is a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Bright , Clear , and light and thin
Reviews.Author: James E. Dunn
Reviews.Content: Cons ....  the charging port is very tight and hard to connect.  This port needs to be changed to a different type on all kindle devices.Its not replaceable so basically when the charging port connector wears out the kindle is done for. This has happen on many kindles .  it is a design flaw.  Other than that its a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is a racehouse!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Andrews
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered a regular kindle but returned it because I wanted more than just a reader; I wanted a tablet and a reader.  When the HDX arrived before Christmas, I was immediaely impressed by its outstanding graphics and resolution.  But now that I've had a chance to use it and put some apps on it, I have to say I'm way more than impressed.  It is outstanding in every way.  My husband's iPad does not compete!What surprises me most is how versatile it is.  I thought I had learned all about it until I bought a book and learned, to my great surprise, that I had only scratched the surface.  LOL  It is pretty amazing and just sad that Amazon go into more detail in its listing for the tablet.  Just buy one!

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX. 8.9 is amazing and worth every penny.
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Skiff "kidzkornerdaycare"
Reviews.Content: Just received my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 today. I ordered it yesterday! It is slimmer than my Kindle Fire HD and slightly smaller too. I love it! So easy to register and connect to facebook and email. I love how the apps are on the homepage. I didn't have a camera on my Kindle Fire HD so I am in love with that feature. I'm not a techie at all but I do love my Kindles. This my 4th one -from the reader to the Kindle Fire to the Kindle HD, to the Kindle Fire HDX! I have the 32 GBP which is more than I will ever need I am sure. Comparing this to my friend's iPad made it really stand out and shine. It is amazing and worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for me and I love it . I have a kindle reader, kindle fire, and now this . I love this one the best.It is so easy to use. I love the help app that puts you in touch with an actual person to help you right away. To me this is the best feature of all! I must admit I am a bit technolgy challenged! I have the 64 bit and the pictures are beautiful. I was even able to take pictures and video without the use of the help app. For me, that's fantastic. Wether you are a techie guru or need tech for dummies ,this is a perfect tablet for anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great new addition to the Kindle Family
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Last year, I bought the Kindle Fire HD 8.9", and thoroughly enjoyed it.  This year, I purchased the new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", and I can't say enough about it!  It is slimmer, lighter, and slightly smaller than the HD (without sacrificing screen size). The quad-core processor is considerably faster than the dual-core from last year's HD, and with double the storage space, what's not to love?

Reviews.Title: Amazing Kindle/tablet/TV
Reviews.Author: Lee "Lee M"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9".  It is fast, great for use as a Kindle, for viewing video, using apps, listening to Audiobooks, and a tablet.  Using this in place of a laptop, you will want to add some apps--Adobe and/or DocumentsToGo--and you can use either a virtual keyboard or a Bluetooth keyboard.  (NOTE:  even though there is a MicroUSB port used for charging and transferring documents, you are not able to connect keyboard or mouse using the USB as it is.  Maybe there will be an app some time in the future, but now it doesn't work.)

Reviews.Title: need solutions
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Two details requiring attentions;1 - Turn on/off button as well as volume button are in the back, making them hard to use, when utilizing a carrying case.2 - Why does the "Battery stopped" notice is showing up ever so often?  What can I do about it?

Reviews.Title: Yippee! I Love It!
Reviews.Author: berggie
Reviews.Content: Everything it claims to be, so far (3 weeks). My third Kindle In 3 years. I guess that qualifies me as a "Kindle Junkie". Fortunately I have a downward rotation from my wife to my grandsons so everyone is happy.

Reviews.Title: As Awsome as they say.
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Hackney "ArizonaRog"
Reviews.Content: It's just what I was hoping for. Can I just put the word AWSOME down 20 times and call it a good review. It's everything Amazon promised it would be on their Kindle Fire sales and Product INfo pages!

Reviews.Title: Boy, was my husband surprised
Reviews.Author: SAM "threeages"
Reviews.Content: He had purchased one of these for a silent auction his company was holding and he was smitten. He opened this on Christmas morning and you would've thought he won the lottery. It's lightweight (like, crazy lightweight). The screen is clear and bright. He's already reading books and watching movies on this thing. He loves its features . . . and me for making his Christmas. ;)

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY HDX!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: AD
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a kindle fire for a while and I finally got one and so far I love this thing. I don't have any negative comments at this time. Fast, awesome picture and the sound quality blew me away

Reviews.Title: HDX 8.9 - The perfect Mid-sized Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I pre-ordered the HDX 8.9 for my wife, her first tablet. She was interested in the Surface at first but after doing some price and spec comparison WE decided to give the HDX a look-see, knowing we could return it if not completely satisfied. Well, it was love at first sight. The display is beautiful, the size is just right, the response is better than expected, the battery life is great, and the price was far less than the other one she had her eye on. I know WE will connect again when the newness wares off and the battery ever dies....

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kathy W. White "mystery lover"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and as with the other two, it is everything i hoped for and more!  I have an Ipad at school, and don't use it because it is not user friendly.  Keep up the good work Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Love my New Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Susan B Mayo
Reviews.Content: Really am enjoying my new Kindle Fire HDX. Loved the way it came with most of my content already downloaded and then it is very easy to download what I already have purchased. It is a very clear screen and the ease of using is great!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Tablet
Reviews.Author: John Berry
Reviews.Content: Kindle has out did itself on this version.  It has everything that you could ask for in a tablet and the viewing for movies is exceptional.  Because it is a Kindle, I can do all my reading as well as watch movies, games and connect to the Internet.  The size is just perfect and ranks right up there with the iPad and certainly cost a lot less.  I have used the Kindle Fire, the Kindle Fire HD and now the Kindle Fire HDX and I have not been disappointed with either.

Reviews.Title: had to exchange it after 3 days use
Reviews.Author: Ang Gobin
Reviews.Content: I have received a faulty top of the line kindle hd x so have had to exchange it, yet I have given it 5 stars because - when it was working - it was the most amazing device that I have ever used. So user friendly and fast and easy to use for work, play and surf. Just be very careful with the apps that you download as I think that this was the problem with mine. They need to protect the programs needed so that other apps and surfing cannot harm it.Although I have had a faulty device I still love it and am pleasantly surprised at how superb it is - and I got straight through to a uk person on xmas day using the mayday button. Amazing

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Keithwsr
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my wife for Xmas, ordered on the 12/23 and got it on 24 Dec FREE SHIPPING.  This is the greatest Kindle yet and we have at least one of every generation. My wife loves the fact that it is SO LIGHT and the picture is unbelievably clear and sharp.  Eat your heart out Nook and I Pad.  There is no comparison to this Kindle HDX.  My only wish would be that it had a Micro HDMI but I will continue to use our Kindle HD for those situations where I want to hook up to the TV.Great Prouct Amazon!!!  How are you going to top this one for Xmas 2014?????

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Keane "Drew"
Reviews.Content: Great Screen, fast CPU, email looks better than on a PC, just sayin...awesome tablet for those who are not overly tied to certain apps. This has all the right features the price was great. Speakers were super good,really nice surprise, its also really light. May need screen protector like any tablet would,lots of touching...Kindle is cool and just what most people need.

Reviews.Title: very impressed
Reviews.Author: Hamlet423
Reviews.Content: As a major user of amazon services I wanted to try this for myself.  Here are some thoughts1) The screen--its pretty amazing.  Bright and clear with great colors, and its very high resolution.  I believe its a low temperature silicon on LCD screen like the nexus 7.  Its really good. It makes the solid ips screen of the LG  G 8.3 tablet look tame by comparison.The source material is important--but streaming episodes of sherlock or the movie D13- Ultimatum looks amazing. Lower res stuff on netflix not so much, but if its quality video, you will not be sorry.  I could see the pores on Martin Freeman's face!  Just imagine if Edward James Olmos was on Sherlock!2) The sound--the speakers are good and louder than most tablets--surely way louder than the lg 8.3 tablet or the nexus 7. But they could be louder.  Why are they on the BACK of the device and not the front?3)  Construction-high quality--for plastic is impressive and yes, shockingly light.  I am a bit confounded by the button placement, which forces it to be in landscape orientation more than portrait, but its not a deal breaker.  Fortunately its so light it makes for different orientations still pretty easy--and way better in this regard than the samsung galaxy note 10.1 2014 edition (and its much lighter)The snapdragon 800 processor in this is a beast and is very impressively fast and responsive.  Plenty of horsepower here for most everything you can throw at it.4) The software--this is really for Amazon consumption of media--be it audio, songs, or video.  Its not really an android tablet although android powers it--no access to google play store.  For productivity....I think you will have some issues.Given limitations in video downloads from the amazon store and the size of the amazon app store vs the google play store, I'm not sure if you need a 64 gig tablet--this one seems to be best as a home media streaming device, not a road warrior, but I will revise the longer I have it.Aside from a few minor quirks (button, speakers) its a winner. Just keep in mind--it does not have access to the google play store so it is NOT really an android tablet--it has a different function.I guess you can try to hack the tablet but it will void warranty and its easy to ruin it in a lockup or "brick" the device and then you are out of luck.  Don't do that.  Just get a nexus 7 if you must.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX leaves IPad in the dust!
Reviews.Author: Yvette M Hannah
Reviews.Content: Best tablet ever! Never owned a tablet before and didn't think I would like one. Most of my friends have IPads and I don't like them. But the Kindle Fire HDX ROCKS! Easy to use. Haven't used my laptop in a month.

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: Richard Walston
Reviews.Content: Perfect in every way screen resolution weight and the only drawback is charge time but I think something is wrong with mine. Otherwise awesome!

Reviews.Title: More than I thought
Reviews.Author: Joyce S. Reppenhagen
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX today and it is just more than I thought it would be, so lite and thin and the pictures are so bright, I am so happy with it and have been having fun using today.

Reviews.Title: Mind blowing speed, weight, image quality
Reviews.Author: Brigitte Pauli
Reviews.Content: This my third kindle fire. Love the upgrades, especially the light weight, which will allow me to take this device wherever I go. Pleasure to use. I really like that it now has front as well as rear facing cameras... Great for reading, watching movies, staying in touch over Facebook and shopping. It will be my constant companion. If you haven't trusted kindle in the past because it was so much cheaper than other products - try this one. You will be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Stability and beauty in a light-weight, super-thin package.
Reviews.Author: Paul B Dillon
Reviews.Content: I consider myself to be fairly tech savvy, and I took a gamble ordering my new Kindle Fire HDX. I used to be a Microsoft loyalist, then began using Android devices, and most recently I've been using a Samsung phone. The rest of my family all uses Apple devices, so I'm familiar with the most of the major platforms.I've always liked to tinker with my new devices, and I rooted and loaded new roms to my previous Google tablet. I was hesitant to move away from platforms that allow the user more controls, but I'm glad I did. Besides the beautiful screen, the surprising thinness, and light weight of the Kindle, this tablet has one aspect I truly appreciate: STABILITY. The OS runs exactly how you want it (smoothly), and I haven't experienced any crashing with popular apps.Linked well with my Bose Bluetooth headphones, and transferring music was a breeze. If you can live without an SD card slot, personalized menus and lock/home screen wallpaper, I highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle FireHDX
Reviews.Author: Doreen Aube
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  I can do so much more with it than my Kindle Fire , which I keep mainly for reading , The screen on the HDX is brilliant and the sound is much better but my main reason for buying it is so I can Skype when I travel to stay in touch with my family and I love the May day help

Reviews.Title: I am in love with my HDX
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: I have three Kindles I like them all, but I am in love with the HDX. It is everything that was advertised. Light weight, great color quick responce, easy to use right out of the box. The apps and web browser work great. I can not say enough good things about the HDX.It has no downside from my view point. I would and do highly recommend the HDX to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A Must have!
Reviews.Author: Daniela Iniguez "chyna4"
Reviews.Content: Such a great tablet/ereader/whatever you want it to be, don't wanna let go of it electronic!  I had the regular fire, and thought that there would not be much difference in the two, but a friend got one, and now I see why!! The upgrades on the performance (nothing wrong with the other fire at all, but this is like driving a mazarati vs a lexus.  Yep. It's awesome, and with the special financing promotion, I could not say no.  Totally Cool!! Keep it up AMAZON!! You guys rock!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: na
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this product. When it arrives my account and everything was already set up for me. I was surprised. I love being able to web surf, wrote documents, watch movies and play games all in one. I would recommend this product to everyone who doesn't need a fancy laptop or a high prices tablet. This has Microsoft applications, high resolution movies and TV. Great for book readers. This product works really well especially of you ha e amazon prime so then you can watch and read books for free. I do wish you could add your own personality with colors and background s

Reviews.Title: An awesome upgrade from the previous one!
Reviews.Author: G. Alanis
Reviews.Content: Looks and works great. The new screen is sharp with great color. I bought the 64 GB version without advertising and I couldnt be more happier with it. The amazon market place works great, although more apps need to be brought on. You still have your essential apps that most people would like. I do think they should make a device that will be able to use Second Screen instead of needing a 2013 Samsung TV or a PS3. They do have devices that work with MirrorCast but I would like the features that come with Second Screen since they did not include a mini HDMI port this time around. Still an awesome device for the price that you pay for. The origami cover is also really great to have.

Reviews.Title: An Outstanding Upgrade From the Fire HD
Reviews.Author: DonD "Retired IT Systems Specialist"
Reviews.Content: An outstanding upgrade from the Kindle Fire HD. Everything is faster and more polished. It is markedly thin and light (if you don't put the Origami case on it). My only complaint is that the email program will not delete email from Comcast's mail server. Hopefully, this will be fixed in Ver. 3.1. My work-around is to use Enhanced Email.!! Update - 11-23-13 !! Ver. 3.1 released, and it fixed the Comcast mail server deletion issue. Be sure to delete any existing email accounts and re-enter the info. Go into Advanced Setup after you type your email address and be sure to set the delete parameter after Inbox deletion.

Reviews.Title: Amaz(on)ing set-up experience, awesome power
Reviews.Author: ThierryE
Reviews.Content: The user experience for the set-up of the device was intuitive and seamless.I own a lot of Amazon provided content; books, video, audio, and it all sync'd to the device pretty much instantly, turning the tablet into a content rich environment which is a joy to explore and experience.Like other reviewers, I cannot believe how light the device is, considering how powerful it is.The screen is beautiful, watching HD movies is spectacular.

Reviews.Title: Great kindle!
Reviews.Author: Sophie
Reviews.Content: Have finally upgraded from the original and love the new one even more.  I love all the added upgrades and using amazon prime.

Reviews.Title: First Look and Mayday Button
Reviews.Author: Adam Rakhamim

} } } Length:: 9:26 MinsThis is my first kindle fire, and I am still getting used to a lot of the features, but so far I am very impressed with the display and the Mayday button.(One thing that I am not happy about is the limited about of productivity apps, but I'm sure as time goes on, the amount of compatible apps will increase.)

Reviews.Title: Google Play!!!
Reviews.Author: QuietBillG "William E Gilbert"
Reviews.Content: I would give this a 5 star rating if it had the Google Play store!  This BULL S*** competition between Amazon and Google is only hurting Amazon's customers!!Amazon does not sell it's own phone, so most of us have Android phones (crapples are not real phones!) so we buy apps from the Google Play Store. If we want to use the same app on a Kindle Fire we have to buy it again and that is only if it is available in the Amazon App store (and MOST are NOT)!!And I am NOT going to root this. It should function correctly right out of the box.I will NOT be buying another Amazon product until they fix this issue!! The Fire TV is a waste of money until this is resolved!I will keep the Amazon Prime because I can use it on my Roku, Tivo, xBox 360, xBox One, PS3, PS4, Vizo TV, and my laptops (and it is a good deal).QUIT HURTING YOUR CUSTOMERS!!!!Edit: I want to clarify my opinion here - I love the hardware in this tablet, it is an outstanding tablet for the Amazon infrastructure. It is just not very useful for anything else.

Reviews.Title: Office Suites not really installed
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: First of all I love my new Kindle Fire HDX for overall content delivery. However I must point out what I believe to be false advertising in regards to Office Suite. What you get by default is just an Office document viewer. You do not get the Office Suite application which cost additional money.Even the Mayday rep thought the real Office Suites was supposed to be installed. I'm very disappointed in Amazon for implying that the real Office Suite was installed.

Reviews.Title: Prefer it over the IPAD
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle HDX 8.9 through Best Buy with my reward points and I must say I really enjoy it. I am a current Kindle HD owner, but my child confiscated it from me so I used this as an excuse to upgrade. First thing I notice is the HDX is thin and very light. The sound is incredible, the screen is very nice and the processing is smooth. I haven't had any issues with the device, but it is an electronic so I am sure it will freeze up or get hung up somewhere down the line. I have owned an IPAD before and after using the HDX I truly believe I over-payed on the IPAD. I am a true believer in the KIndle after owning one previously. It does everything I want it to for a much lower price (Even though I got it for free). I did have enough points for an IPAD but I still chose the HDX. The sound is so much better than the IPAD, the picture, in my opinion is better,  The only thing I don't like is that Amazon does not have a NOOK app. I wanted to retrieve my NOOK books, but I suppose it is good business not to promote a competitor. I would recommend the HDX or the regular HD to people.

Reviews.Title: does so  many things but does not print from browser
Reviews.Author: Corbaley
Reviews.Content: I was so impressed to read all the many things this does, but, according to Mayday, the BROWSER IS NOT COMPATIBLE TO PRINT. This means you can't print anything from anywhere on the internet. My Mayday rep informed me of a "work around" and I tried it but I was not able to print the full page I was trying to, the quality was poor, and it only works on a single page. This is a HUGE oversight to me, to not even have this be mentioned in all the advertising, and it might well be a deal breaker.Yes, it will print from email and original documents but this is not adequate for me in a tablet that is advertised to be able to stand alone.. Even my little, old iPod touch is able to print directly from the internet to my wireless printer with ease. I just spent a lot of money to get something that doesn't provide a major function I need. Have to think on whether it goes back as maybe the next model will provide this basic function. Shame on you, Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: WIFI huh??????
Reviews.Author: Michael Regener
Reviews.Content: Amazon. How can you sell a product that's this poor. The WIFI on this device, was it even tested?? Product consistently drops its WIFI connection with no cause and seemingly no fix from Amazon support. At least issue a statement and tell us your working on a fix!Yes the product has great features. BUT WHAT GOOD ARE THEY IF YOU CANT CONNECT OR YOU KEEP GETTING DISCONNECTED FROM YOUR INTERNET. I DOUBT IPAD HAS THIS ISSUE. GET REAL GUYS AND TEST THIS STUFF BEFORE YOU START MASS PRODUCING AND SELLING THESE PRODUCTS!

Reviews.Title: notso hotso
Reviews.Author: DixPix "DixPix"
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased the Fire HDX and the Google tablet, our first two tablets. The Nexus is wonderful. Although it is a great size at 8.9 inches, I find the Fire tablet to be very frustrating.When using the keyboard it seems that it put spaces in all over the place and is very hard to type what we want. When editing it is almost impossible to put the cursor where you want it - sometimes the cursor is not visible and sometimes it isn't showing up even though the computer has you set to type from that spot . The capitalization seems to jump around without asking it to. It seems to put a space at the beginning of each paragraph, and takes several steps to get rid of it since you can't move the cursor accurately. Voice recognition is ever so much better on the Google Nexus.  And in general the screen touch sensitivity just seems to be off.  Lots of retyping.When you set a bookmark it is named sometimes in caps sometimes not, sometimes with icons and sometimes not.  Bookmarks are in one menu system at the top left. Saving a bookmark is in another menu on the right. The buttons on the edge of the screen are not there for some of the applications, so you have to get completely out of the application to get the home button back.We knew that the application store would not include many of the games and other applications that are available on all other tablets. Didn't think that would be such a big deal. But to discover that some very common applications and games are not available in any way on this tablet makes it much less useful.I could go on with many other little frustrations, and there are many more . This is probably a fine tablet for some people, but it sure isn't working out for me.

Reviews.Title: Watch out for wifi version
Reviews.Author: Fred Williams
Reviews.Content: I was really looking forward to using the Kindle Fire HDX. Bought the 32 meg version in wifi only. Therein lies the problem. When it works it works well. But it has difficulty hanging on to wifi signals and just quits at times. Apps don't update well with wifi. Display is great but it just doesn't work well with wifi, even though I am 20 feet from the router.

Reviews.Title: Failure to Sync Unsolved, Wide-Spread....
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Church
Reviews.Content: Told last night that CS rep had filled out a ream of concerns over failure to Sync. Suggested that I not return or replace pending developments. This is, possibly, good news as resources likely are being assigned. Still steamed over being dumped by prior upper-level tech. Amazon should pursue why I was not called back, if only based on my oversized purchases. No excuse for lies or evasions. As a former customer-relations manager, I found people really want the truth if a solution is not immediately available. Not ready for release: Repeatedly drops Wi-Fi during movies. Connectivity is solid on other devices. As annoying, neither email contacts or calendars sync. Been blown off on the first by engineering, which wanted my birth weight. As for the second, escalated -- if you can call it that -- to someone who claimed a bad connection and promised to call right back -- 11 hours ago.

Reviews.Title: Depends what you're looking for...
Reviews.Author: Stefanie
Reviews.Content: First, the pros - beautiful picture and screen. Perfect size - big enough to see things easily, but small enough to comfortable hold it and extremely light (one of the best aspects). Movies play wonderfully and books are easy to read and access. Now the cons - if you are accustomed to the large number of apps offered by Android and Apple, then you will be extremely disappointed. The app selection is seriously lacking and the apps that they do offer are way behind the ball on updates. Due to Google licensing issues, there are no Google apps (e-mail, Chrome, Google+, Drive, etc). Most of the stuff can be accessed in a roundabout way or over the Internet, but certainly not as convenient. Definitely don't read too much into the "built on Android operating system" comment in terms of apps. The other issue that I've had is, while it's generally pretty fast, it disconnects from the wireless router a lot. I consistently have to go in, turn wifi off and then turn it back on, so it reconnects - that issue is by far the most irritating.Personal opinion, it's nice, but I probably wouldn't purchase it again.

Reviews.Title: Significant Limitations
Reviews.Author: ROBERT J TOTH
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Kindle Fire to use when traveling. Works fine as a storage and reading device for books. Unfortunately this Kindle is very weak when used for streaming from, or working on, the internet. Freezes easily which requires turning off WiFi and then turning back on to correct problem. This unit is near worthless when used for in-flight streaming. Do not purchase this Kindle if you plan to stream video when traveling by air. Flat out does not work. I would not have purchased this Kindle if I had been aware of its' limitations. Wish I could have written a more positive review. - I have been very satisfied with my old non color Kindle.

Reviews.Title: So much potential, but it falls quite short.
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I really liked this device,  after a few days of use to get to know it. It is very responsive, intuitive, and versatile. However it also crashes on graphics intensive applications and would constantly freeze to the point where I had to power cycle the device by holding down the power button to force a shutdown.I had very little expectations when I purchased this. I mainly wanted it for searching the web when I was away from a PC and reading books. I found myself hardly using any of my PCs at all, and completely relying on this device for videos, web browsing, reading books, shopping on amazon, and playing games.If it was not for the freezing/crashing issues, I would have gladly kept it and my review would have been 5 stars. Maybe I just received a dud, and with amazons 30 day, no-questions-asked return policy on the hdx, it is well worth trying yourself if you are on the fence.

Reviews.Title: No Epub Support
Reviews.Author: M. Phillips "tx.parrothead"
Reviews.Content: Had this, sent it back.  I found out too late it does not support Epub books.  Since I have over 2000 books in this format this device became essentially useless to me.  I wish I had done my homework first and found this out.  And SHAME ON AMAZON for not supporting the industry standard for electronic publishing.  I will not even consider a Kindle until that happens.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Tablet...Returned my Mom's iPad Air...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Hello Folks,I have written over 150 reviews. I started my reviews recently but I have been a member of Amazon since the company started selling online in 1995. I am not a person that says, "I know it all" but trust me, I purchase thousands of dollars worth of products a year from Amazon. If I do not like the item after testing it or wearing it or even better, looking at the way it was manufactured, I return it.I purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 32GB for my mother for Christmas. My brother bought her the iPad Air. After my mother used both tablets, we returned the iPad Air because it was so difficult to use especially with the game Ruzzle, the play screens and layout were for some reason different and confusing on the iPad, just to name a few negatives.My mom uses the Kindle HDX Tablet for email, a few games and surfing the net. She reads her books on it and jots down notes with the tablet. The Kindle HDX is one Amazing Tablet and for the price, you cannot beat the deal! The screen is crystal clear, sharp and vivid. The colors are bright, true, and brilliant.Amazon "Nailed It" with the Kindle vs. iPad TV Ad. The Kindle is a fraction of the cost and the quality of the Kindle HDX is just as good if not better than the iPad. With Apple, you are paying for the name, nothing else. Apple gives you nothing extra, in fact, the iPad is a Tablet with no bells or whistles but yet because the name Apple is written on it, the company feels they can "Rip-Off" the customer and charge an arm and a leg for the iPad. Also, Apple tracks you all over the web including the push for you to purchase the Apple Cloud Storage space. This is sale smasher in itself. No company will tell me I have to purchase cloud storage when the cloud is not safe.When we first registered the iPad, Apple wanted all kinds of information, it was intrusive and aggravating. Registering the Kindle HDX was as simple as a few clicks.The iPad cannot even run flash, we tried, it would not work.Buy the Kindle HDX, you will not look back especially for the price you paid. If Amazon puts an SD Card Slot in the next version of the Kindle, it will be a hands down slam dunk winner and could crush Samsung.I hope this review helped. If it did, please click the "yes" button on the right side. Thank you

Reviews.Title: BEST OF THE BEST
Reviews.Author: B. Blankenship "Girls Can Hunt 2"
Reviews.Content: I was debating on purchasing a Kindle tablet for a year and a half, and right before Christmas, I started looking again to see if I really wanted to drop the money into one. My husband told me to get it, since I didn't buy myself much. We looked at the Apple Air on Walmart.com and then we actually saw a commercial for this NEW Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" screen being compared to the Kindle Fire HDX. Once I received it, I haven't been able to put it down. I'm now actually glad that I waited to get the newest and latest edition. The megapixels are unbelievable. It is so clear, very user friendly, and Amazon even has a "Mayday" button to where you can connect to a live person if you need help with anything. It is amazing, I downloaded many apps for my little boy that I home school, he is in kindergarten, and many of the apps. I downloaded were free. Amazon even gave me FREE 500 coins to purchase apps. and books, videos, and every time you purchase something with the coins, you earn more in return. I loved it so much, I even bought my husband one, 3 days after I bought mine. He received his today (Thurs. Dec. 26, 2013) and absolutely loves it!! GREAT PRODUCT, HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

Reviews.Title: Really cool device
Reviews.Author: Tony Hammitt
Reviews.Content: I got this for myself for a Christmas present (from my kids :) )Really nice device, well-designed, rugged, lots of cool apps of course.  The Origami case basically doubled the weight, at 11.7 ounces itself (device is 13.7)Signing up with Verizon wasn't as seamless as I'd want, but that's on them.  Their website should give you all the options you need but it doesn't.  It is nice being able to keep using it where there's no Wi-Fi.The new Kindle book software is cool, too.  I use it to get to sleep, tell it to read me a story out loud and I'm out within a few minutes.  I've been having it read me Poe though, so I should expect some odd dreams...  I gave the text-to-speech a bit of a challenge with Huck Finn and it did OK.  Doesn't handle the extremely colloquial language well, but it's still understandable.  Would have liked it if it bleeped the n-word, but I can see why people may not want that; editing literature is evil, but it'd be a nice option.The screen is amazing, literally beyond your eye's resolving power.  Battery life is pretty good.  Seems better than my kids' Fire 7" models, which seem fine really.Great product overall, no complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: Finally freed from the iPad
Reviews.Author: Stephen Aniston
Reviews.Content: I love the scroll wheel, tabs and buttons combination on the UI. The scroll wheel and the tabs on top are what I use the most to buy new content or watch or read what I have recently started. Saves me a lot of time and is very intuitive. Finally, I have been freed from the delirium of icons on the Apple iOS. The screen is brilliant, fantastic colors and it does not give me a headache like the iPad. The responsiveness of most functions is lightning quick speaking to the quality of the microprocessor and graphics card. It is extremely thin and light as well. I like the plastic back as well as putting this a tablet on a table doesn't have to enduce scratchy sounds. The ability to combine Amazon Instant Video and Prime Video in one unified library so I can rent or watch movies is priceless and is the reason I have wanted this device for so long. Book buying is obviously the Amazon bread and butter and it's done well. Buying magazines is also a very nice and an easy experience.  There are two downsides so far is that 3rd party apps and games are not up to par with Apple, but that is not really that important for me.  Also the Silk browser can definitely be improved. I had a much better web browsing experience on the iPad Safari. Somehow I was always thrown on the mobile pages and I should have the option to browse in regular mode.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, but special offers can drain the battery
Reviews.Author: DaMaDo "DaMaDo"
Reviews.Content: There's tons of detailed reviews so I'll just add that the special offers consumes 30% battery per hour on mine. It ran out faster than my smartphone. I'd consider that $20 upgrade.Other than that it's an amazing tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Device.
Reviews.Author: check "test"
Reviews.Content: Awesome device. Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 has good hardware and has an excellent software system. The picture quality on the HDX is stunning. It is noticeably better than the HD, there is no comparison between the two of them.

Reviews.Title: PRIME Member returned after 2 weeks & My "Mayday" experience
Reviews.Author: MountainMan "David"
Reviews.Content: The Good1 - Built-in Dictation. This feature works pretty damn good. See:dmediamomDotCom/2013/12/11/are-you-using-the-kindle-fire-hdx-dictation-feature/2 - Screen, duh! It *is* nice and everybody has talked about it.3 - Keyboard, especially "long-press" for numbers and special characters.4 - There is a scrollable word correction display as you type that would be annoying on an android phone but work well here.5 - Battery charges to 100% overnight and I have never gone below 50% with the exact same usage I gave my laptop every day. But I do not remain tethered to it like some people that I know. As for playing games, although I had about a dozen on the HDX I did not find one addictive enough to play for more than just a little while.The Bad (FYI, submitted to Amazon's returns-feedback email address.)1- Documents I copied over according to directions that the HDX provided after clicking on the "Docs" menu were not showing up in the docs section. I copied them over in individual year-dated subdirectories that the HDX does not recognize. It appears that, although folders (sub-directories) can be copied from laptops to Documents through Android File Manager (AFM) and are visible on the kindle through AFM, the Kindle software through the DOCS menu cannot see sub-directories (folders). I have several years of files on my laptop that reside in their respective years' folders. It appears the only option I have is to copy every year into the single Documents folder on the Kindle. This is unacceptable as it would make sorting (without renaming each and every file) impossible because most of the files have the same name. Sub-directories and sub-folders have been included since computers' existence. Leaving such a basic capability out (it is not even a "feature" but a common sense capability of all computing) makes the Kindle Fire HDX "Documents" menu item useless. This screams for a software update. Fortunately, I could see the document subdirectories in ES file explorer and in Kingsoft Office.2 - I also tried using the email documents option. The only problem with that is you cannot edit documents once they get to Kindle because double-clicking on the document pops it into Kindle like it was a non-editable book.3 - I could not watch live internet television due to I get the "need to update flash player." Sideloading Adobe Flash works but audio/visual is out of sync. I tried with both Firefox and Dolphin. Forums here and on XDA were no help. "Mayday" rep said "they are working on it and I will submit a ticket." Like that would help with a known issue.4 - Attempted to watch CBS's new series Intelligence." When prompted, I allowed Amazon's BETA streaming player to load but the video/audio sync is still off. Audio is before video. To confirm it was not my router, I put the Kindle HDX next to my laptop and started both of them at the same time. My laptop was perfectly sync'ed. [Note I was only offered to use this BETA software when watching CBS, not CNN or other networks streaming through the internet.]5 - The most disturbing thing to me is that after using Amazon's BETA streaming player for 30 minutes it started playing commercials! It even-numbered them in the top left corner one of five. The same exact feed through my internet router had ZERO commercials. I paid $15 to not be bothered with commercials but yet I get them on Amazon's BETA streaming player! I don't care if it is a beta player. I am not going to be a beta tester after paying nearly $500! This was the final straw for me deciding to return the HDX."Mayday" rep had not heard of, nor had any notification of an Amazon BETA streaming player. Such things are to be expected from large corporations that typically do not inform Customer Service Reps about BETAs or updates. However, even after the rep put me on hold (meaning she was asking someone else), she denied any knowledge of any such "workaround" and suggested I sideload Adobe Flash. I explained I already tried that.From my career as a Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3 CSR and trainer in hardware and software support I know that even the best CSR's will not know everything if they don't think outside of the box and keep asking questions from "veteran" reps and their Systems people. Instead, I received the "I apologize" excuse ad infinitum despite the fact that I told the rep that she had no reason to apologize as it was not her fault that a basic feature expected from all such hardware is sorely lacking in the HDX.6 - If you are used to texting on your phone, type and edit in portrait mode. Typing in landscape is difficult. Swipe is not supported. Every piece of nonsupported software that I try to sideload eventually had glitches and problems trying to run on the HDX.7 - I explained that I could not find a way to change the internet background color on websites in Silk. The white background is hard on my eyes and the screen has a bad glare on it. She hesitated for a moment, checked her screen and advised that there indeed was no way to change it. I now know that changing to "Reader View" allows for font and color changes. The "Mayday" rep was either not sufficiently trained or was not provided hands-on testing after the training; either of which would have solved that problem.8 - As far as the Carousel is concerned, I want the same icons on it every time and I don't want them moving around based on usage frequency. And, adding the first photo from the photo collection to the carousel each and every time I go to photos even if I never looked at that first photo is really annoying. The rep explained that she understood and started to explain my options of deleting or moving each Carousel item. I explained that I already knew this as well as just scrolling the Carousel up to hide it but that lack of simple customization is frustrating.9 - If I attach a photo to an email and then later go out and choose photos from the top menu it brings up the email. Just a tiny bug that can probably be quickly fixed. This should have been caught before rushing this to market but this type of bug is typical for corporations that rush products to market to beat holiday (or other internal) deadlines.10 - Screen glare is bad especially on the Bezel. A color other than white might help the screen background but the only option to change the screen background is while reading a Kindle book or in Silk's "Reading Mode." A black bezel is not recommended for any product if you will be using it in a brightly-lit room or where there is artificial light behind you. I notice no difference from my current laptop's 1680x1050 resolution except my laptop glare is much less.11 -  It is a fingerprint magnet. You need to leave a soft glasses cleaner cloth nearby.12- As almost all people have noticed, there is a pesky backlight issue. At first I thought it was because of the extremely sensitive screen but it makes no difference how long you leave your finger on the screen. Moving from screen to screen causes the screen to change from bright to dim with auto-brightness turned off. The screen is way too dim with auto-brightness turned on.13 - I could not access Kindle book discussions from the book menu. I do not think HDX is a complete "fail" or the software is completely broken but, even as a PRIME, movie-watching member, I can't live with it. You will need time and patience for its learning curve and for software updates if you need to do more than what it was designed for, reading books and watching Prime movies.Last, it was very difficult to hear my "Mayday" rep [name omitted for this review], even with the HDX volume turned all the way up and my home completely quiet. This may also be attributed to either not having her headset adjusted correctly or her non-English accent.  And NO, there is nothing wrong with my hearing! I got the definite impression that she was extremely uncomfortable in her job due to she was not prepared. Hiring bi-lingual reps strictly for their language capabilities and ignoring their lack of customer service experience and lack of communication skills is a Human Resources issue that I strongly suggest Amazon address if they want to keep their "#1 Customer Satisfaction" rating." Finally, when I asked the "Mayday" rep to help start my return process, she again put me on hold and a minute later another (male) rep came on the line. I could hear him saying hello to me but because the original rep left her system on hold, he could not hear me, nor could I see him. He continued to try saying hello to me with my hellos going un-answered for 5 minutes until the connection was lost. My email address was previously confirmed and the first rep accessed my account so they also had my phone number. When a connection is lost, common customer service dictates the rep attempt to contact the customer again. Not here! This experience was the poorest I have ever received from any company in my 30 years of IT experience. Fortunately, Amazon's Returns policy does not require a customer service rep's help and I initiated the return myself online.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: I never take the time to write a review, but I had to write regarding my Kindle which my husband bought me for Christmas.  I LOVE IT.  I love the live help.  One thing I do wish is that the volume went a little louder.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Brian D Klaus
Reviews.Content: I never thought I'd stray from Apple products but this tablet has convinced me otherwisegreat display, ease of use, decent battery life, free app every daycan't rave about this more

Reviews.Title: What can I say????
Reviews.Author: RiverCat
Reviews.Content: I say, Fabulous!  I have to sit in a chair for 3 1/2 hours on M T and W, for dialysis.  My first,generation kindle died;  I bought the top of the line model hoping it would last longer.  It is so easy to use and I have it enclosed in an Origami cover; it sits on its own and needs no prop, just my lap.  The color is so good and I can adjust the size of the font for my”chemo” eyes.  It is just so handy, I love, love it...I even named it Mary in honor of my FB friend who sent me my first Kindle as a gift.  Mary and I go every where together, reading a book, playing a game, searching the web...too cool

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: sharon Trank
Reviews.Content: I gave a ipad, I bought this for my son for Christmas and he says it's better than my ipad!  Personal preference but I agree that it is strongly made and we gave had no problems what so ever.

Reviews.Title: So Easy to Use!!!
Reviews.Author: Carollee
Reviews.Content: I watch movies, read books, download music, play games and everything is so easy.  And there is always that wonderful help button if you need direction.  Best money I've spent in a long time!!!

Reviews.Title: Great kindle!
Reviews.Author: Lacey
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law for mothers day and she absolutely loves it! It's very light weight and the screen is awesome!! Very nice!

Reviews.Title: My new favorite
Reviews.Author: sbb
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle I liked my Fire Kindle but the HD is the best!!! Love it love it love it!!

Reviews.Title: Worthwhile Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sweeties Dad
Reviews.Content: I really like the help function. It worked perfectly and was as advertised. Amazing! Size is great and it seems to hold a charge for a long period. Very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: The Best Thing Since Sliced White Bread!
Reviews.Author: Clear Blue "clearblue"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this thing! It has made my book reading, movie watching, game playing, web searching existence mobile!  I can now take what I love most anywhere! The font is bright and readable with varying sizes to choose from. The battery lasts forever! Well, 12 hrs and somewhat more. I love the origami case which is beyond fabulous because you can form it and it feels like a real book cover! I can take it into the kitchen with me and set it up on the counter so that I can see it while I am preparing a recipe! I love that! Or if I'm into a movie, oh and movies are beautiful on this thing and the sound is the best I've ever heard even better than my Toshiba laptop. When it is near dinner time I can take it with me to the kitchen, prepare dinner and continue watching my movie. It is so light and easy to carry. I really do not see why there are ANY negative reviews on this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. The apps are awesome and I found some free books on facebook using pixel of ink. People have to be crazy to rate this little jewel any less than five stars. I highly recommend it! You won't be disappointed. Give yourself time to get use to it and learn all its functions. It has a ton!

Reviews.Title: Good but not Great
Reviews.Author: Martin D Waugh
Reviews.Content: Not being able to access so many apps is very frustrating.Not having the freedom to use applications on the Fire severely limits you.Slow response time with the Amazon apps is also surprising and frustratingIf this isn't fixed I will go with another tabletPlease upgrade Amazon! The ability to use other systems only makes your tablet more desirable

Reviews.Title: the best kindle fire ever
Reviews.Author: Kendall
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire.  I bought the first kindle fire that was made.  I loved that one, but now I have the new 8.9" HDX.  This is the cat's meow!  It is very fast and very clear in video and sound. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is everything I expected plus a whole lot more.  Upon arrival I selected the May day feature for assistance with set up and within five minutes I was up and running.  All my stored items from my old Kindle was there too.  I LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: twinmom42
Reviews.Content: Had the Kindle Fire HDX 7" but my eyesight is not as good as it used to be so I upgraded to the 8.9".  It is incredible what a difference the size makes.  I thought it might be a little heavier given the larger size but it is about the same and it still fits in my purse.  I wish I had purchased this to begin with!  Great device with awesome Amazon service.

Reviews.Title: Amazon does it again!
Reviews.Author: jkl.
Reviews.Content: I received my first Kindle as a gift and thought it could not get any better.  I was hesitant to upgrade to the newer HDX and larger display.  Once it arrived, all doubt was gone.  Lighter, clearer display, great features.  Toss the laptop and other cumbersome gadgets.  This has everything I need.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: gekmikey
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what i need to use.  Only thing isnot having google play. Have had no problems. Would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: so. awesome
Reviews.Author: happyin2son
Reviews.Content: I have gone from original Fire to HD Fire to HDX. I really like the bigger screen. I don't like the change in orientation in Words with Friends. I really like reading my email on the HDX.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Loving Life
Reviews.Content: best little tablet a person could hope for reasonable price,clearity perfect, great size especially for those of us over 40 (lol) I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Choice for Me
Reviews.Author: Staci Ann
Reviews.Content: I had thought I was an all "apple girl".  Sorry apple, Kindle fire HDX has surpassed you with their Mayday feature.  It is worth it's weight in gold.  Every agent has been able to speak to me in my language without accents that I don't understand. I have had that issue many times with other companies. Mayday techs are also knowledgeable and the BEST customer support I have ever come across.  As for the product itself, I can do everything that I wanted to straight from my kindle. The sound is great, the picture is beautiful.  There are plenty of apps available.  The kindle is aesthetically gorgeous.  I am so happy with my purchase which I was afraid to make.  Silly me. I would have gotten it sooner if I would have known.

Reviews.Title: Too many problems
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife bought a kindle Fire HDX 2 1/2 months ago. Two weeks later, the screen suddenly went blank and the device didn't work anymore. We brought it back to the store and they kindly exchanged it for another one. The store's tech person said that this was a common problem with the Kindle Fires. The second device worked fine for two months, but suddenly last week, it started turning off at random times. Now we are exchanging this second Kindle for a third, this time through Amazon customer service.I suggest customers get a regular tablet if that's what they want. Amazon should stick to making e-readers.

Reviews.Title: Nice but has a major flaw
Reviews.Author: E. Bennett "Shopsalot"
Reviews.Content: I like the device, however, what I've found is a lack of compatibility with my other Android devices.  Few of my Google play apps are compatible with the kindle and that's a big disappointment.  A big one is that I can't use my chromecast device with it.  So be aware that you are pretty much limited to Amazon for apps and many Android apps won't work.  If you don't need a lot of other apps, it's a nice little device for Netfix, basic browsing, reading and kindle games.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet, especially good if you are just using it for multimedia, the one to get over the HD if getting a Kindle
Reviews.Author: JM in NY
Reviews.Content: I have been fortunate to be able to compare this product directly to several other tablets in this size category, namely the ipad mini, Dell Venue Pro 8, and also the new version regular Kindle HD 7.  First off, if you are going to get a Kindle, get this one.  While I am not sure the screen upgrade is noticeable under the majority of conditions, the processor upgrade definitely is.  The HDX is much faster and more fluid, whereas the regular HD is noticeably sluggish and does not handle things like streaming movies nearly as well.  If you are using it primarily as a media device (reading, watching movies, listening to music) the HDX does pretty well.  It has a simple to use interface, the carousel makes it easy to get back to things you were recently viewing or using like tv shows or apps, Amazon purchased movies, music etc automatically show up--no searching for apps and hoping they work, just click on music or movies and they are there.  If you want to watch Vikings using the History app it actually works, whereas the ipad hangs most of the time (the Dell doesn't have the HC app but you can just go to the website and it works fine--the Dell is much faster/more at home on the web than the others).  So while the Ipad has more apps, they are much more likely to not work from my testing, whereas the Kindle ones, though fewer, seem more likely to actually work.  Your basic multimedia apps like Netflix, Hulu, etc are there (though not Vudu at the time of this review).  There is a Roku app so you can use the Kindle as the remote for your Roku if you have one (which gets you a keyboard rather than picking out each letter when searching).  The speakers are quite good, noticeable on music compared to the ipad.  Main downsides would be a smaller screen than the competitors mentioned, and it is somewhat pricey, especially compared to the Dell Venue Pro 8, which has a larger screen and the more full operating system if you are looking for more of a netbook replacement.  It also seems somewhat slow to charge and doesn't seem to hold a charge as long as the others mentioned, which is somewhat odd given the smaller screen size.  The browser is somewhat cheesy and internet usage is slower than with the Dell/Windows device, probably on a par with the Ipad which is also somewhat slow (although when I say that it is comparable with the ipad using Mercury, Safari is pretty bad so the Kindle probably does better than the ipad using the default Safari).  The HDX seems to find and connect to networks faster/more smoothly than the Ipad, which again seems sluggish at that and tends to hang.  The only other con I can think of is for Android devices in general not just the kindle, and that would be the Big Brotherish nature of Android apps compared to say a comparable windows one (and we don't know on Apple ones, since they don't seem to even let you know what permissions you are granting).  An app that from the Windows side wants 1-3 permissions might well want a dozen or more from Android, and you are left wondering why some basic calculator app or whatever needs to have access to all of your contacts, identity, location, etc., so if you worry about such things you end up using a lot less of the apps than you might, even though they are available.  Still, if you want an easy to use no hassles way to watch movies, read books, listen to music, and occasionally browse the web a bit, the Kindle is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Donald Ngai "Donald"
Reviews.Content: I loved the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and couldn't wait to trade it in when the new version came out.  The screen is clearer, brighter and much faster.  Everything I do is so much quicker than the older model.  Play movies, browse, etc.

Reviews.Title: Charge Port Problem???
Reviews.Author: L Hughes
Reviews.Content: I DO LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE 8.9 hdx..But...sometimes it will charge and sometimes it wont..I noticed from day one that the charger was crooked when it was plugged in...Set at an abnormal angle...This is very frustrating...Contacted support..They are sending another one...Very upset....You get it set up with pictures and all your apps and then you have to start from scratch...My original Kindle did not do this...The cost of the 8.9 hdx is pretty high so I expect more from them...Obviously this is a known problem with the Amazon Kindle and we were not told....If they plug up the kindle before they sell it they could not miss the crooked plug....A lot of people are having the SAME PROBLEM..Recall????? Read the threads....To many people with this same problem...May want to wait until they get the things fixed before you buy...

Reviews.Title: kindlefire HDX
Reviews.Author: V Betz
Reviews.Content: i cant go without it..tjr best thing i ever got for myself.. i take it everywhere i go... drs dds its the best.i even watch my movies.read play games skype..look up things cooking..and so handy to take in your purse.  LOVE IT.......10+

Reviews.Title: kindle Fire HDX8.9, HDX,WI-Fi,16GB
Reviews.Author: Rose's
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle HDX. The Screen is so striking the color is something else! The colors are so true to form. I would really recommend this to anyone who watches movies,and enjoy playing games. I also read on my kindle. Now, if I could beat candycrush I really be happy. That game is so addicting! I love it!

Reviews.Title: really hoping for this tablet to be better than it is
Reviews.Author: Ryan E. Crichton "Evil Ryan"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire HDX 64GB (without special offers).  If I could I'd give it a 3.5 star rating, but I can't quite bring myself to give it 4 stars.  I was really, really hoping for this tablet to be better than it is.  While there are plenty of pluses, the minuses are just too significant.On the plus side, I love how sharp and bright the display is, and it is incredibly light (even after I added a bluetooth keyboard/case to it).  As someone who is very invested in Amazon products (on my Android phone I am all about the Amazon MP3 player and Kindle e-reader app), it is great to have a device that doesn't have all that Google Play bloatware on it, and I love that the music player and e-reader are integrated into the OS on the Kindle Fire (although there are a few things about the music player that could be better).But now for the downside (and there's much more downside than I'd like).  Firstlly, the tablet is glitchy.  I'm constantly finding that when I click on an icon on the home page, nothing happens, and I have to go up to the carousel to get the app to start (which is really annoying when the app I want to use is one I haven't used in a while, so I have to scroll through the carousel trying to find it).  And even more frustrating is how many apps I have that routinely crash.  This seems especially true for high end apps (like almost all of the games I play on it).So while I love the integration with Amazon, and have no complaints about the interface, at the end of the day Amazon needs to put a lot more effort into making their operating system more stable than it is.  I don't know if the problem is that FireOS is starting to be enough different from Android that standard Android apps aren't fully compatible, but whatever it is, it is something Amazon needs to address sooner rather than later if they want the Kindle Fire HDX to truly be a top-end tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the best!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon fan "Lourdes"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 a few months ago. It is awesome. You can take great pics with it (8 megapixels). It is very user friendly and there are many apps to choose from, also tons of books. If you like to play music on your Kindle you will not be disappointed, the quality of the sound is incredible. I had previously owned a Kindle Fire 7" and after buying the 8.9 HDX gave the older one to my sister.. she loves it. I would highly recommend the Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 to everyone that desires a great tablet. You really can't ask for much more!!

Reviews.Title: Kingle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love it.  Since I have pain in my hands, it is so helpful to be able to hold it and not have to turn page.  I must admit, I didn't think I was going to like it because I am an avid reader andthought I would miss holding my beloved books.

Reviews.Title: A very good device
Reviews.Author: Duckman "Duckman"
Reviews.Content: I thought with having 64 GB would give me plenty of space for storage, boy was I wrong.  I bought it mainly for use on vacation, reading and returning emails, watching movies or reading books.  The movies especially in 1080p take up a lot of space, as much as six GB each.  This leaves little room for anything else.  I will say thou, the picture quality is outstanding.  The best I've ever seen, even better than a I pad.  I just wish that there was a slot for removable storage. Also the I would like to mention that the sound for such a small device is also very good.  hard to believe that such full rich sound can come out of such a small speaker. As long as you understand it's limitations, don't hesitate to buy one.

Reviews.Title: Great product and enjoying it
Reviews.Author: mypointofview
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift for my wife and she has been thrilled with it.  I know she has enjoyed many hours playing games and reading books on it.  She is fairly non-technical and I'm very technical as I work in the industry.  I judge how good a product is by how much she asks me to solve problems for her and that has been zero with the kindle fire HDX.  As the saying goes, if the wife is happy, I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: Happy customer
Reviews.Author: judy
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my kindle, everyday I learn more about it, this is my third kindle I have purchased. I have one that my son gave me as a present, the black and white $69 one, that started me out. I use that one mostly for reading. My kindle hdx  fire was purchased to use for traveling so that we can stay connected if need be to the internet, our mini computer, so to say, and watch movies on long road trips. I even bought a kindle for my daughter too, as her children broke the one she had. I am very pleased with the color of the kindle hdx, what else can I say I am a very happy owner of all the kindles I own.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Lee Bennett
Reviews.Content: Got i for my wife. She loves it, its fast and she loves the mayday thing. Great product and great service from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet if you do not want iPad
Reviews.Author: Tahni Gould "Tahni"
Reviews.Content: I like this better than the older Kindle. I got this because it had a camera and I did not want the iPAD. Love this Kindle. Even when I had a problem with the first one I got (did not work unless plugged into the wall), easy to get it replaced. I love the things I can do with the camera, video camera and sending these to facebook. Glad I made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best full color tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: My wife is in 7th heaven with this thing. She's an avid book reader and now she can easily take a number of books with her. With all the other features this can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: P. Rosen
Reviews.Content: Great - love it.  Still use regular Kindle for books tho since I find it easier to hold and read.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: Angela Grabinski
Reviews.Content: This is the best gadget I have ever bought.  It goes everywhere with me, I love it.  It is a perfect size and holds so much more than my original first gen kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Easy to hold, beautiful than the picture
Reviews.Author: Wnag Baobao
Reviews.Content: It's much beautiful than the pictures on the web site, much thinner than it looks at the pictures. The back cover is not as smooth as I suposed, it gives me a feeling of touching rub, so it's much easier to be hold in hand without worrying about to drop it on the ground. I love this pad, the sound is wonderful, miracle, astonishing...

Reviews.Title: as before amazon has a home run
Reviews.Author: player
Reviews.Content: excellent product, easy to use, touch screen is very responsive, battery life seems to be good, you cant go wrong

Reviews.Title: wonderful device..........
Reviews.Author: Christine Hall
Reviews.Content: The kindle does everything I wanted it to do. the only dissappoinment is connecting to local internet, it takes several trys and lots of patience for sites to load.

Reviews.Title: I'm having fun with it, althouth I bought it for professional reasons,
Reviews.Author: tttiger "Tinctoris"
Reviews.Content: that is, in order to display my photography in art class, there to be transformed into paintings. The camera is 8mp and much better than the Ipad. I should state that I began my journey with an Ipad Air, only to be disappointed at its contrariness and mediocre 5mp camera. While I haven't used the flash on the Fire, it's good to know it's there when I need it. I find steadying the tablet camera very easy with the Fire, which is something I worried about. I see no difference in the weight between this and the Air, which I returned. I find navigating from screen to screen easy--very intuitive. The picture is bright and clear as a bell. While I don't use the audio much, the speakers are good. I find exploring the web a bit cumbersome with Silk (the browser), but quite do-able. I have called for Mayday assistance three times, and had my questions answered quickly and professionally each time. Amazon has built a good product, and the support behind it is unmatched in the market. Go buy one.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: anncat
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle.  I purchased this particular model to have the unit serve as a portable laptop in addition to being my e-reader.  I would give it  5 stars if I could figure out a way to lock the screen orientation.  I even purchased an app and it doesn't work.  I'm still looking for a suitable cover that serves as an easel.  The one I purchased has a nice notched base-plate, but the back (easel part) is not stiff, so I am unable to set the Kindle at the angle I prefer for reading at a table.  The Kindle slowly tips backwards as the easel relaxes and bends from the weight of the Kindle.As a laptop/notebook computer, this is faster by far than my PC, which isn't the latest or fastest.  I use it primarily for downloading e-mail and doing internet searches.  Using this as a reader, I'm still reading a minimum of 2 books per week and am impatiently waiting for the next books in several series to be published.  I purchased the 16GB model because of a review that reminded me of the cloud, so I can keep the storage at a useful level.All in all, it is "as advertised" and I am very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Danielle Stapleton
Reviews.Content: Don't know what to say.  I like my kindle, only issue was my daughter was about to totally reset to factory settings and lost everything I had on here. Had to redownload it all. Wish that was under parental block too so needed password to access settings

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: PAUL H WHEELWRIGHT
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas this year and I love it. I read books, surf the web, I have even been learning Swedish on it. It is a little different the Apple and Samsung as far as navigating around, but it did not take very long to get really comfortable with it. It is very thin and light weight. The programs load quick and the graphics are awesome!!! My wife has an I Pad, there is no way I would trade my HDX for it. I bought one of the folding covers in leather. It works great all so. I would buy this tablet again and again.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase!
Reviews.Author: Hiwartha V. Donaldson
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet.  I am a workaholic but this tablet is basically for entertainment and it does just what it is made for.

Reviews.Title: Terrific product
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: My huband bought this for himself as a Christmas gift and absolutely loves it .... he is a big reader and had been adamant about having the "feel" of the book in his hands .... now he's addicted to his tablet and downloading his books there .... he says he now doesn't need a light to read and that makes it easy to take with him to catch a read at lunch or waiting in a dr's office ..

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: claire osgood
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Easy to adjust.  Apps I added work well.  Loading speed is average.  It does take a little time to get used to the touchiness of the tablet, but once you have used it a while it is manageable.  Games  are easy to play and see.

Reviews.Title: Fast, convenient, and fun
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I rated this product so high because it performed consistently, was very thin and it's a lightweight. It was easy to carry and connected seamlessly with other bluetooth devices. It is easy on the eyes to read books for long periods of time, and then in the next instant search the internet quickly to bring near instant information to your fingertips. There are lots of good apps to choose from and I think it is priced well. It seems to have enough memory on board to do most anything the average user may need to do. After a month of use, I couldn't tell that it was even used. The screen held up to normal use and I can't see any visible scratches on the surface. It feels like a durable product and will potentially last a long time.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: A Hernandez
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I am so glad I chose the Kindle HDX to me it is better than an Ipad or any other type of tablet I have seen other people using. For my money Kindle HDX all the way.  Great clarity, easy to use.  I'm not a computer person so easy is real important to me.

Reviews.Title: Just Wonderful
Reviews.Author: 1etcetera
Reviews.Content: This in my opinion is just Amazing!  I have a Kindle Fire and purchased the HDX for my husband.  At first he wasn't too keen on it, now he rarely puts it down!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am quite excited about finally getting my hands on the Fire and being able to get it set up so that I can take full advantage of all of its many features.  However, there is one area that concerns me and that is the touted battery length.  So far, with a full charge, I am getting only about 4 - 5 hours of use before I have to recharge it.  I asked Mayday about that and was told to reduce the amount of brightness.  That really hasn't helped very much.  If someone out there has had that issue, please tell me how to get longer battery life.  I also find that there are times that the Fire locks up when playing Solitaire and I have to either let it set for a few minutes to turn it off and reboot.  I ordered the Book for Dummies on line, no local book seller carried one, and it took over two weeks to finally have it arrive.  I would never order another book from that site.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift for my retired father
Reviews.Author: A. J. Mee
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my 64 year-old father for Christmas and he loves it. He loves the large size (it fits his fingers) and its light weight. The real-time help is a God-send. The help staff spent 45 minutes patiently walking my dad through setting up the Kindle. These people are saints. My dad calls in for help about every other day now - setting up the calendar, syncing email addresses, etc. They are polite and helpful. I cannot say enough about them.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Exclusive
Reviews.Content: I rated the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" the way I did, because that is the way it has met my expectations.My dislike has nothing to do with the product; it has to do with the cost and type of accessories available at the moment, and not being able to add memory retrospectively. I would like to know how to upgrade from 16MB to 64 MB.My likes are price, performance and its visual display capability.It is endowed with a variety of applications; eBooks, Movies,and Music. I can immerse myself looking at its screen for hours.I would recommend it to anyone who likes high definition display, its ease of use, and a portable library at their finger tip.

Reviews.Title: This is a great table for the price then IPAD.
Reviews.Author: Mark Doyle
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire HDX 8.9 Tablet. I like it has 2 camera that it's easy to use. Like the style and its lighter then Ipad. The one thing that I wish kindle had is HDMI mini port like there had from the previous Kindle. So I had to get the Nexgeer PTV Push 3000. And it's work great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Ezrway
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  It is so much better than the Google Nexus 7 (2013) I got my wife that died 2 days after the warranty expired.  The 8.9 size is much better than a 7" too.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Rwong "Rwong"
Reviews.Content: I finally join the tablet bandwagon after seeing many co-workers and friends carry their iPad.  Nothing against Apple as I do have a iPhone, but I just didn't want to carry a tablet that is similar to my phone.  Plus, the Kindle Fire HDX was sold at a great price.  I like how you can borrow a book and stream certain shows and movies for FREE if you have an Amazon Prime Account.  Amazon did a great job in creating this tablet.  As for games and apps, the library is growing but I hardly use this table for that.  I use it mostly to browse the Internet and surprisingly read.  I find e-Books very convenient!
