Highly recommend this tablet if your are looking for an Apple alternative.

Reviews.Title: Shocked at how great this is...
Reviews.Author: Sam F.
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical of the entire tablet category, thinking they were just laptops that were less useful. And I didn't like how big full-size iPads were. But after a couple months with this unit, I enthusiastically endorse the HDX. It's completely eliminated the near-nightly fight over the main TV and DVR. The wife doesn't have to be relegated to the bedroom to watch something when we want to watch sports.Admittedly, the strength of this is as a content delivery device. I haven't really used it for office stuff and doubt it would be well-suited for that. But as a method to get books/movies/mags/TV shows, it's really unequaled. The real power isn't fully realized unless combined with Amazon Prime - seamlessly integrated into the operating system. If you have a bunch of Apple or Google Play content, the case for the HDX isn't nearly as compelling, but even then I think it's still a strong case on the combination of ease of use, perfect size, light weight, performance, and price. But with Prime, it's really no contest. Very satisfied. We use our Kindle HDXs (we have both a 7 inch and 8.9 inch) daily.The only thing I wish it had was GPS....you can still use Google Maps (no, it's not in the Amazon App Store, but it's fairly easy to add, along with Chrome, as the included Silk browser...well....kinda sucks) but it won't enable turn-by-turn directions since there's no GPS. Small price to pay for a primarily home-content device, though.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet E-Reader
Reviews.Author: ThatTexanDude56
Reviews.Content: E-Reading +Magazines +/- Not all Mags are digital yet. Need a digital subscription to the The Horse Backstreet Choppers!Surfing Net +Android Games + /- (Not All Work Games For Kindle)Camera + /- (Cannot use for Instagram)Skyping +/- Auto focusing makes a dinging sound kind of annoying. The fix keep you tablet still don't walk around with it.Video +Sound +

Reviews.Title: great screen but does not play WAV files
Reviews.Author: William C Meyer Jr
Reviews.Content: A higher rating would be warranted for great screen.My problem is the HDX does not play WAV files as advertised!First mayday call resulted in being told by nice young lady that wav is not supported.Further research determined that others have this problem.  The HDX is supposed to support wav files.A second mayday call got a person who transfered me to a tech on the phone and we tried to resolve the issue.Finally the d/l of (VLC Plus Pro) would allow the playing of a Verizon voicemail if it was first downloaded.I trust that Amazon engineers are working on a solution to play embedded wav files w/o an app.

Reviews.Title: All I expected and more...
Reviews.Author: Lenny Kraftchick
Reviews.Content: When a product lives up to the high qualities advertised, and delivers the many superior features addressed in its marketing campaign, I believe it deserves the five star rating. The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 does exactly that. In particular, I like the HD display and the quality of sound from the stereo speakers. Since I am replacing my netbook computer, my one concern before purchase was the performance of the Silk browser. This turned out to be no issue. I am very satisfied with the browser speed and the way it performs...a huge increase over the old netbook I was using. I added the Netgear Push2TV device and now enjoy mirroring video and pictures on my large flat screen tv. I have had occasion twice to call on live help through the Mayday function, and both times I had a support person respond within 15 seconds. Wow, that is a nice feature. My one small nitpick is that I wish the speakers played a little louder. Not that big a deal because when I listen to one of my DVD concerts that I converted to MP4 and loaded on the Kindle, I  bluetooth to my outboard speaker.

Reviews.Title: Malfunction
Reviews.Author: Dianne A. Richardson
Reviews.Content: I actually love the Kindle Fie HDX 8.9 but within days of purchasing it the HDX would only display it's name "Kindle Fire" and that was it,  It wouldn't shut down and wouldn't turn on.  I wrote to Amazon but to date have not received as much as a confirmation of my inquiry.  This is my fourth Kindle, all the others, even though I've given them to family members, still work perfectly.  I asked Amazon if it could have been the magnetic cover that is also an Amazon product.  No response.  I purchased both the HDX and the cover at Best Buy.  I had the device exchanged for a new one but am awaiting it via shipment.

Reviews.Title: Is great when it works
Reviews.Author: TxBuyer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle arrived in a nice box, fast shipping time.I set it up and was gladly surprised of the quick response and the browser speed compared to my ipad.The camera is great and the screen looks very nice.After a week or so, I started experiencing some freezes while reading a book (on different books) and the browser took a long time to connect (tried several websites, most of the time tested google to avoid lots of images).Tried the remote help feature and was impressed by this, the response time was great and the support agent very nice. They made some changes on the kindle and worked ok for a few hours but the problem came back again.  I used the help again after a couple of days because of the same problem and got instructions to reset/re-register the Kindle but the problem started again after a few hours. I kept telling the support people that the problem does not happens all the time but it looks like they don't listen and follow a script.Thinking on return it before the 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Shouldn't have elminated the HDMI connection.
Reviews.Author: Milsma
Reviews.Content: Extremely thin and light (until you add the cover).  Graphics and sound quality are excellent.Button position on the back is awkward for wake up.  There is no mini HDMI outlet to connect to TV for HBOGO, etc.

Reviews.Title: Some things awesome, some things not
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Media consumption on the HDX is great--great for movies, videos, and reading your books. Browser is not so great, typing on it is not so great. Seems to have some bugs... For instance, search function begins in the midst of typing search phrase, applications freeze, etc. voice recognition rarely works consistently. Bottom line, cheaper than the iPad and it shows. So, you may dig it if you have never had an iPad...

Reviews.Title: tough experience in australia
Reviews.Author: spud
Reviews.Content: i knew this product dosent have access to the amazon media store and i was ok with that. the media i have got plays awesomely.my biggest problem is the nba league pass app. i thought this device was a fantastic piece of hard to watch the nba on my international league pass. unfortunately due to some weirdness the live game steaming is geo blocked. its driving me nuts and a quick search of the internet shows its driving other non usa people crazy too.for me if this was fixed id give the kindle hdx a five out of five.

Reviews.Title: Love It, But...
Reviews.Author: edward laue
Reviews.Content: Thought I would love it, but lack of popular apps like Facetime are big disappointments. My wife and kids all stuck with new IPads this xmas but I insisted on Kiindle Fire. It is much lighter and picture more crisp and love Amazon Prime. Just give me Facetime so my family and I can more easily communicate.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Sallyanne Urciuoli
Reviews.Content: Love it so much...that my mother in law bought one as well! Would recommend this product to everyone. Two thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: So so wonderful
Reviews.Author: Candy, Ohio
Reviews.Content: I love it. This is my second kindle I have.  The first one was a kindle fire HD 7". I needed a bigger screen so I got the next bigger one kindle fire HDX 8.9. I love it so much. Quality is wonderful. Kindle products will never disappoint you.  Love reading or surfing the web. This is what you need then. And you get lots of free books to.

Reviews.Title: Lovin' my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: D. Stone "Bedford Wife"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is all I expected it to be.  It performs quickly and without very many glitches.  It is not a PC, so it does sometimes have issues opening web pages or with links, but by downloading a second browser, I could get around many of those.  I'm still exploring the many things I can do with my Kindle.  Reading on it is great, once I stopped trying to flip the pages ;)  There are so many free books available, too!  I've taken some good photos, used Skype, and played games with my grandkids.  The Special Offers included are not annoying, only seen on the opening screen.  My only concern is that it does eat up battery time pretty quickly when browsing or playing games.  I find it needs charging nearly every night.  Was awesome to have it on a recent trip.  So light to carry on a plane!

Reviews.Title: email does not sync, printing difficult
Reviews.Author: steve phillips
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed to find out that email does not sync.  I have att.net and while all the email loads, there are no contacts, folders or updating of deleted, sent, etc.  I have to manually delete all received emails.  Printing to my wireless canon pixma722 printer does not appear possible (or easily done) is another major issue.  To me, email and printing are basic functions of a tablet that should be a given feature.

Reviews.Title: Stays on it.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "fletch1"
Reviews.Content: I think I've lost my wife. She stays on it to much. But I'm happy she loves it. Oh well , at least she's home.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Carol Donovan "Luv my Westie pup"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for Christmas along with the wireless keyboard.  as a MAC user myself, I was absolutely impressed with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 - when I can, I plan on purchasing one for myself! Sorry Apple

Reviews.Title: Outstanding tablet (but)
Reviews.Author: Clinton
Reviews.Content: This product is right up there with those of Apple and Samsung. I actually tried it out for 30 days for free while I had my ipad air with me. The screen is magnificent and bright much more superior to that of the ipad air. Some games actually tend to run smoother on it and I never experienced any sort of lag. It's perfect for movies, videos and some games in particular. The tablet is comfortable to hold in the hands.Now cons- from the very first day the back panel attracts fingerprint so much and is very noticeable and might be a turn off for some.The operating system is so boring and very dull looking. It's not cool and very non adjustable. I wish they had gone for an open android like system.Extra - the cameras are average, like any other tabletAll in all this is a very good product and I was very impressed with it and even though I chose the ipad over it, the only significant benefit from that is just the numerous tablet optimized apps for the ipad. Otherwise this is better.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offer
Reviews.Author: Ella Lindenhofen
Reviews.Content: I just received my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", 16 GB tablet an hour ago, so I will have to return in a month or two to give a true review, but I can say that I am a 67 year old widow and not what you would call an expert in the field of high tech gadgets. I took the Kindle out of the box, plugged it in and synced up with my router and was up and running in no time. If you can read directions you can set this up without a problem. I actually watched Downton Abbey first episode from Amazon Prime and it was incredible. Picture quality is outstanding, and the sound is fantastic. There are still plenty of feature's to explore, as I would like to stream movies and watch them on my TV, etc.  I will write a follow-up in a month to see if I am still as elated as I am today.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Kinney
Reviews.Content: This is my 7th Kindle purchase, and so far the best. I have given kindles to family members and they share my enthusiasm for the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I. LOVE. IT.  Beautiful display, excellent sound.  Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Sandra Acquistapace
Reviews.Content: The problem is I never want to put it down.  Watching movies with some headphones is similar to watching on my large screen tv. (not kidding).  The device is very responsive has plenty of options/settings to personalize to your preferences, such as changing the "sleep" timer setting (default is 5 minutes).  To get the full benefits of owning this latest 8.9" HDX Kindle Fire you might want to consider becoming an Amazon Prime member.  Excellent product and Worth Every Cent!!

Reviews.Title: the fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nancy Saladin
Reviews.Content: The weight of the kindle is light.  The screen is very easy to read.  I enjoy using it, but it did freeze up on me once, and I couldn't turn it off or do anything with it.  It ran out of power of its own accord and seems to be working okay now.

Reviews.Title: why I love my kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: This was a first purchase for me and I was NOT disappointed !! I researched a good bit, prior to purchasing the Kindle Fire and found it was recommended as being superior to it's competition. I would highly advise anyone looking for any device that does it all, with ease of use, to get themelves a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I just love it !!

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: MARGIE KITCHENS
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle, 8.9 great size take it everwhere. Im on my free 30 day trial membership of Prime at this time wished, Primed members could borrow more than 1 free book a month and I wish there was more movie you could watch for free even if the yearly rate was a little more than $79.00 year. would gladly pay a little more if more was offered. THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Just what I had hoped for
Reviews.Author: cjneedlepoint "cjvisser"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is everything I had hoped it would be.  I can use it fully anywhere there is Wi-Fi including at hotels internationally.  I get my e-mail, browse the web, order on the web, read my Kindle books, play games, Google information, etc.  It has been like having a mini-laptop wherever I am.  I know some reviews have dissed it concerning downloading movies.  I have not done that so I cannot speak to its problems there.  I just know it is what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX rocks! Best electronic I have purchased.
Reviews.Author: d.peterson
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product to the entire world! This is the best electronic toy out there. If you want to make your knowledge go somewhere this is it.

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: angeleverlast "AG"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom for Christmas.  She hasn't put it down since she opened it. She had a kindle fire, which is now mine and the fire is nice as well.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Lisa Freeman
Reviews.Content: It's really more than I expected, every thing and more than I can do with my laptop apps make it capable of doing everything

Reviews.Title: The second kindle as a gift.
Reviews.Author: linda vailous
Reviews.Content: This gift was for my husband. An upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX. He loves it. This is the first time it was a no brainer. The old kindle will go to a family member.Grade sizeNew features great.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: jade barb
Reviews.Content: Got mine for Christmas. I've gotta say that I've had a blast using it! Incredible clarity, lighting fast speed when downloading anything, and the prime library rivals that of Netflix. Games have no lag, books are very easy to read... I love my kindle. I use it way more than my computer now, haha

Reviews.Title: It's an amazing tablet for its price.
Reviews.Author: Steven R "S R"
Reviews.Content: For this price I don't think you will find anything better. If you're a Prime member then there's no question that this tablet is for you, but even if not, the graphocs is still stunning and battery performance is great. This is the real deal!

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it!!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Isbell
Reviews.Content: Got  the kindle fire for my wife for Christmas . She loves it!! Not sure if it's good for me. I think she has a new best friend.... Lol

Reviews.Title: gifted
Reviews.Author: Matt Merrill
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my wife. i dont use it at all. but my wife seems to enjoy it very mucj

Reviews.Title: Wifi Spotty
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Saam "Csaam"
Reviews.Content: I have a heck of a time getting this kindle to discover networks and once connected stay connected.  I can sit with this device and my POS Kyocera Rise phone and have the Rise work and the Kindle not.  I've owned at least one kindle in each of the last 3 generations and this is the first time I have seen this problem.  Without reliable wifi this device is a very over priced ereader.

Reviews.Title: 8.9" HDX is a great media tablet
Reviews.Author: Bill Esposito
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to go into a long technical review of this tablet as there are plenty of those reviews for you to read here.I bought the 64 gig 8.9" HDX, I currently own and use a Samsung Note 3 for my phone and a Galaxy 10.1" tablet (mostly retired since the HDX).  I travel out of town via air about 40 weeks a year and have been doing that for about 10 years.  I've tried all sorts of portable media devices from Archos, Ipods, MP3 players smart phones and tablets.The HDX is the first media device that I've owned that has actually met all my traveling needs.What I like:SizeAmazon Prime DownloadsNetflixSideloaded appsWhat I don't like:Wish there were more downloadable moviesWish the Amazon Appstore had ALL the apps I wantThe size is the feature which first sold me on the HDX.  It is a large screen and very thin and light.  So thin and light that I did not want to put a heavy case on it and have purchased the Leather Kindle Fire HD/HDX 8.9" Sleeve by Dockem  so that I can remove it and leave it in my backpack while using the HDX and keep my tablet thin and light.  I also purchased the Anker® Multi-Angle Portable Stand  for watching movies.Amazon Prime Downloads.  I just flew from east to west and back this past week. Was in brand new airplanes in First Class but there was no on board entertainment. I watched three Amazon Prime movies and finished a book.  Need I say more?Netflix has a better video selection in my opinion and the app for the Kindle works great.Apps.  I've not found an app that I've needed that if not on the Amazon AppStore I couldn't side load from another source.  Each day I use the Kindle the restrictive app store offerings are mitigated.Back to Amazon movies.  I just wish that there were more current offerings...maybe it will get better as time goes on.And lastly, while there are work arounds for just about everyghing on the Kindle, it would just be easier if you could load Google PlayStore apps....And this is really the last thing, I just bought Laser Projection Virtual Keyboard and after about 5 minutes of practice I find that it works great.  Vastly speeds text input for both my Kindle and phone.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: anne vincent
Reviews.Content: I love it! So easy to use, with great options for the whole family.  Glad I got the bigger screen size.  I just wish there were more cover options.It was difficult to find a cover.

Reviews.Title: 4.5 Stars - Review for HDX 8.9 16GB Wi-Fi version
Reviews.Author: Nadine - Hook Me Up Book Blog
Reviews.Content: Review from a book blogger perspectiveI bought me the kindle for Xmas and have to say I’m pleasantly surprised. Its sleek design and thinness makes reading so much more fun and less a hassle. Compared to the iPad, the weight difference is truly obvious. It’s easy to navigate, especially if it’s your first tablet as it's for me.It synchs your contacts and Amazon infos easily; even Goodreads was already on it, which is a big plus if you’re a book-addict like me. Adding your email accounts was done super-fast and even my gmail calendar got synched. The bright colors and the sharpness of the screen is just amazing. I love to see all the book covers in color instead of the boring black and grey.The two cameras are great –I can’t complain about them. While skyping I had a great picture and my family could see everything clearly. The photo editing options are easy to handle and navigate; totally dummy safe.What threw me off was that if you have read/finished a book it still stays on the screen (under Book and then click Device/Cloud) –it’s confusing. I’m used that when I finish a book and move it to a special genre folder that it’s gone from my home screen but with the kindle fire it’s not the case. It took me quite some time to get used to that.Another thing that bugs me is that I CAN’T switch out/change the screensaver photo for one of my personal pics or background pics –bummer. Compared to my older kindle, the battery dies faster, which is a bit annoying but I blame myself for using it way more –surfing the net, checking social sites etc.But other than that, I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX and I’m happy I bought it. Reading, highlighting, sharing book quotes is so much easier.I highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: This is one great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kent Ogaard
Reviews.Content: I bought a new ipad air and this HDX 8.9 and can compare them side by side. I ordered the ipad first because the HDX was not available yet. I would not have bought the ipad if I would have had this kindle fire first. it does everything and more and costs less

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: DJ
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet.  It's the first tablet I've purchased, so I'm still in the learning mode, so to speak.  But so far so good!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Bezold
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire HDX:Lives up to its expectation.  Larger screen worth the money! I have enjoyed all the features from reading books to watching movies to checking emails etc.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: AllenMW
Reviews.Content: This device meets or exceeds all of my expectations. It is versatile. Easy to use. I have utilized the Mayday button, and am very satisfied with the experience. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: I'm loving my 1st tablet.  I'm a KINDLE fan
Reviews.Author: LadyB
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I'm loving it.  I was torn between this and the iPad but mostly leaning toward the Kindle Fire HDX.  I did some research and comparison and the Kindle Fire HDX was more favorable over the iPad.  Both do almost exactly the same things.  iPad more Apps but I feel the Kindle will eventually get those same Apps and some in the future.  The only thing I'm having a problem with is understanding the Mirror Display.  I have to call MAYDAY and find out how this actually works.  Other than that I'm so very pleased in the price and the device.  Thanks again AMAZON I knew you would come through for your loyal customers and fans.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Changed Views on Kindle
Reviews.Author: Shannon E.
Reviews.Content: Love this product...I had no desire for a tablet type system and when I reviewed the special offer and read up on the he Kindle Fire I thought I would try it...great visual and sound as well as being handy on the go. Battery life is great as well. I charge every night so I don't know how long it will go without charge but I watched 2 movies at hospital stay accessed FB, checked email and played a couple of games to pass the time and it never went below 50% battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Bonny J Kerby
Reviews.Content: upgraded from the kindle fire, I love this new kindle. Along with the prime membership it is the best ever

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Frank E. Rogers
Reviews.Content: Love the HD brilliance of the display and the mayday button that allows direct customer service to answer and fix any problems I have. Would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" to anyone looking for a tablet. Don't waist money on a much more expensive IPad.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: amv03
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this. Great picture quality. Does anything and everything I wanted and was looking for. Books are so great on here too! If you want something great for a good price I will say buy it. Only thing I don't like as much is the charge cord is short. But that's so small of an issue I don't mind. So worth the money. This is my favorite new toy!

Reviews.Title: Powerful, Fast, Useful for Any Purpose, and Fun!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle FIre HDX 8.9 - First of all, it is incredibly light and thin.  It is very comfortable to hold, and weighs much less than you would believe possible.  The web is super fast.  Downloads take only seconds - much faster than my original Kindle Fire.  I have always enjoyed my original Kindle Fire, and now I really enjoy my larger KF HDX!  The Kindle tablets are so user friendly that anyone could learn to use them like a pro, and enjoy the experience!  I would certainly buy this tablet again, and I would recommend the KF HDX 8.9 to anyone who wants a work horse of a tablet with a user friendly platform that is fast and fun to use.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Still learning more about this everyday.I do not understand the cloud too well, nor do I know exactly how to get from th cloud to the device,but maybe and old dog can learn new tricks.

Reviews.Title: new constant companion
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love this new kindle, it is my third kindle purchase. Imagine is so crisp and clear. This version is also so lite. Only negative is I don't like where on/off button is as I tend to accidentally hit it when holding horizontally.

Reviews.Title: The only Kindle worth getting, and by that i mean its amazing!
Reviews.Author: Bradley
Reviews.Content: After trying the other kindle fire products, i found they all had unacceptable compromises, like the blue tint on the hdx 7 inch,  and the slowness and poor screen quality of the kind fire hd were no where to be found on the 8.9 inch. In my opinion they should remove those models and keep only the 8.9 inch. HDX 8.9" is easily the flagship of the series, and possibly the best tablet on the market.Cons:-Incompatibility with things like the office 365 mobile ap.-Apple users coming over have no way of transferring music and songs (greedy apple, glad i left em)-Software is not rock solid, it needs polishing, i know for a fact you will run into some kind of minor bug within the first hour of vigorous online use.

Reviews.Title: No Product Disappointments With The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: STORYTELLER "GRANDPA RON"
Reviews.Content: Really growing to enjoy, but still learning the features.  Only Cons: Compatibility with sites requiring Adobe Flash.  Amazon didn't honor their 25% down w/4 monthly payment offer which was my motivating factor.  Watch out for that one!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX  8.9----
Reviews.Author: kathy babcock
Reviews.Content: I have had all the Kindle's (in order) and each time a new one came out I upgraded!  This Fire HDX is amazing.  It does everything I need it to do plus a lot more.  My son has an Ipad and after seeing this one he wanted me to trade.  The answer was a resounding NO.  I love my new Kindle Fire HDX and and hope to learn how to use it to its' highest and best use.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Tammy Nelson
Reviews.Content: My husband is very happy with his Kindle Fire HDX, and that is an accomplishment and a compliment to Amazon.He is a Web Master and a Professor teaching Dreamweaver at a nearby city college and he loves the way his web pages look on the kindle HDX. It's digital quality is to die for. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK AMAZON...

Reviews.Title: Great Little Machine
Reviews.Author: bvail "meganik"
Reviews.Content: First, my Kindle history:2010 - downloaded Kindle app to smart phone2011 - Kindle 3g 6" screen - pretty lame for internet - e-ink no color2012 - Kindle Fire - nice color - better for e-mail, etc.2013 - 8.9"All I can say is this thing rocks.  Beautiful HD screen.  Very fast on internet.  Surprising sound - not like my Kindle Fire.I chose not to get the 3G version, as I have the FoxFi app on my smart phone which makes it a hot spot as long as the phone has a signal.I waited until Amazon had a special offer and last month they had thirty bucks off any HDX so I pulled the trigger the last day of the offer.  Also signed up for the Amazon CC for an additional fifty bucks off.  I'm a prime member so free two day shipping and a price of $399 delivered for this bad boy.  How good is that?Oops, forgot to add that when I opened the box and took the Kindle out I'm thinking this is a work of art.  Very thin, elegant with simple controls on the back and light as a feather.As far as 'limited apps' go, how many does one want?  From what I gather but haven't tried yet is to go to settings and allow downloading of non-Kindle Amazon apps.  Also, some complain they can't access YouTube.  Oh contraire!  Go to silk and then type your default browser in the address box (I use MSN but freebies like FoxFire would probably work)  and then go to YouTube or whatever you wish.  Easy Peasy :o)I've had this jewel for only a couple of weeks, but I'm totally satisfied.  My wife, who has no experience with a Kindle at all was very impressed with it, checked her email, etc and she is somewhat of a Luddite :o).  I had to talk long and hard for her to switch from dumb to smart phone.  She now loves her Samsung Galaxy III.One thing I don't get is the many reviewers who complain that this is not a full featured notebook and the many who compare it to iOS units.  But then I'm biased against anything Apple, be it phone, mp3, computer, whatever.  This Kindle fits my needs and I'm pretty sure there are workarounds for utilities, such as Word, but then I have computers for those tasks.One more thing.  As thin and lite and 'pretty' as this unit is I wouldn't want to scar it up, so like all my electronics I will install a cover.  Most are pretty expensive but I found this one:  Maxboost Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Case Book  Leather Stand Cover  for the measly price of $12.95 delivered.Cons?  None to speak of...

Reviews.Title: Works perfect, including "miracast" wireless WiFi projection, to my big screen LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Donato "sailor.in.florida"
Reviews.Content: Great Tablet for reading ebooks, and watching videos, especially taking advantage of Amazon Prime's free instant movies & TV shows.  I use the Kindle Fire's "miracast" setting to project the picture to my vintage big screen,  65"  Panasonic LCD TV, (my TV is 10 yrs old). I use  Belkin's WiFi Screencast Streaming adapter, which is HDMI connected  to my TV (also purchased from Amazon).  My new Kindle Fire HDX (via miracast app setting) connects to the Belkin adapter via WiFi, transmitting the video, which is then transmitted by Belkin to the TV. Works Great as advertized. Screen on Kindle is crisp & outstanding. On my wish list would be to include a USB connector, which it does not have.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dale L. Dawson
Reviews.Content: The best device for the money! Unfortunately it is so new that developers have yet to update their apps to fit the 8.9" HDX format, but I am waiting patiently. For this old mans eyes, it's size beats the 7".

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I made the switch from the Nook Color to this, and I have absolutely no regrets!!!  I was nervous at first, but after having my kindle for a few weeks I'm upset that I didn't make the switch sooner!  The product itself is just so much better - the operating system is simpler and easier to navigate, the display is so much more vivid, and I've even noticed that 50% of the books that I had on my B&N; wish list were cheaper on Amazon (the others were the same price - none were higher).  Definitely love my new Kindle, as both an e-reader and as a tablet!

Reviews.Title: What an excellent machine.
Reviews.Author: Pamster
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle, and certainly my favorite.  It's great for reading, but then, all of them are.  I downloaded some movie rentals to take on a trip, and even though I downloaded them in the lowest quality resolutoin in order to save space on the device, they still displayed beautifully on the device itself.  (Not sure how they would have looked on a TV screen or larger monitor, but I wasn't trying that.)  Today I got it set up to stream to my TV using Display Mirroring - what a great feature that is.  I can hardly wait to try out some more of the features.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Gassner
Reviews.Content: I have had two previous kindles.  One with the keypad as the bottom, which I broke, and the second the kindle touch.  Loved it, but missed the backlit feature of the ipad I had borrowed while waiting for the second kindle to arrive.  The paperwhite was not out then.  Later purchased a cheap tablet on line from Walmart, which worked fine, but was slower than all get out.  Ordered the fire hdx when amazon offered the no interest financing, and all I can say is WOW.  Speed and performance wise, it left the tablet sitting in the dust.  Was kind of alien at first, but learned more about the fire each day, making it more fun  and productive to use each day.  I now find myself reading while listening to free music, and checking my email inbetween.  The only thing I wish that kindle had included, was a slot for SD cards, but hey, who knows what tomorrow holds.

Reviews.Title: This is the best Kindle by far
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. Rahn
Reviews.Content: If you read books or surf the web, this is for you.  It is the best Kindle by far and sending emails are simple as you type words appear on a line and you can choose which word you want to use greatly speeding up doing emails.  It also has a mic for dictation or emails.

Reviews.Title: just do it!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this thing. Buy the otter box with it. Saved my butt a couple times already :). Fun games, stunning video, awesome audio. Very great tablet. Would recommend highly!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ptee1208
Reviews.Content: I like my new kindle fire but why do I get emails saying I can get $30.00 off.  I would like to get $30 off.

Reviews.Title: Better than the iPad mini
Reviews.Author: B2Mommy
Reviews.Content: OMG - I love love love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 Display.  I originally had just a standard Kindle 7 Display and have used it so much in the last year for everything from reading books, to fantasy football tracking, to shopping on Amazon that I decided it would be worth the investment to upgrade and upgrade I did!My new kindle is awesome. The dual cameras are great.  The Kindle also has a flash, which the iPad does not.  My 5 year old son received an iPad from Santa for xmas, so I've been able to compare.  The display is SO much cleaner on the HDX and slightly larger than the mini.  The photos are better, the sound is better.  I mean, I'm totally in LOVE!If you're on the fence, don't be.  It was worth every penny.  I'm only sorry Santa didn't bring my son an HDX as well...(although he specifically wanted an iPad because they use them in school)If I was Oprah and I had a Favorite Things list, this would be number 1!!!Love it :)

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: tiahra chandler
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad a kindle fire and a laptop. I got this as a Christmas gift  and I couldn't have received a better present. The battery lasts way longer than the original kindle fire and it also has way better clarity 5 stars Amazon!! This is by far my favorite device and since I received it I haven't touched any of my other devices

Reviews.Title: Wow! 5 star.
Reviews.Author: Billy Milbeck
Reviews.Content: Absolutely amazing tablet. Outrageously strong wi-fi antenna. Beautiful graphics. Nice & user friendly. Love that u can download prime movies. Only 2 things i can think of is I'm glad I got the 32gb & almost wished I gotten the 64gb. The 32gb was completely full after 4 movies(3 in HD & 1 SD) I understand from a business perspective but wished they could've added micro sd storage. Also lockin me out gmail & youtube on a android device is a bummer. But overall I am truly impressed with the Hdx. Nice work Amazon! Easily takes the ipad vs hdx competition

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: frabo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my wife - being I have the Samsung 10.1 and am very dissatisfied with Samsung - I thought I would give this a try. Believe me, it has the Samsung beat in every way imaginable to the point I am considering throwing this piece of crap Samsung in the garbage and purchasing another kindle fire HDX 8.9" for myself.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Karen Miller "karen2323"
Reviews.Content: I have used Ipad, mini ipad and the kindle fire. But far, the kindle fire is the all around best. Small and portable. My grandkids loves the games. Battery life is good and its so portable. I got this for Valentines day from my sweetie and glad he got it for me. I would recommend it for all ages. The 7" is a great present for a younger child.

Reviews.Title: Old Timer Friendly Device
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey B. Potts
Reviews.Content: I can't help but be amazed at the technology that goes into making these wonderful machines.  Book reading, game playing, e-mail and numerous other uses including surfing the web and hosting your FaceBook page.  Very user friendly.  Great job Amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Buy this great invention
Reviews.Author: Susanne J Claar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is wonderful...I can see the screen easily...the colors are fabulous...getting around all the different sites is so easy... I would recommend the BOX highly...especially to the 60's crowd..solo easy to use

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: B. Oswald
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Christmas and she has hardly put it down!! Just the right size and the live help button is a feature that she finds most useful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 WI-FI, 64GB Rocks!
Reviews.Author: DRB "ScorpioDave"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Kindle and it just is amazing....It has it all. Ipads are nice but the specs on this unit are amazing!  I loved my Kindle HD 8.9 but this new Kindle Rocks!  The screen resolution is amazing....very fast processor and lighter, the bazel edge is smaller so the screen looks much bigger. I can only say buy this unit...you will absolutely love it. It has everything you could want and more, plus free apps with Prime....and so forth...wow...

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Inge-merethe Otey "graitdane"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is the best that Amazon has put out I love it and the Mayday button is great I have used it ones it work just like they said it would,nobody will go wrong with this Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: You don't have to be a reader to love the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: PentwaterGma
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my DH for Christmas this year. He is not at all computer savy and wanted something for internet, FB, and email. It is perfect for someone that doesn't really need a computer. The Kindle Fire will cover everything he needs and then some. He was tickled that he can get movies and TV free from Prime, and that he can hook it up to his TV to watch them. He was also surprised at the ease of shopping for music, shows, and apps.I was surprised and pleased that Amazon included the wall plug-in this year, but wish it would have been posted in the description. I spent the $20 on the separate one thinking it was just like last year's model since I couldn't find where it said it was included. No matter, I'm keeping it for myself to replace my old Kindle charger.

Reviews.Title: I love my new Fire.
Reviews.Author: Boog Smith
Reviews.Content: I received my new kindle fire HDX 8.9 today and im extremely happy with it.  I have been a loyal amazon customer ever since the first kindle fire.  But I was always disappointed with each version that I bought.  I also own a 8.9 hd version.  The HDX model is everything I wanted the original fire to be.  The only hiccup in the tablet is the silk browser.  It runs fast enough but my only problem with it is the lack of adjustable font and lack of a dark mode.  Oterwise the tablet is a dream.  I solved the problem with the browser by downloading the UC browser which has many features that I like and it is my default browser.  The complaint of lack of apps in the amazon store is easily solved with 1mobile and aptoid app stores.  I love my new tablet and just want to say that amazon has done a fantastic job improving the Fire line.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet but some issues
Reviews.Author: Matthew C Dyal
Reviews.Content: Great tablet but one annoying thing is that there are certain apps that don't rotate. They force you to view it a certain way and it's always where the charging port is at the bottom. Very annoying when charging and using. Also lack of available apps is another problem

Reviews.Title: The best tablet out there!!!
Reviews.Author: Becky from Ocala
Reviews.Content: I was thinking about the different tablets that are out there and just didn't know what the best one was for me.  Then I thought about my Kindle and how much I loved it.  So, I decided, after seeing the commercials for the new tablets with the comparison to the I pad air, I decided to get the Kindle Fire HAD.  I am so happy with this decision!!!  I have a friend that owns an I pad and she can't believe how much more my tablet does than hers.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire or IPad ?
Reviews.Author: carrie pursino
Reviews.Content: It is extremely light. It seems to do everything my iPad does. I'm still working on all that it can do with it. I find myself using it more now than my iPad. Apple would not be happy. I'm glad I took a chance and tried it out.  Carrie

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Opa
Reviews.Content: Fast, big screen, long battery.  Power cord seems to be a little difficult to insert, but no big deal.  Wish there were more apps.

Reviews.Title: My first kindle. Love it!
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Doolittle
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize how much I would like the Kindle. I can take my books everywhere and even when I am watching tv, I will read a book and turn off the tv.  So much more convenient than reading on my laptop.

Reviews.Title: I Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet, light weight and simple to use,  I have a 7inch  first edition and I love it but the clarity of this one is so much better. I haven't had a chance to really play with it a lot. But, when we drive to Texas I will be looking forward to having lots of time with it.  The only downside is the cases I have ordered 4 and they either don't fit the tablet right or they are to flimsily to hold the tablet up.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Paula Traphagen-Bossert
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle.  I have loved them all....but, this one is amazing. I even used the Mayday button and was quickly guided through solving my problem.  Amazing screen and picture.  Wonderful for reading books, watching movies and surfing the net! Thanks, Amazon, for another wonderful Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Fire is on fire
Reviews.Author: Barbara Z. Chadwick "waterlily"
Reviews.Content: Just love EVERYTHING ABOUT THE FIRE.  Love the help gosh are they great.  It is faster, clean and lighter........This is my third............thanks

Reviews.Title: Must have it
Reviews.Author: pezman
Reviews.Content: I have had this Fire HDX since day 1It has a beautiful picture.I also have a Samsung note 10 but the HDX has a better display.

Reviews.Title: Exellent product
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Diesen
Reviews.Content: With this offer I tried the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  It is a excellent unit we use it everyday for internet access, movies, apps, everything. The display quality is superior, watching a movie is awesome.  The size of unit is perfect not to big not to small my 3 year old grandson can even navigate through using Kindle Free Time which is a huge success at our house it allows me to choose what content and for how long and does not give him the freedom to go to internet access. It runs smoothly and is easy to set up and navigate through. I will be keeping this unit and it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Just gotta say Wow!
Reviews.Author: Frugal Shopper "BunellaZoe"
Reviews.Content: so far I can't find anything negative to say about this tablet.  I already had the Fire HD 8.9 and was in love with that but this is even better.Better on/off button (i kept turning the old one off when i was trying to raise/lower the volume).  Also better volume buttons.The camera is so cool, I'm taking pictures of my husband while he's dozing in his recliner cause he thinks I'm watching Amazon Prime Videos (which I am also).  The picture is gorgeous, the sound I think is Dolby.Set up was so easy since I already have a Kindle account and everything that was on my old Kindle was in the Cloud somewhere and now it's on the new one.  For the wifi all I did was input the password for my home network and i was connected.I've only had it one day, so i'll come back and follow up in a month or so.

Reviews.Title: Even better than the HD
Reviews.Author: Shana Clemens
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle Fire. I was excited to get the new HDX after learning it had a better battery life, quad core processor, and is much lighter. Finally, I don't have charge my Kindle every day. It is much faster than the HD and the scrolling is noticeably smoother. I am thrilled with my HDX and glad I didn't wait to get it.

Reviews.Title: If you're on the fence....
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I just got my kindle fire HDX 8.9 yesterday, and it is amazing. If you're on the fence about getting this - GET IT.The good: The display is breathtaking. Seriously. It's very user-friendly. My non-tech savvy mother figured out how to play around with it almost immediately (after i showed her how to turn it on... see my comment below). If you have prime (which you should - if you want to get the most out of your kindle), they have plenty of content available for viewing. The lending library is awesome. They also have this program called "kindle first", where you can get an advance copy of next-months releases. So... free movies + free TV shows + free books = happy girl. Some people have complained it's hard to find the free stuff. I'd have to disagree. There's an entire category for "free" stuff in the store, which makes it super simple. Amazon cloud drive is pretty neat too. I can back up my photos from my phone and tablet to the cloud drive so they are nice and safe.The bad: why are the buttons on the back? This is kind of silly. My tech-savvy boyfriend couldn't figure out how to turn the dang thing on because there's a tiny tiny little button in back. I always have to turn it around every time to find it so i can put it to sleep or wake it up. Also - 16gb is going to be too small for the average user. I bought the 32gb and i'm already close to capacity after downloading three HD movies and a few apps. If you're trying to decide which size to get - go with the 32 or larger. Also - the special offers are annoying. Get it without. We see enough ads in our everyday life to have ads on our reading devices, right?! one last thing. This is not an android tablet so you won't be able to download all the apps your android or apple phone has. It doesn't have a few apps that i use (instagram, google hangouts, gmail, etc.) But i'll survive. This might be a deal-breaker for a few people, but i have my android phone to fill in the gaps.Have I mentioned how amazing the display is??? I haven't been able to put the dang thing down since i got it! If anyone has questions - let me know and i'll try to answer.

Reviews.Title: Very powerful tablet, amazing screen, just not my cup of tea.
Reviews.Author: Brent H
Reviews.Content: When I took the Kindle Fire HDX out of the box, I was impressed with the build quality. The power/volume buttons seemed to be in strange locations, but after a few minutes, I was used to them. The buttons work very well if you are using the tablet in landscape, they are a little awkward in portrait mode. The finish/feel of the tablet was great, it's very slim and light.Once powered on, I loaded up a couple Amazon HD videos. The screen is amazing. There really isn't much more to say about it. Everything is so sharp and clear. And color reproduction seems great to me, but i'm not a videophile. Besides the screen, the next thing that really stood out to me was the sound. The speakers are some of the best ones I've ever heard on a portable device. They are not going to blow you socks off like some high end Bose system, but they seemed well above what the norm is for portable devices.The OS (operating system) on the Fire HDX works well. Everything was very smooth while navigating. Loading and switching between apps was nice and quick. The factory installed apps seemed to work well. I had never used a Kindle Fire tablet before and the OS seemed pretty easy to figure out. The Amazon App Store seems to have a lot of decent apps/games, but is still missing some of the apps I was looking forward to using. This is where things just didn't fit for me.I can use the Amazon App Store on my android phone, but can't use the Play Store from the Kindle. I understand why Amazon want's you to use their store, but I wish I had the option to use others without having to "hack" the device. I did find a way to load unsupported apps onto the Kindle, but it took a decent amount of effort, and I felt like it was a little too much to go through for unsupported apps.The only other complaint I have is that you can't change the background in the OS. I know you can change the lock screen background (if you paid to remove the ads, which I didn't mind the ads at all), but not the one inside the OS. It seems you are stuck to a black background. Which maybe I just didn't figure out how to change it. Someone can correct me if I'm wrong.In conclusion, the kindle fire HDX 8.9 tablet is truly an amazing piece of hardware, I think as far as tablets go, it's a top dog for sure. The OS is not bad by any means, but it's not the "pure" android experience I was hoping for. The Amazon App Store not supporting some of the apps I mainly bought this tablet for, was the deal breaker. It seemed like way to much money for something I couldn't use as I had planned, so I ended up returning this tablet to Amazon.That said, I did purchase two of the 7" Kindle Fire HD's for my kids for Christmas :)I will be going to a more pure android tablet for myself.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is Incredible!
Reviews.Author: Robert C Brown
Reviews.Content: Have the Fire HD and the features on the HDX really improve the experience! I highly recommend buying one today.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pat Myers
Reviews.Content: i already loved my older kindle version, but this one is marvelous.  I love seeing all the covers of the books i have on my kindle as well as being able to facebook, surf the web, watch videos, etc.  The camera is amazing and it takes wonderful pictures.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love th Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Barbara Toppin
Reviews.Content: I like its size and weight.  I was having trouble holding my ipad so decided to get the HDX.  There is not one thing I dislike about it.  It is just what I wanted.  Just as all the other Kindles I have purchased.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: jjwatson
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle Fire for everything, and absolutely love it!  It's light weight, has a big screen, and so easy to use!  I would recommend this to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: loving it!
Reviews.Author: Carol Cameron
Reviews.Content: I just got it last night and am loving everything about it! I had a 2 year old Kindle Fire and was getting frustrated with how slow it was. Plus I was having increasing difficulty reading due to my aging eyes. This HDX8.9 is amazing!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: uneekfish
Reviews.Content: So sharp and clear.  My first tablet, but I looked at others and I liked the layout of this one and the size is just right for me.

Reviews.Title: awesome tablet
Reviews.Author: showitup
Reviews.Content: I really like this Kindle.  It's smaller than my Ipad. I take better pictures and all the apps I have on my ipad was able to put on the Kindle. I really like the flash light on the Kindle. With my volume and power button on the back of the Kindle is helpful for when my Lil girl wants to play with it and she can't because she don't know how to turn it on. Even though this is only a trial to use I want it and will sale my ipad to be able to purchase the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: DogMom
Reviews.Content: Just got it to replace my Kindle Fire HD which I already loved.  This upgrade is GREAT!  It's much faster, and the display is amazing.  I stream content when I exercise which means I can watch Amazon Prime, Netflix, Showtime and HBO.  My only criticism, which isn't about the device but the cover, is that you have to take it out of the cover to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: marilyn hewson
Reviews.Content: This is my first kindle that i bought for myself. Its very easy to use and the display is so clear! I love using it and would recommend it to anyone wanting a great tablet!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Michael Dixon
Reviews.Content: sound quality is absolutely fantastic. This is my fourth Kindle I absolutely love this tablet it is beautiful.. Picture is really beautiful it is so light easiy to handle I haven't had to use Mayday yet but I'm sure that will be great also. Amazon knocked this one out of the park

Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: Really awesome tablet. Games and app run flawlessly with the speed. No time at all to load up games. Only downside for now is the inability to set a background. Once we get that update it'll be perfect

Reviews.Title: KINDLE AND PRIME!
Reviews.Author: COREY YOUNG
Reviews.Content: Love it! Books come at a steal amazon have everything you could ever need cant wait for helicopter drone delivery...

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: joey hamilton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet very fast big screen does everything you could possibly want to do. Great range on the WiFi a must buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Ginger M Artigue
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire quickly. Awesome product!  Easy to use and battery stays charged a long time. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: Tried it free for 30 days and did not want to give it back. So great for our family to watch shows, play games and read.so convenient to check emails as well. Picture quality was amazing!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Twigg
Reviews.Content: So far my wife really likes it and has given me permission to dispose of her 1st generation iPad to help defray the cost of HER Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant
Reviews.Author: Gregory Bleeker Jr.
Reviews.Content: The "Mayday Button" is awesome, within 5 seconds I had someone on my screen both times I pushed it, it helps having an Amazon Prime account if you plan on buying this...Not as featuresque as the iPad Air which I have also, but it can come pretty close at times...

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: I've been reading a kindle for a very long time.  Have read over 300 books on my old kindle.  Just decided to order the new kindle fire.  It has definitely exceeded my expectations.  I've recommended the kindle fire to all my friends and my book club.  It's awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love it (with a few complaints)
Reviews.Author: LUCY EARHART
Reviews.Content: This was given to me as a gift and I love it!  I had a Nook color that was smaller and more bulky.  This is slim and easy to use.  I only have three small complaints.  One:  I don't like where they placed the plugin for the charger on the device.  Two:  There should be more font size options for books.  There are only two and the Nook had several.  Three:  So far, there is only one option for a case and that is the origami case.  It doubles the weight because it is a heavy duty case and I don't like the way you have to maneuver it to get it to a standing position.  Other then those three small complaints, I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: It is light weighted and has two cameras
Reviews.Author: Margaret A. Gourdine
Reviews.Content: I like it.  It is much lighter that the original Kindle so you can take it with you without being weighted down.  I also like that I can take pictures with it instead of also having to take a camera with me also.

Reviews.Title: The new Kindle Fire 8.9" HDX
Reviews.Author: John B
Reviews.Content: best Kindle ever! The display just pops out at you. The new Silk is a great improvement. Mayday is a nice feature. The display for reading as bright and clear. The new thinner design makes it much easier to hold while reading. I think this was an excellent investment.

Reviews.Title: HDX everything I wanted and more.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have been using the original kindle for about two years now.  The Fire HDX blows that one one away.  I can do so much more.  The HDX has a brilliant screen, great sound, and very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: YAY! SO Pretty!
Reviews.Author: Metalette
Reviews.Content: After years of being single, I think I want to marry my new Kindle HDX 8.9.... *sigh* Love at first sight.

Reviews.Title: HDX Dream Machine
Reviews.Author: nedjinski
Reviews.Content: It's hard not to give this thing 5 stars - I was an early Kindle Fire adopter - I had the first edition KF 7" , then the 8.9 HD, and now the 8.9 HDX. The evolution of this device has been amazing. With each iteration I was highly impressed, but none more so than this new HDX - it is simply incredible - very fast, very smooth, light weight, super sharp screen graphics. I can't imagine these things being exponentially better in a year or two.I would like it if it were more of a device open to the rest of the world - meaning it would run all apps in the google play store seamlessly - but it does what it does very, very well.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: very unsatisfied to the point of selling after 1 week of use for 30% off....JUNK!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Matt Federico
Reviews.Content: Not very impressed with actual performance of this tablet...Freezes constantlyAuto correct for typing suggestions way offAuto correct for typing overrides anything typed to what it thinks is rightKeyboard space bar tiny and thinks I want a period after every word.. example: hello.my.name.is.WiFi error when still connected says no service then freezes tablet but until reset000 help from Amazon for issues or.support yet  claims to have great customer serviceEditing words is a joke the cursor jumps around to every spot other than the one requested then likes to split words to make irrelevant suggestions that causes more problems.Lots of issues that even my 7" RCA tablet doesn't have that I bought for 70$After my experience I will never recommend this to anyone or purchase another myselfMost irritating issue... Auto correct assumes what I want to say but no where even close, extra useless letters and splits words to make 2 complete random words, and most of all I'm sick of having to double or even triple check to make sure spaces between words aren't replaced with periods yet it will overrideMy advice is to reconsider  buying this tablet and a sure waste of time and money thinking.you got a good deal on a decent tablet...(took 2 hours to make this review from all the problems it caused and freezing up.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!
Reviews.Author: Livinlite "M Madonia"
Reviews.Content: First -- ordered and shipped/received in less than 24 hours......AMAZING Amazon!Second -- Exactly as described and was up and running in under 5 minutes --- it doesn't get any better than that!Third -- I have owned IPad 2 and IPad Mini -- this Kindle is the IPad killer for sure.Finally -- Best bang for your buck.  If you are on the fence, lean in and get this tablet for yourself.

Reviews.Title: WIFI
Reviews.Author: DONNA
Reviews.Content: I have had problems with it connecting to my WIFI. It is connected, however states that there is no internet. I have a wireless network and has a strong connection. This kindle freezes in games constantly. I have the kindle fire and never had any problems with it.The only positive thing I can say about this kindle, is the screen is larger and the may day. But that hasn't been able to answer the question of the freezing and WIFI. They just have me do a reset. Which works for a while, but not long.

Reviews.Title: This Is An Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Katt Winter
Reviews.Content: I am a techie, and an Amazon Prime lover. I own a Note 3, MSI GT70, Ipad4, Note 10.1 2014, and a few older tablets for reading including an underwhelming 2012 HD refurbished Kindle. I was annoyed with the old HD for many reasons and was going to return it until my son stole it for Kindle Free Time, which btw, is worth the subscription. However, as many people do who don't have multiple screen homes (Kindle HD 2012 was first and only at the time) I was annoyed by its limits and didn't see it's merits.Even with my plethora of fancy and infancy devices I missed Amazon's set up for books and video streaming. I could have got the all new version of the HD cheaply but I thought for a few dollars more having the most recent Kindle would've hurt, would have all the product support (os updates, lending library, and Prime HD streams). However, what I didn't know about was the free Prime downloads they added!!!!!Unfortunately this feature will only be amazingly useful on Kindle with higher memory. It makes me want to cry. :( If you want to store your music and have up to four or so 1080p movies downloaded for offline use 16 gigs is too small. It's the case for any tablet, and to be honest 32 is really very little. The os your apps and games will eat that space in no time. It's not like the olden days.Aside from the os eating all my space, I have to say if you're a Prime Member the HDX is a need. It's so lovely watching videos for free that were optimized for your device in impressive full 1080p. I had no idea how useful this would be for more than a bedside companion. No 4G or purchases necessary to enjoy a show while you're waiting at the doctor. In that respect alone, if you're a loyal Amazon subscriber regardless of the tablet this is a no brained thing you will enjoy.The old HD lags and is slow, but this model is fast. You can write accurately and with ease. The battery life might make you sad, but if you're reading I believe you have 17 hours. Which, is totally why you own a fire right? ;)The app store is still limited, and behind ios and android in updates and releases, but Amazon is working on getting exclusive games for its tablet owners like the Telltale Walking Dead series. Which is amazing...I'm pregnant and struggling with a lot of physical issues and have been confined to my bed so gadgets have become very important. I doubt I could rationalize spending $300 of tech money on an 8.9 or even a 7 inch HDX when for that I could purchase a Nexus 10 or 7, or even a used retina ipad mini, but I can't say I don't want one. (There is one on my wishlist).If you're new to technology and tablets you will love an HDX, if you're a loyal Amazon Prime fan and use their wonderful services then you will enjoy this. It's fast. So fast, and streams in true HD with proper broadband connection so you will only miss the downloads when you're mobile. We all know Kindle Ebooks beat all other ebooks, and Amazon makes the best reading app. It's still an impressive ereader, and the Goodreads integration makes my nerdy soul happy.Cons are it's still a bit heavy for a reader, but a nice case with a strap should remedy that. No back camera, so if this is going to be your main tablet you will be saddened. No HDMI port but those are becoming dinosaur tech, and adapters or Miracast exists now for older tv's. No Google Play store... But I have to say something as a techie dork. Amazon I hope you're listening, you guys almost have it right. What do I mean?You're providing great hardware for discounted prices and adding amazing customer service to your product for no additional cost. *Slow Clap* You're producing Amazon Exclusive content that is available only on your devices, but you allow other devices access to your main features so you're not self isolating either like Apple can.The HDX is truly a step in the right direction of you guys can do the following:Open The Play Store. Trust your products and store, it's great. Apps are discounted, and fair. Limiting yourself in this area is hurting you. I believe you'll see the errors of your ways here. Have exclusive content and offer your own, and win the internet even more than you already have.Step the prices down for the bigger memory tablets. You're not selling machines, you're selling a portal to one of the best services out there. I save so much money using your physical stores alone!! Your videos are beautifully optimized. Your tablets are now impressive, and no one can best your customer service for the services you provide. So, since you're selling physical products, movies, and exclusive content take a bit more of a hit on them HDX tablets so the service is available to more people everywhere.Allow us to customize the carousel. We know it's a Kindle, but give us some options. Let us display a book collection up there instead of all the recently opened things. Remove from carousel is one of my least favorite things. I don't mind the special offers, because there are great deals and recommendations there but allow us some level of customization and I don't mean those weird decals.Let Google into your hearts all the way. Give us a normal page or two with widgets. I love the folders feature.If you made those tweaks your tablet might win the internet completely. (Maybe usb 3.0 too)That all being said this is a great tablet for Prime members, readers, and streamers. The 16 gig HDX is worth keeping around for a long time, and I believe newbies and tech lovers alike will be happy with the hardware.If this is your only tab expect app store limits and some frustrations, but Amazon is really working to improve those things, and HDX owners will reap the benefits of this in the future. Music sounds great for back speakers and is the best I've heard from any non Bluetooth connected tablet yet. Price is still good. May Day is useful for even the savviest of us because it saves time. If you're not going to be a Prime Member, you want the biggest selection of apps and all of their updates immediately and this is going to be your main and only device... you're not a reader... or you're looking for a productivity or Jack of all trades machine this isn't for you. Don't buy it then give it a horrible review. This is a media tab. Movies, music, books, and shopping. All the best things in life. It does do some productivity but if that's what you need look elsewhere.When you pick up an HDX you're picking up well crafted fun. The pixels are so pretty you'll want to shed a tear. Amazon's media access is so extensive you'll want for little, and combined with other services, you may just want for nothing.If you get an HDX no matter what you will find things that will bring you joy, hopefully for a few years to come. I wish I paid full price for device help if it malfunctions (they all do) because dealing with Amazon directly is usually a dream, but I got a great deal. I am absolutely pleasantly surprised and taken with this device, and I think you will be too if this is what you choose for your ereading and Amazon media needs.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: CHRISTINA M WOOD
Reviews.Content: I loved my Kindle Fire...used it until it died, would no longer charge. This happened right around the time the HDX came out so I decided to replace it.  I like the Regular Fire better. I had to get a replacement after 2 months and its still not working right. Freezes all the time, knocks me off of sites, very slow, issues with games. I wish I hadn't wasted the money and had stayed with the lesser model.

Reviews.Title: After 3 months I'm Totally Disappointed - If you want to be locked into a content provider go get an iPad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got the for Christmas and really wanted to like this device, but there are a ton of drawbacks:1) Amazon App store doesn't have the selection that GooglePlay does.2) A lot of the Apps in the Amazon App store simply do not work, or are too buggy to use... even the ones called the Kindle Tablet Editions.  I find this is almost always the case with steaming video apps that might compete with Amazons streaming service.3) FreeTime is a great concept, but unless you pay for the premium version you can't share your downloaded prime content or your borrowed prime books with your kids, you can only share the apps.4) No Google integration at all.  No Gmail, no way to play my music from GooglePlay, no Hangouts.This device is inexpensive because it forces you into Amazons content and if forces you to play by their rules.  If you don't care about being forced into those sort of rule, then go get yourself an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Should have gotten the Nexus - great hardware isn't enough
Reviews.Author: R. J. Bigelow
Reviews.Content: Awesome specs. It even has Swype. Screen is everything I'd hoped for. BUT. No Play Store and more than half the apps I rely on are not in the Amazon store. No SD card expansion. Doesn't work well with content servers.

Reviews.Title: Finally upgraded from the 1st gen 7" Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: FlamingoNut "Tracey"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, I was floored on how thin this device was.I opted for the 32GB since my original Fire, while I had plenty of GB available, you're only allocated a certain percentage for apps, which I find ridiculous.  I would have to uninstall apps just to install new ones.  This shouldn't be limited (but it is), especially when there was plenty of GB still available.I was able to obtain the OtterBox Defender Series for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" (will only fit Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"), Black, which is a perfect case for this.  Sure, it adds a little bulk, but it's a good quality product that protects my new Kindle, and the clear plastic screen protector doesn't interfere with the sensitivity of the touch screen.The color & display is crisp & absolutely gorgeous.I also opted not to pay extra just to shut off the special offers.  Initially, I was irked that I'd have to endure them, but honestly, I don't find them bothersome at all.  Actually, I like that they offer items specifically for my Kindle (I purchased a Marware speaker that was just offered for $10, as opposed to the regular $29 price), plus, have gotten a few mp3 credits.  Honestly, I don't think it's worth paying to get rid of them, and that actually still surprises me to be saying that.  They're not nearly as intrusive and I thought they would be.I don't notice much of a difference in charging times between my old Gen 1 KF and this one.  Both seem to need to be charged quite frequently.The only issue I have with this Kindle is that even though it's connected to my router, no internet connection is detected.  To rectify, I can either go into the Wifi section and switch to another Wifi, then switch back to mine, or I can just shut the Kindle down and turn it back on.  I seem to be doing this more frequently, and it's getting rather annoying.I also don't like the email connection.  I'd much rather put my password in each and  every time I want to check my email.  I don't want it to be logged in permanently, and am having a hard time finding a way to do this, so for now, I removed it.

Reviews.Title: Poor WI-FI
Reviews.Author: Wayne Boelter
Reviews.Content: Downloading on the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is very bad.  Sometimes it takes more then an hour to get a download.  You have to keep going back and resetting your Wi-Fi connection.  One screen will tell you that you are connected and the download screen will tell you that there is no Wi-Fi connection.  Contacted the Mayday to no avail.

Reviews.Title: Great but some glitches
Reviews.Author: b.bailey
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 on Christmas eve. I love all the features, but noticed that it would never charge above 82%. I contacted Amazon who quickly sent me a new charger. But that didn't fix the problem. So they sent me a "new" kindle which was actually a "reconditioned" kindle. This one didn't include a charger, so I purchased another one from Amazon (the same one that comes with the kindle). This charger didn't work at all--the lightening bolt wouldn't even appear. So I gave up on those chargers altogether and ordered an aftermarket charger from a company that had good reviews. It charged the "new" kindle but again, only to 82%, even when charging overnight. But occasionally it will pop up to 100% randomly. I've given up on expecting the kindle to fully charge and am living with the 82% charge.Others have mentioned this other problem--it drops my wifi at odd moments. I have to wait sometimes several minutes for it to pick it up again, even though the device says it has connected to my wifi, and sometimes I have to shut it down completely and restart before it will pick up the wifi again. I don't have this problem with any of my other devices.On balance, I wish I had waited to get this version of kindle until it had been out for a while. I have a first generation Kindle Fire that still works perfectly, which I bought after it had been on the market for over a year. I think if I had waited to buy the Kindle HDX, it would have given them time to fix the glitches. Still concerned that they sent me a reconditioned Kindle instead of a brand new one, especially as it was still easily under warranty. I am a huge fan of Amazon but this hasn't been up to their usual standard of excellence.

Reviews.Title: best yet
Reviews.Author: Penny Winters
Reviews.Content: I love this device. I is the best kindle fire yet. I am glad I went with the 8.9 inch screen

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: M. Stephens
Reviews.Content: I have only had this Kindle for a short while but I already love it! It is so much lighter and easier to hold to read a book than the older Kindel Fire HD. I absolutely love the camera on this Kindle, It is so easy to use, it takes great looking pictures that you can touch up if you like. My Kindel will save me tons of money this winter by keeping me out of the stores, instead of shopping I will be curled up next to the fire reading books from Amazon on my Kindel Fire HDX.. This would make a wonderful Christmas present and guys this would save you a lot of  money also by keeping the wife out of the stores. I highly recommend the Kindel Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Lighter and faster then an Ipad Gen 3
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife on release day. She absoulutly loves it over my Ipad. lighter faster and same apps as the ipad.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the greatest!  Everything I had on my old Kindle was downloaded automatically without any problem.  I did use the "Mayday" button and service was fast and consultant "Teresa" was very helpful and personable.  Thank you Amazon!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: C. Fine
Reviews.Content: Very impressive. What ease in use!...My son has an ipad, and this is just as great, if not better! Very happy with the sound, the graphics and the help button should i ever use it. They make it so easy to work with, and am very pleased! I love that is all connects so nicely with Amazon that i don't even have to think about it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX 8.9. Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this new kindle HDX 8.9 it's lighter the the last kindle fire I had, although I loved that one also. This new version is great. Light weight, clearer picture, the May day button I have used twice now and it was Very helpful ! I would,  and have recommended this tablet to everyone

Reviews.Title: The portal to my entertainment life
Reviews.Author: Lindalealphamale
Reviews.Content: Infinite content delivered to a speedy device that has great audio and video playbook. Easy to use and 30% cheaper than the ipad which comes with a less impressive spec sheet.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: R. Delaney
Reviews.Content: Its as advertised. I had the first kindle fire for 2 years and it was a little quirky, but the this one is flawless, I do miss the portability of the 7" device.

Reviews.Title: A great iteration!
Reviews.Author: R. Kassis
Reviews.Content: The graphics are awesome! someone said to me it looks like it is 3D. It is so clear!It is lighter than the fire. The case (clam) feels sturdy.I have other tablets but this is my favorite. I am very glad that storage went up. I purchased the 64 Gig. I have downloaded 3 HD movies and still have 30 G left with all the books and app I have.

Reviews.Title: Not user frieindly
Reviews.Author: caca
Reviews.Content: I am not computer literate and this product makes me feel even worse.  There are no instructions and you don't know where to start.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: First thing you notice when you open the device and pick it up, is just how light it is, the lightest tablet I've ever held. And I flip it around I like the new design compared to last years body, It feels so good when I hold it I just love it, and the other thing that amazes me is how thin it is, its not as thinner then the iPad but still just as thin I would say, but its way lighter, they have removed the HDMI port so you wont be able to connect it to a TV but you can do it wirelessly with Mira case, I first turn it on and the screen is really Beyond HD, its beautiful its really amazing, the only thing I don't like about this device is they made the volume lower then the Kindle Fire HD 7 (2012) the HD was the loudest tablet I have ever heard but they made this tablet speakers worse but it is much more clear and has surround sound, but its just not as loud as the HD.
