When I first power house game (Dragon Slayer) it ran smoothly with no lag what so ever and the game gas I would say PlayStation 2 or 1 graphics, and it ran smoothly with no lag or stutter, Its a really fast and snappy device really it will handle any app you put on it, Its running the latest  Snap Dragon processor, and its really fast, its the fastest tablet you can get for its price. The other thing I like is that they finally added a rear camera its 8 Mp (mega pixels) its not so great but it will do what ever you want knowing tablets don't and shouldn't have really good cameras and this one has flash not many tablets have flash, only Samsung really does that and Sony is all I know of but its nice that they include that. I also like the interface its has a good design instead of fire os 2.0 which just had a plain black background, this one has a grey and black background mixture that looks amazing, and with this perfect screen it looks even better, with Fire OS 3.0 (mojito) Its a skin version of android made of all Amazon content which has a good selection, but not much of it on its app store, but it only has all the good stuff none of those useless apps. This Tablet is amazing I love it and its a great family tablet with Kindle Free time, I mean if you are an amazon user you will LOVE this device, and maybe if you never used amazon you will soon start to love it, really its the most easiest thing to get used to, its so simple. This has been my review, and hope you guys Love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX8.9  Simply Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: D. L. Blair "reader"
Reviews.Content: It's the best tablet out there.  Has many great features and is really slick.  Highly recommended.  I really love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing! I bought it for my wife for Christmas. She loves it! It works as advertised. It is easy to use. Instructions are easy to follow. Start up was fast and easy. It is a great product with plenty storage. My wife loves the many available apps and software and books.

Reviews.Title: SHOULD have been better
Reviews.Author: M. Seroczynski
Reviews.Content: I've spent a lot of time over the last three days searching, working, and "fighting" with my new Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX (I also have first generation iPad). I was really intrigued by the hardware (primarily the display) and lower price than the competing "Air" product.I am very impressed how cool it runs (but I have not tried to play games with it and the display's brightness is turned down) and it has not crashed even once. Also, the battery is good for many hours of lightweight use.>I probably would have returned it by now, but I've found a couple of very good applications that I would like to continue to use: CalenGoo and Polaris Office (I don't think spending a few hundred dollars on just a "content viewer" is such a good idea), so I will probably keep it.>I keep discovering user interface issues. I have just discovered a problem with Kindle's PDF reader where I was unable to exit the reader when viewing a single-page PDF (would not display any "soft" buttons/icons and there is no hardware "home" or "exit" button). Apparently there is no way to empty "email trash" other than selecting each and every deleted email first (!). There seem to be NO WAY to place photos in collections or folders (I've created folders with a file explorer but they were ignored). I am just wandering who wrote the software...>So far, I have not been able to set up the Kindle calendar (this just amazed me). It wanted me to synchronize with an existing online calendar of some sort, but I don't have one. It will NOT work in a stand-alone mode and, apparently, it will not store it's data in Amazon's Cloud either. With "CalenGoo," I created a few Google calendars (as it recommended), and so far it is working very well.>I was able to open, edit, and save older versions of Microsoft Excel files with "Polaris Office," but it does not work with Google Drive. I used a file explorer to transfer files from-and-to Google drive and then I moved them from-to another subfolder on the Kindle; it was doable but unnecessarily tedious.>The often bad-mouthed Silk Browser has worked quite well (but I've turned the "acceleration" off); the only problem I've discovered so far was NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD) site (disappointing).>A fact that the user cannot change the screen backgrounds (login and "desktop") is astonishing...The included user guide is too basic. I've just bought an e-book to solve that problem.>Amazon does not allow access to Google Play, which has some applications that are either newer or even not-available in the Amazon's App Store. I have also discovered that a lot of the available applications I was looking for (productivity and utilities) have poor users' ratings.>It would have not bothered me that there was no easy way to connect to Google Drive directly if Amazon offered a similar functionality. For example, not allowing storage of calendar data in IT'S OWN "cloud" totally amazed me (unless I am missing something here or I am just having a bad dream).I think, the Kindle Fire has a great potential; Amazon just needs more ambition to go beyond the reader-viewer-listener-shopper business model, or sell them for half price so we can buy multiple tablets for different purposes.Please report all shortcomings to Amazon, so the software can be improved (hopefully soon).>For clarity sake, I am a long time, "loyal" Amazon's customer.==============================================================================================For people new to Kindle Fire 2013 (now or in the near future), I recommend this e-book by Michael J. Young: "Kindle Fire: The Complete Guidebook - For Your Kindle Fire HDX and HD, Second Edition"==============================================================================================I've tested three PDFs with OfficeSuite Professional: no problems.

Reviews.Title: NOT GOOD EXPERIENCE AT ALL
Reviews.Author: marie leslie "Les"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this and all the options that it had for movies, books, gaming etc. However when it came it took over an hour to download the software. When I choose some frees games it would not download them. I could not watch movies they would just buffer. I called Mayday and the connection did not hold and the man did not seem to know anything technical. He turned me over tokindle support. I was not offered any real technical support. I tried to inquire if a certain amount of broad band was needed and she said you don't have enough. You can return it so I did. Later I called again to see about another device and I was told that the HDX did not need certain broadband requirements. No one really offered to trouble shoot the situations and I could hardly understand the person helping me. She did not seem to fully understand my questions and seemed like she was reading from a script saying the same thing over and over. I was not only disappointed in the HDX I was even more disappointed at the support which seemed really non-existent. I called again to inquire about the HD after all I am not going to spend over $400 if I can only read and no one can answer how that would work. So I am really writing this to see if Amazon reads these and if they really care about how their staff responds to problems.

Reviews.Title: Jury is still out on this one.
Reviews.Author: TeriS
Reviews.Content: I just recently upgraded from the original Kindle Fire version to the lovely, larger HDX version. It seems that certain online videos, as well as some of the apps react/stream so much slower on the new Kindle than in the old one. Also...there seems to be a bright red pixel type burn area only noticeable when the screen goes briefly blank when opening or closing apps. Not noticeable when I'm actually within an app. Will call on the weird red spot...other than that...dunno. Just seems much slower instead of faster.

Reviews.Title: Bad, bad, bad
Reviews.Author: Darlene Johnson
Reviews.Content: I was so looking forward to the Fire HDX with all the hype about how wonderful it was, got it set it up charged the battery to 100%...next day the battery was at 11% and I hadn't even USED it for anything....so I charged it AGAIN to 100% and powered it off completely....the next day it wouldn't even turn on! Okay, so maybe I got a bad one, I contacted Amazon and they didn't even offer a replacement...just said send it back and they would refund my money....go figure! After reading more reviews here I'm thinking there are MAJOR issues with the batteries in these so beware. And just for the record, I have 4 Kindles, including the 1st generation and all of my Granddaughters and my daughter and her boyfriend have various ones and so far this is by far the WORSE one I have owned and it cost the MOST!

Reviews.Title: Kudos to Kindle
Reviews.Author: James Larsen
Reviews.Content: Despite all the jealous sniping from devotees of a certain fruit pad, I find the kindle to be a rather able platform; especially with some android side loading (very easily done).  I got the 32 gig 8.9 incher and have only managed to fill up 4 gigs, and I have a few dozen apps and over 220 e-books on it (mostly in large part still on amazon servers, ie the cloud).  The sound is loud enough that everyone in the room can hear when someone reads to us from the 2 able speakers on the tablet, but I wish it were just a tad bit louder.  It is louder than my 16 inch notepad speakers.  Amazon whisper sync is the cat's meow for starting a book on my HP laptop and finishing it sometimes on the tablet or vice versa.  This tablet is overkill for my wife's reading needs, but I am enjoying it's other features.  I have 3 browsers on it and 2 readers, and the pixel count exceeds that of most apps and games,  so it should be a photographers delight. The 8 mp camera takes the best pics compared to a certain fruiti pad.I hope the screen is gorilla glass; so far so good.  Stays charged a long time also.  The reflexes and speed  on the kindle exceed those of a cheetah, no gripes there.  I have no gripes about the wifi.  I do find that the auto brightness can be distracting, so I turn that off most of the time.  I discovered quite by accident that it has sleep mode and Off, and no instructions about that unless I do some internet research.  It's really simple to use.  Sleep mode is a power sipper.  I can charge it from way low to over 90% in about 2 hours with the handy dandy wall wart and usb plug.  It's bright enough to read even  under my 2x4 foot skylight, which is pretty darn bright.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the hdx 8.9.  I does everything I want it to do.  It is light but powerful. I have compared it to other tables and the kindle just comes out ahead of the others.  I have already recommended it to my family and friends and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9 is great
Reviews.Author: AnnD
Reviews.Content: I love the new kindle fire hex 8.9 but wish it had adobe flash player.  And some things I want to stream don't work.

Reviews.Title: Like the Fire HD a lot
Reviews.Author: K P Lierz
Reviews.Content: Like the HD. Like the back lite, makes easy to read in poor/no lite. Like the access of cloud holds many more books than will ever read.

Reviews.Title: very happy with kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Lisa B.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase.  I have had it about one month.  I had an earlier version of the kindle fire.  I like the larger screen.  While it is bigger than the old one, it is not as heavy and it is still small enough to take it with me when I leave home. I have used the May day option twice; my "how to" questions were answered very quickly.  They walked me through the procedure.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: lillivun
Reviews.Content: I loved the color and good quality.  VERY well fitted around on/off, adaptor outlets and open and close auto shutdowns.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kristin Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: The best of the best. Superior in its class and I will never use up all the storage this beast has. Love my kindle. I never leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: It meets all of my expectations.  I let my son-in-law use it and he loved it as well so my daughter got him one.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle'n 4 life
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the kindle. I now use it for most of my reading and surfing. It is awesome.It is the best kindle out there.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Deegal "Deegal"
Reviews.Content: What's not to love?  Even has that wonderful little live person who comes on the screen to help you.  Great features and fits in my purse but still has a nice size screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. The Fire hdx 8.9 is a huge improvement over the Fire hd 8.9. I will be buying another for myself.

Reviews.Title: can do tablet
Reviews.Author: donna
Reviews.Content: I consider the fire a tablet because I can do anything  on it . I use it primarily for reading.  WIth all of the apps,available for the fire  I can use it for documents  and surfing the net. I check the weather, my grandkids play games, watch movies etc.  I used May day once just to see how it works.  It worked as advertised . They answered right away and  were very professional  and helpful. This is my 3rd kindle and have loved each one. Go for prime because it takes your kindle to a whole new level of use.  Free shipping , borrow 1 book a month, watch movies for free  you can't beat prime.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I need.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Ok,  I got a few years on me, and I ain't that tech savvy, but I love this thing. I read, listen to music, audio books, check my email etc. This easily meets all my needs. It took a little getting used to  but once I adapted to the touch screen and learned to navigate around l found it easy to use. I don't use many apps so that's not an issue. I down loaded a lot of my music and that went pretty well. It seems to lose WiFi connection more than I think it should and the glare on the screen makes it hard to use outdoors. I bought an anti-glare screen protector that helps some. Those are small complaints and overall I am very happy with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Who needs an IPad when there is the Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Ganey
Reviews.Content: I always wanted a tablet, but didn't want to spend a fortune. The Kindle Fire HDX has all the features of the IPad but half the price. When I'm reading books or downloading learning apps for my kids, it is such a breeze. I love my Kindle F and wouldn't want anything else!

Reviews.Title: no newlivestream
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Like the device except for one big problem...can't seem to access New Live stream . THis is a really important app for me. Some events are only available on Live stream. May be a deal breaker for me. The device is great in many ways but if I can't use it to watch Newlivestream.in particular..ONENESS events..not much value to me.I have tried to side load it and May day..which is a wonderful service in many ways.w a sn're able to help in this case.Update I was able to watch a Live stream video using moboflash and Dolphin. SO all is well and I would now have to say that so far I couldn't be happier with my kindle fire HDX. Really an awesome tablet!

Reviews.Title: Better then IPAD all day!
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Burgett
Reviews.Content: My friends and brother all have IPADs and they try to sell me on one everyday.  As much as I liked Steve Jobs, Apple just doesn't allow the same freedom the Kindle does.  I did mainly get this to go along with my new Amazon Fire TV, and it is nice...I can be watching a movie in my living room, pick up my kindle and it transfers the movie to my kindle and it picks it up right where it left off.  Then if I go into my bedroom I can just transfer from my kindle to that tv.  The functions, features, and picture quality are amazing!

Reviews.Title: wonderful value
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Coyle
Reviews.Content: I was not sure what I expected of this device, but it has certainly surpassed anything I could have imagined.  I have only had it for a few days and I already know that I wouldn't want to be without it. The screen resolution is excellent, the speed is excellent, the camera is great.  I haven't begun to explore all it's possibilities and probably never will but I think it is a great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: J. Reed "luv2draw"
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of using the Kindle Fire. I started with a Samsung Galaxy & found it would not allow access to Amazon Prime. Found out from Amazon that only i-Pads & Kindles can access Amazon Prime. I tried a friend's i-Pad and had great difficulty trying to figure out how to use it. Since I have a laptop, I don't really need to be able to use word processor/excel on a tablet. The Kindle is much easier to use than i-Pad or Samsung, the screen clarity/color is outstanding & the camera takes great pictures. I only wish it had a close up option. I also like the option of the MayDay button. I've only had to use it once so far, but love knowing it's there. I am very happy with this Kindle and Amazon customer service rocks!

Reviews.Title: Light and Fast
Reviews.Author: Chakfem Aborigine
Reviews.Content: I had a tablet before this one. It was heavy and had too many applications that did not need. This one came in Light and fast. Has met my expectation of a tablet

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: sharelle zittleman
Reviews.Content: Love it! Easy to set up and easy to use!Will order the next new kindle, can't believe what a difference from my first one

Reviews.Title: fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Loraine Burtch "Lori B"
Reviews.Content: This machine is absolutely great.  The pictures it takes are better than my expensive cameras.  I read lots, so the Kindle Fire has been wonderful in that I load my books in Cloud and open them when I'm ready to read each one.  This is the third Kindle I've owned and I must say that each of them, the original, the paper white, and the Fire, is fantastic.  I can't be without my Kindle  period, end of report!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Daarlyn
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"! This is my 3rd Kindle (#1 was a 2nd generation Kindle reader, #2 was a 1st generation Kindle fire) and they just keep getting better. The screen size is great, colors and graphics are amazing and it is VERY lightweight.I use it for reading and surfing the web and it passes with flying colors. Very fast as well. Good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: yes to kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Love it. Would have been a five if it had flash player potential. Easy to learn. Easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to drinking the Kool-aid that is Apple Products
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle HDX, while traveling overseas, my Kindle would connect to Wi-fi, that my wife's iPad couldn't even see. The screen has great reaction time, and the screen is a great high quality. If you're big into downloading movies, get bigger than 16B. One HD download of Star Trek ate up 10GB! Couldn't do much else with that movie in place (thank goodness for the Kindle Cloud).

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Catwoman "bookcrazy"
Reviews.Content: Great sharp images larger screen makes it easier to see the books which is what I mainly use it for. Playing candy crush is more enjoyable than on the kindle fire 7" even beats out my desktop. However my order was lost by Amazon and I ended up having to run to best buy to get the replacement for $30.00 less which worked out better for me n the long run!

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: K. Kasaba
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying its functionality! It is everything I expected it to be, I would suggest that others purchase one as soon as they are able.

Reviews.Title: Not An IPad BUT
Reviews.Author: C. Snead "STi  Mtn  Man"
Reviews.Content: This is a really good alternative to the much more expensive tablets out there. It's fast, attractive, and handles normal needs very well. I own the 7" HD and there is no comparison to the Xs better performance. Kendle cases are way too expensive so I purchased a Poetic one that keeps the unit from normal scratches and dings. At 20%of the cost it's a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great device for the less than tech savvy person
Reviews.Author: DJK
Reviews.Content: I like the fact I can manage the device for the person I bought it for using my amazon account.

Reviews.Title: Right desition
Reviews.Author: ReadingBitch
Reviews.Content: I played with the thought to get a Kindle for a while and finally gave in, now I wonder why I did waited for so long. I mainly use it for reading. I have so many books that I decided to get the 64 GB one so that I can have a bigger part always with me without hoping for Wi-Fi.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Kalani Waldron
Reviews.Content: This is a great product and fun to use. I will be using this tablet for years. Perfect size too.

Reviews.Title: My husband loves it
Reviews.Author: T. Driste
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my husbands bdayHe had an older Kindle and it needed to be updatedHe loves his Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: The clarity is wonderful and I love the Mayday feature.  They were very helpful and knowledgeable  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Echo Karras
Reviews.Content: LOVE the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! Bought it as a birthday gift for my husband (will probably buy another for myself!). It works FAST, it's fun and easy to use, and the Amazon pricing special made it affordable.We have only used the "help" person once, but it was wonderful to SEE & HEAR who was helping us - a new high in customer service.I would recommend the Kindle Fire HDX to ANYONE looking for a tablet - one of our sons is in the Army and stationed abroad, so my husband loves to be able to keep in touch using his Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Fine display, responsive, but WiFi could be better
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dfwc"
Reviews.Content: I have had the device long enough to find that I like pretty much everything except the WiFi radio. First, it seems to suck battery more than the Nexus 7 I owned previously. I find that I must put it in 'airplane' mode when I am not using the network to get decent battery life. Worse, I find that the connection to my local wireless router becomes unresponsive after some amount of use. I find that I have to occasionally toggle the 'airplane' mode to get a good connection again. I don't have to do this often, but enough to be noticeable. Other than this, the device behaves as advertised.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle.  I wish it was adobe acrobat compatible but they do have a video program that lets you access things like cbs.com so at least video streaming works for online stations.  Not able to use it for gaming.  Awesome sound and video quality over all.

Reviews.Title: Love watching videos
Reviews.Author: Sydney's Mom "7923"
Reviews.Content: I got this so I could use the Prime downloads for off line viewing on an airplane, as I spend a fair amount of time on an airplane.  But, as I am sure Amazon figured out, I buy far more movies and TV shows than I get for free.  The ability to watch an episode of a TV series without commercials is priceless.  I have the entire Breaking Bad series in my library, and before each trip, I just download a couple episodes and watch on the plane.  The resolution is stunning.  I also have an ipad air, and I watch Amazon videos on it.  For the price, there is no comparison.  I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an ipad air just because there are a couple apps I need that were only available on ios.I also love reading on my Fire.  Just not at night.  I have found that the non-backlit display of the Paperwhite is much more conducive to sleep.The price reduction makes this my favorite android tablet.  I have an old Samsung Galaxy Tab, and when that dies, I am sticking with the Fire as my android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great price on an upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marsha Schultz
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  I have an original Kindle Fire and still use that to read books at night.  I bought the upgrade to use the camera and video feature.  This works great for taping track athletes at meets and showing them a great clear picture of how they are doing.  The internet is also much faster on this version.  I also enjoy being able to watch movies or shows on it because of the great picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful hardware, but it software is too limited
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The hardware is wonderful: fast, smooth operation with a great display.The purchase price is very reasonable, but it comes at a cost: Amazon will not let you install software other than what is in their apps library (yes, you can "side load", but that doesn't actually work particularly well). And that means you miss out on things like the native g-mail app (yes, it's better than Amazon's e-mail app), browsers like Chrome and Firefox (yes, they're better than Silk), and so on.The integration with Amazon prime means that watching videos is easy, and Amazon also lets you stream Netflix. It's kind of hard to argue too much with Amazon's trade-off of low price in return for being mostly limited to Amazon's offerings, but this Kindle would be so much better if you could also use Google's app library.Amazon, please open up the Fire HDX to other app libraries!

Reviews.Title: Its OK if You're Near a Wifi
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: But don't expect to watch movies in the car after downloading them, doesn't work.. you need Wifi so for my purposes, this tablet had limited use. I returned it to Amazon and received a full refund, no problem. Otherwise the device is cool around the house with Wifi.

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied after one month of ownership...
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Patoka
Reviews.Content: Amazon has put together some great hardware at an impressive price. The interest-free installment plan makes it extremely affordable.  Having my Amazon Prime services at my fingertips is great.  If this were all that matters in a tablet, FIVE STARS!But, the Amazon app store and ecosystem is a sad and depressing state of affairs. Google has apparently boycotted Amazon's store, so any app you've purchased on Google Play Store will not be available. There's no Chrome browser, no YouTube app (OMG!), no Gmail app... what about the Google star map app?  Nope.  Google maps?  *sigh*  I'm usually aggravated that the normal, every day tasks that I take for granted on my Android phone are a P.I.T.A on this thing.  I rarely leave the house with it.Worse still, major publishers *might* have their Android apps on the Amazon store, but when you search for your favorite apps you're more than likely to find a ton of cunningly named applications from unknown publishers.  If you do find a major vendor's application from a (hopefully) legitimate publisher, you'll pay for it again and maybe they'll update the app as often as the Google Play store version.  Or maybe not.The Amazon Silk browser works well, but it's not what I want (privacy??) and good luck finding an alternative.  At least I could find proper versions of Spotify, Tumblr and Facebook.  Sketchbook Pro is nice.  I managed to find a PC tool to download apps from Google's store as .APK files and then sideload them into the Amazon Fire OS, but that's a lot of effort and the Google services are not available to keep that app updated or enable many of it's features.  You'll be tempted to download .APK files from forums and warez sites, but then you're guaranteed to become infected.Anyway, If you're an Android hacker with an Amazon Prime account and looking for great hardware at a very low price (all seven of you), you might have a few, warranty-voiding choices after buying this tablet: 1) find a way to root the device and install Google's Play services and applications.  Or, 2) root the device, flash it with a custom Android ROM, load Google's services and apps, and then install Amazon's applications from the Google Store (Kindle Reader, Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Workspaces, etc).Or, rather, I'm still researching this.  I hope we have some options.  Otherwise, I think I made a mistake.

Reviews.Title: K-HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: HD1962
Reviews.Content: this is absolutly lovely. I was very surprised at the quality. I am cutting off some of cable so this is an alternative for me. Love it!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 (almost)
Reviews.Author: Stephen R. Woods
Reviews.Content: I will just echo all the kudos already bestowed on this device. I do, however, have some small complaints. The first is about the inconsistency of where the back arrow and home icons appear. They seem to appear in different places depending on the app you're running. On my Galaxy S3 smartphone, also an Android device, the back arrow is ALWAYS in the lower right corner, and the home key is ALWAYS the center key at the bottom... regardles of app. Now that makes sense and is consistent - are you listening Amazon?  The second complaint is the complete lockout of Google Play Store and making it hard to get non-Amazon apps. You have to "root" the device to get non-Amazon apps, and I don't want to do this.  OPEN IT UP Amazon.  You already have a captive audience for the device. If most Kindle users are like me, they buy tons of stuff from Amazon any way, so we don't need to be prevented from looking elsewhere for apps.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: D. Sedlak "Deb"
Reviews.Content: Do Kindle and never go back.  I simply love this Kindle.  It is great for reading, searching the web and just about anything else.  Push2TV is the best thing ever and we get so much use out of it.  It is so great to be able to have a movie on and switch it to our TV in a matter of seconds.  I love the larger screen for reading and playing games  So its YES, YES YES to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  also like having the special offers.  It gives me ideas..

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Elaine Cook
Reviews.Content: I have gotten a lot of use out of this Kindle, more than I had anticipated.  It has been especially useful in the hospital for e-mail, Facebook, etc.  It's handier than trying to take a computer in with me.

Reviews.Title: great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gregg Rooten
Reviews.Content: I tried the original Kindle Fire, the BlackBerry tablet, a Galaxy tab, and even an iPad. This one is the greatest! Easy to use, super speed with amazing clarity of graphics and sound. It does everything I want from a tablet.

Reviews.Title: My kindle
Reviews.Author: Bookworm "idahojewel"
Reviews.Content: I like my iPad better as it has more apps and games that I like. The kindle is slower booting up and not as easy to navigate around as the iPad. But since I gave the iPad to my husband, I will get use to this. The visual pictures are great.

Reviews.Title: Wireless connectivity issues !
Reviews.Author: Tina M. Bumgardner
Reviews.Content: let me first say that I truely love my kindle fire HD, but even though it shows I have a full signal (excellent) i keep getting disconnected.  it won't even say that i'm disconnected it'll just stop.  then i have to turn it off and on again.  yes i've tried re-booting it and calling mayday and regular customer service but they have been no help at all.  I even had my router checked, double checked and replaced just in case but like i said i have a full signal and my other wireless devices have no problems at all.  I have the original kindle fire and even though it shows excellent kindle strength it won't connect at all :(  very sad.

Reviews.Title: Nice pad
Reviews.Author: MS Delta
Reviews.Content: I was looking at this and the ipad. Trying to buy something like this will drive you crazy.  For what I would be using this for why pay the extra money for the ipad when this devise would do everything I needed and more.  We get so wrapped up in names we really don't use common sense sometimes. I will only use this for book mostly, videos, and games for my grandson.

Reviews.Title: Best Display I've ever seen but....
Reviews.Author: Watchguy
Reviews.Content: This thing has an awesome display and amazon customer service is great as always. However, the interface isn't as good as my iPad. Several websites I tried didn't render quite right and made them difficult to use. Apps are good, but not iPad good. I think the product is superior to iPad, but the infrasctructure just isn't there yet.

Reviews.Title: good for reading not so good for other stuff
Reviews.Author: Karine Valliant-Saunders
Reviews.Content: So I bought this a little while ago.Its great for books, but the apps for it are not the best.Netflix and hulu plus both seem to crash a ton on this device, which I imagine is the apps themselves.However, when I try to use the "mayday" function, it doesn't work.  The internet browsing is also ridiculously slow.Maybe I got a bad apple, but I don't think so...if you're looking for a bigger ebook reader, it's great, but other functionalities are minimal.The only other thing I use it for is taking notes in my night classes-for that it works great, I downloaded the office suite kindle version.  So for my two main purposes it works great, but if you want something for movie viewing-unless you're downloading the movie I'd go for something else.  The streaming on the kindle isn't great and there isn't a ton of support (despite mayday) to really help out with glitches.

Reviews.Title: Volume Needs to Come up
Reviews.Author: Abigail
Reviews.Content: This is a nice kindle to have. The only problem I have is that the sound is not as loud as the 7" one.I mean it sounds like this is half the volume of the kindle 7". I love my music, so therefore I AM NOT ALL THAT PLEASED.but for listening with earphones, I guess it would be fine. But I use this kindle and let my music go from room to room. But overall, I think it is good.

Reviews.Title: Ads?  Really?
Reviews.Author: Statari
Reviews.Content: I got the slightly cheaper version of this product which apparently means that the greeting screen is irrevocably an ad of some sort.  It's mildly annoying and unexpected but nothing I can't live with.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Nisttahuz
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX.  This my third Kindle, each one having better than the last,  I use it primarily for reading but also enjoy movie previews, book reviews and games.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Hol
Reviews.Content: Love it and easy its to use.  Does the same as any other pad, maybe even better. Clear screen display!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: beckyc251
Reviews.Content: Wish I could learn to use it better.  Easier to maneuver than my last one. Takes great pictures.  I'm a definite Kindle fan...my 3rd!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 etc
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: Replaced an earlier Kindle Fire. It is great. Love all the apps. Nice to have a larger reading service. Color and clarity are excellent. Need to use a stylus but do not mind.

Reviews.Title: I bought 4 of them!
Reviews.Author: Melanie Wojtulewicz
Reviews.Content: After I bought Kindles for two nieces and a nephew for Christmas, I decided to treat myself too.  I never imagined how you could take a computerized book to bed.  Now I can take lots of books to bed.  I am very happy with my machine.  I do with that they came with instructions. I do not like the idea of trying to figure everything out my trial and error.  I don't know what flat bellied people do  Mine sits just right on my big tummy.

Reviews.Title: Android Tablet, Some Unique Features, Some Unique Failures
Reviews.Author: T. Steyaert
Reviews.Content: I got the Kindle Fire HDX after using the Google Nexus tablet.  When the HDX came out, I thought about the change and decided to wait for a bit.  Did more with my Google Nexus and when I couldn't find a good way to show the Prime videos, I decided to try the HDX.Pro:  HDX will show Prime Videos, including downloading locally. Great graphics resolution.Con:  Amazon Marketplace, not Kindle Marketplace. A new account, so linking things to Google's account doesn't work.  Lots of applications seem to run all the time, causing issues with other applications.Who wants the HDX?  If you want to watch videos from Amazon Prime, get the HDX.  Need the super high graphical resolution, get the HDX.  Basically, anything else you can do from a standard Android tablet for cheaper and much more configurable.Android tablet has more configuration, and a much bigger application pool.  With the Kindle, you can load applications from another Android device, but you don't get updates.  Overall, if you need the higher resolution, or want to watch Amazon Prime videos, I would suggest just about any other Andoid device.

Reviews.Title: shoulda gone with the iPad
Reviews.Author: Miss Cellophane "Clearly, you don't remember me."
Reviews.Content: So few apps (like airline apps) on the Kindle.  I am sad that I didn't spend the extra money to get the iPad.Additionally I can't sync my work stuff on this device.The glare on this tablet is annoying when reading.  I love the old school kindle for reading and continuous to use that whoever possible.

Reviews.Title: cant wait for the fix.....still love it...
Reviews.Author: mitch3155
Reviews.Content: I loved the first kindle, wanna love this one, too. The quality of construction and clarity of the screen are second to none. The only issue I have, which the people from kindle assure me a fix is coming, is the sudden loss of WiFi. Can't wait for the fix. This is truly the only device you need when traveling here or Europe. Haven't tried it in South America.

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: G. Plude "orchid lady"
Reviews.Content: This is my first foray into the tablet world.  I was on the fence as to whether I needed or wanted a tablet when I have a smartphone and a touch screen laptop.  I was on the fence too when I bought my first Kindle reader and feel immediately in love with it (and I won't give it up for reading books).  The HDX is easy to use, easy to get used to (I haven't had to hit Mayday yet).  I have found I use my phone less for email, unless I'm away from home, and I can see the portability advantage.  Is a tablet crucial, probably not, but it is fun.  More to come.

Reviews.Title: Some Problems with Options
Reviews.Author: RGrabber
Reviews.Content: I am still working on understanding all the options.  This is my first tablet and it appears as though Amazon expects a first time buy to know the ins and out of finding option.  The Mayday is helpful if you know what questions to ask.  They have been friendly.  If you know the basics my feeling is that is a good item.

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping it would be!
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I hate the fact that I can't download some of the games I had on my Kindle Fire HD onto the HDX!  The one game that I really liked to play (Pogo) can not be downloaded.  I've lost other games too but that is the one that irks me the most.  If I could I'd like to go back to the old 8.9" Kindle Fire HD.  This one is NOT worth the money!!!

Reviews.Title: My 2nd Kindle
Reviews.Author: Linda Ledezma
Reviews.Content: Its everything I wanted in a tablet and so much MORE!  I love it!!!  I use this tablet for absolutely everything.  Watching movies and TV shows its just amazing clarity and functions without any issues.  I have no Cons for this product.  IF your on the fence about purchasing a HDX Kindle Fire...take the leap....you will NEVER regret the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Home Run, Amazon!
Reviews.Author: David Artemison "DJ Artemison"
Reviews.Content: Wow, I love this! I've never purchased a device that was so intuitive and simple to set up, right out of the box. From watching Prime instant videos to loading and listening to my music (it can read iTunes files without converting them) to surfing the web, everything was smooth as Silk. The May Day live help feature worked as advertised. I had a rep helping me on downloading an app outside of the Kindle App Store within 2 minutes. The Origami case is really cool and you can buy 2 years of Asurion insurance coverage, replacing it up to 3 times, for $80. Absolute home run, Amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Great Reader & Browser for what is needed
Reviews.Author: Lelo & Lela "Lelo & Lela"
Reviews.Content: It is easy for an older person to use and adjust the font for reading. So easy to see all your books and get to email.

Reviews.Title: Gives the other tablets on the market some competition
Reviews.Author: kranberry
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet ever, but I must say that I really love it so far. There is so much storage and the free app a day is a added bonus. All the apps run smoothly and seamlessly and it is very user friendly.There are some compatibility issues, like the device may not be able to play all of your movie formats but this is easily overcome by downloading a good media player (I'm bias to vlc).Another problem is the lack in the number of apps available on the amazon market compared with android/apple etc. However, if you go into setting>applications, just click on the 'allow installation of applications that are not from the appstore' and you can then download your apps from other markets directly from online.It is also very lightweight, I carry it around all the time and the screen resolution is fantastic, everything is so crisp and clear.Overall I think this tablet can hold its own when compared to the other tablets on the market right now. Much improvement from the previous kindles

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: annette a isbell
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX, it is very clear, there Is no problem reading from it and the camera is wonderful, takes a wonderful picture much better then a regular camera.  But if you are sitting in direct sun it cant be read. But you can read it outside but not direct.  I have had a few Kindles and this one is the best.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: M. Ponds
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle FIre! It doesn't have all of the functionality of the iPad, but it also costs much less.  They offer online help with a live person which I really like.  I have used the option twice and once they were of help and the other, not.

Reviews.Title: Love this Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: allen captivating
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kindle for years and it became an extension of my arm.  My husband doesn't know how I  had survived without one.  Now that I have this newer Kindle I love it more.  I wish I had my old one too so I would always have one charged.  However, this Kindle takes great pictures and my old Kindle didn't have a camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" HDX Display with Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: Russell E Brown Jr
Reviews.Content: Before I bought this,  I was thinking of getting an Apple IPad Air with all the bells and whisles. In my own words.....this is a much better buy and it has all the bells and whisles you'll ever need. I'm very HAPPY with the choice I made. I Love my Kindle and Grand-kids Love it too. Should of bought this years ago.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: Drew Estaver, Charleston SC
Reviews.Content: Compared the Fire HDX, 9.5 to many other similar tablets. For the money... it delivers great value.Have used one month as of this posting, but have not explored all the included features and apps., so this is a first impression report.Opted to accept the opening promo screens to lower the price, and we don't find them objectionable.Very slim and light weight.Great screen image quality.Fast response and browsing loads.Free security and wireless print apps available from Amazon.The included "Mayday" online Tech chat, help access is quick and painless. The Tech can circle or line point on your screen to show you exactly where to look for the next step in understanding steps in finding your way to answers to navigation.  You can see them on screen, but they don't see you.Only negative so far is:Takes a bit of initial searching around to find ways to delete and save and other common commands.When first using most apps and features, there is a tutor dialogue, but we haven't found a way to "replay" them later if needed.No print command available when using Silk web browser, but you can take a screen shot by pressing "power and down volume" at same time, then save to photo album, and later attach to a message.

Reviews.Title: Screen Resolution but very demanding especially when wifi is on
Reviews.Author: BoPan
Reviews.Content: I like the apperance of the kindle Fire HDX. And the screen resolution is very fantastic.However, several things should be noticed.One problem is that the battery could not keep the device on for a long time, especially when you turn on the wifi. When the wifi is on, the device could only standby for one day (24hrs). But when wifi is off, it could standby for a long time. I don't know why. The same thing has not been noticed in Ipad or Galxypad.The other problem is sometime wifi is not stable. Sometime you could not connect to the Internet, even 192.168.1.1, although the symbol of wifi is still on.The last problem is I could not manage the program in process. The software from a third party is needed, if you want to close one program.

Reviews.Title: A THREE TIME KINDLE OWNER
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is perfectly perfect.What a pleasure to use.What a beauty.Bravo Amazon, you have  done it again! How can you possibly make it any better?  But if there is a way,you will and I'll buy it also.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely Love my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: dean Huthman
Reviews.Content: I am so pleased with my Kindle Fire. I especially like the feature where you can get help  from a  tech person, by simply pushinga button. (clicking) They do not make you feel stupid when you ask a stupid question ,and handle every response in  a professionalmanner. The Kindle has great color and clarity and works so well I almost feel that I have had it for years.My Daughter wanted meto get an Apple IPad, but I felt Kindle was superior and have not been disappointed! Also several Bucks Cheaper.  Kudos toAmazon. Great Product !!

Reviews.Title: FUN!!
Reviews.Author: C. Wisehart "Icarolyn"
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure I would use a Kindle enough to invest in one but I'm surehappy that my husband talked me into getting one.  There are manythings to learn and I'm just getting started!!

Reviews.Title: A must for Prime members
Reviews.Author: Mr. Joshua "JB"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome product. Definitely a must for Prime members. Streaming alone is amazing.Wish I bought the 64gb instead of the 32. Takes some time to get used to but it's fun learning it.I haven't figured out how to customize the lock screen or even if I have access to do so. I haven't used Mayday yet but I well soon. Battery life it's quite nice. After live streaming for a few hours, I was still good to go.If you're looking to buy and you have Amazon Prime, buy the 64gb Wi-Fi with ads (save yourself the $15).

Reviews.Title: Of all the Kindles, this one beats them all...
Reviews.Author: Henry Wiggles "Snorg"
Reviews.Content: Except for the usual problems you would have with any Amazon device (you need to be born with the instructions installed in your brain) this Kindle far outruns the previous Kindle devices.  I mostly use it for streaming videos from the Amazon Cloud. Always do that otherwise you will be using your memory to store them. I would only download videos that I would like to see "off line". I bought the Kindle HDX 8.9 with WIFI and 64 Gigs of Memory. You can save money by accepting Amazon's "Offers", like I did. The only drawback from doing that is that a lot of their offers are for kids. I don't have kids. Some of their offers do not give your the "unlock" device function. Then you have to either cycle your Kindle through standby or go to the offer and decline it. That's the hassle from saving the $30.00 to $40.00 more you'll pay for NOT having offers come up on your Kindle. Just the same, I would recommend having this Kindle over the iPad and Samsung Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: DEBS
Reviews.Content: Love it.  I have the Kindle Fire HD from last year but just wanted to upgrade so I had the front/rear camera.  I gave my last years' model to my mother and we are both happy.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Bought the HDX 8.9 to use at work and at home. Looked at other tablets and really happy with my choice. Was able to sideload chrome, which I need for work, and the the use at home for magazines, movies, tv, etc. is fabulous. Screen colors and resolution can't be beat. Highly recommend !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic tablet.
Reviews.Author: Michael C. "Malithorne"
Reviews.Content: I owned the original Kindle Fire and it had served me well for quite a while. It was heavy and far from perfect with a horrible keyboard and limited storage on a small display. So I was admittedly a little hesitant to consider the latest update to this product. The iPad was out of the question as an overpriced technical prison. But I looked at several options among current Android tablets including ones from Samsung and Asus. But as a happy Amazon Prime customer, I gave the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" a closer look despite common objections about limits of the Amazon app store, and the absence of widgets and customization in the Fire OS. A techie snob, I was impressed with the specifications of the Kindle Fire HDX when compared to other tablets. I decided that I had to take the chance when Amazon sweetened the deal with the offer to break up the payments. Sold Amazon, and make mine 32GB.When the box arrived and I pulled the Fire out, I was blown away at how light the Kindle Fire HDX was in my hands. The matte black back felt great as well. Turning it on, I quickly found I was in love with the beautiful display and the lightning fast response of my new tablet. And thankfully Amazon updated Fire OS with a well designed Swype enabled keyboard. After playing with my new toy a while, I noticed the slightest blemish in my display, especially when displaying dark colors. So I tried out a feature of my new Kindle Fire HDX that I thought I would never use..... Mayday.I was greeted by a friendly smiling support rep that asked me to explain my problem. I mentioned the blemish and she asked me to point at it, since she could see my display. I did and she drew a circle right where the problem was and said I had some dead pixels. Amazon would send out a new device and I would have to return the defective one. As a computer support person with many years of experience, the feature I thought I would never use taught me that I had chosen exactly the right tablet. Outstanding feature that is sure to be appreciated by many Kindle owners.The Kindle Fire HDX is a great tablet that deserves praise. Speaking of which, I never considered my original Fire as a tablet. Just didn't seem deserving. But the 8.9" Fire HDX is difficult to call anything else because it's clearly just not another Kindle reader device. Just the right size for reading and consuming web media or movies, and the battery life has been far beyond my expectations. The included charger gets the Kindle Fire HDX back on its feet in no time at all. And at $120+ cheaper than competitors, there is no reason to look beyond this tablet. Amazon nailed this one.

Reviews.Title: great1
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I had reviewed this Kindle for months before I decided that I wanted to buy it. I had carefully compared Kindles and other I-Pads. All my content from my old Kindle transferred easily. Even tho this is not a dedicated e-reader, I will use it as my main e-reader. I discovered that the background of the page can be changed from bright white to off-white or pale yellow. Very useful for night reading when a white page can be too much glare.

Reviews.Title: Greatest small computer I have yet to see. Can't praise it enough.
Reviews.Author: Hal Bourne
Reviews.Content: Still learning more about this small package of magic. I appreciate being able to dictate my email to it since I am a bit clumsy typing on the smaller keyboard. I never was a good typist anyway. It is lightening fast. I read quite a lot and this is my second Kindle. I notice a reading lamp is not at all necessary with the back lighted screen. Love it

Reviews.Title: complicated for this older man
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: There seems to be no organized way to take the customer through the directions, organization and placement of content for easy use. You must have a cover , it is so touch sensitive; yet there are times I can pound on it before it will respond to my "touch". I will need more than the 30 days I have had it to become comfortable with all it has to offer. A short course in beyond the basics might help. Otherwise, it is a great Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Good or great?
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Ferrantello
Reviews.Content: I love the size and ease of use. But I didn't realize the lack of capability with external applications and programs.Hopefully Amazon will work with these companies so we can access the things we need.

Reviews.Title: enjoying my kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: millerbr
Reviews.Content: Very handy when needed. Grand kids are always asking me for it to play games. I have had no problems at all. I have used the May day once to return a DVD and it was a great experience. Thank you kindle people.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mai "Mai"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a great tablet for entertainment. This is it. Downloads movies and TV shows easily with no buffering. Resolution is excellent. Availability of books for purchase or borrowing is fantastic. Screen is easy on the eyes and top quality. Plenty of options for games. A help button provides the best customer service I have found for any tablet. Strong wifi capability. Super camera. The Kindle Fire is an amazing tablet.

Reviews.Title: So Coo
Reviews.Author: Elliepoo
Reviews.Content: I really really like this Kindle.  So happy I got the HDX - audio is fantastic and picture quality is great

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this purchase
Reviews.Author: Edwin J. Stevenson
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this so I could do school work while I was at my lunch breaks at work. Now I use it all the time for many other things. The picture quality is great (better than others I have seen). Sound quality is very good with Dolby but it isn't as loud as I would like sometimes and using bluetooth speakers doesn't give the rich Dolby stereo sound. I would like to see Amazon allow more outside apps to be used but there are a lot of good apps there. I probably should have bought a 4g version because some apps will not work if I am not connected to the net and I didn't need the 64GB model because I don't think I will ever use that much memory.

Reviews.Title: The screen is very sharp.
Reviews.Author: Dean Fredrickson
Reviews.Content: Screen is very sharp, download speed very good on wireless.  Some apps are a bit difficult to install.  nice tablet

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael McPhearson
Reviews.Content: I love the 8.9" Kindle Fire HDX,love the screen and everything it does,it's more or less the big brother of the 7" and also does a few other things it doesn't.I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: I'm hooked on Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Dinah Lamunyon
Reviews.Content: Love  my new Kindle Fire. Just the right size for ease of reading & transporting. Like the black & white text for ease of reading out in the sun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: What a great tablet this Kindle is!  The clarity of the screen is superb, the Wi-Fi is quick, and the help feature just adds another layer of consumer friendliness!

Reviews.Title: My kindle fire
Reviews.Author: william k. raley
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire HDX 8.9".My wife and son say I don't by myself anything. So the kindle fire HDX is all mine.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Mrs. P. J. Singleton
Reviews.Content: this is my fifth kindle and that is only because it is the larger size. started with the very first one brought out and have continued to purchase over the years since. best thing ever.

Reviews.Title: Not a 'bargain', but worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Norbert Pohl "Car Nut"
Reviews.Content: Amazingly fast. Easy set up. Great screen. Unparalleled tech support system. Good battery life. Takes great pictures, panaorama pics are awesome!Only downside is some popular apps aren't made for it, and some sites don't support this device for their content.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Linda G "Linda G"
Reviews.Content: Best gift i ever received. It Does everything and more. Love it. I play my games, read my books and take care of my emails and web business.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I just Love this Kindle. I have had a Kindle Keyboard with 500+ books on it for a couple of years and have enjoyed it too. The Kindle Fire HDX is just incredible. It is so quick with everything. I have loaded it with games for myself and my 5 year old grandson. The Kindle Fire HDX has a great camera too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sally McEntire
Reviews.Content: So very happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, still learning everything that it does. Took some great pics with it already. I have already recommended this to several friends. Downloaded a guide and it has been very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Angela Lane
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice.  extremely simple to use and even easier to read than expected.  No problems at all.  Absolutely pleased with the purchase.  It was a birthday present for my husband and he is thrilled with it as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Al Lenhardt
Reviews.Content: Would like to do spreadsheets and documents on the device as well as to print from it. All other features are what we wanted and need.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Patrick Eakin
Reviews.Content: A good tablet compared to the others currently on the market. The screen has a vivid display and graphics and videos look good. It works works great with my wireless home network. It didn't come with a screen protector so I purchased a screen protector and a nice case to protect it. Battery life is decent for what is it used for as well.

Reviews.Title: Great way to read, surf, get emails
Reviews.Author: PRHPage
Reviews.Content: This is a gift for my husband, and he loves it! He's had a laptop up to this point, and the Kindle is much more portable, but the screen on this devise is plenty large enough that he doesn't miss that part of the laptop. This devise is very light-weight, and the graphics and colors are stunning. It's quick to pick up wifi.My husband (and I) have no reservations or problems with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Give me Chrome
Reviews.Author: Sodamoca
Reviews.Content: I gave it a 5 star rating but I find there are a couple of flaws with this tablet which if you are aware of them will not cause you much heartburn.  The one that will and that I have yet to find a good work around is the Silk Browser.  I don't like it and I wish I could more easily replace it with a different browser.  No matter how many times I change the search engine it reverts to Bing.  Nothing against Bing but I am a google man.  Taunting me with settings that seem to let me change my default search engine (and it does until you reboot) does not help.This is not Android.  Anymore than Apple OS is Linux.  This is built on an Android core but it is not native Android.  As such some apps are not available for it and some need to be side loaded (download the apk and load it manually).  If you want to always check the latest and greatest of each type of app out there then this might be a big negative for you.  Me? I want to find one I like and never change it again until a major upgrade is demonstrated to me.The App store is more arrogant than Microsoft used to be.  The App store thinks it knows you and it doesn't.  It takes your Amazon purchase history, your books, and then assumes you just want movies, books, and games when it returns search results.  Use google (or Bing I guess) and get software reviews there then search for them specifically.  I like to use the full Amazon online shop and search within Android Apps to get a better return on my search.So why did I give it 5 stars?  It is powerful, its graphics are beautiful, it is exactly what I thought I would be getting and it cost less than other comparable systems I looked at.  I am an Amazon Prime member so it fit with my current online usage and I did my homework and was aware of the flaws and work arounds before I ordered it.  Get some utilities (ES3, Evernote, King Soft Office) to compensate for issues and check to make sure your treasured games are available (no haytown for my wife was an issue) and then decide if it is worth the extra 100 to 200 dollars to get a pure Android device or worth the risk of voiding your support if you root it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: There are not enough stars to calculate how much I love my kindle fire 8.9 HDX. It is super user friendly, the sound and graphics on this are awesome.  The battery life on this is also great.  Thank you Amazon I have been addicted since my first kindle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: L. Gregg "sweetredpoppy"
Reviews.Content: Everything about my new Kindle Fire is wonderful, cannot think of one negative......would recommend to anyonethinking of getting a tablet...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi and $G LITE, 64GB
Reviews.Author: JRTLVR "queni"
Reviews.Content: In my humble opinion, Kindle Fire lives up to everything it's advertised to do and then some!  My only regret is waiting so long to move on from my previous Kindle (which I also loved).  I never expected the "Fire" to be so incredibly user-friendly!  It does everything but kiss you good morning and make the coffee!  The only negative is that I do find the battery needs recharging more frequently, but it does so much more that I can easily understand why this is necessary.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great size.  So far I've found it easy to use,  have not had to call May day. The camera takes awesome picture and I like the video.

Reviews.Title: like my new kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: nancy spero
Reviews.Content: Wish I could print anything from it. I find I still have to use my laptop too much.  It doesn't have capability to use a lot of app's that are vailable on the phone. Too expensive for not a lot of upgrades.

Reviews.Title: Fire's burning bright
Reviews.Author: David J. Brumbaugh
Reviews.Content: This is one beauty of a Kindle Fire and it's as light as can be!! There is so much more to it than you can believe!! There are no drawbacks to it PERIOD!!! This is money that's well spent and if you want the cleanest sound in playing music you are able to catch every nuance of it!! For a shining example as to that go to the music store and if you're a big fan of the animated Transformers movie type , or should I say Swype?, and go for Transformers soundtrack and look for Spectre General and buy that song and turn the volume all the way up and you will hear every last word at the end of the song!!!  You will love this machine!!!

Reviews.Title: Can't go Wrong with a Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: CybaX
Reviews.Content: Looked at many tablets for many months. Since I am a Prime member I decided on the HDX 8.9. I can say I made the right choice. The main complaint I heard prior to purchase was the lack of the Goggle Play Store. This is not a dealbreaker. Amazon has many apps & is growing. Also, if you know what your doing, you can load compatible apps from other app stores.Have not used the "Mayday" feature & hope I don't encounter a problem I have to. But it's nice to know it's there if I need it.

Reviews.Title: All the bells and whistles but encountered some glitches
Reviews.Author: R. Eye
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" as a Xmas gift for my 23-yr old daughter.  I saw her watching a movie on her smart phone and asked her why she wasn't using the HDX.  She told me that the Netflix streaming kept stopping and she had to start it all over again, which didn't occur on her smart phone.  She also told me that she could not watch youtube videos on it.  I called Amazon customer service but with Kindles one must now call a special Kindle service line.  The Kindle CSR told us that we needed to do a number of things and then call back if the problem persisted.  It persisted but not as often.  We called back to report this and we were instructed by the Kindle CSR to reload some apps including Netflix.  It was strange that the Kindle CSR blamed Netflix's streaming for the glitch or our wireless router when our family of six watches wireless Netflix & Amazon streaming on numerous devices in numerous rooms throughout the house with no issues.  My daughter told him that she accessed Netflix with both the Kindle HDX and her laptop side by side watching the same movie from Netflix and the Kindle froze but the laptop did not.  She told him that this should be evidence that the problem was not Netflix or a wireless issue at our house.  the Kindle CSR told her that if this second round of steps did not fix the problem, then a new Kindle HDX would be sent out.  After she reloaded the apps and did what the Kindle CSR told her to do, the problem was still there, so Amazon sent out a new Kindle Fire HDX.  The new one has not encountered the problems that the old one did.  It is an expensive item to have issues with streaming when other items like our numerous laptops, smartphones, iPads, and Android tablets do not and we think that something must have been updated to fix this glitch.  My daughter likes the light weight and portability of the HDX, the image is clear and crisp, and she can download some college textbooks to it if she wants to.  She had downloaded many apps and is enjoying it.UPDATE: Now she can no longer view youtube videos again.  We give up.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought the HDX and not an iPad
Reviews.Author: J Ambrose
Reviews.Content: When I first took the Kindle out of the box, I had a moment of buyer's remorse.  When I went to add apps like Blackboard, I felt it again.  But I have to say, I used a tech rental program to try out the new iPad and was very glad at the end of the rental period that I didn't buy an iPad.  I keep eyeing windows-based tablet PCs, but Microsoft seems at least a few years from working out all of the problems in hardware and OS.  After comparing my options, I find the Kindle to be the best possible choice for the money. It is faster and more intuitive than the iPad, and it is far less expensive than any equivalent performer of the PC ilk.The battery drains a little faster than I expected, but it also charges pretty quickly.  So far, there haven't been any functionality I can't replicate on the HDX, although I haven't found a way to run flashplayer content.

Reviews.Title: Hard to sync up !!!
Reviews.Author: Frank Grippi
Reviews.Content: The reason a 3 star was chosen, is the difficulty getting your email, contact list  and calender to sync up. A second email had to be established for the calender to work. Contact list will be seen in the new addresses only, not your original address. Frustration, set aside,the kindle HDX has an amazing display, very light  and a joy to use. Waiting to see if a better option is made for a protective case.

Reviews.Title: It is the best
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Schmitz
Reviews.Content: It does everything I wanted and more! Easy to use. Light weight.Wish I had it a long time ago. I  forget my phone before I forget my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: A must have for us Amazon vets
Reviews.Author: Bio L. Titterington "Bio T."
Reviews.Content: I have the 1st gen Kindle and liked it but then I saw this was coming out and had to have it.The HD screen is great. They moved the speakers to a more logical position for tv/movie viewing and this thing is light. Really light.Battery life is good. I don't even know how they fit a battery into this thing. It's so slim.Only downside is that some of my favorite apps that I have on my iTouch are not available on Kindle. Not a deal breaker but a slight bummer.

Reviews.Title: First tablet
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: Love what this can do.  Use it mostly for email, browsing, and games, although I have tried watching a movie, the camera, and music just to see what it can do.  Much faster than my wife's non-HDX 8.9".  The button layout on this is MUCH better than hers too.  Here's some info:Camera:  Only tried a few times, but seems to work well and comes w/ great editing tools.Movies:  Again, only tried a few times but great quality and sound for a device this sound.Email:  I have my company account set up on this and it was a piece of cake to do and works well.Games:  Not much to say....they work great.Web:  It is what it is...browser works fine.

Reviews.Title: very nice except for
Reviews.Author: MNMan
Reviews.Content: While everything works fine, I wanted to stream movies to my TV, but the only things available have a high cost associated with them.  When will someone come up with a cable (micro B to HDMI).

Reviews.Title: Prepare to be entertained. This is the Kindle we have been waiting for.
Reviews.Author: the stout hearted "reinx"
Reviews.Content: Media consumption at its finest! This is the Kindle Amazon has really been striving for it seems. Gutsy(fast and responsive), stylish, and very surprisingly light! The origami case will add a noticeable amount of weight but you will want it to keep this particular piece of tech safe.Browsing the web and reading your favorite books are both immediately satisfying, while the Amazon app store continues to grow its offerings at what seems to me a reasonably competitive rate.The HDX's ability to catch hold of and maintain a signal from your WiFi is solid(impressively so) and will keep you connected for all your Netflix and other streaming needs.And stream you will, because the picture quality is very good. The speakers are not as loud as last gen, but for a tablet I find them adequate for a quick couple of tunes on break or an episode of my favorite TV show before bed.I have occasion to use my HDX for up to 12 hours at a stretch at times and the battery keeps up quite well for reading or researching the occasional article on the net. The included charger and cable will keep you juiced up at a very pleasant rate as well.Bottom line: The kindle as a media consumption device does its job without a hitch. Highly reccomended. The 8.9" screen is still quite handily portable but if you don't mind the loss of screen realestate you can't beat the price of the 7".

Reviews.Title: I love this Kindle fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Beverly A
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" was the first tablet I ever had.  I am computer literate.  I am a novice at this tablet, however it is easy to operate.  I like the idea of having WI-FI and 4G LTE.  I have WI-FI at home but I like the option of using this tablet anywhere instead of looking for a Wi-Fi hotspot when I am traveling.  It is easy to read a book or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: pumpkin8
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is fantastic.  The screen is high resolution and movies look fantastic on the 8.9 ".  It is very fast.  It also allows android apps to be downloaded. I highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.

Reviews.Title: hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Grandma of four
Reviews.Content: Good for reading especially long books!  I like that I can place book vertically or horizontally also for games.  It doesn't add much weight.but the cover is heavy.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet; one shortcoming
Reviews.Author: shopdaddy "musikdaddy"
Reviews.Content: I bought a 32GB Kindle HDX 8.9.  Traded my previous Kindle HD 8.9 which I was very happy with, but I got bit by the "new model" bug.  The HDX tablet is much lighter, has a sharper screen, has faster response, and obviously better WiFi.  The only shortcoming I have to complain about is that Amazon didn't see fit to include HDMI on the HDX as they did on the HD.  I really enjoyed this feature on the HD because I could download a movie, then play it back on any TV with an HDMI port.  Unfortunately, Amazon chose to build in Miracast, a technology to connect to TVs and other devices that is deployed on very new TVs and, apparently, is not yet perfected, based on the plethora of 3-star (and less) reviews of the Miracast adapters sold on Amazon.  It is the reason I didn't give the HDX 5 stars, otherwise, I'd consider it a perfect mobile device.

Reviews.Title: Good so far.
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Weichselbaum "Chaswax"
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife. At first she was a little worried that it was only for reading books. She was so surprised that it could do almost everything her notebook could do and do it faster. has great speech recognition to use instead of typing. The screen is so big and clear so that even us old people can see and read. Best of all - it made my wife happy.

Reviews.Title: It is very good!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: It took me a while to figure it out, but as I learn how to use it, it is quite the instrument.  It should have had a instruction manual with it.  The biggest fault with the unite is when you go out of town it won't work without being hooked up to the internet.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Georgetta M. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I pre-ordered it before Amazon was ready to ship. I have the Kindle fire HDX 8.9, 64 GB. Each one has met expectations.  The only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because many of the books now have the table of contents grayed out.  I could see and use the table of contents on previous devices.  However, I have located the table on most books and bookmarked it.The second reason for only 4 stars:  I have purchased 3 cases- looking for the perfect one.  Have not found it yet.  I do not want to raise the camera from the case to take a picture.  One case allows me to take a picture without raising the camera, but there is a black spot hiding the center of the picture, but the picture comes out great. STRANGE!Even though I only gave my 4th Kindle 4 stars, I would not give it up!

Reviews.Title: Nothing like this!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Prentiss
Reviews.Content: This is my first purchase of a note pad of any kind but I rely don't think I would ever want anything else!  So portable and everything is right there at the touch of your finger. The HD is incredible! Facebook is so easy, my email is set up great. Nothing bad to say about it! I could go on and on but I want to get back to playing! :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome features!! Glad I got it!!
Reviews.Author: Mavisjo
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle fire!! I already had one of the original ones which I still use because it is more compact & easy to stuff in my purse. I love the neat features the fire had to offer. The color screen is very clear & great for playing games and watching videos. Oh and it of course is great for reading, although as I mentioned I still use my first kindle for most of my reading. I find it has a better screen for outdoors & is more compact & lighter than the fire. I can access all my books on either kindle. I just sync and it picks up whenever I left off, great feature! I have yet to use the mayday app, still learning all it has to offer & haven't felt the need yet. I know I will at some point. If you are considering a kindle vs iPad, I would suggest giving the kindle fire a try, you won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Great Ereader/Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" about a month ago. I am greatly impressed! Amazon has done a wonderful job with this tablet and, and, product support. No more waiting on line or holding the phone for hours and waiting for call backs. And your credit card number to talk to a rep.  With the May Day feature, just press the button and you have support. Amazon, you deserve 5- thumb ups!!!The hardware is very nice to hold. This tablet is amazingly lightweight and thin. The HDX is very, very comfortable to hold and manage.The screen on the HDX is the best I've ever seen. "Beyond HD" is not an empty marketing phrase. This thing surprised me with its color, clarity, and brightness. It still reflects noticeably, though. Just to test it, I downloaded a movie and WOW!!!! Sound and picture beyond belief!!! Navigation is intuitive and easy. I can quickly and easily switch among reading, watching videos, shopping, and moreMost of the apps I want are available for my HDX. YouTube works just fine on the Silk Browser. And there are plenty of news apps, games, alarm clocks, etc. Seamlessly integrated with all things Amazon. I buy the vast majority of books and movies from Amazon, and my HDX provides an unbeatable way to enjoy them.Looking for a e-reader, tablet that offers great ease-of-use, picture and sound, and, and, and people always complain about support, not that they can solve every problem but at least you can get help. VERY IMPORTANT!!!… Best product on the market. I love mine!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing clarity
Reviews.Author: Gwen Drury
Reviews.Content: The picture quality of this is stunning! I am still learning my way on all the features and using trial & error to explore. Having a free trial of Amazon Prime is great, too.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: L. Clark
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is amazing, it is sharp, clear, and love the front and rear facing camera. The games just seem to come alive. I had a Kindle Fire HD, and it only had the front facing camera, which made it difficult to take pictures. I find myself reading more and enjoying playing the games as well. Internet connection is great, and it is faster.

Reviews.Title: new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: granmuey
Reviews.Content: I really didn't need this Kindle but I sure wanted it.  It is a treat to use, lighter than my other Kindle and clearer.  Although I was perfectly satisfied with my older version, this one has me spoiled.  I can take pictures now!  I keep one with me at all times.

Reviews.Title: love my choice.
Reviews.Author: Shenelle West
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle, runs very smoothly. I was a bit hesitant because I thought that it wouldn't be able to run some of my favourite programs, but it does and very well I must add.
