Reviews.Title: Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: So far , In love with my New Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  , although with most things time will tell ! Hoping my Kindle Fire HDX continues to impress me over time !

Reviews.Title: Fantastic birthday gift
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I received the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" as a gift and it is great.  Wonderful, clear, sharp color, quick downloads, instant internet connections, very light weight and manageable size.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Bleskan "CAT LOVER"
Reviews.Content: Love my 4th kindle.  Best to read or listen to and great to surf the web , pay my bills, games, and will print my stuff too.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle!!!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Lewis
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before purchasing my tablet. The Kindle came highly recommended by a co-worker. It's light, a great crisp picture and absolutely fun!!  I love my Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing Device
Reviews.Author: Bruno Ierulli
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my new Kindle Fire HDX. Very thin, light and durable. It's wicked fast and simple to use right out of the box. I was an iPad groupy for years and had a Nexus 7.  This is my first Kindle, and I. Absolutely love it. Very stylish design, with a non slip rubbery finish on the back. You won't be disappointed. I recommend you purchase the model with no ads. It's one continuous infomercial on your device and lock screen.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: I would recommend one of these to anyone! I'm extremely happy with the Kindle fire HDX 8.9! It's pretty fast!

Reviews.Title: it pretty sweet but...
Reviews.Author: p0w3rg10v3
Reviews.Content: It seems like all the commercials on television or ads I see online showcase games that seem like they're only available on iPad...  Other than that I think it's great.

Reviews.Title: Review for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Hans J. Suchanek
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. For my age (65) is it very easy to handle. Mostly I am using it for Skype to be connected A/V with my relatives in Europe.I wished I had a printed short manual available to find troubleshooting help, especially if my screen is going black. Please supply a laminated manual similar to spark charts to help me and the elderly.I will take my kindle to a trip to Europe  and will try to convince my daughter to buy another kindle for herself. By the way, the pictures made with my kindle are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: In love!  <3  <3  <3
Reviews.Author: pchy
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best mobile device I've owned.  The tablet is extremely light, making it easy to hold while reading.  Fonts on screen are super crisp.  The backlight adjusts correctly so it isn't blinding at night.  The tablet is responsive and snappy.  And to top it all off, the BATTERY LIFE is amazing!  Beautifully done Amazon.  Beautifully done!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: C. Serio "Mom of 2 beauties"
Reviews.Content: We got this mainly for when my husband travels and it has been exactly what he needed.  He can watch movies or read.  He also can check his email and we were able to Skype with him on his latest trip.  It was very easy to set up and we love the Kindle Free Time for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the Kindle HD to this one.  Actually, my husband bought it for me.  I love the size of it.  The picture quality is great! I had one problem where it froze and wouldn't do anything.  I couldn't even turn it off.  After researching on Amazon for questions and answers, found the answers.  When I asked a question, had a response within an hour or less.  Have not had that problem since.  I do a lot of reading so this is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Jim Dandy
Reviews.Content: The kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is great! It has all the features of an I Pad, costs less, the display is just as good or better when compared side by side with the I Pad and the selection of apps is good. Of course the selection of books is outstanding as always with any Kindle. If I had to find one fault with it it would be the glare when reading. I had another Kindle and as an E-Reader the display was better but in order to get a tablet you have to compromise on the reading screen a bit. It is still easy to read but in bright sunlight sometimes can be a bit difficult. If someone wants an E-Reader and only an E-Reader I would recommend the Kindle Paper White. As an E-Reader they don't come any better.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Ray H.
Reviews.Content: It doesn't allow printing with my wireless printer which really limits its use. Only works with certain printers. Other than that really is useful and handy little tablet. Picture is so clear and sound for movies is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Super tablet
Reviews.Author: Gary M. Pewitt
Reviews.Content: Incredible video and sound.  Fixed almost all shortcomings of the previous version -except for the unforgivable lack of an S.D. card slot.  Why oh why don't they put one in?  Can't reach the "Cloud" when out in the boonies.  I have a solar array to power it but can't put enough movies on it for more than a short trip in the outback.  I had to buy a wireless one terabyte hard drive to add storage.  Please Amazon add an SD slot to the next version.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: A. Porter
Reviews.Content: I have had kindle, kindle paperwhite and now the HDX 8.9.  Paperwhite is still best for consuming books.Screen delivers outstanding picture. I mostly use this HDX for consumption of TV shows/Movies.  Secondary uses e-mail(works very well), surfing internet(OK-Silk locks up occasionally), and time wasting game apps(work well).Issues-Silk locks up occasionally.  When apps update they can interfere with Silk/streaming movies until you reboot device.  Battery will drain quickly if you don't use airplane mode when device not in use. Device will drain from 100% to 10% in 10 hours.  Even with these issues I rate a five.  Hopefully Amazon will address these issues with future updates.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 display
Reviews.Author: Kaye "km"
Reviews.Content: I purchased as an upgrade from Kindle Fire HD 8.9 display and it is definitely an upgrade.  Lighter, more responsive and great display.  I rated 4 stars instead of 5 simply because of the price and because upgrade required purchase of a new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet to enjoy the Amazon Prime privileges to the full.  Some limitations and issues.
Reviews.Author: Alison
Reviews.Content: We love the picture quality and speed of this tablets.  Though we already own two Kindles, we felt that this device finally allow us to enjoy the full scope of the Prime membership.  I especially enjoy watching Amazon Prime movies on the Fire because of the amazing X-ray features.  The names of the actors, trivia, goofs appear automatically at the relevant scenes.  I rewatched many of my favorite movies and oh boy how much more I learned about them!That said, we do have the following issues:1. It does not support Adobe Flash.  So my son cannot do his homework and my husband cannot do his online study on this tablet.  I know I can make it work if I jump some loops, but it really is a hassle and it always make me nervous installing unauthorized third party app.2. The tablet reset several time for no reason in the first week we got it.  It was a bit annoying because after each reset I needed to login to all the apps we have been using again.  In fact I was so annoyed that I thought of have it replaced.  The second week onward this phenomenon did not occur and I am keeping my fingers crossed.3. Occasional lose of WiFi connection, despite of strong signal.  I need to turn off and then turn the WiFi back on to get the connection again.4. Despite this tablet is basically running on Android, many of the Android apps are not available in Kindle Fire.5. It boosts to be able to print documents directly from the tablet to the network printer, it does not have a standard app to help you set up the printer to achieve that function.  I am totally lost in the process of shopping for the appropriate app for this purpose.  Why can't Amazon recommend the right app to do it?To conclude, a great device if you are already a Prime member and  the majority of usage is for movies, books and audiobooks.  The Silk web browser is good enough but without Adobe Flash support, too often you will find streaming video footage not playable on many of your favorite websites.

Reviews.Title: LEARNING THE KINDLE...TOO SOON TO EVAL
Reviews.Author: S Miles Schlesinger
Reviews.Content: LEARNING THE KINDLE ...SERVICE AND HELP HAS BEEN GOOD ...TOO SOON TO EVAL AS I AM OLD AND TAKES ME ALONG TIME

Reviews.Title: Great product, Love it.
Reviews.Author: Gary Willis
Reviews.Content: I'm recommend this to everyone.The May day feature hits a home run.This tablet is the only way to go.Way to go Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Loving it !!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia Cox
Reviews.Content: I have the iPad but the kindle with the larger screen has my ipad collecting a little dust. I love all the new features and the case makes it seem like a  neat looking book. The volume is also better.

Reviews.Title: 5 stars!
Reviews.Author: Rosi
Reviews.Content: I own both an IPad and this kindle fire HDX. I love the lightness of the kindle. The color display is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Thomasine "Thomasine"
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle hdx.I have had no problem with it. Also I have kindle hd  which has static off and on when listing to audiobooks.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inches 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Carto_BJ
Reviews.Content: Love my Fire HDX.  I also bought the bluetooth keyboard that helps when I have a lot of text to type.Games work great, movies look good and I can hear sound even with the Otterbox covering it up some.I read on HDX but still like my old non glare screen Kindle when I'm doing a lot of reading. I do like that you can change the background color of your reading screen and of course the text size.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I really do love my new Kindle Fire HDX8.9".  It was a problem for me to get started, but it was my error.  When Tech support figured out the problem, it was readily solved and I was on my way.  It is easy to switch between apps and the  video is fantastic.  So clear!  So bright!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire is the best
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I want everyone to know how good the kindle is it dose videos and the picture it takes are the best I tell everyone about my kindle fire kindle fire is the best

Reviews.Title: ...My PRECIOUS....lol
Reviews.Author: Sue C Que
Reviews.Content: This is my 6th..(!!!) Kindle tablet. I was already super happy with my Kindle fire HD 8.9 and thought there could not be anything better..but..wow...the HDX rocks!The graphics are crisp and color is great. The 2 camera's (even has a flash) are the cat's meow! SO easy to use..so light..so pretty and what made my day is that now you can put your books in Collections (folders)...Fast, great storage capacity. Who needs a laptop? I am hooked! HIGLY RECOMMEND IT!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB tablet
Reviews.Author: Harley Stow
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle Fire pretty well. It is fairly easy yo use although I am not at all experianced with tablets so it might include a little more user information, but the mayday button is really nice. Have only used it once and the lady was rel nice and very hepful. Could not have asked more from her.I would reccomend it to anyone and I am sure I will like it better as I learn more about it.

Reviews.Title: I love the kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Connie MN
Reviews.Content: I had the kindle fire and I went up to the fire hdx. 8.9" screen. I love it!! Its big but its lighter than my old kindle. I needed help and all I had to do was push a button and the guy showed up and helped me with everything I needed it was great!

Reviews.Title: Great device for me and the kids
Reviews.Author: paul d freeman
Reviews.Content: The kids really love it for reading and especially playing games.  A great feature is the abiliy to set time limits for reading and playing games.  There is also a lot of free media that we have taken advantage.

Reviews.Title: great functionality in a sleek frame
Reviews.Author: Adam Rast
Reviews.Content: My main goal when purchasing this tablet was to find an e-reader that could provide extra functionality while still excelling at its primary purpose (reading books); the kindle fire hdx has that in spades. Not only is it a high quality e-reader, it handles the full range of entertainment media. Perfect size, long lasting battery, affordable price tag, beautiful and vibrant color display, fast processing, and the entire internet at my fingertips. I can access all of my media with a few simple swipes, and the rest waits for me in the cloud. Really cannot find fault with this product.

Reviews.Title: Better Than iPad! In my opinion!
Reviews.Author: Meng T Lee
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend on Christmas! She really wanted an iPad or Galaxy Note Tab but this was more in my budget. Thought she wouldn't like it as much but now she literally cant go anywhere without it! (Its getting annoying! Lol!) She's thanked me over 20 times every time she finds something new  to do on the Kindle! I also had the free trial of Amazon Prime and it makes the kindle even better! It's lightweight, HD picture is great the Help App is really useful too! They really talk you through things even if its the smallest things! There is just so many things to do on the kindle! I'm planning to get me one soon too! For the price, you really cant find anything better! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Ever!
Reviews.Author: Flora Fauna
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of use of this product.  Other tablets I've tried have been confusing and difficult to use.  This tablet is light-weight, ergonomically easy on the hands, and if you do have a question you get a real live person to walk you through your problem in a matter of 30 seconds.  The video is clear and sharp.  I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX!

Reviews.Title: The best treat
Reviews.Author: Sheila M. Colon
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my kindle fire HDX 8.9!!!! From the moment I open the HDX 8.9 I can not put it down it is absolutely my favorite  electronic toy...I have recommended it to my friends kudos to amazon:)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Philip M61
Reviews.Content: As a ipad owner as well it is a bit different to use but the clarity of the video it displays is suburb.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: We love the new HDX Kindle Fire tablet.  The picture is so clear, my husband is enjoying watching movies from it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my kindle fire. It is more than a tablet. I like how it is integrated with Amazon. Though it might not have every android app, it doesn't need them. What it does well. I've read 12 books since I've had it.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Gramieto10
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the things I can do with this that I couldn't on my kindle fire. 4G for one. The set up us different and took some getting used to. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre HDX 8.9" Wi-Fi, 4G LTE 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9'. After the larger keyboard version and a smaller keyboard version for my purse this one is great.  My larger keyboard Kindle tanked after 3 yrs and 1000 bks and I wasn’t as crazy about the smaller screen on my other Kindle. Now instead of needing 2 Kindles (one at home and the other in my purse) this version fits perfectly in my purse and isn’t too small or too heavy. And no more clumsy book light attachments. My new HDX was money well spent. While I’d like a larger screen this size works well enough. Thankfully Amazon has a forum and a Q&A; page to help with initial start up that I thought was a bit tricky. Guess I could have asked the May Day person for help but I haven’t tried that feature out yet. The only negatives I’ve seen so far (and I’m still learning) is the s-l-o-w start up and the battery runs down quickly.  I’ve only used it thus far to do a lot of reading and to play a game or two.  I’m charging it up every other day.  I’ve played around with a few free apps but thus far I haven’t been all that impressed. Certain ones I hear drain the battery.  I was disappointed to learn quite a few magazines’ only show lots of ads.  The web browsing is not as easy as I hoped it might be, certainly not as easy as my laptop. I’ve yet to watch any movies but the color quality is excellent.  But for reading it’s great, very happy with that part. I’d heard there was a blue edge that shows up while reading books on this model, but that’s not true on mine.  I read for hours and I love reading on this.

Reviews.Title: I am pleased to have my Kindle but would rather not deal with all the ads.
Reviews.Author: Rita Stevens "Ritarae"
Reviews.Content: I do not appreciate the many ads that entice for gambling or games.  I am a reader and that is why I wanted a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great Display!
Reviews.Author: Stanley T. Myles "techsan68"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle purchase, and the best of the series so far. The display is just stunning and the streaming very fast! This Kindle does everything you should expect from Kindles (media, games, apps) and is a terrific buy as long as you don't expect the near-PC functionality some other tablets offer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Debbie Smart
Reviews.Content: It's big enough that I can actually read it.  I am going to put more things on it that I can read

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sandy Kauffman
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle purchase. The first was the original 8.9 e reader. But this kindle is amazing it's a computer, e reader, gamer.It's great !!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Candykss
Reviews.Content: Took a little bit to get used to finding my way around, but it's beautiful to use.  I love the carousel, the light weight, the graphics, and the camera is awesome.  All in all it takes a bit to get used to but I love it and I'm just getting started with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle very good, but tech and delivery problems
Reviews.Author: Janette Neal
Reviews.Content: I like the KIndle 8.9" HDX very much. The first one I gotfrooze and had to be replaced. That led to delivery complicationsfor the new KIndle. Everything eventually worked out fine.  Janette Neal

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jim Eastman
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful.  I learn something new on it almost every day. Their live "Mayday" tech support is awesome.  The image quality is amazing. I bet you think I really like it???

Reviews.Title: Good choice!
Reviews.Author: Traveller
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent choice for someone like me who is not computer savvy.  The personal guide, which I have brought upquite often, walks me through every question that I have with my Kindle.  This is the most outstanding feature that I can have someonehelp me directly.  They all have been kind and patient.  There is not anything that I dislike about it.

Reviews.Title: The Time is right for Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kent Johnson
Reviews.Content: Has a very good video screen; can download and watch Hulu, Amazon Prime, and Net Flix. Good availability of Apps

Reviews.Title: Love reading my PDFs on this
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Walker
Reviews.Content: I get a lot of art instructions or magazines that are in pdf format.  I just discovered how easy it is to email them to the Kindle by using my kindle email address assigned to this new device.I still read regular 'text' stories on my Kindle keyboard, but this is for my art books and magazines that need that color format.  I've been reading them on my computer using the Kindle app, but this is so much nice to have available.  I also enjoy the camera feature.  The special offers are not obtrusive either.  I tried them on my keyboard once and they were totally obnoxious, eating up part of the screen all of the time, but not so with this version.  You only see the offers when you first turn the device on while the screen is still locked.  I am very happy with this device, although there is glare on the screen if you are in strong light, so I will be researching the glare screens available.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sharona
Reviews.Content: Great buy..Checked out others but the pluses of this one won my heart. This is my 3rd kindle. I just seem to upgrade my kindle. Can't imagine what will be next.  Great sound,  AWESOME color.Super fast downloads..Glad I chose Kindle again.

Reviews.Title: I really recommend this machine
Reviews.Author: Joe Ferreira
Reviews.Content: I do like the Kindle fire HDX because I had an iPad and I like this better this machine is faster and it's got better resolution camera takes great great pictures

Reviews.Title: Love it! Love it! Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Mcgovern "Donna"
Reviews.Content: Kindle did it again! I had gotten the first kindle fire when it first came out, now this one is outstanding! It basically has it's own brain!!  Can't say enough!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is nice and take everywhere I go.  I enjoy reading from it and surfing using the Silk browser.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx
Reviews.Author: geckogirl548
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire hdx 4 G lite. The screen is bigger and easier to read. I like that the on/off and volume buttons are on the back on opposite sides. This is my 6th kindle, so I know my kindles. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Light weight and powerful tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindler
Reviews.Content: Minimum weight, great screen, a powerful CPU, large memory, simple interface, convenient Amazon services. This is all I got for the minimum money. In my collection were and there are tablets, as a NOOK Color, Asus Transformer, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD 8.9", NOOK HD Plus. So, the choice is absolutely relevant, meaningful and perfect result.

Reviews.Title: Apple man loves new kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: Marcus Davis
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's just the right size . Ultra light and the display is perfect. I am an Apple guy but I really love my new k kindle fire..And thanks Amazon.for.letting me.pay it off in installments!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: ramvenfu
Reviews.Content: This tablet is great for the hardware and its performance, one drawback is Amazon limits some apps that you can download. I would like to have gmail, and chrome on it. I would not recommend the advertising one, it is worth the thirty dollars to not have it especially if you have kids.The battery life is great, lasts a long time. I get two days on one charge and that is with full use during the day. 17 hours is not a lie, this battery lasts 17 hours of use. The screen is great and is very better than my 42 hd tv with a blueray player, my son actually prefers to watch his shows on it. (16 months). He just got interested in educational shows and responds better to the Kindle than the TV.I like how easy it is to use your amazon products in kindle, I have prime so I download Barney videos and when out and about son can watch them. Makes for a nice dinner when he is watching his shows.Where would I go with this, well I would integrate Kindle fire OS with Ubuntu because of the close business relationship they have with Canonical also a tablet as powerful as the new kindle fire hdx would kill with Ubuntu. I have an old HP laptop with similar hardware specs and when I first was using it with Ubuntu I thought I had bought a new laptop. I am thinking of getting several more Kindle's for my wife and son, and maybe then one will convert into a Ubuntu tablet.I bought it because it was similar to or better than an Ipad or Ipad mini after owning one I know it is better than an Ipad even the latest ones on market right now, my friend just bough an Ipad and is thinking of returning it to get a KIndle HDX 8.9 because of price and well, he also has prime and likes he can rent/download videos with his prime. The kindle freetime is great too, although I have not set up an account for my son because he is just a bit too young.My only complaint is well Amazon is a bit like Apple with the apps and restrictions, let us use all the android apps, also allow for a dual boot Ubuntu :) tablet with an Amazon prime app that allows us to still take advantage of all the Amazon-Kindle environment.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful first tablet!
Reviews.Author: shelby220
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great picture/camera! I love it... I use it for Netflix, social media, and reading. Great tablet!  I highly recommend purchasing this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great, but...
Reviews.Author: Lyrisist
Reviews.Content: The one complaint is that the market did not have all of the Android apps that I needed it to have. Other than that, this tablet is the best 8.9" on the market.

Reviews.Title: Best thing since peanut butter
Reviews.Author: LMJB
Reviews.Content: I never knew I needed a Kindle Fire until my husband got one. Light, easy to use,take anywhere. Great picture taking abilities.

Reviews.Title: DOES IT ALL FOR LESS MONEY!
Reviews.Author: D. Bozeman
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle Fire with the Origami leather case for my wife, who had been monopolizing my laptop, and now I can't get her to communicate with me (which in a small way, guys, be a good thing!). I'm not a techno-geek, but what I do know is that she is totally thrilled with everything about it. She plays a lot of downloaded games, uses Facebook, email, and browses websites probably 16 hours a day, while she works from home. Pandora works great and there is no need to use external speakers because the music sounds so good from the Kindle. This is our first tablet, and there may be some features that are lacking, but she hasn't found them yet. Personally, I have found Silk to be a bit cumbersome since I use Google Chrome on my other computers and I know it's probably just having to learn something new. Now my 17 year old daughter wants one so I'd better be saving my money for her birthday. I have never used the Apple Air so have nothing to compare to, but so far, we think we made a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: A great gift
Reviews.Author: frances b lee
Reviews.Content: It was a fun gift at Christmas, little did I Granny know it would help me in schoolI find it easy to use and find info on things I don't know. LOOOOVE IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle,the only thing I h a v e against I t is t h at u cannot use Google chrome

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX *.9"
Reviews.Author: Franklin S. Daley
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX surpassed everything I expected it to do.I have not started to use it to its fullest

Reviews.Title: Not an IPad - on purpose!
Reviews.Author: Fester Slamstone
Reviews.Content: This is not an IPad! And that is why it is great - don't get me wrong Apple does a lot of things great, but for  a user that only needs certain functionality, this is THE value on the market. Screen? AWESOME, Speed? YUP! Simple? Pretty easy and if you screw something up just call in the AMAZONIONS with the MAYDAY feature.Great Christmas gift for the non-power user in my house.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: I originally bought the Kindle because I though it was so cool how you could do documents and entertainment stuff on it, but found out that you have to download the Microsoft Document App because it does not come included on the Kindle. I don't know why they tell us this if it isn't true! But oh well, it worked out because Kindle gave me a bunch of "coins" for downloading certain apps that they were advertising that I could use towards the already discounted price of the app. It's originally I think $10 but was on sale for $5 and I didn't have to pay for the app anyway which is good! But now I can do everything on my Kindle! Watch Netflix or Hulu or go on Facebook and create documents! Screen and display is perfect even if you download a Movie or Show in Standard instead of HD it still looks like HD!! I just wish downloading movies didn't take up SO much space on the Kindle but it does. Plus it sooo lightweight and pretty. It sucks though that it has no nice and normal screen savers and they're just AD's and if you want them gone you have to pay an extra $15 but some are helpful and they're not too annoying. But overall I have no complaints. I got mine for Chistmas '14 and so far nothing has gone wrong! Tested out the Help option and they are true to their word that you can speak with a live person! Haven't had the need to really use it yet though so that's good! I highly recommend :)

Reviews.Title: it is ok but
Reviews.Author: Steven M Gagnon
Reviews.Content: the apps that i want to get will not work on it and cost to much when i paid almost 500 dollars for it when can you get the free app so i can get my dishanywhere to work like on my laptop  thank you for the help if you can

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: doc2
Reviews.Content: Just Fantastic!!  I can do everything with the Kindle Fire XDX that other tablets can and much faster!!  I recommend this tech gadget to ALL!!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: oscar felix
Reviews.Content: An amazing tablet. Super fast. Beautiful display. Takes great pictures. More than enough apps in the amazon store. Has not disappointed yet. Battery last a long time. Even when playing movies.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is "tops in performance"!
Reviews.Author: Judith L. Mellon
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd kindle.  The first I took everywhere to read and now the kindle fire hdx is "absolutely hands down the best kindle ever". I am a professional but do not consider myself computer savvy.  I read all the reviews first and made notes.  The color, video & performance are wonderful.  I can read, watch movies, surf the net,  it does everything practically that my laptop does.  I bought the keyboard case to protect it and its great also.  It's easy to learn to work, easy to add apps, and remove them.  This was the best buy and well spent money.  Thanks amazon for making it so easy for me.

Reviews.Title: Really pleased
Reviews.Author: Donna J. Livingston
Reviews.Content: I like everything about it.  I really like the help feature.  I have used it twice.  Both of the techs were really helpful and nice.

Reviews.Title: As an older, retired guy, I found my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 wonderfully easy to learn and the display is magnificant!
Reviews.Author: George Biderman
Reviews.Content: My grown kids bought me this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for Christmas, and it has exceeded my expectations for ease of learning, functionality, and I absolutely love the 1-click purchasing feature.  I used to hunch over my computer in my home office to search the web, do my email, and organize my family photos ... now I just take my HDX 8.9 to anywhere I wish to sit comfortably, even outside on my deck, and do what I need to do.  I even switched some of the paper newsletters and magazines I get to their online version because the screen is large and really crisp and clear.  I'm far from being a geek, but it is so intuitive that I have yet to use the Mayday feature!  Some of my friends have the Apple tablet, and my screen display is much better!  I love it.  I also love the Origami Case I purchased for it from Amazon as this case awakens my Kindle when I flip it open, and all I have to do to turn the Kindle's camera on is to ease my Kindle up a little bit in its case to automatically turn its camera on.  It is a quality case with great features.

Reviews.Title: Love the Kindle!
Reviews.Author: S. M. Peden
Reviews.Content: The Kindle HDX is super speedy and the picture is fantastic. I love it and I use it constantly! It is perfect for work and play!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sarah Lee
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  I love the Fire HDX.  My husband gave it to me for Christmas.  It's everything Amazon describes.

Reviews.Title: I wish there were 10 stars!
Reviews.Author: C. Noel
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire! The display is crisp and clear, and the graphics are gorgeous.  I went back and forth for some time about whether I wanted this version or not.  I started out with the Kindle 2, and it was nice, but this is ions above that one. I really enjoy the viewing option when I'm reading on it.  I prefer the black background at night, and either go with the white or cream colored during the day.  The games offered by Amazon are diversified enough, along with super enjoyable to play!  Extremely quick response time using the web, along with the email.  Just could not be happier with it!

Reviews.Title: Great tool !!
Reviews.Author: DED
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX8.9 is a great, easy to use tool for reading, watching movies, buying items from Amazon, using for Email and once all setup, has a long lasting battery.  I would recommend to anyone needing these uses.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HD and Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I now have 2 Kindles and I LOVE THEM.  They do absolutely everything I want to do.  I can browse, I can watch movies, I can play music, I can play games.  I take it with me to the beach and anywhere there is wifi you can connect, for free.  I don't think anyone can ever say, they don't like the Kindle.  It does everything, what is there not to like?  When I first bought my first Kindle I had no idea what I was getting other than the advertisements I had seen.  But everyone loved it so much, I had to get a 2nd one. The sound is great and the picture is fantastic!  If you only have one, you will have a hard time getting to use it, everybody else loves it too.  My husband would not use my desktop Dell, but he will use the Kindle to check his stock, catch up on the headline news, etc. because it is so so easy because you can use it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire yet
Reviews.Author: Catherine Adkins
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and they just keep getting better. I love the 4G so I can use it when there is no wifi availble.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: David M.Hartness
Reviews.Content: This product is fast and has an easy to use interface. The screen resolution is amazing. I'm still learning and the screen size could be slightly bigger but all the feature are great.

Reviews.Title: The Best!
Reviews.Author: red hen
Reviews.Content: So very easy to read.  Colors are just very intense, vibrant, and appropriate. I am very happy to have selected this model and brand.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!  Download most movies/tv shows and watch offline...  And interfaced with IMDB!
Reviews.Author: Scott.R "Yea!"
Reviews.Content: *** What a great feature to download movies and TV shows at no 'additional' charge, so THANK YOU AMAZON!  I did not know this feature was available when I purchased the tablet. Now I can most watch movies/TV shows offline when Wi-Fi is not available.*** No space problem for my 16GB - I downloaded a full length movie at 720 HD and the available space went from 7.1 to 5.3 for a decrease of about 2 GB. That makes 2 - 720 HD movies downloaded and with my other apps/books the device still has 5.3 GB available... so still plenty of space available. Due to download times I use 720 HD which is still an incredible picture quality due to the small size of tablets.  It's really is a waste of time and space to download 1080 HD... unless the 13" table down the road is not a myth...*** I love the X-Ray feature showing the movie and TV shows' with the IMDB connection of cast biographies and other their titles, ratings and interesting general trivia...  the IMDB cast changes as the actors change from scene to scene...*** The Dolby sound is amazing.***  In my opinion, the KF may not have the quantity of apps, but does have a ton of 'useful' apps.  The KF and other android tablets have the best euchre app by far... compared to the other non-android tablet...  and I love playing euchre.  The other word and numbers (such as Sudoku) type apps are on par with any other tablet...***  Cannot comment on the camera - who uses a tablet to take pictures anyway?***  THE BEST WARRANTY even when out of the warranty period...  Amazon has replaced several our older KFs which were out of warranty since it was our first problem... that is incredible service.***  I used the Mayday feature and sure enough the response was just a few minutes... he corrected the audio problem quickly which I should have figured out myself in the first place.  He wrote on the screen since I could not hear him.  How cool was that...  and I believe there is no charge for online help even if it is out of the warranty period.Our family has the KF and the other top rated non-android tablet and love both...  one is just too costly for me, but apparently my wife can afford the more expensive one.Insert a product link[Cancel]

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: CMOR
Reviews.Content: It is great for reading and surfing the internet, watching tv,  & playing games. Am looking forward to more apps coming for this device.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle. I really like this one. It is like a small computer,not just a book reader. I do every thing on it.Most of the time  I don't have  to even get  my lap top out. It's very lightweight and slender. I take it ever where.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Love
Reviews.Author: jane m wolfe
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire! I can take it with me any were and to tell the truth I have. It has great color and I never get any glare from the sun. I tell all my friends that it is a must have.

Reviews.Title: another "hit" for Kindle
Reviews.Author: SMS1253
Reviews.Content: LOVE  the new HDX! User friendly, sound is superior, and price is right.  8.9 in. is perfect size for over 50 crowd. Keeps viewing screen compact but not too small for those of us using readers : ) Another great product in the Kindle line

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Francisco
Reviews.Content: I love everything about my kindle except that I didn't buy the one that I didn't need Wifi but that was my mistake. I use it several hours a day and LOVE the Mayday feature.  Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: NICE TECHNOLOGY
Reviews.Author: DOUGLAS PETTIT
Reviews.Content: Love ability to go on the net mobile and actually see what is on the screen. Very light and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire !!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynne
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for about 1 month.  I love it. I have the Amazon Prime and have watched several show/movies and it is great.  I can view my Facebook, email, Pintrest  and more.  I also love the Mayday Option, I always know if I have a problem or question they are always there to help and are very friendly.  Would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Sherri Larsen "sherrilynl"
Reviews.Content: I love the immersed reading. It has a long battery life and has never frozen on me. The cloud is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: cool device
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I can watch tv and movies, hear music and buy take pictures and video and figuring out the rest of the device I can read and play games on there I am actually hooked

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Lori Turner
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this product! Amazing picture and light weight. Easy to navigate and setup was a breeze! You won't go wrong with the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Golemo
Reviews.Content: My husband gave it to me for xmas. one of the best gifts I ever received from him. loving my new kindle fire HDX

Reviews.Title: The Best Gift I've Ever Received!!!
Reviews.Author: Kai  Mann
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire HDX for Christmas and if it weren't for the fact that I can't make calls on it I would never put it down. There are a couple of apps that I can't get that I would be able to get if I had another tablet but overall I am satisfied and will wait for Kindle to get more apps that I can get like the apps I already have on my phone.A Proud Kindle HDX 8.9 Owner

Reviews.Title: 5 stars
Reviews.Author: ELAINE POPE
Reviews.Content: I do love my Kindle, I almost gave it four because I would really of liked a manual with it. I dont like using the mayday, although they do solve my problems

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Irene A. Butler
Reviews.Content: Haven't many electronics so got myself this and love it.It has tons of games, skype,etc. and easy to use--fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Easy enough for the over 70 crowd to learn
Reviews.Author: Lynn Lewis
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle.  The first was the black and white ereader.  I got it for my husband for Christmas.  On Christmas morning I called Kindle Support to help me register it.  I was VERY impressed by how quick they were to help.  I waited less than 3 minutes for a tech to answer. They were very patient with teaching this elderly person,  it was my first first ereader.Then I got the first Kindle Fire 2 years ago...color made a big difference!  What got me interested in upgrading to the HDX  8.9 this time was the Mayday feature.  I have used it every day since I got it a week ago.  Again I am very impressed how quick they are to answer.  The battery on this one holds a charge so much longer than my old Fire, it is much lighter to hold, the color is sooo much better/bolder.  There is no end to the number of apps available thru Amazon.  At my age I have lots of eye problems and I love the fact  that I can read books without my glasses with no difficulty.  I am reading more now than I have read in years.  One little problem so far.  Sometimes the print can't be made bigger on certain web pages.  I was trying to download a new book thru my Prime and it wouldn't let me do it.  I hit the Mayday button and the tech person went to that page and even he could not read the message under that order page.  Together we both figured it out.  It said I had reached my Prime limit for January.  All of my friends and family know that I have a new Kindle, I brag about it constantly.

Reviews.Title: Power inlet..
Reviews.Author: virginia sigala
Reviews.Content: The HDX Fire is our third Kindle.. We get tremendous enjoyment from the reading, games etc. etc.They say a chain is only as strong as it's weakest link. To us, in our opinion  .. The power inlet on the Kindle is it's weak point.Our first two Kindles have lost the ability to recharge because of the plug receptacle. The present plug is too small and on the fragile side to stand up to what is expected from it.. We would suggest a stronger wider recept, something built to withstand the many, many times that the power cord will be plugged in and pulled out. The Kindle is Great !  We get hours and hours of enjoyment ...

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: greenbean
Reviews.Content: I'm new to tablets so don't have any experience with which to compare this device.  But it is amazing to me what all it can do - and so efficiently.  I'm still learning but am most pleased to this point in time.  Have had one experience which required customer assistance and it was handled with the usual Amazon courtesy and expertise.  Love the brilliance of the display and how small and light in weight it is.

Reviews.Title: best tablet
Reviews.Author: Lance Zehring
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought for me as a chistmas gift and its the best i've ever used the graphics are fanominal and the sensitivity is the best i have ever seen. I would recomend the tablet for teens and family bother .

Reviews.Title: Lightweight, portable, crisp
Reviews.Author: Danise C. Chester
Reviews.Content: Love it, I'm used to a bigger screen but it's very light and great for travel!! Battery life could be better but I still love it!

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Edick
Reviews.Content: crystal clear colors, very light weight ,many fun apps to choose from, videos play smoothly. I only wish the on/off button was on the front.

Reviews.Title: Great little computer
Reviews.Author: S. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I previously had the original Kindle Fire.  When it could not be repaired, I got the Kindle Fire HDX.  I use it for everything I would use a desktop computer for, and in addition it has a built in camera and I can read books on it.  Only problem I have is that I can't play Draw Something because the Kindle Fire HDX is not compatible with that game.  Not sure why since the older Kindle Fire was compatible.

Reviews.Title: Bewildering at first
Reviews.Author: spewak
Reviews.Content: Once you get past that this is no ordinary Android tablet, you start to enjoy all that Amazon has to offer thru using the Kindle. I am a Prime subscriber so the benefits are rather enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Gary Best
Reviews.Content: It has lived up to everything I thought it should be. Would buy another if something happen to this one.

Reviews.Title: logging out???
Reviews.Author: Michele Ramont
Reviews.Content: I am still getting used to it and I do like it.  I don't understand why it doesn't have the option to log out of your email account.  It just doesn't make sense to me.

Reviews.Title: The best Kindle Fire by far...
Reviews.Author: Nowie
Reviews.Content: I have owned all versions of the Kindle Fire, which initially was a nice companion to the iPad, but not nearly as fast processor-wise or user friendly.  The new HDX is really good.  The apps that I have used previously and were "clunky," such as HBO GO, are excellent now--the processor is greatly improved.  Still the best for books and other readable items.  I have told many of my friends about the improvements, and the price was very good also.  Very well done...

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "khde"
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9  WOW !!!!!!!! The graphics and sound are incredible . Size is awesome and light weight.The apps are fantastic , Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: a lovely addition to the electronic toy collection
Reviews.Author: Roger W. Hawk
Reviews.Content: The images are so sharp and clear....makes you want to watch a movie right now.  This is our first tablet so we're learning a lot.  For the most part it's very easy to navigate, but we're having a little trouble mastering the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Keeps you occupied
Reviews.Author: Karen Stendahl
Reviews.Content: This thing is great while your sitting in the Dr's office, Keeping your husband occupied while sitting in the Drs office is even better. The graphics are better then our TV's. It's easy peasy getting apps. One click and it's on your kindle. I cant wait to travel with it!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Miller
Reviews.Content: I have been looking at tablets since the 1st I-Pad came out but just wasn't sold on Apple. I read several reviews when the Kindle Fire first came out comparing it to the I-Pad and it was one of the ones that was comparable, lower in price, and did more. I kept comparing lots of tablets until I could make my purchase. I was really pleased when they came out with the larger screen, because I didn't like the smaller ones as much. I am very happy with my purchase. I was pleasantly surprised that a non-techie could use it right out of the box without a how-to manual or a even a little frustration. Easy to use, great pictures and graphics, 2 cameras, lots of memory, and a great price. What's not to love? I'm glad I made all the comparisons ahead of time. I have a tablet that's a winner and I am really enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: fun
Reviews.Author: southwest lady
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is super fast and easy to use. And the mayday feature is  beyond awesome. When I was first setting it up I could not find my e mail and the person appeared instantly to guide me through the process of setting up e mail accounts. I have had trouble connecting to my home wif fi but out anywhere public it works great. Perhaps some issue with our internet but I dont think so because our intenet works fine for our desk top and lap top,.;..more on this issue later. I already called twice and went through some basics with no resolution. They told me to call my internet company who told me to call my router manufacturer. Oh well.

Reviews.Title: Struggling with the Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sylvia L
Reviews.Content: I find the Kindle difficult to use particularly if you accidentally touch the screen and the system jumps out of what you were doing.. There is a lack of information on how to use it. I still have not been able to configure my email and the on-line help people were no help, they could not do it either. Have had this since Chistmas (a gift) but it is not being used any more. If it would not offend the giver, I would ask for the money back.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!
Reviews.Author: Dianne H
Reviews.Content: I have used many tablet but ths one is the best.  I love the screen size and clarity.  It is very easy to read books on my tablet and it is much better than my Kindle e-reader!  There are tons of apps and games.  My grandkids love playing games on my Kindle Fire.  I also purchased a case for my kindle that has a keyboard in it so it is like a mini-computer to surf the web, write emails,  etc.  I couldn't be more pleased with my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: S. P. Cliatt "Sandy C"
Reviews.Content: I really love my new kindle, but I do not like having to deal with the ads every time I turn it on. With the price of this tablet, we should not have the ads with it. I understand that we can pay an additional fee to have them removed. REALLY?!?! Also, my older kindle had a light that turned green when the charging was done. This one does not. It would have been a great feature to have included on this one.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire is HOT
Reviews.Author: Josheila Crandall
Reviews.Content: Looking at the reviews for the Kindle Fire HDX and comparing it to the IPad Air is a no brainer.  I was told by a colleague ofmine that he likes the apple because it is sexy.  Well guess what the Kindle Fire is just as sexy and more and the pictures make the Ipad Air look amateur.  Okay so you say the IPad has more apps well how many of those apps are you really going to use.  My suggestion buy the Kindle Fire and let Apple know they are not the only game in town, in fact they need to step up their game iof they are going to compete with Kindle.  Kindle Fire rocks in every way.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I expected!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had been waiting for an affordable 2 in 1 tablet/computer that included everything that I wanted but it seems that none of them met my requirements so I decided to table that idea and go with just a multimedia tablet with an emphasis on reading/video/music. I had previously purchased my wife a Nook since she is an avid Barnes and Noble shopper, but since I primarily shop for books at Amazon and have purchased quite a few music CDs from Amazon as well, I figured that I might as well go with the Fire HDX. Another factor in my decision was that I had already downloaded the Kindle reading app on my phone and computers and acquired quite a few free books for my library. I am a teacher and having these available on my classroom computer appealed to me.So that is "why" I went with the Fire HDX. I decided on the top of the line with everything except for 4G coverage because I figured that I would always have enough content to keep myself occupied between wifi hotspots and would never need the Kindle to download something urgently enough to require it right then when I was not in an area of coverage.I am totally impressed with the display on videos, the music sounds great when connected to quality headphones, and I already have enough books to keep me busy reading for quite a while. I need to remember to utilize my 64gb hard drive since so far everything that I need is sitting in the Amazon cloud. I never was a big gamer fan, but I've downloaded several free games and a few interesting apps and being a traditional guy, I will probably stay with a steady rotation of those when I feel like playing something instead of trying to improve my mind by reading.If I would have to give any negative comment to this device at all, it would have to be that it occasionally doesn't keep up with the buffer on streaming and doesn't play perfectly with a few online video apps like Watch ESPN or CBSSports. So far, I have had only one instance of it needing to catch up with an Amazon Prime video but it wasn't a huge problem and obviously could be remedied if you went ahead and downloaded the video before watching.Speaking of Amazon Prime, it seems many people are upset because all videos are not available with an Amazon Prime subscription. I just started my trial and will spending the next 30 days checking to see what is actually available with Prime. If I cannot find enough of the videos that I want to stream for free, then I will simply discontinue after the free trial. I did the same thing with Netflix because their selection did not have the newest or best videos available for streaming. The same seems to be true of Amazon Prime but I will give them the full trial period before passing judgement.  I suggest everyone check out the videos that are available through Prime before jumping on that wagon.Anyway, the Amazon Fire HDX is everything it says it is and apparently every bit the competitor for the Apple Ipad Air or the Nook, with a display that tips the scales in favor of the Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: joshua diaz
Reviews.Content: This tablet is just ok. I can't stand the constant (must be built in) advertisements that are constantly popping up. It is so annoying. From my understanding it how they kept the price down.  I would have paid an iPod price to avoid it. I don't notice a pixel difference between this tablet and my old iPad. I also find this tablet to be slow and lagging. The app selection is decent.  For basic internet surfing its ok.  I would suggest an iPad. 100%  thank god this was a gift.

Reviews.Title: My Review of Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful to be in bed and watch my favorite TV shows and movies!I love watching the Kindle while I am warm and snug in my bed.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but hard to read in bright light
Reviews.Author: David kitterman
Reviews.Content: The Fire is a great internet appliance, you can cruise the web, check email, and enjoy a light lap top, not.  But, for books it is less than wonderful.  The screen is reflective and isn't all that easy to read in the light.  If you read at night in bed, its fine.  Another anoing thing is all the comercialization that comes with the apps and standard Kindle.  Expect to be controlled by the commercialize Amazon appliance.  Would I recommend it, yes, as long as you live by Amazon.  Cheers, David

Reviews.Title: try and you will become a believer
Reviews.Author: Flower Lady
Reviews.Content: I purchased the original kindle fire a couple of years ago and really enjoyed. I wanted to upgrade and was torn between the air and the HDX 8.9. I decided to explore a trial of  30 days and was sold after less than an hour of usage. It is very easy to use and if needed May day is handy. Not only is there ease of use but very fast. This has replaced my laptop. I would recommend for all age groups as there is something for every with/without monitoring.

Reviews.Title: i like this and not that
Reviews.Author: bethany
Reviews.Content: So far so good. EXCELLENT picture quality, easy to use.  However, I often have to turn my Wi-Fi off and then on to use the internet or for apps, like Facebook for instance this always happens. Very annoying. Not sure what that is about.

Reviews.Title: Excellent new Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany VanderVelde
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle, but wanted one with a camera and bigger screen.  I absolutely love this model and am glad that I decided to upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Linda Glienke
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it!  Only one thing I wish -----wish I could use Adobe with it.Best Christmas present I could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: C. Michael Blackwell "M. Blackwell"
Reviews.Content: I have purchased a total of 6 Kindles for my self and for gifts. They are excellent performers. I have had no trouble with any of the ones that I owned. They have performed very well. I still have my first generation fire and it works great and my wife still uses it as a reader and to watch movies on. The 8.9 HDX is a great tablet and is very fast and trouble free. I used the mayday button on it once and got immediate results from their tech. I would highly recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Does as promised
Reviews.Author: susanleeann
Reviews.Content: Great Ereader and does what it promises.  Just wish it were compatible with more of my favorites from my IPhone then it would be perfect!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: carolyn williams
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9! I have learned so much to do with it since Christmas 2013!

Reviews.Title: Love It!�
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing! It's battery doesn't run out easily, it's so light I can take it anywhere, the grafitcs are awesome, and you can read it where ever! I love my kindle! It's better then an iPad

Reviews.Title: Good device but needs some help.
Reviews.Author: Michael Politz
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice tablet for most things but is lacking in some crutial areas. It needs to be able to download adobe flash player. I cannot understand why it wouldnt be able to do something simple like that, many videos on facebook and youtube require flash player and the kindle fire hdx will not play them. Also you should be able to print from the kindle and that is another miss.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX8.9 HDX Display Wi FI 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Jenniffer
Reviews.Content: My son gave me the Kindle Fire for my Christmas present.  I can't put it down! It is everything I would want in a tablet. The light and color is EXCELLENT! I can check my email and compose email. I have a front and rear camera that takes EXCELLENT clear pictures. I can browse and shop for anything that I want with KINFLE Fire.  IT fits so comfortably in my hand and with just a light touch to the screen connects me to whatever  I want to do. It is great for everyone in your family to use. YOU can set parental controls and set time limits for your children or grandchildren.  Just as I am able to type this review , when I am reading a book and come upon a word that I need to know the definition, I LIGHTLY tap on the word, I can makes notes about the word and highlight the word.  There is so much to say, but I leave you with this, when you need help with something you press the help app and you get a real person  speaking back and forth with you, leading and guiding you through the process.  By the way you can see the person but the person cannot see you.  Go out and buy your New KINDLE FIRE! You won't regard it.

Reviews.Title: Not very user friendly and not enough memory for best quality
Reviews.Author: B. Mason
Reviews.Content: Graphics and picture are excellent, but it is not very user friendly.  Found that you can only download one movie at time if you want the best quality.  Maybe an additional extra should be an external flash drive port or SD card slot.

Reviews.Title: Greter Expectations
Reviews.Author: Sharon Harrington
Reviews.Content: It is not as easy or adaptable as I expectedI am not particularly technologically adept, but feedback made me think this would be a cinch!

Reviews.Title: Kindle is nice when it is working.
Reviews.Author: Josephine Burton
Reviews.Content: It is nice when it is working but Ihave had problems and right now it is froze! Going to try to return for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Power button and book reading.
Reviews.Author: tom wells
Reviews.Content: The power button shuts down immediately. Several times I have been in the middle of something and inadvertently touched the power button and shut down. Think about a delay before shutdown.Also I can't easily find the way to stop reading a book and return to home screen. I have swiped the screen different ways and tapped on different ways to no consistent result. I get the side panel, seemingly by magic, that allows me to get out to home screen. I try the same actions again with no result.On the other side, I find the picture and sound quality to excellent. Other features are good as well. I am really enjoying my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: flash needed
Reviews.Author: Zach Kroll
Reviews.Content: great tablet, but sometimes if I want to watch something without flash can't play  I can't say enough the great customer service that comes with the kindle.  I would purchase again and do become a prime member if you watch a lot of movies.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: David Barrymore
Reviews.Content: Thank God for Mayday!  As a first time tablet user, I'm at a loss with some of the icons and symbols.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Dana Ray
Reviews.Content: I considered the KF against the ipad and samsung tablet and chose the KF because I am a loyal amazonian and liked the lightness of it. I felt like I was cheating my book library by going through an app on another device. However not being able to change backgrounds/wallpapers, struggling to navigate through and find things, and needing to buy tokens to play within free apps and games is a turnoff. So....it is bigger and lighter than my old KF but I feel the limitations aren't worth the money. I would have been better off with the samsung tablet but hindsight is 20/20. It does serve it's purpose and is still a great reader so if that's all you want to do, go for it! And because I still love Amazon I do think their PRIME movie selection is better than Netflix streaming any day of the week.

Reviews.Title: Never too old to learn.
Reviews.Author: Ruth L. Richards
Reviews.Content: I still have lots to learn, but I'm having fun.  The Mayday feature is great.  I've only used it once so far and was so pleased with the polite helpful person I talked with.  Now I'm writing down things as I go along, so I'm better prepared with my questions.  I'm 74 yrs. old and decided it was time to energize my brain with something new.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: shirlyNoE
Reviews.Content: I thought that the Kindle would act as much like a tablet as an e-reader. That's not quite the case. As an e-reader it is excellent, as a tablet not so much. Many of the Android apps that I expected to be able to use are not available for the Kindle, like YouTube. There are apps that are similar, but not the one you expect. Same for several of the word games I play on my Android phone, not available on Kindle. The other disappointment was my local newspaper. I wanted the whole paper, with the same format. A reviewer posted a reply from the paper regarding the format that said Amazon restricted the way they could submit it. Also, love reading the magazines with the color display, but my favorite ones require you to download an app, and I preferred them to be downloaded instead so I can't get them either.

Reviews.Title: apps suck but reading and picture quality are great!
Reviews.Author: Heather A. Stottlar
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great and has an awesome picture but i cant play my games on it because it is so far behind in updates I'm past the levels it is stuck at. Otherwise it is good for reading and watching a movie. I like shopping on Amazon better on the kindle than on the computer. It has easier ways to view things before putting it in your cart.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with very few exceptions
Reviews.Author: Vic
Reviews.Content: Product screen, speed, and most functionality are great as advertised with small exceptions that perhaps have "work-arounds". The exceptions that I experienced are printing to a Cannon wireless printer and is perhaps more fault of the app rather than the Kindle. But, the unit is advertised as a productivity tool from which you can print. I can't as of yet.Also, I downloaded multiple movies from Amazon Prime. Upon deleting them the last movie would not allow me to delete it in the conventional manner so I re-booted and the screen responded with a question that basically asked if I wanted to restore factory defaults or continue to boot normally. I chose not to restore settings and continued to boot. I later went into the settings screen and found an alternative way to delete the movie without having to resort to losing my personal settings.Other than these issues, I really like and would purchase it again. The live help feature works great with knowledgeable and professional support techs. I perhaps should have asked them to assist me with the two aforementioned issues and still may do so.  I use this product more than I ever thought that I would. My friend has the Apple equivalent and from what I've seen so far, I would choose this Kindle ..hands down ... if I had to make the purchasing choice again.

Reviews.Title: Fast, looks good, but 2 major flaws.
Reviews.Author: Kyle Peterson
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a good product.  The obvious downfalls have been well documented, but I'll say it once again:1. The App availability needs to increase substantially.  Compared to Google Play and the iTunes App Store this doesn't hold a candle.2. FLASH - who doesn't have flash enabled browsers???  Silk is a good browser, but not having access to videos is a huge annoyance.  Side-loading dolphin helps, but then it turns into a preference game - every time you click a link it asks you which browser you want to open it in...Other than that, the performance, the HDX display, the speed of the processor are all improvements over the previous version.  Also the weight is a huge plus - It's so light.This tablet is purely for entertainment purposes.  If you're looking for a tablet to bring to work, as well as read books, watch movies, etc, look to the Nexus 7, Ipad or Samsung Galaxy Tab products.

Reviews.Title: The best present every
Reviews.Author: Lori L. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I use it everyday and am overjoyed with how easy it was for me to use.  The screen size is perfect for  reading books and checking my e-mails

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Audrey
Reviews.Content: I really like this kindle, makes reading and what ever else I am doing easier. Also my grandkids like it for games or reading. Much loved addition to our household

Reviews.Title: Really Great!
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is so wonderful!  I have the original Kindle Fire, which is also great, but I love having the larger screen, front and rear cameras, amazing picture quality, and of course the much larger capacity!  I have used it with the 4G and also with my smartphone hot spot to connect with Wi-Fi, it works great with both.  It's fun trying out the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Walter I. Gruer "S. Gruer"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the HDX.  It is lightweight and  easy to use.  The processor is fast.  Because of its size and weight it is very convenient to take anywhere.  I never use my ipad anymore.

Reviews.Title: husband loves it
Reviews.Author: tammy king
Reviews.Content: he is so in love with it that it is his prized possesion and he wont let anyone touch it and will grab it if you even look like you might touch it lolwe loved the offer amazon put out for this that made buying this more affordable to buy...thank you amazon for doing that program

Reviews.Title: Meets ALL expectations
Reviews.Author: Roman Garcia
Reviews.Content: Never been a fan of the Apple products. But this does everything and more that what I expected!!! Great product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" - I Love It...
Reviews.Author: Linda Sue Stinchcomb
Reviews.Content: It does everything that an ipad  can do. It stays charged longer than the Kindle Fire does. I an just enjoying everything about the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". I take it to work with me.

Reviews.Title: Really like it.
Reviews.Author: Carol Frances
Reviews.Content: The thing that stands out for me about this device is that lovely Mayday button.  I will leave the technical reviews to others that know much, much more than I do.  I hate being dependent on others to answer my eye rollingly silly questions.  With the Mayday button I can ask as many silly questions as I want in the privacy of my own home. Not one of those video techcians roll their eyes at me nor do they sigh before answering me and fixing my little problem.  Otherwise it feels good in my hand, the colors are great and it's not very hard to work.  I am very glad I got the 8.9" display.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: bugsy
Reviews.Content: I have not bee able to put  my Kindle HDX down since I received it.  It has many, many helpful applications at the Amazon site that are very helpful to me.  I love all the games you offer and the cookbooks have so many recipes in them that I want to try.  I love transacting business with Amazon.  Everyone there has been very helpful and nice to me when I have called.  I joined Amazon Prime and have really enjoyed watching the movies and I am glad I am able to be with the rest of the family while they watch TV I can watch a movie with my headphones.  I am so happy with this purchase and very glad I made it.  When I received mine, my husband liked it so much he ordered one for himself.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Don't choose another product. HDX is the way to go!
Reviews.Author: kah262
Reviews.Content: My parents really wanted a Kindle but were too reluctant to make the purchase on their own. I did my reserch and compared other products, and this seemed to be the right fit for them. Turns out my dad loves it and reads much of the day because it's easier in his eyes than the fluorescent light he used for reading his crime novels. My mom loves to surf the net and watch news videos without any trouble. She got so excited when I found an app for her to play different meditation music.Only downside is not all magazines and newspapers have a Kindle edition, but all in time, I guess. I have a Kindle Fire and love mine but an jealous of the HDX!

Reviews.Title: Just love it!
Reviews.Author: sherri a.
Reviews.Content: Clarity is amazing...easy to use...Mayday help is truly helpful.  I did find one thing that was awkward....the power button and volume are located on the back of the device.  When you use a nice cover you can not get to those easily...you must remove cover to reach them.  But otherwise I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jill L. Gress
Reviews.Content: I went from the 1st version Kindle Fire to this one, what a jump!The graphics are outstanding and having the ads are no big deal.My only complaint of this is the apps - there are just too few of them. I know they are working on this so this can only get better.As per the other recommendations/comments, went with the mid range on storage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: Phil Lair
Reviews.Content: I had the previous version of this kindle and was very happy with it, but this newest version is super fast and the screen resolution is even better. Connectivity is excellent; I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Brown
Reviews.Content: Fast.  Some people will find the Amazon spin on Android annoying.  If you are a devoted Amazon user, then you will love it.  Super sharp screen, too.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nana Nae "Renee"
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle. I love how much faster it is now. I would recommend this to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: I'm on FIRE!!!
Reviews.Author: Puffbunny
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT!!!!!!!! Don't regret buying it!It meets all my needs. Love the display and the easy to use apps.

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: Blues
Reviews.Content: Having a first generation Kindle, the step up in quality and function was eye opening. (Literally.)Been getting a lot of use out of the unit with very few hiccups along the way.  No regrets at all.Display is as good or better than my wife's retina display iPad.A winner in my book.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 IS GRRRREAT!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: GEORGE W MILLS
Reviews.Content: I checked out all of the reviews CNET, U-TUBE, ARTICLES & ADVERTISED FEATURES AND SPECS. So when I received my 'real' copy I immediately began to play with it . It was every bit of what I envisioned it would be. No disapointments. You can't beat the clarity of picture, Dolby sound and CPU speed in a thin light weight tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift and so far, it has met all of our expectations.  We are still learning tricks here and there but it holds true for all the advertising about it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Moss
Reviews.Content: This is a great item not only for reading books (which I do) but for connecting to the internet.  I use the Kindle for reading newspapers, some books, and for email purposes.  It has many more uses but it is great for what I do with it.  The color is great and the display for reading is good.  I have a keyboard I use with it and it makes the Kindle much more easier to use when entering text.  This was a good purchase and I recommend it to any one for reading and internet usage.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Loretta A. Flynn "laflynn"
Reviews.Content: Haven't finished figuring out all the uses for this Kindle Fire, but every day I find out more things that can be done.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it
Reviews.Author: Trisha Richardson "Trisha Richardson"
Reviews.Content: There is nothing about this Kindle that I don't like.  Very simple to understand and use.  Just having problems figuring out how to print from it

Reviews.Title: great gift idea
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: I just love my Kindle fire HDX!  was given as a gift and I cannot put it down! just love it!

Reviews.Title: My second Kindle fire devise
Reviews.Author: JCBM
Reviews.Content: There has been a few glitches with apps and other issues.  Still, overall, I'm happy with my device and use it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great device, excellent graphics
Reviews.Author: Richard Finley
Reviews.Content: I was torn between the latest iPad Air and the Kindle Fire HDX.  Both are great products but the Kindle has tremendous graphics and very easy to use.  I like the look and feel and happy with my choice.  Very little to complain about, except the volume and power controls are on the back.  But there are apps to control volume without thumbing around the front while you're watching something.

Reviews.Title: Just the Best
Reviews.Author: Ginger Outlaw
Reviews.Content: Just love everything about it and the helper is the best about this kindle fire and it was cheaper then the iPad

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy!
Reviews.Author: Teriza349
Reviews.Content: I gave my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" five stars because it is amazing. I am new to this type of device and still learning how to use it. I have downloaded a few easy games and books to start with. I know that once I learn my way around this device that I will never want to put it down.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Christiana G.
Reviews.Content: I really love my new "Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". I love having the ability of using it also as a tablet. The quality of pictures are exquisite. I would recommend this Kindle to anyone. Just loving it!

Reviews.Title: best thing ever
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I love it , tech support is wonderful much better than I iPad . I would recommend this tablet to everyone

Reviews.Title: i love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: aputerlady "aputerlady"
Reviews.Content: I had a Samsung Tab before but with my Amazon Prime membership, I thought that the Kindle would be a better match. IT IS! The 8.9" display is crystal clear, the battery life is extensive, the lending library is super, the only thing I miss is Flash for specific websites and the inability to load an alternate browser. Some sites don't recognize Silk and won't display content. The Amazon store has lots of apps and they seem to be more well tested than the play store. There are ways to get non-Amazon content but the apps are not as reliable. I miss Zinio, too but got it working with a few glitches. So - would I buy it again - YES. Do I wish I had bought something else - not now. I do lust after technology and in an ideal world I would have all the tablet formats but that's not going to happen.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Kathi Bagley
Reviews.Content: I love the weight of the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 The size is just right...pictures are sharp and very clear.  Good for reading books, checking mail without waking my husband.  Would highly recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: better then they original
Reviews.Author: pascale
Reviews.Content: Its lite and durable, its apps are clear and fast download, videos are exceptional. I only put it down to sleep and its the first thing I pick up when I wake.

Reviews.Title: good for movies, limited app marketplace
Reviews.Author: R Nav
Reviews.Content: Overall combined with Amazon Prime this is a good solution for someone with kids needing video in the car.Until you get good at side-loading apps via 1marketplace the unit is very disappointing for the kids to game on. Popular iPad and Android games mostly not available in the Amazon marketplace.Otherwise box holds its charge well and within an Otterbox is well protected.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Jack Moore
Reviews.Content: The HDX has the best picture of all that I have seen. It is easy to use and performs flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: DeDe
Reviews.Content: Exceeds expectations.  Easiest computer or tablet I have ever used including the IPad.  Love the helpers they are very knowledgeable.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Brian M.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle has a great picture - it's clear and bright.The camera is terrific - easy to use and storage is a breeze.The software is easy to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle Yet!
Reviews.Author: Katsup92
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazing, the battery life is great even with heavy game usage, and the weight is minimal.  I am so glad I finally picked up the HDX, it's fantastic.  The Mayday button is great and definitely a great feature.
