Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Stanley Pittman
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected and more. And the live support is amazing. Please keep up the good work.  Thank You.

Reviews.Title: the new kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bun
Reviews.Content: light and easy to use. take great picture. I love my kindle and will tell friends and family to get one

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: WOW!!  BEST GIFT I EVER GOT!!  I LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 !!  IT IS OUTSTANDING, EASY TO USE, AMAZING SOUND, AMAZING COLOR, ALL THE PROGRAMS ARE EXCELLENT!!  IT IS A VERY HANDY SIZE TO CARRY AROUND WHEN ON A TRIP!!  THE MAYDAY FEATURE IS EXCELLENT AND THE PEOPLE THERE THAT HELP YOU ARE SO VERY NICE AND HAVE EXCELLENT HELP!! I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH...HOW AMAZING THIS KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 IS....YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED!!  ALL THE FREE PROGRAMS AND GAMES ARE SENSATIONAL!!I ONLY HAVE ONE COMPLAINT...IT DOES NOT HAVE ADOBE FLASH PLAYER...OR ANY FLASH PLAYER!!  I REALLY MISS A FLASH PLAYER FOR MY EMAILS....AS I CAN NOT SEE SOME OF MY EMAILS THAT REQUIRE A FLASH PLAYER (:  !!  THAT IS MY ONLY COMPLAINT!!

Reviews.Title: Mom approved
Reviews.Author: Melinda Bessner
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother who is still getting used to computers (she just got an iPad last year and was still trying to figure that out). Now with the help "mayday" feature, she basically uses that all the time to answer all of her computer questions. The only negative is that the volume and power buttons are on the back and it took some getting used to. (Basically she didn't like that)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Garen Herd "GLH"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the kindle fire hdx. 8.9 inch is the perfect size. Not too small, but small enough to carry in my bag. Great, clear picture. I really like the brightness adjustment capability and the "May Day" feature. Finding things is a snap. Would highly recommend the kindle fire hdx.

Reviews.Title: Best Fire Ever!
Reviews.Author: scott aldrich
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this g=for me for Christmas and I love it!  I have had a Kindle DX, original Kindle Fire and a Kindle Fire HD 7".  The first HDX was a little glitchy, but after doing a Mayday call and then reporting that the issue did not resolve with resetting the device they sent me a whole new one and it is a dream!  I have only had a small issue with the downloadable Prime movies listed on the device in that some were on the list but could not be downloaded.  When I reported this Amazon was kind enough to rent the ones I wanted to me for free until they can figure out what is causing the issues.  I have never had issues with Amazon, I love Prime and my new Fire HDX is the best ever!The HDX is so light and thin, but still very strong in its construction.  I did decide on the roocase oragami instead of the Amazon version as it is lighter and I really wasn't worried about the slide to take pictures function.  I did find, however, that the roocase functions that way as well purely by accident!  If you have the case open and the cover flipped all of the way over to the back it will turn on the camera automatically if you slide it down just a half inch!  C\Kind of a nice surprise unless you are in the middle of a timed game or something.  I travel for business weekly and the tablet is so easy to hold and read on, or sit down on the airplane tray table in its case and watch a movie or play games.  The display is so awesome even when next to the older Fire HD!  I am so glad that I upgraded and went for the larger memory as well.  I can use it to download even more content at higher quality so that I can enjoy it as it was meant to be enjoyed!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 4.9
Reviews.Author: Cindy Volgmann
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle to all my friends.  It connects to WI FI effortlessly and quickly.  Color and clarity of the screen is awesome.  I have downloaded dozens of books.  Love the ease of highlighting, looking up words in the dictionary, creating my own collections, syncing with my second kindle and more.  My only issue is that sometimes the books get stuck in the queue and are difficult to open after downloading.  I am very happy with it overall.  I find it comparible to the IPad for a lot less money.  Love the Mayday feature, found techs to be cheery and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Love it so far
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I've only had the device for a little over a week, but absolutely love this tablet.  The screen is outstanding and the speed of the processor is outstanding.  Browsing the internet is a breeze and the load speeds I am seeing are as fast as my PC.  Love using Prime to watch shows and movies, and have really been very pleased with all aspects of the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Rob 427
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas Gift to my Lovely Wife ,she loves to read and Facebook and search the web and is a almost non stop reader she takes it every where she goes ! She Loves it !

Reviews.Title: I only say I like it, because there are a couple of things Wrong with my tablet.
Reviews.Author: TOO MANY DOGS:)
Reviews.Content: I CANNOT GET THE SOUND/SPEAKERS TO WORK. I've TRIED everything I could on my own; THE MAYDAY, AND OF COURSE HE CAN'T HEAR ME.PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE HELP ME WITH THIS PROBLEM.MY 7" Kindle has no problem. ALSO, when I play my Bubble Pop Pymamid game, it runs EXTREMELY SLOW. And a Black Shadow shows up on it when starting it up and changing between levels of the game. I feel like I got a re-furbished one and not a new one.I believe I'm going to have to return it for a replacement, with NO problems.Just tell me how to get the SOUND to work, and the speed of my favorite game up to where it should be.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Helene Kyle
Reviews.Content: I had the earlier Kindle which I loved, but now that I have this larger one, there is no turning back.  The only thing I don't like about it is when I'm reading a book, playing a game, or whatever....it's often hard to get the "home" icon to come up to get back to the main menu.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: stephen stiers
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product do to price for the value, It can do all the things I need it to. And I would recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Works even better than I expected
Reviews.Author: montanarex
Reviews.Content: I am by no means a computer wizard. This is my first step in a tablet, gradually breaking away from my standard desktop and laptop. We travel a lot and wanted something smaller to do my business things and web surfing. Lugging around a laptop to Mexico is a pain in the butt. This thing is many times faster than any of my pc's and it is pretty easy to get to learn how apps work on a tablet. My wife and I bought another one (heck we both have to have our own) after using the first one and enjoying it so much. I especially like that it comes with speech to text capabilities right out of  the box. The apps that are available make this thing an amazing piece of electronic equipment. Like I said, I'm no pc wizard but I can't find one thing I dislike about this product. Also I only had to use the MAYDAY button a couple times and it worked just as advertised. The help was quick, consise and fast.

Reviews.Title: kfhdx
Reviews.Author: T. PARDO
Reviews.Content: i loves it; a little different than the regular kf.it is also brighter and works in a different way. just the other day, i save a pic that i couldn't do on the other kf. it also last a little longer on battery life. so i don't see any false in it at all. i also got my movies, books, pics, etc. and the cameras are awesome, almost like you have an ipad, two cameras and a video camera in one gadget,beautiful. i just loves this kf, i'm glad i bought it.

Reviews.Title: Irreplaceable for me
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Just what the doctor ordered.  It has everything I need where I want it, when I want it and is quite easy to use.  Haven't had to use the Mayday button yet.  A great piece of technology.  A real winner.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDX eight .9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's light-years better than my first generation Kindle. Have had no problems and it does everything Amazon claims it does

Reviews.Title: love my K
Reviews.Author: traveler
Reviews.Content: I had two Kindles previously that I loved but had some issues.  All solved on this one and I will be using it much more as a tablet. Fast and fine!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Maria L Castro
Reviews.Content: i love it better investment ever!!! cant wait to start reading some books, love all the apps really recommend the kindle

Reviews.Title: the kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Raymon L Woolery
Reviews.Content: This is a very good Kindle an really enjoy it,  would you recommend it anyone that is looking for this type of device.It is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Laquetta Joe
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my purchase, it exceeded what I was looking for, it is much better then the apple ipad mini, and the HD resolution is excellent! And you can print from it too!

Reviews.Title: Kindlw Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: David Yahn
Reviews.Content: Has pretty much lived up to my expectations. Picture and sound are far better than my original Fire. Capabilities are greatly improved and there is some additional soft ware available. Book and movie selections remain outstanding but I still feel disappointment when I scroll through available apps. There appears to be a lot of trash available but that is my opinion and it may be exactly what others desire. Overall a great improvement.

Reviews.Title: #DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: Arthur Minto
Reviews.Content: 1st tablet is the best after ALL!! Some really KooL features that I cant get on my laptop or from my cell!

Reviews.Title: YEAAAAAAHHHH
Reviews.Author: Carlos Agrinsoni
Reviews.Content: shabalobdingdong! Is this this awesome! Light and vivrant this particular device is a technological wonder.I would highly recommend it for everyone!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: SP "Slim"
Reviews.Content: We just had a baby girl and it is so awesome that we can use the video to collect some memories. Internet is fast and the movies are incredible. I suggest joining Amazon Prime and watching some movies for free. 79.99 a month is a great deal, no shipping on hardly any item you order when you are a member.

Reviews.Title: Second Kindle
Reviews.Author: Loretto Cook
Reviews.Content: I have a regular Kindle, on of the first that came out and it goes with me everywhere.  My new kindle fire is going to take a little getting use to because it is capable of so much more.  I just have to learn to use it.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Wendy Clark
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX.  It is si simple to use.  All of my information transferred over from my old Kindle.  I would definately recommend it for anyone- first users or experienced users. Worth the money.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: sean
Reviews.Content: I am pleasantly surprised by the ease and functionality of the this device.  Love it and will recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: The Kindle came in very fast. It is everything I wanted and more. Keep up the great work. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Gift!
Reviews.Author: Grampabillyboy
Reviews.Content: My wife is very happy with her Christmas present. I'm thinking of trading in my Kindle Fire for an HDX 8.9"

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mike Barnstable
Reviews.Content: This was my first Kindle and I am very happy with it. It took me a while to learn how to use it and I used the MAYDAY button 1 time and they were able to help me. Great customer service.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little gadget...
Reviews.Author: Zopa
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth Kindle for our family and I have loved them all... I am an avid reader and find that reading with a electronic device has few downsides. I have had a couple of disappointments with the HDX, the first being that it provides no native method to print web pages in general. Also, being a technically oriented type I'm feel that the support for apps is a little thin in the areas of performance and user friendliness. In order to support a tablet like device I think Amazon may need to add a little bandwidth to their  servers and require their app developers to provide more extensive help resources for their work. Overall though (hardware wise) its a beauty and provides a lot of features that top the competition. I recommend it! May the Android OS become available for PC's...

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9, Wi-Fi, 16 GB
Reviews.Author: Howard C. Wasserman
Reviews.Content: This is an extraordinary tablet! It is light in weight, the picture is pristine, and the Dolby stereo is utterly amazing!  Along with the reasonably priced Amazon Prime feature I added, which, in addition to the 2-day, free delivery of Amazon purchases, allows for no-extra-charge borrowing of up to a book a month and no-limit, free streaming of TV & film videos from a large Prime Library, many of which can be downloaded, this device becomes a superb entertainment-and-learning center. An additional enhancement is the cover-stand I purchased for this tablet. It solidly protects the device, serves as an excellent table-stand, and also strongly improves the already dramatically fine, rear-speaker audio by reflecting it to the listener in front.  I had expected to be pleased by each of these purchases, and the reality has exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Super Tablet
Reviews.Author: M. Frisby "Vinshield Viper"
Reviews.Content: Beautifully constructed and very user friendly.  It would have helped if there were a basic user guide included rather than having to call for help each time I got lost during the initial stages of using the tablet.  By the way, the "Mayday" feature is excellent and the techs are very knowledgeable and helpful...the best I have encountered in all my years of messing around with PCs.All in all, a great product...the only thing preventing "5 stars" was the lack of a user guide in the box.

Reviews.Title: Fired Up Over the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Debra M Schoch "Debra Schoch"
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY SECOND Kindle bought a 7 -inch one last year and really liked using, then this model came out and well thought I would try a bigger size and with all the extras on it had to get!  Both of my Kindle' s have cases, which I think is a must have. For me, to protect and just make it easier to handle. I did need help on sitting up my email account and grateful for the instant help and walk thru. Eager to try the Skype with the grandkids and did use the camera very cool. Overall very happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love
Reviews.Author: Paul Diamond "Pablo"
Reviews.Content: I love the screen resolution.I love the battery lifeI love that all my content (books, audio books, magazines, music, video, apps) can be on the device or in the cloud, and its so easy to access them from the cloud.I also have an ipad 2 and a Kindle Fire 8.9 HD. This device is superior to both in every aspect.

Reviews.Title: Overall great product
Reviews.Author: Debbie Nelson
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if it is the device or programs but there have been several times when programs report that it is not connected to the internet when it is.  The device shows it is connected and my other Kindle Fire HD, laptop and desktop all have access to the wireless when this message comes up.  Resetting the device always works but is a bit of a pain.  I wish more Google play apps would run on it as well but over all the app selection is pretty good.  Otherwise everything is awesome.  It is great having the 4g for those times that you want to take it on the road :)  The screen is absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Five Stars
Reviews.Author: Carol Barcomb
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire HDX - I find it very easy to read and the size is just perfect for my needs.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone who is interested in purchasing this.

Reviews.Title: Great pad
Reviews.Author: Henery
Reviews.Content: It's got everything you would like in a entertainment package plus  help when needed. What more could you ask for!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Charlie in Austin
Reviews.Content: I wanted a very high quality display to show photos...and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 delivers!It's great for viewing movies and reading when I'm traveling.It has a long battery life.Amazon Cloud enables me to store pictures/files on my PC which then can be viewed on the Kindle.I can easily download pictures to the Kindle from Amazon Cloud to view when not connected to the internet.The Mayday HELP capability is GREAT...I've used it several times and got my issues resolved.The customer support is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: symply the best.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: i find the kindle fire hdx8.9 to be the best better than all the rest.this tablet is above all other.

Reviews.Title: Love this size and how light it is
Reviews.Author: Snow-white
Reviews.Content: I already had the Kindle Paperwhite, which used I daily, and I was debating if it would be worth it to also get the Kindle Fire. I bought the Kindle Fire as a gift for my son. While he was home, I was able to see the 8.9" K Fire in action and loved that as a Amazon Prime member I can watch many movies and TV shows for free. I was able to check out reading magazines and cookbooks on the large 8.9" screen which was also a lot of fun. So I went ahead and ordered myself the new Kindle Fire.Now,  I use them both, the Paperwhite and the Fire, - daily. The books are stored in the cloud and available on both devices. When I wake up in the middle of the night and can't go back to sleep, reading on the smaller Paperwhite is the better option, because the light on the paperwhite can really be turned very low and somehow not interfere with my husbands sleep. Also, the Paperwhite fits into the smallest handbags. BUT for reading leisurely on the couch during the day, for watching movies, series ETC.!!! this Kindle Fire is really great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD X 8.9
Reviews.Author: SMITHKEN
Reviews.Content: excellent product excellent service I'm just beginning to understand all that it can do. glad I bought the user guide to go with it

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: weestraw
Reviews.Content: had the 1st generation kindle fire loved that, now i have this 1 & i really love it.  I love the bigger screen, its faster and xtra clear, also my fire didnt have speech to text (or whatever its called), i took the time 2 get email running so now i can send and receive emails, i also changed the name of the kindle from what amazon gave me, and a plus is that all my information from my other kindle is on this 1.  i am glad that i purchased this!!!

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my Mom - Best Present EVER!
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mom for Christmas. Best present ever. Her expression was priceless... I feel bad for my dad who spend 10x as much on jewerly that she forgot about because she loved her Kindle Fire HDX soooo much. She's not tech saavy, but is obsessed with calling Mayday, which answers quickly and is very helpful. They helped set up her email, connect wirelessly to the tv, figure out Prime video, etc. She texts or calls me everyday talking about something new she found out and loves. HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend this!!! Don't waste your time of money with an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: HOLLY L. GIFFORD
Reviews.Content: This product is fantastic! Fast shipping & product was very well represented! highly recommend it! Perfect for everyone, very user friendly!

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire has come a long way
Reviews.Author: Allen Edwards
Reviews.Content: I'm a big Kindle (and Amazon) fan, and I've owned several of them. However, I owned the original Kindle Fire and just didn't care for it. The Kindle Fire HDX is a different story. The OS is significantly improved, and the display truly is beautiful. I can't see me replacing my iPad Mini with the Kindle Fire HDX (yet) because the apps still have a way to go, but if you're just looking to surf the web and take advantage of Amazon's great services, it's not a nice tablet. I have used the Mayday feature once, and I was very impressed with the service. And finally, the 8.9-inch HDX actually feels lighter than the Mini!

Reviews.Title: the Best kindle on the market
Reviews.Author: B. Weaver "quilt mama"
Reviews.Content: I truely love this kindle. The graffics are spectacular, I cannot say enough about this product. I want to get my husband one exactly like it. I do believe he is using it more than me. We love it

Reviews.Title: love love love it
Reviews.Author: amazon shopper
Reviews.Content: well worth the money. very light weight (is less weight then my kindle fire). it is  easy to navigate around. have not used the camera on it yet but am excited to see how well it takes pictures

Reviews.Title: Greatest video ever!!
Reviews.Author: Ronald Green
Reviews.Content: I am so very impressed with the smoothest & least pixellated video I have ever experienced! The total package is worth every penny. I looked at all devices available and for the feel, function, fit and price (@ 64Gig) this is it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: just finished reading the kindle fire hdx user guide and am really looking forward to getting to know it better. so far I am extremely impressed by all of it.

Reviews.Title: kindle hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: don
Reviews.Content: it's great. had my daughter help me set it up as she is very good with tablets. she owns an i pad. the kindle is easy to operate and i  really enjoy using it. my daughter was very impressed with it and thought the price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Really great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael Sannes
Reviews.Content: It works great for what i use a tablet for. Great screen, easy to use. I would recommend it highly.Mike

Reviews.Title: Love this.
Reviews.Author: C. Turner
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle and it doesn't disappoint.  Easy to use and beautiful to look at.  I would highly recommend a Kindle for anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Problems with music player that freezes the device
Reviews.Author: Luis A. Castillo Pacheco "Alex C."
Reviews.Content: I just love everything about my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" hardware wise, the screen is superb and the response it fast so far, only complain is from my point of view I think the HDX 7" sounds louder than the 8.9".It works perfectly with the WD My Cloud drive, I can see all my video library now streamed directly from my personal cloud, no problems at all. I'm still waiting for the update that lets you do more than mirror the screen in the TV.On the software side there are some drawbacks compared to a regular Android tablet, less apps or older versions of the same app available in the Amazon App Store, but at least for the apps I need and use they are OK.Only suggestion to Amazon is the possibility to customize the top menu items to let you remove the ones you don't need, in my case Newstand.UPDATE April 2nd, 2014:After the update to version 14.3.2.2_user_322095220 I got a huge random problem related with the music player and device's stored media. I have a LG HBS-730 Bluetooth Headset that I bought in Amazon and use with my Kindle, after several minutes of listening music from the device, the bluetooth connection starts to fail and if I change to a regular headphones the playback plays smooth for some minutes, then the whole device freezes and the screen turns black, no response in any way, I have to press and hold the power button to reboot the device and when it comes back it needs several reboots to have the Kindle run smooth, this problem is more frequent with the latest OS update.This problem is not just related with the use of Bluetooth headset, even using normal headphones pluged in the device after hours of music playback the device hangs completely.

Reviews.Title: learning is fun...
Reviews.Author: Prosie
Reviews.Content: Got a Fire for my 60th Christmas and am still getting to grips with it.  I have a first-generation Kindle which is fine for reading novels.  Wanted this one for magazines, newspapers, books with pictures (such as travel guides and photography books), showing off my photos, and borrowing library books.  It works a treat for that.The text is clear, adjustable for size, spacing, and font, and easy to read. The "brown text on cream background" is nice for reducing glare when reading in a dark room (like in bed or on a plane). Syncing a book between devices is simple.I have a smartphone so didn't want the 3G/4G feature, and I use a PC for mail and word processing.  But having e-mail comes in handy for forwarding "sync links" to the device (over wireless) to set up synchronization functions without connecting to the PC.Have downloaded games, a map, BBC iPlayer, and other apps without difficulty.  Am enjoying discovering the toys out there.My only complaint is that the "auto brightness" feature leaves the screen too bright.  You can manually set it, but it's fiddly if you have to do it often.  And it's a shame that you can't change the brightness while reading.  You have to exit your book to get to the brightness switch.It's fun learning the Fire's capabilities (and limitations).  A much appreciated gift.

Reviews.Title: My First
Reviews.Author: Maria DeFrancesco
Reviews.Content: I have never owned  any tech gadgets, this is my first. I am enjoying the freedom to go with the times

Reviews.Title: Kindle set me on fire
Reviews.Author: Isidore Teitelbaum
Reviews.Content: Great tablet. Replaced my iPad (1st generation). Learning curve was not long and easily set up my office and email accounts, synced my calendar and contacts from my pc.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really debated between the KIndle Fire HDX 8.9 and the ipad Air. I am glad I went with the Kindle. I use it on the train during my commute everyday and the 4G works great. I bought my wife a Kindle HD for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Kerry S.
Reviews.Content: Works great just what I was looking for in a reader and a tablet.  The help is also great to use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Bill Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I looked at the Apple Air and this.When comparing the 2 what made my decision was the price comparison and the fact that I already had a Paperwhite and was comfortable with Amazon  Inc.thank you for the most excellent product

Reviews.Title: Another winner for Amazon
Reviews.Author: KensDiamond
Reviews.Content: Everything from the picture quality to the sound is wonderful. I had a little problem with this HDX at first but I tried the mayday button and had online help within seconds. I followed the instructions I was given and the problem was solved instantly. This service alone is worth a lot, it is one of the greatest things Amazon has come up with..This is my 5th Kindle and I have enjoyed each of them more than the last. My hubby is always trying to think of something to get me that I would really like. When he first asked me if I wanted a Kindle I said no as I just didn't think I'd use it that much. I could tell he really wanted me to get one so I finally said ok. I couldn't believe how much I loved that first Kindle, it went everywhere with me. I would read where ever I had to wait, grocery store, post office, bank, Dr. office etc. If hubby is watching something on tv that doesn't interest me I watch something on my HDX or play a game or read. I still always have my Kindle with me no matter where I'm at.Thanks again Amazon for a wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: i love my kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: bcarter
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this kindle.  I have had to use the assistance from the May day feature and I have to say May day Dave was wonderful and was able to help me very quickly.  This is an excellent feature.  My kindle has a very fast response time.  I have several kindles but this is by far the best.  It takes wonder pictures also.

Reviews.Title: Not a Bad Amazon Gadget
Reviews.Author: Pnut Butta
Reviews.Content: For the record, I view tablets as toys so I largely relied on reviews from tech magazines such as Gizmodo, TechCrunch, PCWorld, etc. in addition to customer feedback that already had one of these units. I use this mostly when I'm flying to watch movies or if I'm in trainings/meetings at work to play JetPack Joyride.  It's super light (compared to my primary workhorse, the ASUS Transformer) and the user interface is fairly intuitive and easy to use. So, it serves my purposes. . . .

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire8.9 is Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Jay Wadsworth
Reviews.Content: We received our Kindle and found the device to be a super clean clear display with all the facility necessary except the absence of an external outlet port. However we were able to solve that with the addition of a Netgear wireless adapter  for wireless connection. The Kindle display connects flawlessly to our 47" TV as well as all of our smart phones with the mirror app installed.  The Kindle was also also supplemented with an additional purchase of a keyboard and a case. That has made the Kindle a real piece of welcome gear here at our house. The kindle takes a few minutes t learn your way around but that is worth it. I had a small issue and called support. The phone support was just great and fixed the problem over the internet to our Kindle.at our place.. Could not be more pleased at this point in time.

Reviews.Title: RE:Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: PKS
Reviews.Content: So happy to have this item. I like the different levels of background lighting for reading. Navigation is fairly easy but did have issues in connecting the calendar.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: BAXTER
Reviews.Content: I am still undecided about this. It came to me frozen from being out so long before being delivered. I think that is why it still has some issues. Like the battery does not even last a full day on stand by, you have to shut it totally down each time. Disappointing since my i pad air lasts for like 3 days atleast.  But I still favor the kindle over the apple. Maybe just need to be fixed.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed!!
Reviews.Author: Alfredo H Ayala
Reviews.Content: the only inconvenience AT THE MOMENT is that the app market doesn't have as many apps as Google play or Apple store. I do expect it to get better as time goes by. Other than that I love it!

Reviews.Title: Screen WOW!
Reviews.Author: James M. Young
Reviews.Content: This is replacing my wife's old nook color.  What a difference, the HDX screen is simply beautiful.  She couldn't believe how thin and light it is.  You can also tell that it is running on a newer version of Android, as there are slide out menus, etc...

Reviews.Title: Finally a kindle that has a help button
Reviews.Author: L. D. Barr "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I love it because I can talk to someone any time with just pushing the May day button. Fantastic Would invite anyone to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Nice e-reader & tablet.
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I have an older Kindle e-reader that is stilling going strong, but like most people wanted the newer technology. The touch screen is responsive and the color is good.  Battery life is so-so and does not charge very quickly so be prepared to plug it in whenever your not using it. The lack of Flash Player is disappointing but from what I've read that is an issue with Adobe who are no longer supporting the Android format. I don't love the internet set up and not found it to be very smooth. The connection is fine,  I think it's the browser that I don't care for. Maybe I'm just used to Explorer and haven't given Silk enough of a chance.  I'm sure I'll travel with it rather than lugging my laptop so I can email, check FB, play games, read or watch a movie. I gave it 4 stars because of the browser.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: S. Schmunk
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle. I upgraded from the Kindle Fire HD and it took a little getting used to but now I have figured it out and it is great.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Arthur Byrd
Reviews.Content: I bought  this as a gift for my daughter she is in love with it,. it works very well and she is very happy with her gift

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is awesome, I've moved up from my kindle hd fire to this one and it's awesome. Light, great screen to read on.

Reviews.Title: In love!!!!
Reviews.Author: claudia
Reviews.Content: I've had it for 3 days and I love it. Coming from a 1st generation kindle to this is breath taking. It's very fast, much bigger and very light weight. I just hate the limited cases for it.

Reviews.Title: Get One
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had a number of pad like devices and this is easily the best of the bunch.  The resolution is bonkers and the ease of use is unprecedented.  If you live in the amazon ecosystem this is the only real choice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle love!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: I received this product before expected and was as advertised. I absolutely love it. It was ready to use right out of the box. Has a great HD display and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Device!
Reviews.Author: Kevin  Halle
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this new Fire.  My father received an original fire when they first came out and this is a definite improvement.  The way it works is basically the same meaning someone could upgrade with no issues but they will totally notice how much faster it is and how much clearer the screen is.  If you have prime, I would definitely recommend this device because of all the free shows and movies you can watch.  If you don't have prime then you will probably end up spending lots of money to watch things on it because you will want to use it all the time for videos.  The new mayday feature is brilliant.  This device will be used by a very wide range of people and some may not be very tech savvy.  This does not matter at all because if they don't know how to do something, all they have to do is push that button and someone will teach you at no charge.  This is a tablet for anyone at any age to enjoy.

Reviews.Title: I no longer need glasses.
Reviews.Author: J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: After many years in life I recently decided I need reading glasses. After purchasing the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" I can read small type again. The resolution is so high! Now I probably still need glasses for the other times during the day but I can hold out a little longer now!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!  AWESOME!!  AWESOME!!!  THIS KINDLE IS SUPERB!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is a thing of beauty. The picture clarity exquisite, Dolby speakers are awesome with perfect sound clarity. It is so lightweight compared to the older Kindles. The "Mayday" button is a lifesaver, and the staff that you are connected with (in less than 10 seconds) are so friendly and knowledgeable.  If you're not able to fix the problem under their guidance, they will do it for you. They simply circle the item that you need to do step by step, and it appears on your screen in blue. How easy is that! The quality of the new Kindle Fire HDX is superb!  Thank you for such an excellent product!

Reviews.Title: Liking it more as I get it know it
Reviews.Author: P. Mumme
Reviews.Content: There are some features available that you have to search for, but doing an internet search will get you most answers.  I figured out how to make folder collections and get rid of the carousel.  Have only had it a few days so I'll have to see how much I like it after I have put it to the test.

Reviews.Title: Delivered earlier than expected
Reviews.Author: Kerrie
Reviews.Content: This made it for Christmas, as it is a gift for my mother I do not have total update on it yet however she was thrilled and surprised to get it.  It was packaged well and seemed to be in great shape.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my husband
Reviews.Author: TexasLady813 "NosyPoke"
Reviews.Content: Needless to say, he loves it! There are so many more options than my old Kindle which he was using. There's the WiFi aspect, all the apps that are Amazon related, and the HDX feature that really pops the colors and the images. Now I want a new one!

Reviews.Title: super tablet
Reviews.Author: DWAYNE J HERRON
Reviews.Content: bought for my wife...she cant set it down...worth every penny I paid...definitely recommend this to anyone....thank you amazon for a wonderful product...dj

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Heartkeys
Reviews.Content: I just love my new kindle, not that much to say, the quality of the pictures, videos and movies is amazing. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Just Learning... So Far Very Fun!
Reviews.Author: ekgrafiks
Reviews.Content: I just wish it was easier to find out how to use this blasted thing! This is my first-ever tablet and be warned, it comes with little to no instruction. Be prepared to search if you have no previos history. But I'm having a good time learning, it just gets frustrating. Hey Amazon, how about a tutorial that's easily accessible???

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: kiss1562
Reviews.Content: Loved the Idea of the mayday button. Would have kept it if it wasn't so pricey for the 64gb unit. Really do love the product though and the way that amazon takes care of there customers. Will probably buy another one in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet has all the functions I need and more.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Originally I was undecided about which tablet to get. I have an Android tablet and was looking to upgrade.  So very happy that I decided to try the Kindle Fire HDX.  It is all that I wanted in a tablet and more.  I have and do highly recommend this tablet...

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Iris Tol
Reviews.Content: As a dedicated Samsung Galaxy user this was my first Kindle for myself. I purchased several of the earlier generation models for family members. The screen is stunning and performs as well as my husband's Samsung Note 2014 Edition..and I have the bonus of all the Amazon library content at my disposal.  The camera is average.  My only gripe is that I can only run widgets created for a specific launcher (ADW, Go Launcher, Next, etc), but I still highly recommend this tablet as an excellent product for the price.

Reviews.Title: It beat iPad air away in crisp image.
Reviews.Author: Dr.Poonchai Chitanuntavitaya
Reviews.Content: Use this for reading book and play game, the image is so clear compare to iPad Air. But the speed of loading apps may sluggish when more of the storage occupied with book.

Reviews.Title: Great Device, Limited in Personalization
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: I truly like this device and very pleased. While video quality is lack luster, it had the potential to be better. Other than that, the battery life of this device is great. I watched at least 4 movies back to back and yet the battery was great.If you are a causal person or new to Android, then this device is great for you. It has some of the apps people use nowadays like: Facebook, Twitter, Angry Birds, Netflix, Skype, etc.What bothered me was the lack of personalization. I tried out this device under ads and it is annoying. If you are buying a device then in theory you own it. While the Kindle Fire with ads makes the purchase "cheaper" in a way you are not free to make a choice. Consider using the device everyday, just the thought of looking at an ad displayed on your own device is odd.Compared to other tablets out there, the Kindle Fire is the lightest and affordable. If you are new to Android, consider the Kindle Fire. It has the popular apps people use, the battery life is great and simply a great device to hold and to read from. If you are concerned about the ads, or the price, consider the HDX 7 with no ads. New apps are added to Amazon's app library weekly. I recommend Amazon's HDX series.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Ulices
Reviews.Content: Some apps not supported or not available for divice, ill wait for them to be added maybe next year i buy one

Reviews.Title: Good versatility for what you pay.
Reviews.Author: Mustafa Syed
Reviews.Content: The kindle is a good IPad substitute, for the price.  If you're a prime member it's certainly a way to stream prime content.  I think this tablet REALLY shines if you are technologically versed..aka able to root, understand the software basics because there is no android tablet on the market with this matching hardware at this price-point.  Otherwise, from the perspective of productivity, the IPad wins.I used it to read textbooks..view email, surf the internet and view flash content.  I think the camera can be improved significantly through a software update.  Gaming is fun but I'm not a hardcore tablet gamer.  I also think the browser can be improved, particularly pages reloading when you're revisiting them after brief delays.Overall it's a good tablet, somewhat limited if you are not willing to break through the technological barriers.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Hardware
Reviews.Author: langston
Reviews.Content: Fast, stable with a beautiful display. It especially in low-light conditions this was an awesome tablet. The life-video chat help feature was neat and popular withmy coworkers although I found the OS easy enough I never needed the help.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael T Iocca
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that someone is able to help you at any time of the day with the May Day button.I love this thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet - highly recommended
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet.  Bought the HD 7" in Jan.2013 & there is such a difference between the two. I ordered the 7 HDX 32gb online (not thru Amazon) & the store grabbed the wrong box & I ended up with the 8.9" HDX 32gb, which was even better because I saved myself 200.00 some dollars & got a better tablet.  The 8.9 HDX is very comparitive to the Nexus 10 which is also an excellent tablet, but about a $100.00 less than the 8.9 HDX 32bg.  I may be selling my 7" HD Kindle on ebay & maybe even the Nexus, because the Nexus & 8.9 HDX are the same in all qualities & specifications.  The HDX 8.9 is easy to use, light, good screen quality to watch movies & play games & I especially like the power button.  I recommend this to buy along with the Nexus 10

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Marianne Brown
Reviews.Content: It has a beautiful display.  I really loved it except for the fact that it froze up on me 4 times  in one week.  Also, certain games that I wanted were not formatted yet for the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Super Terrific!!!
Reviews.Author: IJL "IJL"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle Fire and still enjoy all three.  Super products!The newest Kindle Fire  I have is the HDX 8.9" and my others are HD 7" and HD 8.9"; each one has its own selling points and addresses a  variety of people---young, old, computer gurus and not so guru!!  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: A. Scott
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  I have each of the other versions (!) and think this one is outstanding.  I love the MayDay button and being able to download TV shows and movies.

Reviews.Title: love all my kindles
Reviews.Author: Carla,
Reviews.Content: I love it,  love how clear the images are.  It does everything I wanted and more. I did not go ad free, they are just fine on opening page only.

Reviews.Title: The Mayday Button
Reviews.Author: OP
Reviews.Content: Have to admit.  The Mayday button raises the bar in great customer service for other companies to aspire to.  A bright idea!

Reviews.Title: It's a great thing to own.
Reviews.Author: Richard Franks
Reviews.Content: It's fast - it's big - it's easy to use - the mayday button is fabulous - - - I've retired my big computer for everyday use and I use this little beauty instead!

Reviews.Title: good sevice got it right on time i pre ordered it. very happy.
Reviews.Author: KRISTY R VANTASSELL
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my son for Christmas to upgrade his old kindle fire not hd. I love it quite a improvement I like playing on it and don't want to wrap it till I have to so I can keep using it. May have to get my own.

Reviews.Title: Really Versitile
Reviews.Author: Eugene M Steinfeld
Reviews.Content: Really versatile . Seems little I can't do with it, especially after sideloading other Android apps. Really fast and light.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HDX!
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Manton
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT! Great sound, sharp clear picture and the 8.9" size is fantastic! I'm so happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle hdx 8.5
Reviews.Author: Beverly J HIcks
Reviews.Content: The size is great,easy to handle and use even with arthritic hands.  I have been able to use in place of my laptop and find  all my usual sites with no problem.  I am so glad I chose to upgrade my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the gift.
Reviews.Author: Wayne C. Rosing
Reviews.Content: Only complaint is that the screen has a bit of glare for reading even with the sepia background and automatic brightness, this compared to my "old" Kindle.  While I'm still figuring out all that it will do, I've already used it to surf the web, check e-mail, purchase a book, and read it.  I have not needed to use your representatives to do this, i.e. the device is quite easy to navigate even for a 66 year old near techno illiterate.

Reviews.Title: so far... so great!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Allen "Uptown's own"
Reviews.Content: Just got this in the mail today and so far so good. It loaded up my content super fast and the display is brilliant. I'm gonna play with it for a while and then get back with a more comprehensive review.....I cant believe how light it is and what I will say is don't get the origami cover... it is way to heavy.... more later, I'm gonna go play! 11/24...  So now I'm back after playing with it. I used May day and they were able to help me right away...what a wonderful thing!!!!.I did however notice that some of the.apps I had on my HD didn't transfer to the Hdx but the tech on Mayday explained that some apps have to be optimized by the developer in order to work on the Hdx... Not a big deal for me but I can see how some might be annoyed. I am very happy with my new toy now I'm gonna look to see how to get flash on it.. if anyone can help, I'm all ears!!!

Reviews.Title: A very nice reader and work tool.
Reviews.Author: Robert Parker Balliger "BobBee"
Reviews.Content: So far this is a nice tool to do timely work with.  Great screen, light weight, I wish it were 25% larger but then it might be bulky, a very well balanced device.  So far so good on reliability, overall so far I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Wow and awesome.
Reviews.Author: Victor B Stanley
Reviews.Content: Wow. This a awesome reader and more. I find that I'm using it more than my laptop for everyday task. It's fast and responsive. The Mayday feature works as advertised. Good thing I don't have wifi at work I would probably use it in the middle of the night. Seriously a awesome buy well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: another great idea
Reviews.Author: In My Old Age "Jean"
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th kindle , best reader s around and the HD & HDX great as tablet for browsing. Haven't had this one long, seemed slow but has updated and is much better now.love this larger size. I removed the ads after received. Only issue now is on button but that's with otter box case on it, so not kindle fault. Looking forward to Mayday ability, wish only we could request who we get( I vote for a good lookin guy with sexy accent).

Reviews.Title: Very Very Happy with discission.
Reviews.Author: meowpal
Reviews.Content: So far everything I have tried to do with the Kindle, has worked perfectly.  I even used the mayday button one time and got a very fast and helpful response.  Solved my question immediately.  My daughter has an I Pad, and so far I am glad I chose the Kindle instead.

Reviews.Title: Basic features, overview ; even better than the Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jenraider72 "Jen"
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; } cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26preplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26preplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/816xhDXFMtS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26preplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26currentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26currentClick) { return cv_mo1QMRB5A0ATU26currentClick(); } } } Length:: 6:05 MinsThis is just a quick (under 100mb video so it will upload) look at the HDX, 8.9"'s basic features. I use my Kindles mainly for watching videos and tv, as well as web browsing, shopping via Amazon and very occasionally checking email when not near my laptop or pc. My daughter, who is 12, is constantly using my other Kindle, so it's a good tablet for kids- very easy to use with the added security of parental control options. Something I neglected to mention in the video is the placement of the power and volume controls which are now located on the back of the tablet, along the beveled edge. I find this to be an improvement over the prior Fire HD version, on which these were located flush with the tablet's right side edge, making them somewhat cumbersome to use without feeling around or actually looking at them.

Reviews.Title: Super Display! Doesn't take long for even a novice to get up and running.
Reviews.Author: Michael "mikamu1"
Reviews.Content: I'm new to the Android scene, so it's not as intuitive to me as I could ask for.  Beautiful quality product, excellent screen.  We planned on using this mostly for reading and study, but find it handy for the ? that comes up during a movie or new event.  I'm sure there will be more to add later, since we're pretty new at it.Only complaint has to do with app availability - Went to JW.org to get their new library app and found that Kindle is one of the few it won't work on yet.??.  What's up with that?  Seems like all the other major Tablets have no issues.  Please check it out as this is a major study tools that would save us tons of time not having to be on the internet.  This is the main reason I went with 64GB.Thanks for a great product.The HDMI connect from the older model is not on this new one.  We had looked forward to downloading movies for direct plug-in to our TV. Will have to see if there is a workaround to avail ourselves of this feature.

Reviews.Title: Not what we hoped for
Reviews.Author: Rebekah Price "PhantomRebekah"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom so she could play games, Facebook, and check emails without having to fire up her computer (Windows 8 is confusing for her). It's a decent size for her, but you really need a case to hold it successfully. Here are the issues we have:1. It doesn't hold its internet connection. It says the WiFi is working & signal strength is excellent, but then it won't even connect to Amazon. To solve this, you must shutdown & restart. My plain old Kindle Fire doesn't have this issue.2. The Mayday button was the one reason this wonout over cheaper & larger screen options. The button is buried in tiny type on the menu.3. Tiny type. Vision-impaired persons who aren't  computer wizards may never be able to read Facebook or numerous other websites. Trying to enlarge something using the same technique you'd  use on your phone doesn't work here.We had to send the first Kindle back because it wouldn't hold a charge for more than 2 hours of idle time. We got a replacement within one day; however, the didn't send a new charger. They gave a credit so we could order it & promised to refund the cost of next day shipping within 3 days. I sent an email a month later asking what happened to the credit & it was posted to my bank account the next day.So overall, the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is a bit disappointing, but the customer service of Amazon is quite good.

Reviews.Title: the jury is still out on this one
Reviews.Author: JulieMontana
Reviews.Content: Arrived as promised with packaging in excellent condition. Within 5 minutes, I had the Kindle Fire HDX turned on, connected to my wifi, it knew it belonged to me, and had my email set up. By far the quickest start-up of any device I have had. After having it a while, I do have issues with the fact that it will not let a number of my music cd's transfer correctly. I am gathering it is because they are mwav files. Using the Mayday button did not provide a lot of help. The wait for help was less than 15 seconds, but the assistant did not have any ideas why I could not see a number of my cds on the Kindle at the same time I could see through my laptop that they were in the Kindle internal storage in the music folder. He suggested I download the Cloud player, put my music on the cloud, and listen from the cloud. After several attempts to download the Cloud player to my laptop using internet explorer, I eventually got it to download properly using Google Chrome. Then I discovered you can only have 250 songs on the cloud without paying the $24.99 fee to put more music on the cloud. After picking and choosing what music to send to the cloud, I then found out you can't download from the cloud to the Kindle, you have to transfer from the laptop. Useless.  The Amazon cloud player would not accept about 20% of the songs I tried to transfer due to the wrong format(I think that is the issue, anyway). That is how I then looked at the properties of the tracks on the CDs and discovered the ones that would not transfer were all mwav files (windows media) so they must somehow be incompatible with the Kindle (or protected) not sure. So it appears my music issue is not just a Kindle issue, but an Amazon issue. Anyway, I am not happy with the fact that I can't put a lot of my music on the Kindle Fire HDX. That is why I have given it 4 stars instead of 5. I have been overall happy with the Apps I have downloaded. The location of the power and volume buttons is difficult to get used to. The screen has stellar resolution, and reading books is easy. I have not downloaded any movies to comment on viewing those videos.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet, But Poor User Guide
Reviews.Author: Peggy
Reviews.Content: Ok, the HDX 8.9 is a 5 star, great item.  This is my 6th Kindle.  (2 used by grown children, 1 to sr. citizen mother, 1 used by grandchild, and my Kindle HD 8.9 now goes to husband.) So I've grown with the Kindles, from Fire 7", Fire HD 7", Fire HD 8.9", and now the Fire HDX 8.9".  Each one has new improvements.  And up until the HDX 8.9 the user guide has been really good.  But with this Kindle, you can now use the Mayday feature and get instant help (I haven't used it, so don't rely on this info).  Apparently Amazon has decided that no one would prefer to just look it up for themselves.  So you can't.  The information isn't there. The user guide is a very shallow overview.  If you have never used a Kindle Fire, the guide will tell you how to charge, plug in to a computer, register or unregister your Kindle, purchase content, and other basics.  But you won't be able to find out how to do the new, nifty stuff.  For that, you need to contact Amazon or hit the Kindle Forum.  Which means you may not know what you're missing because there isn't anything in the user guide to tell you what your Kindle can do. I've already had to contact Amazon twice to find out how to do things I could do on the HD 8.9.  It's just different enough on the HDX that I needed info.  An adequate user guide would have been useful. Perhaps Amazon will make one available in the near future (I hope).Don't let this deter you from getting the HDX 8.9.  It's a great tablet. And Amazon has the BEST customer service I have ever used, so the answer to my questions were just a quick phone call away. I just wish I had the choice to use the user guide instead. This is especially true when I'm in the middle of nowhere, because wifi isn't always available. 4G isn't always available. Electricity and running water aren't available.  We're that kind of weekends and vacations people.The HDX 8.9 comes with a 9W AC adapter and cord to charge your Kindle.  These adapters are $20 if purchased separately, and charge Kindle Fire models, as well as phones and similar items, in half the time of standard adapters. The HDX 8.9 takes great pictures (haven't used the video function yet), and is so light, you actually feel the difference compared to the HD 8.9.  Because it's different from the HD, I'm still getting used to some differences in using features, but after a week, I haven't found anything missing from the HDX 8.9 that the HD 8.9 had, and there are lots of new goodies. It's a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Ipad hooey
Reviews.Author: WALter Sanders
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, awesome display great battery life this is a delight to use I was hesitant at first and thought maybe an Ipad would be the way to go for my tablet needs but so far no regrets and the money I saved can go to my next new toy!

Reviews.Title: Its my prized possession
Reviews.Author: JACKIE ESSEN
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is amazing very lightweight, bright screen that is so large it is mistaken for an ipad which I quickly correct and explain the many reasons why its better!!! Thank you so much I love this product!!!

Reviews.Title: some disappointment
Reviews.Author: teri simpson
Reviews.Content: Disappointed that I can't get adobe flash on my Kindle.  I wanted to use it mostly for facebook, but without adobe, I can't open most everything without Adobe...why can't this be added???I like the larger screen....and I've used the help button once and it workedbut ----- some disappointment

Reviews.Title: good actual product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the kindle fire HDX 8.9Only really gripe I have is freaking adobe and no more android flash player!!!!But... that isn't Amazon's fault :( I basically bought this thing because it had front and rear camerasKinda hard to get good pictures but over all like I said this is a good product...don't know if I would pay 350For it again knowing what I do now though since my old kindle fire seemed to do just as good (if not better seeing as how it still has flash) 350 for an added camera that's not even amazing.... well it kinda disappointed me

Reviews.Title: Its not good for browsing the internet
Reviews.Author: Larry Hjertquist
Reviews.Content: Its good for games and video's.  The Silk browser is slow and locks up frequently.Looks good but I expected better internet browsing capability

Reviews.Title: Too limited to Amazon with common factory related problems.
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Dranovskiy
Reviews.Content: When I received this device I was really exited. It was my first tablet. The picture and video quality was excellent, the 24/7 tech support right on the device was very helpful for me, 4G LTE internet is fast. I have Amazon prime, so many apps and movies were available for me free of charge. But, I was not able to download some common Android apps and was not able to watch my internet TV, which I used watch on my TV, computer, or  even on my Android phone. It requires Microsoft Silverlight which cannot be downloaded on this device at all. After this I realized that I did not need 64 GB since Amazon limited number of videos to download to 25 even if it is YouTube short videos. Size of your storage does not mean anything. From the other site you can store things on Amazon Cloud, but you cannot use it if there is no internet. After several days I took one picture and my kindle died, became unresponsive and all CPR their tech support tried to do did not help. After new device was shipped out to me I used Amazon charger and it came back to live, but did not hold charge. When I received a new device I charged both of them to 100%, unplugged it and overnight the new Kindle still 100%, but the first one was fully discharged. I should of reviewed customers feedback before buying this Kindle Fire HDX. So, I returned both of them since they did not meet my expectations for an expensive for my budget tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Product need Updating Fast
Reviews.Author: JLCB "JLCB"
Reviews.Content: I'm a KFire-1stGen user and really like that product. Works great, no complaints. Will keep it for reading books. Wanted a larger tablet mainly for watching movies/tv shows and just got the HDX8.9 (1/13/14) which is great except for the following issues which seems to be a prevalent concern from most everyone who has purchased this product.1. SOUND: very weak when watching videos. I have the device volume at max and the video volume at max and still had a hard time hearing the movie. I even tried ear plugs to drown out any ambient room noise and that didn't work either. Bass is really low too. I ckecked the HDX along side my KF1stGen and the KF1 sound was far better. Note: Some owners had luck installing a volume control app that includes an equalizer. Will try that next.2. NO HMDI PORT: to attach a cable to your TV to view movies/tv shows directly on your TV without having a set top box. This feature was on the KFHD, but they took it away in lieu of adding the "mirroring function" of Miracast. THIS WAS A VERY BAD IDEA, AMAZON!!!3. MIRACAST: Now, if you don't have "select Miracast-enabled accessories and TV" (specific Samsung Smart TV with Miracast, PS3-4, or a miracast dongle that you have to pay extra $$ for and stick it in the back of your TV) then you are out of luck in trying to mirror to your TV!  Since Miracast is the "new" thing it's just not available on TV's yet and you have spend more money to use this function...which if you don't want to spend the money....mirroring is basically useless. Going back to #2, Amazon should have kept the HMDI port on the HDX as a back up!4. SECOND SCREEN: Well, you can't use this either unless you get "select Miracast-enabled accessories and TVs".5. IN LIEU OF MIRACAST AND SECOND SCREEN: I've got ROKU so I tried using Plex, Twonky and USBtv to stream TV shows from KFHDX to my TV through ROKU and nothing worked. I'm not talking "live" shows. Just shows that are 2-3 episodes old. Kept getting an error on my Kindle saying "could not play in mobile view" when I was in desktop view. Very frustrating.6. MIRROR & SOUND APP/Update: It would be nice if Amazon would do a program update or make an app that allows set top boxes (ROKU, PS3-4, Blueray) to recognize the Miracast function so we could view KFHDX media content on TV and get better sound quality.FYI: KF-HDX has never had an update as of Nov 14, 2013 which is the "build date" on my device. I just tried updating it today, just in case and it said no updates available.

Reviews.Title: Still considering a return
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This purchase has been very frustrating. There are so many things I love about the HDX, but why they won't allow Apps like Google maps, Chrome, Hangouts on the product is driving me crazy. Their replacement apps are terrible and after reading reviews, I've decided to not install any of the mapping apps they have. So I can either have a crippled product that I keep because it is a great Media Tablet, or I return it and get something else. The screen, speed, and price are fantastic, but why oh why did they decide they needed to cripple this product unnecessarily?

Reviews.Title: Super!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Oh boy, what a dilemma I had in deciding which tablet to give myself for Christmas. The struggle ended when I considered all the latest technology specs of the HDX. I am sooooo happy I chose it. It is slim, light, fast and stunningly vivid! Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: The Best Kindle Fire Yet.
Reviews.Author: Ezekiel Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This kindle would be a great gift for all ages, its simplistic and pretty UI is miles better and more refined than the other older versions. This is a very powerful tablet with good cameras for a tablet, Includes a good decently loud stereo speakers. The lack of apps and some ui elements are the only thing holding this back, as well as ui customizations. But you are a huge amazon consumer and already part of the Amazon Ecosystem, i see no reason why you wouldn't fall in love with this tablet.Pros:-Thin and light but NOT cheap feeling (except on the first point made below)-Screen is not too small or too big, i really think they hit the sweet spot on this 8.9'' Display, not a huge reach when you want to reach something in the middle and it allows it to be light enough to hold with one hand for a long time.-Bright Gorgeous Screen with high pixel density and great color accuracy.-Stereo Speakers (although not the loudest but it is just a tablet)-Great specs and Graphics-Simplistic UI good for adults and kids Alike-Good Assortment of free apps and free app of the day is a great idea.-Clever UI additions like swiping out the on screen navigation to get to recent apps, as well as, getting new application suggestions based on what you have already below the app.-Great amazon services and quick customer service even on the mayday. Mayday took me all of 10 to 15 seconds to get a live person pretty much every time.-Probably the best reading experience ive ever had on any tablet, hands down. This integration of the tablet with the reading app is fantastic. Its fast fluid and a pleasure to read with, They really picked apart the experience to make it better in pretty much every way, looking up words,authors, more information on the book as well as text customization's that all actually had a function and weren't too complicated and convoluted.Cons:-Bezel Pressing on the short sides lead to discoloration-The back buttons are a great idea and are implemented well enough this time BUT, they are too recessed into the unit and are hard to find and feel for, I never got used to it.-when lightly pressing on the short sides, the screens light seems to bleed into the display discoloring it. It doesn't burn into the screen, its something i noticed with this unit. My other tablets and phones have never done this.-Lack of Customization's even if you want them or not-Notification bar is full screen and seems like a blown up phone UI- The Soft touch back is a finger print magnet making the device look cheap and requiring regular cleaning and wiping down to make it look good.-Taking apps off the recent Carousel is annoying and tedious requiring a long press and hold then a tap on "Remove from carousel". This needs a faster and more intuitive way of removing them, especially since it gets so populated quickly with nonsense.-Lack of google Apps, and people should be given to choice to download from either the Play store or the Amazon App Store, but having said that, there app store is respectable has come a long way since the original Kindle fire, by a lot. They should give users the choice but obviously giving them incentive to use and buy the apps from the amazon store when they can find it.Basically this Kindle fire tablet is easy to fall in love with when you first pick it up.Any basic computing tasks are completed without a hiccup. Advanced tasks and gaming are also completed without any hiccups and are absolutely gorgeous on this display. Its Simple yet sexy exterior makes you want to pick it up and get enveloped. Although it not perfect it would be a great choice for Adults and kids and Adults who own it and let they're kids play it. There's parental controls and locks making this convenient.I wouldn't have trouble recommending this tablet to anyone looking for a fast simple and intuitive tablet experience, especially for adults. More Tech Savvy people will find this tablet a bit limited in functionality. For them I'd recommend something else.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: James Kight
Reviews.Content: After waiting almost a month to give this as a present, the day finally arrived, Christmas, and the Kindle Fire HDX was a hit with my son. He had no idea that he would be receiving a tablet, and then to get the Ifad killer was too cool.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ellen Mass
Reviews.Content: I love to read but hate having books stack up until there is no more room.  since the Kindle first came out I've been immersed in books more than ever.  I am extremely happy that the newest Kindle is so light and has so much more to offer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display
Reviews.Author: bin zheng
Reviews.Content: Best tablet ! BEST DISPLAY ! And Fast! First time post review .Love it .Love Amazon.I think will buy one more .

Reviews.Title: Terrific Tablet
Reviews.Author: De'Angela Thompson
Reviews.Content: This tablet is slim and sleek and easy to use. Even though we already own iPads, this tablet was the top pick in our family. We ended up purchasing one.

Reviews.Title: prefer over my IPad
Reviews.Author: Mindywills "Mindy"
Reviews.Content: Love, love, love it! Crystal clear display, very quick! I will probably sell my IPad and I have been been an IPad & IPhone user for years! I do wish that it had flash, but alas it doesn't.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME !!!
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Rich
Reviews.Content: iPad what ??? This is it...Welcome to the real world of Tablets Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 !!! No GPS ??? Big whop...Fast/great screen/colors galore/features iPad users dream of...And don't get me goin' on the Camera...BIG bang for your buck...Just great..Get one TODAY...

Reviews.Title: What a Difference a Few Inches Make!
Reviews.Author: Bob O.
Reviews.Content: Upgrading from my 7" Kindles (one keyboard, one Fire) to the 8.9" model is like working and living in a 900 sqft space and suddenly moving into a 26,000 sqft mansion.  The almost 3 inch difference in screen size doesn't seem like that much, but everything is bigger, brighter, and more detailed.  Yes, the price about doubles, but the benefits far outweigh that increase.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Crystal Newman
Reviews.Content: I didn't know if I would love this one or not. I got it and opened it and couldn't believe how much lighter this one was. I like the new design and the picture is wonderful on it. I feel in love with this and I glad that I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet, but didn't really live up to my expectations compared to last generation HD Fire.
Reviews.Author: Shawn B. Wikle "wik"
Reviews.Content: To tell the honest trust, so far I've only had this for about a week, but I'm not hugely impressed over my last generation HD Fire.  Yes, the picture quality is better, but on such a small screen, it's not all that noticeable. I have not noticed any speed improvement for normal tasks, even though I know this one has more powerful processors.  First time I've really been a little disappointed in a Kindle and this is my 5th one.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: This is everything as advertised. Fast, light, intuitive and sharp. No steep learning curve. The cameras work great front and rear.

Reviews.Title: Loving My Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Nancy Kellum
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.I had pre-ordered it and the wait was well worth it.This is my first tablet.It has been very easy for this grandmother to set up and use.I have been enjoying streaming videoes through Amazon Prime.The picture and sound quality are top notch.My Kindle Fire HDX has also added to my Christmas pleasure.I have downloaded and been playing my Christmas music on it and love the sound quality.I would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.I am also glad that I went for the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Wow!  This is nice!
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Lence
Reviews.Content: After reading all the pros and cons of this product I'm glad I chose this one.  Because I was already an Amazon customer I didn't even have to go through all the registering process.  Very easy to set up e-mail and download games and apps.

Reviews.Title: The HDX is a winner!
Reviews.Author: Elliott Black
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle I have owned and is by far the best.  The Mayday feature and the 4GLTE puts it over the top.  I do recommend getting the stylus to make it more readily usable.  Also, a protective case is also a must

Reviews.Title: love/hate
Reviews.Author: Teddie Nicole
Reviews.Content: I can't really tell if I love my kindle or hate it. It sometimes has trouble downloading books or music or games even when connected to Wi-Fi but when it does decide to download it downloads really fast. It has some bugs to it. Like sometimes it will freeze for a couple of seconds then start to work but it's easy to over look because when it works it works great. I think once they get the bugs fixed it will be a great tablet to have.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, but needs an included manual.
Reviews.Author: John Shipp
Reviews.Content: Great screen.  Good colors.  Responsive touch screen.  Inclusion of the charger is a marked improvement over the original Kindle Fires which required the user to purchase a separate charger.Really, really, really needs a good user manual.  I believe that a reasonably comprehensive printed manual should have accompanied the Fire HDX.  As an absolute minimum, a comprehensive electronic manual should have been loaded on the Fire HDX prior to delivery to the customer.Pre-delivery Amazon advertising indicated that a capability to print from the Kindle Fire HDX would be available in November.  It is now December and the capability to print material from the Fire HDX is not apparent.  Might be there, but I cannot find it.  Pre-delivery advertising made no mention of having to purchase - at additional cost - an app to get the printing capability.  The advertising made the printing capability sound like something included in a software update.I have become used to the weight of my Kindle ebook reader.  I was surprised that the Kindle Fire HDX is markedly heavier - just did not appreciate what the weight specs really meant.  The polyurethane origami case adds additional weight making hand holding tiresome although the great screen makes reading a book a treat.

Reviews.Title: recommended product
Reviews.Author: Donald keith Jordan
Reviews.Content: It's seems like a great product and Amazon and everyone that works there have always been wonderful and have taken great care of us always.

Reviews.Title: A Powerhouse Tablet Experience
Reviews.Author: Ben Henthorn
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a powerhouse tablet with an amazing screen and tons of content, this is your tablet. The tablet's performance is stellar, I have yet to trip it up with any game or application. Opening applications and switching between them is not just fast, it's nearly instantaneous. The screen is amazing and puts Apple's retina display to shame. Physically the tablet is comfortable to hold, pleasing to the touch, and extremely lightweight, making it very easy to tote around the house for a myriad of uses. The speakers are top notch with crystal clear audio. The optional origami case is very useful for table-top use of the tablet, holding it at a comfortable viewing angle and standing up to repeated pokes and swipes.The OS is very content-centric and responsive with the only major downside being the lack of Google Play store access. I'm a gamer and a lot of new generation games have companion apps that are just not available in the Amazon store. A workaround is to download the .APK and .OBB files of the application and upload them through USB via a PC, but that's a bit more of a pain than it needs to be to get this kind of functionality.Overall it's a great tablet, but the lack of Google Play access is slightly heartbreaking. You can search for your desired apps in the Amazon App store and it will auto-complete your searches like it has your app, only to discover that it's not available through the AA store. It's just kind of funny that it auto-completes your searches anyway. Other than that, a stellar tablet.

Reviews.Title: Heartbroken Kindle owner going to return mine..here's why.
Reviews.Author: k9sargirl
Reviews.Content: I am a prime member , have a Kindle fire HD, and like shopping with Amazon. Initially I loved the many of the great features of the new Kindle HDX. Other reviews detail them quite well so I wont. I will add that, as a photographer, I found a great little wireless device on Amamzon to upload my picture from my sd cards (or a usb drive) on to the outstanding screen very conveniently. Here is a link to the EZOpower device..it's great with the Kindle once you sideload the app for it.B00EP13JBCNot cheap but a super work around .What I didnt know is that the rear facing camera appears to only work correctly with the Origami cases. I dislike that they need a table like surface to keep the kindle in a stable upright position so I bought a case from FInite. What I discovered (after 3 hours of very nice tech support from various folks at Amazon) is that the case causes the Kindle to think it is not ready to take a picture and therefore it stays in the instruction mode waiting for you to slide the tablet out as you would with the Origami cases. The ONLY way to get it to work it to remove the case entirely. It basically means you care forced to use the Origami case if you want full functionality with your Kindle. I got a response from Finite saying that they were aware of the problem and that all 3rd party cases have this issue to to an update done to the HDX line by Amazon in November after the cases were produced. Amazon folks were nice but said they can only verify the Oragami cases as being fully compatible with the new Kindle line. So I am very sad butgoing to return this snappy piece of technology. As a consumer I dont like having to be forced into a corner and limited by my equipment but at this point it seems that Amazon has created a problem I cant work around. :-(

Reviews.Title: Solid Device For Accessing Amazon Content, But Otherwise Very Limited
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This device has a ton of potential. The hardware is top notch and the screen is near-perfect.
