Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: lemkemichael
Reviews.Content: I have had laptops that are not this fast. I have yet to have any issues with the kindle fire HDX. Sound is great, battery lasts all day.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" is excellent in it's design and concept
Reviews.Author: History Buff
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a super high resolution screen, is well designed and fits my purpose for having a tablet like a glove. The set-up was so simple, it's a dream. Gone are the requirements to struggle with all kinds of questions and techno jingle, a few tabs and one is set up. Simply great.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Nora C. Mccormick
Reviews.Content: I replaced a first generation Kindle with the Kindle Fire after comparing it with other devices.  I picked the Kindle because it best met my needs.  I love being able to access my email from anywhere.  And, of course, reading books is really nice.  The display is crisp and wit the larger screen I feel like I am reading faster.  I love the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: This Kindle Fire is great!
Reviews.Author: Sasquatch
Reviews.Content: I really am crazy about my Kindle Fire HDX.  What amazes me is how fast it is.  I setup my apps and subscriptions so much faster and simpler than I did with other devices.  When I took it out of the box, there is a quick start guide which I used to hook up the charger, and I began running it while it was charging up the battery.  When I tested my video apps such as Netflix,Hulu Plus,Epix and HBO GO, I was surprised at how fluid the motion pictures were.  Also they were in HD.  I downloaded some of my Kindle books that were stored in the cloud, and that was quick.  There seems to be so much that can be done with this that I have yet to find out.  I like the fact that the user manual is installed on the device for easy access, and there is a "mayday" button to talk with a live customer service rep to walk me through any problems if I should have need to.  Physically this Kindle fire is very thin and light, which makes it easy to handle and transport.  I have yet to use the camera, which I'm sure will be a blast if it is anything like the other functions.  This is well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet !!!
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: Its so beautiful! I have always wanted a bigger screen than my phone to play games and watch the news from apps. I recently got rid of my cable. Saved over 1 hundred  dollars.

Reviews.Title: best kindle
Reviews.Author: EVELYN GARCIA
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE, IT IS MUCH BETTER THAN THE OTHER KINDLE(not that the other is bad) BUT THIS ONE I ENJOY MUCH MORE.KINDLE FIRE HDX 8.9 YEAH!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ryan Modares
Reviews.Content: GOOD!!! IT'S AWESOME YOU SHOULD BUY JUST MARVELOUS MAGNIFICENT I AM RUNNING OUT OF WORDS.........OH NOOOOO GOOD BYE #YOLO #SWAG

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Barbara W.
Reviews.Content: I have a problem in that I can not get wireless at my home.To download anything I have to go to a library or cafe.I can enjoy what is downloaded at home and  that's good.I wish I could play some games at home but not thefault of my Kindle.  Love to make the print larger,good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Dalton
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and navigate around.  Love reading books, checking my email,facebook, and the Internet.  I have an older Kindle that I loved, too.  But thelight behind the text on my new Kindle HDX 8.9 is great.  The picture qualityis stunning.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: DenP
Reviews.Content: Great Kindle Fire Love it and enjoy it very much.  I wish Amazon didn't want so many words to describe your likes about product. Makes me not want to comment about them.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Geraldine Cruse
Reviews.Content: It's lightweight, easy touch, battery lasts forever. I take it with me wherever I go, particularly if I know there will be waiting time.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jewel Hoffler
Reviews.Content: This kindle is the bomb. You got to get. The pictures are awesome. Price was high but worth every penny. Download quickly. Mega bites great.

Reviews.Title: Great entertainment tablet
Reviews.Author: S. A. Rieth "sjkrieth"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet.  We have tremendous fun with this item.  It is fast.  It can easily handle any app we throw at it.  It can do entertainment but also be able to office documents.  We greatly enjoy this item.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Pamela Brungardt
Reviews.Content: Love my new toy! Wanted one for a while, finally got it. I'm very pleased with my purchase. Having fun!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: V. Moore "Luv2CraftGinny"
Reviews.Content: the lst one broke, we called and you prompty send us an RMA and a new one, thank you, great service by Amazon always.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Janet A. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Love it! Great graphics kid friendly design and great parental settings and control. I love that there is a volume control button on the outside!

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love
Reviews.Author: 1booklover
Reviews.Content: Runs so much nicer , faster, smoother than my old fire. Updated a lot. Glad I chose it over the IPad.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Jensen "trout61"
Reviews.Content: Nice unit good picture good sound a little costly but good if you want something a little bigger than a phone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Bill Toothman
Reviews.Content: I have had 2 other kindles and this by far is my favorite. With the camera from both sides and the color it has I really enjoy it. If you are looking for a Kindle this is the one to get

Reviews.Title: Take a tablet- it's good for you!
Reviews.Author: Thaiophile
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a tablet before and I am amazed at the speed and range of this little jewel it is now fitted in a case with a keboard and is my constant companion!Thanks Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: getting better with each model
Reviews.Author: philw
Reviews.Content: sleek, functional unit. brilliant color definition. Have given my ipad to the children.would be great if i could expand the memory. still don't trust cloud storage.Would have given 5 stars except 99% of accessories can't be shipped to Australia by amazon affiliates. this has been the only drawback on what is now my 3rd kindle.

Reviews.Title: Constant companion
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline K. Hand
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's the right size to carry with me.kitchen chores go fast when I can watch Hot in Cleveland. I can order a new outfit while I wait in the doctor's office. And I can spend face time with grandchildren.

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Farley
Reviews.Content: I am a HUGE fan of Amazon and the Kindles. I have a Kindle Fire HD, and Kindle Fire HDX and I LOVE them. My son and I use them all the time. We even have the You Version app downloaded on them and take them to church, instead of carrying a bible. I tell everyone that I would rather have a Kindle, than an IPad anyday.

Reviews.Title: I Love my Kindle.
Reviews.Author: George Douglas Abraham II
Reviews.Content: It went on sale a week after I bought it. It would have saved me $40.00 dollars. OH well. I love my Kindle.

Reviews.Author: J.SablanMesa
Reviews.Content: ;)First owned the Kindle Fire(1st-Gen)...Loved it's convenience, (especially for it's Price)......got Surprised for Last Christmas, with HDX 8.9" (Thanks Momma)......was Original 'Fire'......Evolved......I think iPads are Great,But I Love being a Proud 'Kindle'-Owner...;)(Now, I need to save for an OtterBox;:( just Wish "LifeProof" made Cases for Kindle)...

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I moved up from the previous model. This one is WAY better. (nothing wrong with the old one but--) The battery lasts a lot longer, the older one's battery only went one day or less, this one goes several days. I do leave it in airplane mode most of the time but treated the old one the same. Nicer screen, snappier response. Can't wait for the next generation.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Amazonazing !!!
Reviews.Author: steven thaanum
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 for my wife to replace my IPad that she took from me.  The Kindle Fire is amazing.  Just the right size, beautiful screen, doesn't have the incompatible app problems like my Ipad with flash, etc.  She loves it !  I think I should have got that instead of my Ipad also...

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Eb
Reviews.Content: Great device for the money. It does everything except the laundry. Have no problem with this at all. It is all fun.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Sharon A. Phillips "SPhillips"
Reviews.Content: I love this!!! I still have my previous (first) Kindle and I thought it was perfect, well this is AWESOME!!! I can be reading than switch over and check my e-mail or Facebook than do a little shopping or play a quick game, watch a movie or listen to my music all from this one device!!! I know there are still a lot of features that I have not even figured out yet!! It was super easy for me to get started and I was like a kid with a new toy, I was up most of the night playing with it!! :)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is all they said and more. I love the fact that I can just talk my words here not have to type. My recording is great I also like the Mayday button and have already used it and my question was answered in a few seconds and she showed me even more things that I needed to know wonderful ,wonderful I have never seen a kennel are a tablet like this one. The camera takes wonderful pictures. The movie camera is great also front and back cameras wonderful just wonderful. If you buy this you won't be sorry. I am happy  with all the things it can do ,just great. It was so nice talking to customer service , I have absolutely no complaints about this. I do not know a thing that could be improved everything is wonderful and I am thrilled . Have had it for several months and just still have not tired of it . I really love my books play my games watch movies , music  sounds beautiful on the stereo speakers. Do not fear buying it. You will love it. :-)

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased it...
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Senz
Reviews.Content: I bought the first gen 7" Fire when it came out 2 years ago. I always enjoyed it, with the exception of the poor workmanship of the charging port. Amazon made that right by giving me a Fire HD (the first gen of the HD with the camera) for a minor cost upgrade even though my Fire was 2 years old.  I appreciated that and then bought this.  This really does a great job of tying it all together.  The only complaint I have about the Fire platform is that it's a little too "Apple" for me.  What I mean by that is that because Amazon earns so much off their content, they purposely limit what they feel is competition.  I can't use Chrome as a browser and I can't download dropbox. (on their native settings... I've not attempted to d/l apps from other sources yet), but that's all on the "App" side. The actual tablet is a nice tablet (a great size) and has most of the bells and whistles i need. I wish it had GPS for the basic WiFi version (My Nexus 7 does) but where they go wrong there, they have a flash for the camera. (my Nexus 7 doesn't have flash).So in summary, great tablet, just hope that Amazon realizes that they are better supporting the free market and the best product than attempting to force you to use all of their versions of apps.

Reviews.Title: Just love my HDX Fire
Reviews.Author: Judy Filipski-Baum "judygwtw"
Reviews.Content: One of the best purchases I've made in a long time.  This unit was a replacment for my original Kindle Fire and exceeds what I was expecting; I love the larger screen and the may day button.  Would recommend this product to all.

Reviews.Title: Liking the new learning curve
Reviews.Author: Beach Lloyd Publishers, LLC
Reviews.Content: A pleasure not to have to run upstairs to the computer to check email or search something on the internet. Took some pictures while on vacation, needed to turn the brightness up because of reflection in sunlight. I especially like the Mayday feature--help from a live person, 24/7. I have to get used to the touch screen, probably will purchase a stylus. Skype with the grandkids is the next step!Joanne Silver

Reviews.Title: Everything but the Yawn
Reviews.Author: Richard Evelsizer
Reviews.Content: Love it for everyday surfing, but it seems to get tired before I do, requiring me to shut it down completely, and reboot to continue. The ads are not intrusive, but it would be nice if it gave you time to read them before it goes dark. :-/

Reviews.Title: So happy!
Reviews.Author: Susan M Pollica
Reviews.Content: Love my new Kindle . The bigger screen is just what I needed, and still very portable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Regina Jordan
Reviews.Content: Excellent product have used since I purchsed and very happy with my choice.  purchased it to take with me on a two week trip out of the country and I was certainly pleased that I did.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic rear camera
Reviews.Author: Larry C. Copeland "copelarry"
Reviews.Content: I had the HDX 7" and liked it but I wanted the duel camera.  The rear camera with 8 MP is fantastic.  For some reason I pushed the toggle that changes the sound and it zoomed in.  I had no idea but what a great surprise.  The pictures are so clear.  I email them to my pc and print them and they are such great quality.  I am VERY pleased with my new tablet.  Way to go Amazon.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire
Reviews.Author: nan bastin
Reviews.Content: My refurbished kindle fire HDX 8.9 is great. I Have not had any problems with it. Works perfectly. Size is great.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire HD 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: love it kindle fire is so easy to use with a reasonable price its a must have  its a must have

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle and would recommend it to everyone that I know.  I love the larger screen from the previous Kindles I have.

Reviews.Title: Love It.
Reviews.Author: Opus Fan
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Kindle.  It is more then I expected and I feel a much better bargain than an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Nice little unit
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: It's everything that Amazon touts it to be.  It'll do most everything that a tablet will do, except run Windows, but is that a big deal?

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: got a good deal on my kindle and it arrived on time. Great picture, easy to use love all the apps.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I was doing the right thing when I upgrated to the kindle fire as I really didn't think that I would use it for anything but reading.  I was wrong I use this more then I use my laptop or phone.  bigger screen then the phone, lighter and less bulky then the laptop - Just the right size goes with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: DreaminOfAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: Had a Kindle Fire. Loved it. Wore out the battery & am fast wearing out the replacement. Wanted just a little bit more -camera -had an opportunity to get the 8.9 with some free points on my credit card. Love it even more!!! No issues yet.....Will I wear out this one?You bet!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Marie Lewis "MiLewis"
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with my Kindle HDX 8.9.  The colors are so much better and clearer. Every thing about it is better. I wanted to write a good review and now that I am, I'm speechless. I have downloaded apps that are fun to use, including Office Pro. I was able to open a file in my email and saved it to the OP. It was so simple. No need to print it out. Thanks Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great for reading, browsing, and games.
Reviews.Author: Jason C.
Reviews.Content: Have a Kindle for reading and wanted a tablet for daily use and Kindle Fire was a no brainer for me. Use it all day every day. Never want to be without my Fire. I got mine from Bestbuy, no differences.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Guhl
Reviews.Content: Saw on TV where this outshone the I Pad...well they are right!  This is the best Kindle ever and has all the features you would find in a table but with the outstanding service of Amazon backing it.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Barry Topf
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, reliable and fun. May day is great. Needs improvement in document  and file management to make it a better work tool as well as well entertainment. For dual language users  the inability  to change keyboard language easily I s a drawback. Also should open to more apps such as drop box.

Reviews.Title: fantastic upgrade from the kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: bebop_music "bebop_music"
Reviews.Content: So, I think I've had at least FIVE of the kindle fire offerings, starting with the e-pearl ink reader with the built in key board. I was in grad school and several of my text books where ALREADY in kindle format. Desperate to lighten my book bag by even an ounce, I was the first one in my class to get one. After that, everyone wanted one.Now there's the kindle fire HDX. As I've always been an electronics geek even before there where electronics, no one who knows me is surprised that I buy every new kindle that comes out. I am constantly reading something and this is perfect. Email, social media, books, magazines, apps galore, music, video, pictures, built in camera both front and back, Bluetooth, GPS, have I missed anything? All in something so thin and light, you can get it into your purse with no problems at all. What's not to like. Anyone foolish enough to be on Apple? So sorry for you....

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sweetcheeks "Nana"
Reviews.Content: The video quality is excellent, what a difference between my 8.9 HD and this.  You can do so much more, love the light weight. The front facing camera is a big plus and again, excellent pictures. Amazon has done a excellent job with the upgrades on this kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 was purchased from Amazon last month......
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: This Kindle is everything I've wanted in a Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  It is really fast; takes beautiful photos HD, both front and rear shots; I can bring up most things I can on a computer.Things I don't like, that I thought would be on it, are NBA Games, you have to pay for the games you want to watch;I play my family members on Words with Friends and we chat a lot, it sometimes will go into a mode of deleting your chat message, then it automatically switches you to a game you're playing with someone else in the middle of the message, you then have to go back to the one the message was meant for and start typing the message all over again. This Kindle has a chat line you can speak into to send your message, this way it won't self delete.I haven't used it to it's fullest yet but overall I'm very happy with this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: First kindle, impressions mostly positive
Reviews.Author: Timothy G. Blum
Reviews.Content: Great screen, great display, fast, top specs, etc. Works well on Verizon though usually use it on wifi. Only complaint being new to kindle was that I didn't know you were restricted in terms of apps-no Play Store access, and finding/loading apk files is kind of a hassle. Otherwise a great tablet and was top of the tablets available when I bought it (may move to Galaxy Note Pro though for bigger screen although not better resolution so we'll see).

Reviews.Title: I love this play-toy/tool!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sand
Reviews.Content: I got this Kindle for Christmas from my brother and dad, it was on my wish list but was a pleasant surprise none the less. I already had a first generation Kindle Fire and loved it but wanted the updated version and a larger screen. This Kindle far exceeds my expectations. Love it is right!

Reviews.Title: Great Device
Reviews.Author: Thomas Geishecker
Reviews.Content: I actually like this better than I thought I would.  With my previous Kindle I could only read e-books.  Now I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Love It So Far
Reviews.Author: Rita Dotson
Reviews.Content: My Kindle is so light compared to my previous one and much faster. The size for me is great. Battery life and being able to use while charging is an A+, especially when I am in the middle of a game or reading and I see battery is low, I don't have to stop and wait. I like my Kindle way more than the IPad my husband has. My husband had me order as a gift from him and only had this one a short time and still learning my way around in it. My only complaint and it is not about the Kindle Fire, for the money, it did not come with a case or at least an offer of discount on one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for what I need!
Reviews.Author: T Peake
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX and would recommend it to everyone who asks me! The extra features put it in a class of its own.

Reviews.Title: My kindle
Reviews.Author: charlene70510
Reviews.Content: Love my kindle easier to carry instead of my lap top does just what i wanted on a kindle Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great addition to my Life
Reviews.Author: Catherine
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HDX is a great addition to my Reading and getting out and doing more things with apps.  Am disappointed for can't find a cover which allouds me to read verticle.  do this while eating since I'm a widow and gives me joy at the table.  hope a cover comes out soon. Grandma C.

Reviews.Title: love it.....
Reviews.Author: Marie B. Young
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift and they love everything about this Kindle.... This is the 3rd Kindle I have purchased and they keep getting better.. Also Amazon  has the greatest representatives - staff  .. This also keeps me coming back..... Recommend highly to purchase from Amazon...

Reviews.Title: Great toy for those of us who do not own a smart phone
Reviews.Author: Kath
Reviews.Content: It does all I wanted it to do.  I can download a movie and walk around watching it. Yeah. I waited a while before buying this and it was worth the purchase. I own a kindle touch too.  The speakers on the fire and very good, the text to speech has a better sound quality then the touch. I also use it to read e mail and go to Facebook. I have it connected to Wi Fi but I also bought just the AT&T; 3 month network package when I go outside of my Wi Fi.  Hasn't let me down.

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 met my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Alan Dowhower
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I like the speed and clarity.  I also appreciate technical support.  The technical support is the best of any company I have had to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Amazed, again.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Amazon never seizes to amaze me! I love all the little touches, features and enhancements from the slim and functional origami case to navigation on the device. Need to take a quick picture? Slide the device up and the camera's ready for action. Get stuck? Mayday's here to help! The HDX 8.9" also fits in my hand without getting uncomfortable due to the light weight and size. I've only used it on our wifi connection so I'll report back on how it goes on a 4G connection.I've owned every Kindle release and this is by far my favorite!Bravo Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: tish b
Reviews.Content: I really love my Kindle so far!  I looked at a lot of different tablets before deciding on the Kindle Fire and I'm sure I made the right choice.  I think the color resolution is awesome and I am enjoying it very much.  I like the 8.9" size much more that my old smaller Kindle e-reader. While I am new to all the Kindle HDX has to offer, I am having fun learning about it!  I know I will have many hours of enjoyment reading, studying and playing games!!  Thanks Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: ralphod100
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with how the Kindle Fire HDX performs. Internet access is fast and reliable. Screen resolution is excellent. Reading magazines, newspapers, books etc. is a real pleasure with the larger screen this Kindle has. Watching videos is also very good. My wife has an Ipad air, I haven't seen any noticeable differences in how they both function.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Dave Fus
Reviews.Content: I would really like to give my Kindle 5 stars, but it lacks a good way of organizing music and pictures. I experience no other problems and enjoy it every day. I have a 7" hd kindle fire and this 8.9 HDX out performs in all areas except music and pictures which is the same as my old kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: SPARKLES
Reviews.Content: I am so glad that I bought the kindle fire HDX.  I have been having a great time with it.  The quality of the sound and video are impressive

Reviews.Title: Met Expectations
Reviews.Author: tictok
Reviews.Content: All items met expectations.  The Kindle Fire is used all the time for personal entertainment and to stay in touch with old and new friends.

Reviews.Title: SUPERB
Reviews.Author: Humberto Olivencia Rabell "myst"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best tablets that I have own. Fast, lit,intuitive, easy and a perfect entrainment center. I have 1,2,3,4 and I still prefeer HDX 8.9 AS MY MAIN READER.

Reviews.Title: Why i hate and love this kindle.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Why I love and hate this kindle.  Every good thing everyone says about this kindle is true.  The bad.  They offer 4g for version and another service.  I have T mobile with free world wide data service, but of course they don't offer it for T Moble.  So now I travel with a 3g reade and a firer.  Of course this unit and  all kindles are great.

Reviews.Title: Love the versatility.
Reviews.Author: Melissa Styles
Reviews.Content: This replaced my old kindle and my laptop.  I used my laptop basically for looking stuff up on the web, checking my e-mails and looking up recipes.  This is quick and convenient without the bulk.  Some of the apps that you can purchase for it don't work properly, but that is to be expected with new products.

Reviews.Title: Love love love!
Reviews.Author: scoobydrlp
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about the HDX, I absolutely love it! Picture quality is amazing! I never thought I would be one to watch tv shows and movies on a tablet, but I've watched entire series of shows thanks to Amazon Prime.I do wish there was a little better selection of apps in comparison to the iPad.

Reviews.Title: the price and quality
Reviews.Author: L. Khalilova
Reviews.Content: I had one of cheap Chinese tablets and liked it very much. But it didn't survive long. First power plug jack and headphones jack became very loose. Then power button just fell inside of a tablet. So for my next tablet I wanted something more durable, with US company behind it. iPad Air was good choice but offered only 16GB storage for the money vs 64GB on Kindle Fire HDX. The choice was easy. I use storage for movies on a long car trips.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Dwight B. Donica
Reviews.Content: We have had it for a few days and decided immediately we needed one for each of us so we ordered another but smaller version of the same thing.  We are certainly enjoying them, in fact, not much work gets done now and our desktop computers are feeling kind of deserted. The support (help) is fantastic, live help and they are great!

Reviews.Title: This tablet is incredible
Reviews.Author: Frederic Blin "Nodbuddabag"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is unreal and definitely better than my Macbook 3 and its retina screen.  As long as you are prepared to deal with the Android system, which can be just as convenient as Apple apps as long as you choose your Android apps carefully, you will probably find this one to be better than an iPad in at least two things.  Picture quality and price.  I am still amazed at the picture quality of this item and for the price you just can't beat it.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: A great buy
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: IT IS A GREAT BUY.  It will be a great easy to use companion for our summer trips. with our portable hot spot we will use it in the car.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: It's everything adverstised.  Very happy with screen quality & speed.  Huge improvement from original Kindle Fire.  Keeping fingers crossed it stays that way!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Di "Di"
Reviews.Content: My son chose this for me and I use it whenever I do not have to use my laptop as my laptop is heavy.

Reviews.Title: very good tablet
Reviews.Author: A. Kaplan
Reviews.Content: This is a very good tablet. The display is exceptional. It is fast, the volume without headphones is the best I have heard on any unit. The only downside is that you can't access all the apps that are available on Google play.

Reviews.Title: Getting better all the time.
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: Miss having a "paper" owners manual.  Not being a teckie made it difficult to get along even with basic questions.  After some coaching from some relatives,  I have gotten to love my Kindle Fire HDX. The bullseye is great.

Reviews.Title: So much fun!
Reviews.Author: Nose in a book
Reviews.Content: I am having a great time with this device,  I don't own a smart phone but I imagine this experience is pretty close.  The camera is a surprising good quality and I am pleased at being able to capture most events although like most point and shoot cameras it does suffer on action shots.  The fact that when I go to doctor's appointments and am waiting not only do I have books at my fingertips but games, movies and the internet all in one device.  I haven't yet discovered all I can do with my Kindle but I really am happy with this purchase,  it gives the ipad a run for it's money especially with Amazon and all that it offers at your disposal.

Reviews.Title: Love my 3rd Kindle.
Reviews.Author: K-Bow
Reviews.Content: I don't need to say a lot because it's simple.  This is my 3rd Kindle and I have loved them all. It is easy to use but does everything I want it to do, from paying bills to reading to playing games checking Pintrest and sending emails.  Now with the HDX I can Skype with family and friends around the world.  So go ahead and get the Kindle Fire HDX, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: First look at my new HDX
Reviews.Author: Coral E Showell
Reviews.Content: I have only own this HDX for a couple of days, but compared to the previous HD that i own there is no comparison. My HD would crash about once every two days, which i thought was to often. I have used this HDX all day today and i love it. Its as fast as advertised, and the screen is as clear as advertised. It is faster, and right now i can't find any problems.I love it.

Reviews.Title: love @first byte
Reviews.Author: matt winkelmann
Reviews.Content: It is way faster at everything including the intuitive typing. Everything loads quickly and efficiently. Where ever you think that there could be a problem there is not. I know that I would spend the money again without hesitation

Reviews.Title: A very solid offering
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: A great product especially because of its cheaper price point when compared to Apple or Samsung tablets.  The app store is limited compared to the others which is why it only receives 4 stars.  If you are an Amazon Prime member it is well worth the investment to enjoy movies with the Kindle's stunning HD screen.

Reviews.Title: KFHDX 7.8
Reviews.Author: Barbara Bowers
Reviews.Content: Best case cover I've ever had, works well in all positions, would buy again, recommend highly, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: LOVE Kindles
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have had a keyboard kindle for years and it is basically my favorite electronic device so when I went to look for a tablet for my school work I looked no further than a kindle.The only thing I was wondering is if I could actually edit powerpoint documents on a kindle but after buying the office suite I found that is just as easy to do as it was on my laptop.  I just got it in the mail yesterday and I am already just as in love with it as my old kindle.  I think it will be a few weeks before I find out everything it can do because a kindle really is a learn as you go device without any specific instructions but when you do start something you haven't doneon it before it guides you thorugh the  process and even gives you some quick tips. Setting up the kindle was much faster than setting up an IPad I know because I had to set up three for my nieces and you have to go in and add cloud accounts etc while on the kindle as long as you bought it for yourself as soon as you receive it, it is already for your account information all you have to do it click yes this is me and voila all ready to go. Bottom line I think it is a great product and as far as I can tell will do what I wanted it to do for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Addicted to kindle
Reviews.Author: Cathyanddave
Reviews.Content: This device is AWSOME!!!!!!! Don't know how we managed before it came along  now we read EVERYDAY and love it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Janice A. Davis "Granny"
Reviews.Content: Kindle arrived on time, packaged in a very sturdy box.  This is my third Kindle.  Each one is better than the last one and I am very happy with this one.  It's so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again.
Reviews.Author: Sam I Am
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire primarily for reading and for travel convenience. It wasn't hard to figure out, even though I'm not very tech savvy. Whenever I got stuck, I called the Help line and with one exception, everyone was very knowledgeable and walked me through my questions/problems.  The battery life is great! I use it to read daily and when it gets down to 60-70%, I charge it for a while.  Doesn't take long to get back to 100%.  The issues/downside:  There was (is?) a packaging snafu and the adapter cord did not fit the adapter properly, therefore, the Kindle wouldn't charge. I had gotten an extra 9W adapter and after problem solving this with the Help line, I was sent what I needed at no charge, in very little time. After resolving that problem, recharging is much faster than my laptop.  My other disappointments were 1) it's not compatible with the program that allows me to play some of my online games, although I've been told that addition is being negotiated; and 2) I live in the Florida Keys, too far from the mainland for greater access to E books, so aside from purchasing the books I want to read, what's available to me for free is very limited. This is probably not an issue for people on the mainland. I have, however, been able to buy the books I wanted from Amazon ($9.99).  I haven't traveled with it yet so I don't know how it functions with videos, but all in all, I'm glad I bought it. If your primary use is reading, this is the one for you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Judy Norcini
Reviews.Content: Great color and clarity. Easy to access apps. Takes great pictures. Book discounts and book referrals.  Support access 24/7. Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great.. but with limitations
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have owned the kindle fire hdx 8.9 for about two months.  Other tablets I have/have used extensively are: two previous versions of the ipad (job issued), a nexus 7, galaxy note 8 and a galaxy note 10.1 2014 (beautiful but returned because of changes to how handwriting recognition worked - see my review if interested) and a kindle fire 7 (original).  I have some background for comparison.Pro's:  A beautiful and responsive touch screen with plenty of power "under the hood".  The device is never laggy.  Great "consumable content" through the Amazon ecosystem including the ability to download some prime video (great for me because I travel extensively).  Relatively long battery life when compared to the Galaxy note 8.  Great value for the price.  Superb Amazon customer service - they stand behind their products and my experience with this product has been no different.  I consider this last pro to be one of the most important to me.Cons:  Limited apps in the appstore.  I agree with most reviewers that you can find most of what you need, HOWEVER, there are some caveats:  some of my favorite apps are not the most recent versions and can be buggy (Flipboard and Zite crash occasionally and im not sure if its the apps themselves or something with the Kindle), silk browser is improved over prior versions but still isnt on par with other browsers in rendering the odd page here and there (and what do you know?  you cant easily use any other browser yeah, I know I can sideload but should I have to? maybe this is because the default is for use of accelerated page loading so your data goes through Amazon's servers and they can use it to market to you?)  Additionally, battery life can be erratic occasionally and I had a black screen that didnt go away with power button reset so I had to completely reset it.  The onscreen keyboard is shifted to the right and makes it difficult to touch type but the ability to "swype" type negates that issue for me.I know the cons look like a long list but in reality it isnt.  The tablet provides real value in the form of screen, brute power, and content.  Its just a little rough around the edges.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY KINDLE
Reviews.Author: T. Hairston "mqvp"
Reviews.Content: OMG I'm So glad I brought my kindle. It is so much fun and  very addictive. I stay up for hours using all the features. I brought the Kindle to read books, but I fell in love with everything the Kindle has to offer. I'm glad I waited for this version to come out. I have put my laptop down. It's all about my Kindle. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: kaptmorgan "stormdawg"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new kindle fire HDX it has so many more features than my original and I would recommend this product to anyone

Reviews.Title: Still Learning.
Reviews.Author: rickster
Reviews.Content: Really like this tablet.  Haven't tapped into everything it can do yet.  Still learning all its ins and outs that are available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is the best
Reviews.Author: Narvella Hiltabrand
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle  Fire HDX 8.9 . It is even more then I had expected and very happy that I got it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have three kindles, this one is the best yet.  I like the ease of use.  I like the price of this unit.  The clarity of the screen is great.  The storage of this unit is out of this world.  Great unit for the price.  Kindle offers a lot of free books.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet with excellent screen
Reviews.Author: kunyikun
Reviews.Content: Very good tablet, amazing screen showing quality pictures and movies, speakers are what you expect for the average tablet, otherwise, hardware is close to perfect considering its price. Enhancements i needed most would be support for google apps and the ability to customize the interface or the launcher like the average android os allows.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet I've owned
Reviews.Author: Elio Concepcion
Reviews.Content: I'm totally in love with my Kindle Fire HDX. It's super fast, Web browsing is really smooth the screen is gorgeous. Videos play beautifully and, if you're a Prime member, there's a nice amount of downloadable movies and tv shows. The tablet is really light.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: MRJ
Reviews.Content: The screen colors and clarity are beautiful.  I have read two books so far so I'm learning how to use it.  This is my first tablet that encourages finger prints so it's all new to me.  I purchased it so my wife could read her email on it, and I could take it with me when I travel.  Prime seems like a good thing also.  I'm looking forward to learning how to use it!  Love the battery endurance!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: AnnieMac48
Reviews.Content: This may be the best purchase I've ever made. It is light, colors are great, Amazon is responsible and responsive. I can hardly begin to express my gratitude for Mayday. I almost feel like I could make it now with the user's manual.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: @margaret
Reviews.Content: Love it love it love it love it love it love it love it.  Loooooovvvveeee it. Is all I can say. I don't go anywhere without it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display
Reviews.Author: Russell Johnson
Reviews.Content: My wife had bad eyesight and she had trouble with her old kindle getting the font big enough to see.  She has no problems with larger display.  In short I scored many points with buying this for her plus I got her old kindle.

Reviews.Title: Why get rid of the mini-USB port?
Reviews.Author: Infrequent critic
Reviews.Content: My only complaint is that you can no longer connect the device to your TV to stream the downloads. You can buy a new TV - Samsung Internet, or you can buy another device to stream for you but one of the best features of the previous Kindle HD was the ability to stream just by connecting using a cord. Simple and easy.

Reviews.Title: Great Machine
Reviews.Author: W B
Reviews.Content: Have had other Kindle's,  I am enjoying the new one very much.  Can do a lot more, plus a larger screen to view.It is a very good product

Reviews.Title: kindles ordored
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I was for my son who has a problem with his eyes has opened a whole new world for him works great and his first time so thank you kindle

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Ronalddwinston "ronalddwinston"
Reviews.Content: it is everthing that I wanted and much more.i would recommend it to everyone .it was a wise choice buying it.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Russell D. Johnson
Reviews.Content: What a great product! It is lots of fun. I especially like the mayday function. Very helpful. I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Tyler M. Spears "tylerpheonix"
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very sharp.and fast load times.I recommend.also less expensive than other high end tabs.thanks Amazon.also if you get this tab you get a lot of free ebooks to download on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: very nice tablet
Reviews.Author: J. F.
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a very crisp display with vibrant colors.  There is some screen glare in bright daylight but I don't find it annoying.It has a decent battery life.  I recharge it only when it asks and it frequently lasts three days or more.The apps are quick to load and it seems to have a decent wireless range.This model was highly rated by Consumer Reports and had it not been a gift, it would have been the model I would have gotten.

Reviews.Title: kindle is a must, inspite of ipad, google, samsung or other tablets. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: Vinesh Abhang
Reviews.Content: The device perse is excellent..bright and sharp display. Wish they had bundled packages for caribbean customers including movies, audio books, kindle editions textbooks. Mayday is supportive but not helpful because eventually you still have to pay . Thats why i give 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet
Reviews.Author: W. J. Neubauer "Buffalo Bill"
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this tablet. It does everything I expected of it. Fast, excellent screen. I do wish there were more of the apps I need (I have an iPhone).

Reviews.Title: Love this new Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jan Koepp
Reviews.Content: The 8.9" HDX has a really sharp display.  It operates faster than my old Kindle Fire and the battery needs charging way less often.  It's lightweight and easy to hold.  The size is just right, not too big for convenient reading or carrying, but big enough to look at websites, email and games.

Reviews.Title: im happy
Reviews.Author: Deneen "Richmond, Va"
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new kindle fire HDX 8.9!I just got it yesterday and I'm loving it. The sound is awesome, the May day feature is awesome, I'm leaning towards getting prime. Initially I was gonna keep netflix but for this device you get the movies, books, and two day shipping on most items. It's a win win!

Reviews.Title: Good for reading
Reviews.Author: longjian
Reviews.Content: Good for reading.good quality for music and video.Nice design , fashion and lightable.I like it much more

Reviews.Title: Comment
Reviews.Author: Mary Lee Austin
Reviews.Content: I am still learning how to use everything.  I am surprised that you don't include a DETAILED users guide.  I will have to buy one on line.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 since I have owned it for about a month. My husband said that it is my new boyfriend... :) He sort of feel replaced by it. Love the Mayday button I think customer service knows my voice by now. Also the free app a day love it love it love it... Free apps you can not beat, also the free apps aren't just the once that cost 99 cents. One app I got for free cost 5.99 and it will help me with planing for my future finically. I hope this review helps, and also my kindle fire HDX is money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - Love the Mayday feature
Reviews.Author: Lynda
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use.  Display is Crystal clear.  Very easy to switch between internet, e-mail, apps, books, etc.  Screen size is just about right.  Camera works great.  Love the way the screen images rotate whenever you rotate the KINDLE so you can read it in any orientation.  Touch screen is not quite as responsive as I would like.  Disappointed that software does not permit editing e-mails that you want to forward.

Reviews.Title: Love the new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture. Big screen. Lot's of memory. I love all the stuff you can do with it. Netflix look's awsome on it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Cary Lynn
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle HDX 8.9 for about three months and I love it!! I hardly ever use my laptop anymore. Great product!!!

Reviews.Title: True it is lighter than air !
Reviews.Author: GM
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Kindle ! Not only lighter but also faster easier to handle than "air", with a beautiful clear display screen + all the benefits of the Kindle reader.I find the iCloud application very handy and extremely useful !The aftersale service is swift & prompt...just outstanding.Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Pat Mattingly
Reviews.Content: My new Kindle Fire is everything I thought it would be.  I had a Kindle Fire and really did like it but was looking for something with a little extra, so decided to get this one.  I am so pleased that I made that decision.  The color is so real I almost feel like I can reach out and touch.  Once I figured out how to navigate thru it, I am absolutely loving it.  I take it with me where ever I go.  Thanks for making a superior product.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just love it. My first Kindle was black and white. I could only read books and play a few basic games. The colors , backlight and clarity on this one exceeded my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Origami case for Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Merton E. Coffin "Meco Services"
Reviews.Content: The perfect mate for the HDX! Really like the auto shut-off and start-up when you close or open the case. The slide-up turn on of the camera is also very handy. It makes a neat and clean profile for the unit. Well worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet.
Reviews.Author: Wayne Sundmacher
Reviews.Content: Thought quite a bit about this purchase. Lots of research. Read about other tablets and notebooks. Decided to get the Kindle Fire HDX. Very happy with what we got.

Reviews.Title: Well deserved!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Am very pleased with my new Kindle, have been researching for sometime and finally decided to purchase.  I would recommend this to everyone, easy to use and very easy to see, I got the 8.9 display screen and great for reading.

Reviews.Title: I am glad I waited for the Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Cynthia McElroy
Reviews.Content: It really is convenient for all of my needs and I love the video quality. I love the battery life of my device. I can enjoy it for a long time before recharging. I love it!

Reviews.Title: love me some kindle!
Reviews.Author: mary hewitt
Reviews.Content: I adore my newest kindle! I started with the original kindle, upgraded to the kindle fire,and now am loving my new kindle fire hdx 8.9! With each upgrade I can't imagine anything more! I've even made recommendations to my friends who are now kindle lovers too! Woo hoo!

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: wateaman
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying it.  But I need to learn more about it.  I really like reading library books on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: It's only been  day and I love it so!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased an regular Kindle Fire but it didn't work.I returned it and upgraded  to XD and I'm so glad.I was concerned about not being able to download TV shows that I love but Cupcake Wars and Intervention are included with unlimited downloads. It's going to be worth it.I can't wait to load up my 32gb with stuff.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: RICARDO LOPEZ
Reviews.Content: Is just incredible way better that my ipad, and I paid way more for it. The speed, HD screen, features, everthing is just awesome, I like it, planning to buy another one for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Working well for me
Reviews.Author: K. Crosby
Reviews.Content: Been enjoying this with no problems.  The larger screen is great for video viewing if paired with a stand up case. Enjoying that amazon has a cloud to save all the books/games we have.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: Melanie Bryan
Reviews.Content: The kindle fore hdx 8.9 meets my every need. The screen is the perfect size to do whatever I need to do! Picture quality is absolutely wonderful.

Reviews.Title: very good kendle fire
Reviews.Author: Raquel Reyes "crafty"
Reviews.Content: I just love it is easy to work with thin and sceen very clear. I give it three tumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Very pleases
Reviews.Author: mb florida
Reviews.Content: . Had gen2 fire and wanted a bigger and faster one. Looked at other makes but liked my older fire so decided on the HDX8.9" Now I watch missed tv shows and movies in bed and surf the web on it. Have it about 4 weeks and its working great. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice device
Reviews.Author: TraciePen
Reviews.Content: There are some glitches here and there and nowhere near the amount of quality apps as an iPad, but for the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: FIRE UP !!!!
Reviews.Author: H. Michael Strite "Mike"
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I replaced my Motorola unit with this one and boy is it great!  It's as user friendly as it gets.

Reviews.Title: great product 5 star
Reviews.Author: Donald W Clarke Sr
Reviews.Content: I like my kindle HDX 8.9 because of the ease of use and the only tablet that I know of that has the mayday button that is extremely helpful to a person who wants to learn all the features that are included with the kindle.The magazines that I subscribe to are very clear and crisp as though I were looking at the magazine in real time.The kindle is easy on the eyes.The size of my kindle is very nice and the weight is unnoticeable.Thank you Amazon for a very nice product.

Reviews.Title: if I knew
Reviews.Author: J. Quinlan "sois bon avec toi même"
Reviews.Content: If I had known the specials were abundant advertising I would have paid the$40 more.It's a good device with a lot of improvements but there is no way you can upload to the cloud except by taking photos. Can't upload anything from their web browser.They use html 5 instead of flash which Adobe is no longer developing because the 5 is faster. Some sites will tell you that you need flash and direct you to Adobe. Adobe flash wants to know what operating system you are using and offer a pull down which doesn't show the kindle 's. You can go to kindle apps for the cloud and there is an install button but it too directs you to Adobe.It's faster, has better volume and a good camera.VERY glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: I love my HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire HDX! The only problem I have found is that it is not compatable worth Direct TV's Genie Go! No app as of yet! Hope it's available soon! I really don't want to buy an I-Pad just for that function!

Reviews.Title: Best Ever
Reviews.Author: Patricia Szopinski
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire HDX for about a month now and I love it! Right out of the box it is very easy to use. It has exceeded my expectations,

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet
Reviews.Author: ggrammab
Reviews.Content: This is a nice tablet to use. However, I ordered mine with advertising and wish I hadn't as it becomes kind of a nuisance after awhile.Other than that, it is easy to setup and use. The 8.9" display is better than the smaller screens. I haven't used some of the features like May Day, and the camera yet, but sure they will be just fine also.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: christine wickelman
Reviews.Content: bought for my husband while recovering from surgery.  he is really enjoying it. He is especially happy with the ability to talk to it and have it write out what he said.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: Wanted one for so long, now that I have it I cannot imagine being without it. It goes with me practically everywhere and takes the place of my desktop for many things. Wouldn't give it up for anything.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Jean Snider
Reviews.Content: This is the best gift l have ever received in a long time. I like how easy it is s to play with to work on. Thank!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: My likes and dislike.
Reviews.Author: Darrell G Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: I like the kindle just fine but I wish it had come with a manual. When something costs 400.00 it should have some instructionswith it.

Reviews.Title: Better than anything.
Reviews.Author: wroberthelms "Robert Helms"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle HDX 64GB reader.  It gives me access to the Kindle book library which is vast and deep.  The free books from Amazon alone is worth the price of a Kindle.  Too good to tell it all.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Andrea Griffith
Reviews.Content: I really like my Kindle Fire HDX. It's a great buy without going broke. I am still learning how to get the most out of my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9 HDX 16 gig
Reviews.Author: James M. Blankenship
Reviews.Content: One of the best decisions I ever made this for my wife for Christmas... My only problem is I should have bought two of these. My wife won't let me use it. I programmed it prior to giving it to her on Christmas morning...  she is a big reader and it is just super for her.... Thank You.Amazon................ Jim B.

Reviews.Title: Awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Mcknelly "Mrs. McK"
Reviews.Content: Love this!!!!!!  I have a lap top but I don't use it anymore except to write long word documents and that's because I am a math teacher and I need equation editor.  I love the fact that I can check my emails, search the web, and best of all - read a book on it.  Wonderful ---- that's all I have to say.  Buy it.  Forget Apple! :-)  and I have an apple 4S phone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers
Reviews.Author: Lynn Timko
Reviews.Content: I Love this size kindle. I like the 2 way camera. The Primetime features, the things you can add to it.

Reviews.Title: great pad
Reviews.Author: Dwight Ball Morrill
Reviews.Content: the screen is clearer and brighter than my 27" pc monitor.  The apps available are incredible.  I'm enjoying it a lot.

Reviews.Title: Only one drawback that I can see.
Reviews.Author: Fran Verlangieri "j. verlangieri"
Reviews.Content: I love the fact that I can get Downton Abbey (all seasons) on my Kindle.  It does so much, I don't even need my laptop.  I love readingbut I am disappointed that I cannot read in the sun.  I know you can on Paperwhite, but it would be silly to have another kindle.  I already have two and I had a third, but gave it to my son.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sherri Young
Reviews.Content: I love my books, to be honest I didn't want a Kindle.  I like to hold paper book.  But my husband got me this and I love it!!  I love the versatility of it.  I am sold.....

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: michael iwanicki
Reviews.Content: Good tablet.very clear and concise function.great screen size.vibrant colors.easy to use and has become my main source of entertainment daily

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathy Church "owlgal"
Reviews.Content: I am thoroughly enjoying my Kindle.  It is much faster than I thought it would be and I would recommend it for anyone who is wanting a reader or a tablet.

Reviews.Title: I love this
Reviews.Author: Sid
Reviews.Content: I take this every where I go.  Purchased because I got to make payments on it (thanks to Amazon). Have loved it ever since. Beautiful color and display. The web is easy to use and fast on this. Tons of apps to chose and have fun with. Takes amazing pics and even do selfies without turning it around. Love my kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Kathy Liviingston
Reviews.Content: Love it! Still working on smoothing out some of the functions but getting there. Met all of my expectations and more.

Reviews.Title: Bought to Replace Wife's Laptop and makes a great educational tool also.
Reviews.Author: Bobby Deckard
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HDX for my wife to replace her laptop that was starting to go out after three years. She loves it. The download speeds are quick and the picture on it is amazing. The operating system was no problem because she was already familiar with the Android system thanks to her phone. She takes it with her when my daughter is at practice which before, with her laptop, would have been too cumbersome. If she is using her Kindle and she needs to do something, she simply (and easily) sets it to the side, goes about her task and easily returns to where she left off. The size is ideal and she doesn't worry about the "leg burn" you can get from a laptop sitting on your legs. The battery life is perfect and she takes it with her everywhere she goes. The portability is miles ahead of where a traditional laptop would be. And there is an app for just about everything you might want to do.She also uses her Kindle as an educational tool for some of the children she looks after. The app store has a multitude of educational apps that she has downloaded and uses with younger children to help them learn to read and to improve their math scores. Every day she seems to find a way to incorporate her Kindle Fire HDX in a new way.I am more than pleased with having made this purchase and somewhat surprised how much she uses it in a variety of ways. Also glad I went with the larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Grandsons
Reviews.Author: Naha "honey dew"
Reviews.Content: I purchased these for my grandsons in California. They love playing games on it and they share the kindle with each other which is nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth  Follis
Reviews.Content: This kindle fire is amazing.  I got it mainly to read books, but have found many other uses for it.  I plan to take it on an upcoming plane trip and watch a movie during the flight.  It's wonderful.  I have used the help button several times and the person answered my questions every time.  The people who answer the help feature are so nice, patient, and very knowledgeable. I would recommend this to anyone who is shopping for a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Nancy L. Eberhardt "Nancy L"
Reviews.Content: Love the size and all the features it has on it. It did take my 11 year old granddaughter to help me set it up but I really love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Steven Reimel
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX.  The picture and sound are superb and there are lots of great free apps.  And since I am an Amazon Prime member I get lots of free programming and video.  I couldn't be happier with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great Device, Software Choices Restricted
Reviews.Author: rs
Reviews.Content: Wonderful screen, fast, etc. Sadly, there's no browser alternative to Silk. Silk just doesn't work well with some sites. Unless you jailbreak your device and void your warranty, you are stuck with what Amazon allows you to load through their store. Lots of apps on the Market, some of which I use almost daily on other devices are just not allowed for this device. Overall I'm not disappointed with the device itself, but am impatient with the iDevice approach to regulating apps. If I wanted that, I would have bought an iPad. My bad for not doing more research on this aspect of using the Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!
Reviews.Author: W McMamn
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". Color and graphics are soooooo clear. Having fun taking pictures with the camera and playing games is a blast!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: g.Johnson
Reviews.Content: I loved the kindle fire hdx 8.9 the interface is very smooth and the system is easy to follow.XIII

Reviews.Title: you can take my Kindle when you pry it from my cold, dead hand!
Reviews.Author: The Kool-Aid Mom
Reviews.Content: This small, lightweight electronic has quickly became a part of my hand. There are so many free apps, that I've still not used all of my 500 free coins. The web app is fairly fast, the movies and shows stream quite well with very little, if any, buffering. The actual book part of my Kindle I claimed to buy it for... lol... is good, but I don't use it as much as I originally thought I would. The sound is fantastic, as is the picture. The only complaints I could have, and they are minor, are: the Facebook app is slow and annoying, some of my apps don't "connect" to the internet right, and my Kindle books and the audio synced and worked together (played the audio while reading the page) the first time but hasn't since. I haven't used the May day feature, either. Overall, though, an awesome product!

Reviews.Title: I <3 IT!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Fischer
Reviews.Content: Easy shopping fast fast fast delivery and the perfect product. I will recommend this to anyone and every one that enjoys reading.

Reviews.Title: Kindle rating
Reviews.Author: Pattie
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed being able to play solitare away from the computer and to read a book.  I can put down the kindle book and open it to the nexxt chapter with out finding a bookmark.

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Pretty good I just wish you received more for your money for $79 for annual cost. I'm not sure the Amazon prime is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Best ever!
Reviews.Author: P.A.W.
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Kindle and have enjoyed all. I like the updates and I am so happy with the front facing camera. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: bear
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift to replace the original Kindle. The new HDX is a vast improvement. Why is the cover so heavy? The unit is light and very thin. The heavy cover takes away the advantage of light weight.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: LEP
Reviews.Content: just what I expected and more. Got it and could not put it down, Mayday also great help when help is needed

Reviews.Title: My favorite device
Reviews.Author: Bob Conger
Reviews.Content: Exactly what it is advertised to be. The best. As a bibliophile with 2000 books, 500 of which are leather bound, I never thought I would go for an e-reader. Then I discovered the 1st edition Kindle. Being able to carry an entire library in my hand instead of utilizing an entire room is life changing. And the convenience of an instant dictionary is outstanding. Then, a small stroke and greatly diminished vision brought me to the HD. I still love my books, the way they feel, the way they smell, the way they look...just can't read them anymore. The HD allows me to read without skipping a beat. And with the 4G? We use it all the time on our travels. The best device since the PC...

Reviews.Title: Super case I hope it extends my Kindle's life by many years
Reviews.Author: Terry Cooperrider
Reviews.Content: The case was made to fit the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 and with this case the Kindle travels with all the time!Tip let the case warm up before installing, it goes on so much easier.The case has not interfered in any way with the operation  of the Kindle

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I rarely use. my laptop anymore.  This will be especially great when travelling. I had a friend visiting from out of town when I got my Kindle Fire and she ordered one immediately.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Hubby got this as a Christmas gift, the best part he says that the likes talking to the help person

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Kindle
Reviews.Author: gzusisawesome
Reviews.Content: The Only thing I could add here is I wish Amazon would add The Blackboard Troy University App to their app store since I use my kindle mainly for school. otherwise A++ also love the mayday feature

Reviews.Title: HOW TO USE A NEW KINDLE
Reviews.Author: SCARLET
Reviews.Content: Just getting use to it. I m still having a little trouble with the added features. I have one of the first kindles and loved it except it had no lite.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: My first kindle. Very easy to use and so handy to find books that you really want to read. All the features are excellent and easy to use. I'm 63 years old and this almost makes  me feel as technologically advanced as my grandchildren

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet
Reviews.Author: JFS
Reviews.Content: A superior product in every way! The color is excellent . Could use a little more instructions for the first timer.

Reviews.Title: Neat
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: Really like my new Kindle.  Am a senior citizen so takes me a while to learn something like this.  But am getting the hangof what I bought it for.  Which is to mainly play games.  As not good to do on computer.  Also great that if I need helpit is right at the touch of a button.

Reviews.Title: great reader plus vidio and instant help
Reviews.Author: Jay C Fry
Reviews.Content: My daughter's a special Education teacher. She recommend It  for ease of use; once I learn where to find all the features. I would prefer a guide book then going online, but I am getting use to a live person to help, then researching a book. I also don't have to wait for my granddaughter to show me how to find things, which she loves to do.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gwendolyn Lively
Reviews.Content: It is very easy to use and I was able to transfer the books from mymold kindle.  I'mglad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: I am still working on getting it set up.
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: I love the Mayday button, she is so helpful and friendly and available.  I do have some things to consult with her about yet.She is fast becoming my New Best Friend.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Lillian Black
Reviews.Content: This tablet does just about everything that a computer does.  I just love it.  I AM STILL LEARNING A LOT OF  FEATURES BUT IF YOU HAVE QUESTIONS SOMEONE IS ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU. A MUST HAVE.

Reviews.Title: zinio anyone??
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Monet "Becca"
Reviews.Content: I would rate my fire HDX 5 stars if I could get the zinio app on here. That has been my biggest disappointment.  If anyone has been successful sideloading this app I would love to hear :)Picture quality is wonderful.  Love watching House of Cards on my fire.Feedly app works nicely, as does evernote which is my most used app.  I can pull my recipes up in evernote, stand my kindle on the counter and bake/cook dinner. I have been able to convert much of my iTunes library to Amazon's format and listen to my music as well.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Gerald Stouffer
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a replacement for my original kindle that was stolen. Great color, easy to read in any light, lots of apps. Glad I was "forced" to make this purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: ROBERT L HENDERSON
Reviews.Content: The features of the Kindle Fire HDX rival those of the best tablets out there and best of all it's a lot less expensive. Online help with May Day at your finger tips just another added bonus.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" Love It!
Reviews.Author: SJ
Reviews.Content: Just love this new Kindle! Love the new Mayday! I really liked my 1st Generation Kindle, but this one is over the top!

Reviews.Title: heads up
Reviews.Author: ronald bunt
Reviews.Content: Haven't spent as much time as I would like with it but seems easy to use and that was my goul

Reviews.Title: So much you can do.
Reviews.Author: Edward Tomicich
Reviews.Content: I was surprised to find out how much I could do withthe Kindle  HDX 8 9'  .It's like an extension to my PC.It will be with me everytime I travel.

Reviews.Title: must have!!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Shaffer
Reviews.Content: Love it, my son uses it at school, I get to play when he's not looking!!!  Must have and Great price!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for any needs
Reviews.Author: Nemico Allgier
Reviews.Content: It's so easy to use! The picture is amazing for movies and games. Can't live without my kindle fire HDX, I use it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase love the bigger screen
Reviews.Author: Nancy H
Reviews.Content: Own original kindle fire 7". This is like night & day. All my games are so much more fun & entertaining.

Reviews.Title: a good investment
Reviews.Author: J. Daniels
Reviews.Content: this is everything I hoped it would be.  The screen is so crisp and clear, making it fun to play games, read, watch movies.  I really wanted to be able to watch a movie outside on the patio.  I can't do it very well with my Kindle Fire second gen.  The picture quality is nowhere near good enough and the glare on the screen glass interferes with my view.  There is still some glare on the HDX but not as much, and the quality of the picture itself is so sharp, making it viewable in spite of the glare.The only issue I would have with this item so far is that I notice that sometimes the picture dims a little while I'm playing a game.  It's noticeable mostly at night when the lighting around me is low.  A bit annoying.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Jean Kritschgau
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!Easy to use,I take it everywhere,seldom use my computer anymore.What else can I say, This is my 3rd Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Ginny D. Nowak
Reviews.Content: This is the best, does everything! Take it everywhere and can't put it down. If you are thinking of getting one, do it.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9 hdx
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: THIS IS MY THIRD KINDLE. LOVE WORKING WITH AMAZON. I HAVE TRIED THE APPLE IPAD AND RETURNED IT, BECAUSE CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS LACKING IN MANY WAYS.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Christine Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I use to own a the first kindle that came out, and I must say compare it to the kindle fire, the kindle fire is the best tablet that I have. I love the 8.9 screen it is like wow this is big and a very nice picture.But all and all I would tell any of my friends that the kindle fire is the best purchase for there money.

Reviews.Title: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !
Reviews.Author: Dr Carmen Otalora
Reviews.Content: I am  a great fan of kindle and so there are no disputes on them we have 3 in our home !, my grand children love their games I love my books and I can go from down stairs to up without my kindle because it syncronizes  my books pages it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: L. Buechler
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my wife for Christmas and she doesn't put it down - which is a problem b/c I'd like to play with it too!  Excellent product and it works like a charm.  Best display screen I think I've seen.  This is the third Kindle product I've ordered.

Reviews.Title: love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Avid Redhead Reader
Reviews.Content: Clear, easy to read and handle, fits in most purses, great pictures! Wish I had received sooner. Thanks to hubby

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: TM
Reviews.Content: I really looked around and considered several tablets. After speaking to several people I got the Kindle.I am very happy with it. It is fast, reliable and the picture is awesome.

Reviews.Title: A Pleased User
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: My only problem with my new Kindle is that it is a little too big for my purse.  However my Kindle Touch goes with me easily, and I have something to look forward to when I come home.  I use my Amazon Prime movies on the Kindle Fire while I'm exercising, and it makes the workout go much more quickly.  When I travel with a friend, I can use my Kindle Fire when there is only one tv for us to share.  It is very convenient to check my email, and the picture quality is exceptional.  I haven't used all of the features, for example the camera.  I don't skype, and I haven't had a reason to take pictures on the kindle.  I did try it out, and it worked.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Karen Battista
Reviews.Content: There are so many things you can do with this Kindle and the viewing quality is great.  My only problem is that I want to spend too much time on it!  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Suki Stevens
Reviews.Content: Can't stop my grand-daughter from playing her games! And for me beats going to the library some of time. I'd recommend this device to all my family and friends. Thanks Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: My new Favorite travel companion
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: On a recent trip, my Kindle kept me entertained and occupied for the entire 4+ hour flight there and back.  I love it - it's much handier than my laptop & easier on my eyes than my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Easy reading
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Very nice weight. Easy to use. Like using it outside. Like the help feature with the girl in the picture.

Reviews.Title: great present
Reviews.Author: Arick Karpstein
Reviews.Content: Gave it to my wife as a present. She loves it and is learning how to use it. I have a kindle fire and asked if she wanted to trade; she laughed in my face.

Reviews.Title: Picked one up during the Valentines Day sale
Reviews.Author: S. Kosloske
Reviews.Content: It's a great tablet.  Great screen, good speakers, quick/responsive OS, integrates perfectly with my Kindle book collection, and us perfect to use as a magazine reader with the NextIssue app.My biggest concern was battery life.  This is my 3rd color Kindle (long story), and the battery life on the first 2 was, well, awful.  It seemed like I had to charge it every 2 days with light use.  So far, the battery life on my new HDX has been much improved, and I hope the battery holds out long term, I'd really like to keep this tablet for a while.  The screen size and resolution are perfect for videos and magazines, so I'm set for the near future, and it's roughly half the price of a comparable iPad.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase I made
Reviews.Author: Bette
Reviews.Content: Lot's of options to choose from - but so happy I got this one.  It does everything the IPAD does for a way better price  - and the online chat is great if you need it.  I take it everywhere!

Reviews.Title: 2013 STARING KINDLE
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Stearns
Reviews.Content: This is my best purchase of 2013 !!!! I like the sharp picture, great size ,and ease of use.  I believe "THIS IS THE BEST TABLET AVAILABLE"  This is Kindleistic,Cowabunga

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: pgball
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife and she is enjoying it. So far it is great. Had to call Mayday for the on-screen reading making everything slow.

Reviews.Title: Can't think of anything negative.
Reviews.Author: Alan D. Lee "fizzer"
Reviews.Content: I think Kindle has really hit a home run.  There simply isn't a better combination of specs available that I know of.  The picture is stunning.  But, it's the integration with Amazon Prime that leaves everything else in the dust.  I bought it mainly as a reader, but find myself watching video and movies almost as much.  Oh, and I forgot the great price.

Reviews.Title: It's great except...
Reviews.Author: Ralph Russo
Reviews.Content: I am having issues playing videos.  Even with the Experimental Video Player turned on, certain videos that I try to play using the video player don't work.  And once I can't play a video via the video player, I can never get the download option to come up.  And Flash Player is not allowed to be installed on this.  Why is Flash Player so picky about the devices it will work with (can't install on my Galaxy S3 either)?  Now I have not downloaded any video yet, so not sure if watching those typesOther than that, I love it.  The screen is a great size and the weight is perfect.  Did notice on some apps that some of the functions are a little sketchy.  Wondering if, since the Fire is a fairly new product on the market, the apps have not worked out all the kinks on its Fire version, but I assume that with updates most of these issues will be resolved.  I would highly recommend this tablet to people who are in the market for one.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Blackwolf
Reviews.Content: Sound is too low when using audiobook.  I have to attach to tv for better volume.  Cannot hear very well when in another room.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: john muldrow
Reviews.Content: Just got the kindle fire HDX working great now my lady likes it most of all for her Avon job.  Wil update you at a later date.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: B. Bertini "Sisterwolf"
Reviews.Content: Loved my Kindle fire but decide to purchase this new one but in a lager size.  Best decision I decision.
