I have not had to use the May Day button but might deicide to do just to see how it works.  Good Picture games are excellent on this device.  Reading is also no problem as expected.  Would recommend.  Device arrived on time and in new condition.  Amazon continues to outdo themselves.

Reviews.Title: Overall, pretty great
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle Fire HDX for a few weeks now and overall, I am happy with it. I am replacing an first generation iPad. The Kindle Fire is an improvement in terms of image and speed, as numerous people have pointed out already. I have had a couple of issues however. First, I have some difficulty retaining a quality wi-fi connection. This is escpecially problematic as I use it a lot to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime videos. This is annoying and likely due to my router, althgough this is a problem I didn't experience in the same way with the iPad. Second, and this is VERY minor, based on the wealth of information on Amazon, I was expecting the highly-touted Origami cover. If you read the fine print in the product specs, you plainly see that no cover is included. Again, not a big deal, but it seemed as though the cover was provided. I was able to get another one fairly quickly so problem solved. I just thought you should be aware that if you want a cover (and it's always a good idea), you will need to buy one separately.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Grams65
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the quality, clarity, and overall functionality of this tablet. I would give it a 10 out of 5. Anyone who sees the display of this tablet is blown away by the graphics, but the ease of use in combination with my Amazon Prime makes this table everything I need. The service with the mayday button (which I used once as I was not yet familiar with all the functions and where to find things) is something that should be standard with all high quality tablets, the service person who came on which I could visually see her and she could see me made it a personal experience and in a couple of minutes not only answered my question but walked me through the procedure. I can't say enough about my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Totally the best
Reviews.Author: Marna L Dunn
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is very easy to use and the screen quality is exceptional.  My husband has just a regular HD and wishes he had the HDX.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9:
Reviews.Author: Pam Bridges
Reviews.Content: This is the first Kindle that I have owned and I really love it.  Light weight and the picture is crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: Really Nice Tablet With The Obvious Limitation ....
Reviews.Author: KlondikeMatisse
Reviews.Content: the limitation being you are limited to the Amazon universe.  Although I found some other aps from different places work if you allow aps from other places in settings.  The tablet itself is amazing. Beatiful pictures, movies, great sound and fast processor.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Jeff Haugh
Reviews.Content: Excellent, thinner, and much faster than its HD predecessor.  I would recommend this tablet to anyone wanting a lightweight tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use.  Easy to navigate around. I would only change the ads at start up. Don't like that

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Adrian Romero
Reviews.Content: This is a great device. I would recommend it to anybody. You can read a book or watch a movie.

Reviews.Title: nice to have as a companion reader and wifi
Reviews.Author: David A. McBrier
Reviews.Content: I like it because of the picture and it is easier to carry then a pc. My wife has a kindle fire and I kept using it and she wanted hers back. This kindle is lighter with a bigger screen. I like the way the video plays for most of the internet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", HDX Display, Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Rader
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HDX 8.9". It is fast and efficient for downloading e-books from the library using Overdrive. The internet browser works well, and I was able to integrate my personal e-mail seamlessly. My only serious complaint is the lack of a user manual, or where to get it. It is a very complex little machine, and I've gotten my tips from my son, who has a smaller version of the same Kindle Fire HDX. But I would like an on-line manual available on the unit, to do small things like removing an icon from the display.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product.
Reviews.Author: E. Longstreath "grandma of 13"
Reviews.Content: My Kindle HDX 8.9  is my favorite device.  It goes everywhere with me.  Anything I can do on a laptop, I can accomplish on my kindle.

Reviews.Title: my new tablet
Reviews.Author: Klaus D. Kracht
Reviews.Content: very nice compact unit,easy to use, quick access.need to become more conversant with its use to comment further at a future date

Reviews.Title: NICE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Xin Liang
Reviews.Content: The delivery was so fast. This is a nice tablet especially because of the high definition of the screen. I'm really into it. However, it does not last as long as iPad Air in terms of the battery. Anyway, I'm still recommending it to you because overall it is still fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Reading a book?  This goes UP so many levels...
Reviews.Author: Michelangelo Jack
Reviews.Content: From the moment I recharged this amazingly slim e-tablet and switched iton, I was impressed with the brilliant colours and clarity of the screen.  Soeasy to Register, adjust the date/time zone and load up the Flightradar24program, up and running within a very short time.  Downloaded a book frommy computer main Kindle Library in seconds, no fuss and now reading abook just got that so much more exciting, all over again.  Thanks Amazon.From time of order, it was in my hands in New Zealand in three days.Now, I wonder why I cannot order the protection cover/case?  For some reasonAmazon will not ship to NZ?  What is that about?

Reviews.Title: From laptops and hard back books, to HDX!
Reviews.Author: buckIinTX
Reviews.Content: I was totally against owning a tablet until I used a friend's kindle. After that, I had to own one. The rest is history! Great investment.

Reviews.Title: Wow! What a Kindle
Reviews.Author: David J. Crosby
Reviews.Content: This thing is really something. I think I like this one better than my old keyboard kindle, which is still holding my 90 some books. it is without a doubt far better than my HD which did not perform that well on a cruise in Australia.  The video is incredible and the speed is up way there.  Well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: newmom15
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire is great. Light weight and bright screen! Battery holds charge and last long. Would definitely recommend it to others!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Diane M. Davis
Reviews.Content: Was exactly what I wanted and the price was well worth it, it opened a whole new world for me

Reviews.Title: purchased for my wife as a valentines present
Reviews.Author: Pistol Pete
Reviews.Content: it is registered in her name now.  She loves it.  Only problem is, she had games on my kindle firethat were keeping score in my name, and when she registered her new HDX she had to startall over again.

Reviews.Title: highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Lori Freer
Reviews.Content: Had two other tablets that had issues.  This is easy to use a perfect size and I love it.  I take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Kindle FIre 8.9
Reviews.Author: Karen Brandt
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire.  THis is the 6th kindle fire that I have purchased.  You could say I am Kindle POOR!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Tracie Thomas
Reviews.Content: The Kindle  Fire HDX 8.9 was a gift from my husband and I absolutely love it. It's easy to use and the screen resolution is amazing. It's great for viewing images and watching videos with my granddaughter. I had originally thought I wanted a Surface, but as a loyal Amazon customer the choice was actually an easy one. It's fast loading and I have no hesitation recommending the kindle fire to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Better than a laptop
Reviews.Author: Eric Humphrey
Reviews.Content: works great when your on the go if your waiting around just pull it out and I'm connected to the internet and start having fun or read something

Reviews.Title: love it love it love it
Reviews.Author: Peggy Bowen
Reviews.Content: still trying to figure some of the new features out. But so much faster and better than my other Kindle Fire.  What can I say I love Kindle Fire HDX and Amazon!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Much better than the Nook!
Reviews.Author: scrappin mom
Reviews.Content: I bought a Nook and had it about a week before I took it back and switched to the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. So much better! I love having the camera and love how easy to use it is. I also love being able to purchase Kindle books. I also purchased a case w/keyboard and use it for taking notes in my grad classes. Would definitely recommend this product. Loving my Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons
Reviews.Author: auntbea
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire hdx is as easy to use as the kindle fire but I miss the charging light. The on/off switch is in the wrong place unable to easily use it while it is a tablet cover.

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Rudy Tancredi
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle it is easy to use and fits well in my hands. I have also received great assitance from the help feature this isa graet device

Reviews.Title: fast
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this device for xmas for my wife and she loves it.  Fast processors, with great screen.  She loves it as is, but in my opinion there should be expansion port allowing the user to expand or swap storage.  Speakers should be forward firing.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Donoho
Reviews.Content: Already had a laptop which i love . But i absolutely love the convenience of a handheld tablet . With two kids aged 18 mos & 4 years it is so easy to carry my Kindle in my purse for mine or the 4 yr olds entertainment .

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindles!
Reviews.Author: Martha Oppel
Reviews.Content: I've had Kindles for years.  I keep upgrading.  I love this one.  It feels good in my hand and the screen is great!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product with a few misses
Reviews.Author: JasonM "JasonM"
Reviews.Content: First off, I do love this product and would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.Like many, I was at a crossroads between an iPad, Android, and Kindle. I chose this product based on its overall value and offering. The screen is incredible and the OS is smooth. The origami case is rugged and meets my needs perfectly. In addition to the features you would expect from a android based tablet, the experience is overhauled if you have an amazon prime membership. The ability to download and watch movies off wi-fi and borrow books is fantastic.Only con I can point out on this product is that although it does have an android based OS there are still many apps that are not available for download on the device that you would find in the google play store. I feel that is something that will hopefully change in the near future.If your're on the fence and intend to use this product for reading and/or have an amazon prime membership at all I would highly recommend it over any other device

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Dale deWolf
Reviews.Content: Very nice tablet with many great features. I Like it better than my Ipad.  Graphics are incredible and the ease of use makes this a keeper

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: fabio
Reviews.Content: It is the best tablet right now ont he market. I can appreciate many good things: sound, resolution of the screen, powerful processor, mayday button, battery life, front facing camera, rear facing camera.The customer's  service is the best of the world.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade
Reviews.Author: James Bennett "Second star to the right, and ...
Reviews.Content: I just got this a few days ago, and we already love it. I had bought my wife a Kindle Fire 7" when they came out, and we liked that one as well, and still use it. This one is nice because it adds so much to the tablet. The camera feature is what we like the most so far. My boys like it because of the size and the games. They play different versions of Angry Birds on it, mostly Star Wars Angry Birds II. The processor is a lot faster as well, which is great for streaming videos on Netflix and Amazon Prime.**Update** We've had it now for 2 months and still love it. My wife was jealous because I had this one and she still had the first generation 7". Well now she can have her own as we bought another HDX 8.9", and we will let our oldest boy have the old one. I just can't say about these Kindles, Amazon really did a great job with them, and the customer service with them is great, whether it is the "mayday" service or talking to someone on the phone. I have not had a rude conversation with any Amazon rep since I started shopping here in 2004, they have always been really helpful.

Reviews.Title: Tablet with books, what else do you need
Reviews.Author: atkraj
Reviews.Content: Everything I was hoping it would be. Light weight, slim and great visual. Bigger screen to work with and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Cameron Mebane
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend bought me the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 as an early Valentine's Day present. I use it all the time. I read and play games and watch my favorite shows. The screen is so bright and clear. Reading on it doesn't bother my eyes and movies and shows look amazing.

Reviews.Title: Recently purchased & love it!
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Kinn
Reviews.Content: I've had an iPad, had a Samsung tablet. Wasn't impressed for some reason. So, so much money and the picture was blurry and the camera was lacking. BUT THIS IS A DIFFERENT STORY. The camera kicks butt and the screen quality takes names!!!  The device itself is super thin & light. The battery is outstanding. My son & I take turns on it, and the battery lasts all day. Kid's free time is genius!! I would like a better selection of cases, but IT IS new, so I don't expect much to be available just yet. BEST TABLET FOR YOUR MONEY. Definitely. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: This is my2nd Kindle. The best. great disply very good battery life. Perfect size.
Reviews.Author: CARL
Reviews.Content: PERFECT SIZE. Battery life is very good, much better than our I pad.Wassup. Easy to use as a e reader.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Hardware. Wish...
Reviews.Author: Roberto Fonseca
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is an excellent tablet. No doubt. FireOS 3.1 is also very polished OS. When tying it onto the Prime membership, it makes it a winning combination. There are a few reasons why I can't give 5 stars to this Kindle:1. No Google integration - Yes, I know what everyone else will say. If you really want that you should've bought either Google hardware or go with Samsung, etc. Sure, you're right. But no, that doesn't mean Google integration should not be part of the package. What happened if Google decided not to support any Amazon app (and just removed them all from Play store)? I wish Amazon would just allow Google apps in and let the market decide who they want to go with. Again, this hardware is just plain beautiful.2. Problem with speakers - Within the first few weeks I had a problem with speakers where they just stopped working.After reaching out to Mayday (awesome service, Amazon!) the service person suggested that I would insert/remove headphone jack and see if that would fix the issue. It did immediately. The person went on to say that it was a known issue and product development was working on it. I just wish there was some communication/fix on the issue already.Overall this is a great device. I am still enjoying it very much and look forward to updates to the ecosystem. I hope Amazon continues developing both software and hardware.

Reviews.Title: Stunning pics! Gotta have more Apps!!!
Reviews.Author: Gilda M. Kantey
Reviews.Content: Love it. Pics are amazing. Need more apps and compatibility with other systems. I do love it though and would recommend but with the app and compatibility caveat.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love IT
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, especially for kids with all the controls that are available.  Love mine and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Mail Program
Reviews.Author: James Cohen, D.D.S.
Reviews.Content: The unit is outstanding in all ways except for the email app provided. There is no mass delete selection that I can find and I spent time with Mayday and he couldn't find it either. Together we downloaded another mail app that wasn't as nice and didn't work as well but did have mass delete. I removed it from my device. The mail program app on my old Firefox was idea. Take a look at it and improve the new device's mail program. Thanks,

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: M. Chamberlain "Maggiemay"
Reviews.Content: I like the excellent colors and clarity of the screen.  The MAYDAY feature is the BEST!  It is nice not to have to worry about 'business hours' when you have a challenge

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with my new kindle. There's something of a learning curve though so I am moving rather slowly.
Reviews.Author: Dusty Mike
Reviews.Content: I purchased the device as an upgrade to my Kindle DX. I am delighted with it. Learning to work with the cloud and downloading to the device so I can untether from the internet for a few hours is something new for me. I have subscribed to several magazines, three of which seem too fine a print display to suit my old and tired eyes. That said, I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire hdx 8.9
Reviews.Author: F. Sousa "flamali"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my husband, an e-reader fanatic! However everybody enjoys by  watching movies anywhere and using skype.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: John Holiman
Reviews.Content: Upgraded my wife's Kindle to the new HDX. (I'm next) Beautiful display, with photos and video. Our whole family uses Kindles for work and play. The best on the market and backed up by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mel H.
Reviews.Content: I find this easy to use and find I can read almost anywhere. I went with the 64GB as I check 4 separate e-mails and it does so flawlessly when I activate WIFI. I like it so much I am thinking of getting my wife one

Reviews.Title: Great For Reading and More !
Reviews.Author: Ray Williams
Reviews.Content: I expected my HDX 8.9 to be a bit larger.  Otherwise it's a great product, easy to use and great for reading. Great battery life and the Mayday feature works great.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Angela Ruest "Half-Pint"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely LOVE this Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" tablet. It is a wonderful and portable tool to have. I recently took it with me to Florida and it handled everything I could possibly want to do. I also bought a smaller version for my daughter and one for my husband. This is an OUTSTANDING item.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.
Reviews.Author: Barbara Parks
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I have had every 7" Kindle that has come out. So I really like the larger 8.9" screen.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: S jones
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle HDX 8.9,Wi-Fi,64 GB, the best purchase I have made.I love  the size ,I am still learning how to do everything

Reviews.Title: Great Device with some Flaws
Reviews.Author: Mickey
Reviews.Content: I would love to give the Kindle HDX a 5 star rating but until they open up the device up to full Android I cannot.  There are certain apps like NBC Live Extra that should be available in the app store but are not.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I have had the kindle for two months now and I absolutely love it I can watch videos, listen to music, play games, read books and many other things pretty much anytime I have some free time.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Kindle Fire Tablet
Reviews.Author: What`s Up With This?
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything you need and is even faster.  This is lighter than other tablets and it is sturdy and durable

Reviews.Title: Amazing price for so much.
Reviews.Author: CInzia
Reviews.Content: For the price the quality is amazing! I watch all my programs and carry tons of books and photos.  Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Francis R. Kwiatkowski "Mist-turi"
Reviews.Content: I had the original Fire and was quite happy with it, but this is a huge step up. Only a month and I wonder how I ever lived without it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rowanslife
Reviews.Content: It is so easy to use, clear to read, does everything I want and the help button is awesome. I have used it a couple of times and the customer service reps who "pop up" on my Fire have all been amazing, knowledgeable and easily took over my screen and showed me what to do, just like Kindle claims it will!  Not being a "techie" it is worth it just for that!  Hours of frustration have been eliminated.And the built in camera takes great pictures.  I synced it with my phone and computer and to my surprise my picture albums magically showed up on the Kindle.I also love its intuitiveness in suggesting items for me in the various areas I usually shop.  It has been very helpful and saves me time in just blindly researching for something. So far it has done a good job with its suggestions.Since I got the one which includes special offers I will admit I worried it would become a problem but it isn't.  They are there but they really are not all that intrusive. I also only got Wi-Fi since I do not travel, am retired and rarely have it someplace that does not offer free Wi-Fi these days so really had no need for one with a data package.  I got the best buy I could possibly have gotten on the budget I had. I do not regret it at all.I feel like a kid in a candy store.  Would HIGHLY recommend the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" in any of its versions and if you have a budget like mine but want the best out there, the Wi-Fi 16GB with special offers really fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: My favorite of my three Kindles...
Reviews.Author: Old Santa Lover
Reviews.Content: My first two Kindles were gifts and I've enjoyed each of them; I play games on my first one and read a LOT on my Paperwhite.  I'd been looking at the 'Fire for months to use as a tablet to do more on, and, a good friend gave me gift cards for Christmas; I decided the gifts were a good "sign" that I should make my purchase.  My 'Fire came on time and was well-packaged and is easy for me to use.  Not being very technically (sp?) oriented, I was a little concerned I wouldn't know how to use it.  So far, I've figured things out as a I go and I'm doing really well (for me) and use it every day.  I've not, yet, had to use the help feature but know it's there if/when I need it.  The bright colors and large viewing area are wonderful.  I would like for it to hold a charge longer than it does but hope Amazon is working on that issue.  I would recommend it for anyone who wants a, relatively, tether free tablet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, fast with beautiful display
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I gave the Kindle Fire HDX 4 stars because of not having access to Google Play Store for even more apps. The "plus" is you are allowed to install apps from 3rd parties via a selection in the setting menu. I sometimes have the need to remote in to our servers at work using RDP. I can do that with the Kindle Fire HDX. I tried several RDP apps available through Amazon and the results weren't satisfactory. I got an app from a 3rd party and now I seamlessly access the servers I need to get to and can even access my workstation desktop. I added a bluetooth keyboard and am very happy with my choice of the Kindle. Great video and graphics. As an e-book reader? Perfect!

Reviews.Title: Never Pristine condition.
Reviews.Author: me
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle amazon has ever made.  It looks beautiful in the box.  No wear and tear.  Only open use but had bad luck getting to work.  Since it is the best that amazon has ever made I bought it with confidence.  They sure made it sound really like something every one would love.  Guess it was a big mistake to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Linda Lou Neff
Reviews.Content: Very user friendly.  Have had to use help once or twice and it has been a very good experience.  Recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Had a nook, love this one so much more.. Easy to read and just better all the way around. So glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. Gartz "Padigar"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for myself for Christmas and so far have enjoyed learning what all it offers. Once my husband saw how easy it is to maneuver through it, he’s ready to buy one for himself. Love all the deals Amazon offers for Kindle owners.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX - GREAT
Reviews.Author: Betty Furgele
Reviews.Content: Made a mistake - was rating the armorsuit for the kindle fire instead of the kindle fire.  But anyhow I love the Kindle Fire HDX and would recommend it to anyone.  Picture is beautiful, sound great, light weight.  Lighter than the 7" ipad.  Wish now I had gotten the one with the ability to sync to your internet provider.

Reviews.Title: Use it every day.  Love it.
Reviews.Author: Hilary B. Wagner "Hilary"
Reviews.Content: I also have an IPAD and an IPAD mini.  It's about the same size as the IPAD and weighs much less.  The display is the same and it has flash.  What's not to love.  Also, the battery lasts longer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Georgeen M. Ibarra
Reviews.Content: My second kindle and I love it. Great display, easy to read, quick to recharge and so light.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Wendy S Leishman
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this so my husband could get into this century and learn to use a touchscreen! But now I find myself getting the Kindle whenever I want to look something up online instead of using my laptop. It's the perfect size, not too big not too small. It's fast and responsive. I only locked it up once and it was the game not the unit.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Steven D Spatz
Reviews.Content: Beautiful colors, clear images, very fast processor...This is much better than my IPAD-2 in every way.  I will be traveling with my Kindle Fire instead of my IPAD this year.

Reviews.Title: Fire away
Reviews.Author: Joan Duclow
Reviews.Content: Priced right and far more useful than I expected. I have no problem telling my friends to skip the pricey "big brand" and by a Kindle Fire HDX

Reviews.Title: excellent tab
Reviews.Author: scott d poort
Reviews.Content: Screen res. Fast.ease of use.the only reason not 5 stars is not used to amazon app store.very very good.whats next

Reviews.Title: great. product
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: Very easy to figure out even for the technologically impaired. Crisp picture. Good battery life. Mayday feature is very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX is Hot!!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth V. Jack "Ken Jack"
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet or portable device, but my wife has an iPad4.  I found the iPad4 overpriced for my needs and it is heavy compared to the Fire HDX 8.9" tablet.  As most rave about in these reviews, I agree the screen display is superior on the HDX and it is faster.  I suppose there are users that can actually use many of the missing apps that the iPad offers but I can't.I trust Amazon to enhance the Fire HDX as time goes on.  The Flash player or something equivalent would be a great addition.For me, a portable device, like a tablet, will never replace a "real" computer.  I chose the Fire HDX because I'm a big reader of eBooks and I think Amazon has the edge on Apple with regard to the number and price of their eBooks.I have had my HDX for two months and have no complaints;  I recommend this device without reservations.TBlue Moon over Cuba: Aerial Reconnaissance during the Cuban Missile Crisis (General Aviation)

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: LINDA HOUGHOTN
Reviews.Content: I am so in love with my Kindle Fire HDX.  I watch movies, read books,browse the web, and much more.  The color is so vibrent and everything is crystal clear.  The size of the screen is great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Donna Peter "areader"
Reviews.Content: Due to unable to install "flash" there are alot of apps, games, and websites unavailable to me. The original kindle fire had on demand flash which worked very well. Had I known that the Kindle HDX 8.9 was not compatible with flash I would have purchased another brand and of tablet.

Reviews.Title: Grandmother loves kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Gifford
Reviews.Content: It's easy to share books with friends and grandchildren. Also the games are fun to play.  Also like the self published books

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Humanstreet
Reviews.Content: The screen display is gorgeous and it is so easy to use...I am on it daily for almost everything I do..as far as photographic display, you can easily impress  your friends...just take a look at a picture on Kindle...you'll never go back! Since I am retired I don't use the internet as much as I did, but with Kindle I easily access the internet...every site looks great!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: lily
Reviews.Content: I have the kindle hd 8.9 and love it so I decided to order the hdx 8.9 and am very happy with it.  The quality is fantastic, the screen is just beautiful the sound is great and the ease of use is fantastic.  Very happy with it so far.  Am enjoying learning about it.  Haven't used the mayday yet but just knowing that it is available if I need it is very reassuring!  Took advantage of the lower price, don't think I would have ordered it at the full price.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: PIC'S
Reviews.Author: Bev Brindle
Reviews.Content: It has wonderful pic's.Very vibrant and great color. Love the camera .Great features.Love how easy it is to share things

Reviews.Title: Love it! With one exception...
Reviews.Author: Emma R.
Reviews.Content: Totally addicted! Would not want to be without it. That said, very disappointed in the Mayday button. There is quite a delay when talking and they cannot seem to hear you clearly. The explanation given is "I must be too far away from my router" - no so. I sit right next to it! Have not had one issue resolved this way. When my husband wanted his own Kindle, we did NOT buy one with this feature and are just as pleased with his. Think some serious work needs to be done on this feature. It does NOT work like the television commercial shows!

Reviews.Title: Very intuitive to use and great graphics.
Reviews.Author: Luis Perna
Reviews.Content: This is the first tablet I have ever owned and I am extremely pleased with the ease of use. Having used only computer desktops/mini laptops and laptops I was surprised with the intuitiveness of the tablet, the graphics are extremely vibrant in color and detail.

Reviews.Title: the greatest tablet!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ilya
Reviews.Content: The great one, great speakers, great CPU, great camera, great all in this!!!! A lot of apps on it now on Amazon! Real cool screen!!

Reviews.Title: Kindlefire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Bettie Rozell
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the  KF HDX 8.9 very much.  The guide by Edward Jones has a lot to be desired and thus is difficult to understand.  He is not the best writer.  However, I have enjoyed the Mayday button and all the techs have been extremely helpful, probably would have sent it back if it had not had this feature.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 is Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. I'd been using an ASUS tablet with a Kindle app. With the Kindle Fire, I can enjoy  Amazon Prime movies and also check out one free book per month from the Kindle library. The Mayday feature is real nice and came in handy the first day I had the Kindle.All of the books that I had on my ASUS showed up on my new Kindle. My only criticism is that the unit could have come with a better user guide to get started. You basically get a card that shows you the layout of the buttons and camera. With a little bit better user guide, I would have rated it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I wanted to spend the extra bucks after getting my first Kindle HD but now having done so, it's well worth it.  Only thing I'd like now is aslightly bigger screen...

Reviews.Title: Great Machine - Super Upgrade!
Reviews.Author: TV Man
Reviews.Content: Great machine!  -- light weight with an amazing resolution.  The size is perfect for reading books.  It has amazing sound for a tablet.  Luckily, it does allow some apps that are available in the Android market but not in the Amazon App Store.  But, you have to work a little to get them installed.  Most of the apps that I wanted are in the Amazon Store.It is a great improvement over the original Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Ken Picketts
Reviews.Content: I think it's a good device it took me a little while to figure it out but the customer service helped me out there response time was instant

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Casey Carlton
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new tablet, and continue to find new things to do with it.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Wow, super fast shipping! :)
Reviews.Author: monica harris
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the overall handling of this product, it was shipped fast and it is a wonderful device. I am sure that my husband is going to enjoy this for Valentines Day! <3

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Rosewicks
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture, speed and sound.  I like the larger size and it's still lightweight.  Much improved over my older model Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Brenda Mason
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love my Kindle Fire!! Has become my new best friend - I can use for work and for leisure!!

Reviews.Title: Love it, Love it, Love it.
Reviews.Author: J. Taylor "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I didn't think I would like to read on anything like this, but was very pleasantly surprised. The print is large enough to see clearly, and the lighting is very nice. The picture while watching a video is excellent, and the sound isn't bad either. I just wish I could upload a video that I took with it to my computer, there may be a way but I haven't found it yet.

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: mary villella
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  Never disappointed. It live up to my expectations.. highly recommend it to anyone who is think I g of buying an iPad.  And kindle are very supportive.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Blessed mom
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and navigate through. Great way to bring your children close to view games, documentaries, and fun stuff. They cozy right up beside you!!

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I am just learning all the things I can do on my new Kindle Fire HDX.  Have lot more to learn, but I am mastering "one thing at a time", Thanks to the "help" button.

Reviews.Title: fire on fire
Reviews.Author: Charles Missler
Reviews.Content: The kindle fire is light, extremely intuitive and has a great picture for videos. I had to use the help button on a Sunday morning and got a friendly knowledgeable person on my screen almost instantly. She was able to teach me how to do what I wanted to do in under a minute.

Reviews.Title: Because I liked my Kindle
Reviews.Author: sally cygan
Reviews.Content: I brought the Kindle Fire HD X because I all ready had a Kindle  and I wanted to be able to do more and play more games with it.

Reviews.Title: kindle 8.9 HDX
Reviews.Author: mysterybuff
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the versatility of the Kindle 8.9 HDX.  We use it for news, reading,  games, weather and for email.  Games graphics are really clear.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX - PROBLEM WITH LOADING BOOKS
Reviews.Author: JACK BOGLE
Reviews.Content: Sometimes, my books do not load.  I've asked the MAYDAY people to correct it several times.  Other than that, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE MY NEW KINDLE!!!!
Reviews.Author: T.A.P.
Reviews.Content: I had the Fire HDX 7 which I thought was great but heck this is even better! I love that it is bigger, it could be even bigger as far as I am concerned! Having vision problems the bigger the better for me! I love the fact I can take pics and video with it and they come out GRRRRRRRRRREAT!!! One more thing I wish I could get Google apps... The 2 should get together for us the consumers!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth S. Nahom
Reviews.Content: I had the smaller version and upgraded for the holidays. The sound is wonderful along with the picture. The only downside to this is reading a book outside. Sigh! Other than that it's  perfect.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: C. Downs
Reviews.Content: This is the 6th Kindle I've bought and I love it. Each time I upgrade, I give my old one to someone in my family. My previous Kindle Fire I gave to my Uncle and he's constantly thanking me. He doesn't take his Bible to church anymore, he takes his KINDLE!

Reviews.Title: Kindle tablet
Reviews.Author: jnorthern
Reviews.Content: This tablet was everything I expected it to be. I am well pleased with the performance and reliability of your product. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: awesome device..
Reviews.Author: Murthy S. Puvvada
Reviews.Content: pros:- lightweight (i take this everywhere)- fast- amazing surround sound (compared to the crappy ipad sound)- prime video capablecons- OS/ ecosystem (planning to load stock kitkat and try out for some time)- batteryrecommend to anyone on Amazon prime..

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Justina Dismang
Reviews.Content: Great pic on screen. Crystal clear. It's fast and easy to use. Lightweight and easy to hold. Loved it so much I bought my husband one three days later!

Reviews.Title: Worththe $$$!
Reviews.Author: Lacey Barone
Reviews.Content: I like my tablet because I can download games and shows quickly. It also has many educational aspects. I would recommend this tablet to others because it a fun and easy tablet that is affordable!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: Still getting use to my new Kindle Fire but so far so good.  I love this Kindle Fire.  I would order this again.

Reviews.Title: great gift. big hit.
Reviews.Author: Paula R.
Reviews.Content: MY GRANDSON LOVED THIS. HASN'T PUT IT DOWN SINCE CHRISTMAS.I'M THE BEST GRANDMA. HE'S READING MORE NOW AND LOVES THE GAMES.

Reviews.Title: The new Kindle Fire is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Robin R.
Reviews.Content: The new Kindle Fire is amazing! It is much lighter than I thought it would be, and the display is simply fabulous. I have never seen such a sharp picture on ANY tablet. It is also very user friendly. I have only had mine since Christmas and am still learning to use it, but I really love my new Kindle! I am still amazed with all its features and capabilities; AMAZON, you have a real winner with this one!!!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Lesley
Reviews.Content: I really do love my kindle but I do wish I could print from it (other than my email) and I wish I was able to play my zumba videos. A lot of downloads consider the kindle as a mobile device and don't allow you to view there sites or videos. But it is very handy and very smart.  I use it a lot for recipes and learning its capabilities more so everyday.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful detail!
Reviews.Author: Diana Quinn
Reviews.Content: Thanks for offering a payment plan, that's the only way I was able to get this. I have two older android tablets that I eventually stopped using because of the need for a stylus. This Kindle Fire is so awesome, the view of my pictures is alone, almost worth the price of admission. My finger just glides through every screen, I finally understand the allure of a tablet. I subtracted one star for everyone's favorite complaint and that is the wish that Amazon figure out a way to work with Google Playstore. Even though I have found some nice apps and even a few android apps, I still want to share all my data with my phone and it's accounts.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This new version is a very lightweight device and my grandkids just love to watch their favorite videos on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX rating
Reviews.Author: Patty Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I don't like that I cant get adobe flash player and it limits some things I can do on my Kindle. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" 2013 Edition by Sheila P.
Reviews.Author: Sheila D. Pendergraph
Reviews.Content: I gave this tablet a 5 stars because it's a great tablet and so easy to use once you get the hang of it. Everything is right at your fingertips and does many multiy tasking and the small size comes in handy and fits right in your purse. I got one for Christmas and haven't been able to put it down yet! I like the Kindle better than my PC and would highly recommend this to everyone and the price is right!!

Reviews.Title: Have wanted one
Reviews.Author: Jerry Hagan
Reviews.Content: I wanted the Kindle to take with me for reading books.  Have used several times so far  It is a little small for navigating some of the other areas though.  May be my eyesight or big fingers.  Haven't used all thefeatures yet, but I am satisfied with the main purpose of reading books.

Reviews.Title: BEST KINDLE YET !!!!
Reviews.Author: rkhhenry
Reviews.Content: There is nothing bad that can be said about this kindle, absolutely the best one yet. the commercials are spot on. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Christy Fisher
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this kindle. I compared it to the iPad and since I had previously owned a kindle fire and loved it I thought this was a better fit for me and I love it. It is so light and portable and the graphics are awesome!! I would recommend one of these to anyone.

Reviews.Title: I really like my Kindle Fire HDX.
Reviews.Author: Henrietta Jones-Nicholas
Reviews.Content: This tablet is really great for all my requirements and enjoyment.  It is easy to use.  My grandchildren use it all the time, basically, to play games.  Really great for the cost!!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: P. Defrange "okie"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle and was my Christmas present this year.  The picture is great and the internet is fast.  I got the one that also can use 4G but have not hooked that up yet.  The wi-fi, however, works great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Diaz
Reviews.Content: Wow, the Kindle Fire HDX is super fast, great browising speeds, great brillance of the screen, easy navigating and all those apps from audiobooks to Amazon Prime instant viewing. The Kindle was for my jr. high kids who need more access to the internet for school. They are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: A gift I will always treasure
Reviews.Author: Carol B
Reviews.Content: With the online help you can't make a mistake.  The help is very knowledgeable and it is a pleasure to deal with them.  Courteous and efficient.  Once you get the help, the Kindle is relatively easy to operate.  Even if you are not computer savvy you cannot go wrong with this Kindle.  The help option takes all the stress out of using this Kindle. There is not words enough to describe the pleasure of using this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: J. Monahan
Reviews.Content: This is my first hand-held electronic device so I have nothing to compare it with.  It was a Christmas present and I love it.  It does morethan I ever thought it would and never ceases to amaze me.  I am still learning how to use it, but have no complaints so far.  Would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Long Battery Life
Reviews.Author: T. O. MaMairdon
Reviews.Content: I received the kindle fire right away in the mail.  After charging it, we started watching TV Shows & Movies on Amazon prime.  The picture was great and it was easy to get used to the user interface (I already own a iPad and a GS3 phone)

Reviews.Author: Guillermo Olivares
Reviews.Content: Does everything I expected to do for my children.  It is fast, it looks great undes any circumstances and my kids enjoy it

Reviews.Title: Useful and practical
Reviews.Author: P. Hulsey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Clear picture. Light weight for reading. Amazon book suggestions and free books. Enlarging icons good for old eyes

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Brandi Wood
Reviews.Content: It is a great Kindle, but I did return it because I like the size of the 7", so I exchanged it for the newest HD! I use my Kindle more for reading vs as a computer or TV.The clarity was fantastic, camera's were awesome, speed incredible! Price, perfect!!

Reviews.Title: Received Timely and in Great Shape
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: My husband can't put down his Kindle.  He loves it.  It is a great product for avid readers.  Thank you,

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: mike clark
Reviews.Content: Works great but email is too hard to set up by a dummy like me. 5more words are too many.

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it, love it.
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle.  They just keep getting better.  If you don't have the tablet habit yet here is where to start!

Reviews.Title: It's a Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Mr. Marcus
Reviews.Content: I've been using the Kindle Fire from it's inception.  It's THE e-reader/tablet of choice for me (and my youngest).  I've got four (4) so far and none disappoint.  Good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's GREAT!
Reviews.Author: Rosalind K. Campbell
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a NOOK...the Kindle is easy to use and great fun with tons of options.  The user manual is very user friendly...I haven't even had to use the 'panic' button yet.  I will recommend it to all my friends.  It does it all!!!

Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire!!!!
Reviews.Author: Juanita McIntosh
Reviews.Content: A lot of my family have and have raved about their Kindle Fire so I treated myself to one! Love it! The only thing is I am not tech savvy and wish it had more explicit tutorials on it, but then I went online and found all the explanations I needed!! Very well worth the money I paid for it and Love the fact that my grandchildren can have their own "app" on here so I can limit the time spent on games, etc....

Reviews.Title: KIndle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: We have a total of 5 Kindles, and this one is by far the best yet. My wife uses it, and it has replaced a Kindle Fire. She loves her gadgets, and has really taken to this new one.

Reviews.Title: 1st Tablet
Reviews.Author: Preston
Reviews.Content: As I had never used a tablet, I was intimidated by the thought of learning this new technology.  The May day feature was a big selling point. However, the Fire HAD was so user friendly I haven't had need to use it as much as often as I had imagined.  It is still comforting to know that I can access help instantly. PRESTON

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Victoria Velasco
Reviews.Content: I love it! I use it everyday for school to study and store my notes. It comes in handy when I do not want to use my laptop.

Reviews.Title: its a ok tablet
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jones
Reviews.Content: Still trying to get use to the tablet haven't rely used its full potential. Have had a couple of stuck moments with the kindle which required a hard reboot. But still trying it out

Reviews.Title: A definitely must-have!
Reviews.Author: Cat Fox
Reviews.Content: I LOVE it! I had the opportunity to use Mayday (learning curve regarding the dual-facing camera) and it was amazing. Thank you Amazon! This device is a winner!

Reviews.Title: This product is very easy to navigate.
Reviews.Author: D. Winkler
Reviews.Content: I see that the Kindle Fire HDX is cheaper than when  purchased it last month. Is there anyway I can get my purchase revised to reflect this savings? I would really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Glacia Parkins
Reviews.Content: I love that I have everything I want in this compact little screen and is so visually clear and the color is phenominal. Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: Michael Blanchard
Reviews.Content: This thing does everything I wanted it to do. Very powerful, quick, and the graphics are awesome. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: HobbyHorse
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love it... Far surpasses anything on the market. This is my 4th and they just keep getting better..

Reviews.Title: Great !
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Turek
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Easy to use and priced right.It has been a pleasure to do business with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Tery
Reviews.Content: I've had a Kindle Fire for 2 years and will still continue to use it.  But the Kindle Fired HDX 8.9 is so clear, easy to use and hours of fun.  The books and apps are so easy to download.  I am loving it.

Reviews.Title: So clear, so much faster
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "not too old to rock."
Reviews.Content: I love my fire!  I use it everyday and it is so much nicer than my old kindle or my old nook..  The picture is great, the sound is much improved.  the only thing I don't like is there is no Charging light.  I take mine to bed and use the alarm to wake up to.  It is fast, light and just perfect size for reading or surfing the web.

Reviews.Title: Great looking screen, Faster processor, and 3rd version is a charm
Reviews.Author: A. Wells
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how light it was. The speed bump you get from the first generation fire is huge.Amazon have stepped their game up

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade in the Kindle family
Reviews.Author: Rick A. Coscarelli
Reviews.Content: This is really a major upgrade to the Kindle line of tablets.  We have the Kindle HDX 8.9 and wait until you use their "MayDay" help function, wow!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Nikki Crady
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX!! It's so compact and easy to use. I don't have to use my laptop for everything I do on the internet anymore.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kim from Iowa
Reviews.Content: I have been debating for well over a year what type of tablet to upgrade to and I am really glad I waited until the Kindle fire HDX came out. It is the best purchase I have made in a long time. Would highly recommend it to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: LAC
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" I had the Kindle Fire 7" and loved that too! Now my husband has that since I got the new one. I use it all the time and take everywhere with me. It is great to show pictures, watch video, play games or just read.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Alvin J. Rich
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box, when I turned on my Kindle Fire HDX, 8.9" I was amazed at the vivid colors and the performance of this tablet.It is everything that I had hoped for and much more.A. Rich  1/31/14

Reviews.Title: Best tablet out there!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Monette
Reviews.Content: The picture is possibly the clearest out of any other tablet out there. I get better picture with this than my HD TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gladys Choyke
Reviews.Content: I really should have rated this Kindle Fire about 41/2 stars.  It is easy to use and love the display.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Slagle
Reviews.Content: I got my new Kindle.  Had an older one and was expecting to have ti download everything from the Cloud.  I turned it on the first time and everything was right there.  Have really enjoyed the HD and larger size.  The weight is very manageable, even with a protective case.

Reviews.Title: Love the NEW Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: M. Liebergot
Reviews.Content: This is now my 3rd Kindle Fire.I had originally owned the "7" original and 2nd generation Kindle Fire's.I decided that I wanted to upgrade to the larger screen so I purchased the latest 32GB "8.9" Kindle Fire HDX.While I do love the larger screen size, I have to also say that I was rather impressed at how much thinner the new Kindle Fire HDX was.  And the screen resolution is phenomenal.While some have complained that they can't run non-Kindle Fire apps on it. I have found the opposite, as there are several sites out there that let you load other Android apps and browsers on it, without the need to jail break your unit. As a result I use my Kindle Fire HDX for what it does best, such as watch movies, and listen to music, as well as do work on it as well using office apps and the like.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet at a Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my kindle fire HDX 8.9. The size is perfect (I'm not a big fan of smaller tablets) and the touch screen is just as responsive as that of an iPad. Although there is a smaller pool of apps to choose from, this is made up for by the capabilities it has regarding purchasing and reading books/magazines (which is what kindles were made for in the first place!). It is especially ideal for the college student who doesn't want to buy huge expensive textbooks to carry around. If you are looking for a tablet to replace your printed books/magazines and that has all the capabilities of an iPad for a great price, I would definitely recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it.
Reviews.Author: Terry Brooks fan
Reviews.Content: I had been borrowing my husband,s IPad and I have the Kindle DX with the keyboard at the bottom. My Kindle started doing some crazy things, rebooting itself when I was reading a book, refusing to go online when I wanted to access the store, so I thought it was time for an upgrade.  I first considered the Kindle Fire because I already had a Kindle but after the commercial on TV, I had to have one.  Best decision I made.  Easy to use, beautiful screen quality.  I didn't even know it works the same as any tablet so researching things online has been great.

Reviews.Title: i love it!
Reviews.Author: wolfmoon
Reviews.Content: Was the best Christmas gift. My daughter was glad I got the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 too, because she got my Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Ronda
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"  I had the original Kindle Fire and thought it was great.  But this Kindle Fire HDX has far exceeded my expectations.  And my Grandson is loving my old Kindle because it is still working great!!  I highly recommend this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Right choice
Reviews.Author: Janet Pace
Reviews.Content: I have only had the new Kindle for a week, and I am impressed with it so far. I was afraid that the web browser would not work very well, but it has worked great. I took it to my local public library and they helped me get set up to download books and audio books. I have done both and I am happy with the experience. It is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Fire Feb 2014
Reviews.Author: Maurice
Reviews.Content: Good machine significant advance on my previous Kindle.Only deficiency I have found is I dont like the positioning of the power switch. Put the machine in a case by you, hard to get to the power switch.

Reviews.Title: Great hardware, not a bad software
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this a week ago. After debating between I pad mini and kindle HDX  I decided to go with kindle fire . I had an iPad 3 in the past.So far I love the hardware it's not laggy at all. Software needs little more improvement . Amazon's ecosystem is better than iTunes. Battery life is very good I can go 1 week without charging. Improvement in multitasking much desired.

Reviews.Title: i really love this tablet its easy to use, easy to find information, able to put into my purse.  its just a wonderful device
Reviews.Author: Sandra Davis
Reviews.Content: I thought I would miss having a iPad, but I don't.  Get the same benefits a a much chew privy.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: John Eberle
Reviews.Content: does everything I want with a fast and clear screen...prefer using it if I can beat wife and daughter home to get my hands on it first.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars for the Kindle HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Dave Traill "twopar3s"
Reviews.Content: Mine is an upgrade from the original Kindle Fire and I couldn't be happier.  The color and clarity are great, easy to navigate.  When needed the "Mayday" feature is great.

Reviews.Title: addictive
Reviews.Author: MagicMadge
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It is replacing my Nook for night time reading and I am saving a lot by not buying new batteries. With all the things that can be done, I'm spending way too much time on it.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Judy W
Reviews.Content: Love love love love this!!!! I highly recommend this Kindle Fire HDX!!!!  Works like a dream I never leave it at home.

Reviews.Title: For all age groups
Reviews.Author: Hotti Dotti
Reviews.Content: Purchase the item for my 71 year old mother and she loves it. She can't stop talking about it she plays her music games

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN I HOPED FOR
Reviews.Author: Hermann Weidemann
Reviews.Content: Functioning well, good thought out, many possibilities and nevertheless a quite excellent bookreader. I can hope for many will enjoy this product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Susan McCrary
Reviews.Content: Excellent product that exceeds my expectations and competes well against the the iPad and other tablets.  A very pleasant surprise!

Reviews.Title: Wow a great picture
Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: What a surprise I got for Christmas when I received my kindle fire HDX 8.9. It has the most amazing picture and sound.I am not tech savvy but so easy to use.Love getting books and music.

Reviews.Title: Better than I pad air
Reviews.Author: c white
Reviews.Content: Absolutly love it Better than I pad  also have fire hd 8.9. The newcamera on back really makes this one complete

Reviews.Title: Fun Tablet
Reviews.Author: Terry Leishman
Reviews.Content: We have never had a tablet so aren't sure how to rate but we love it.  It is fun and seems easy to use.  It's very light and easy to read.  We love to use it for scriptures and LDS books and the Mormon Channel.  I would recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: no flash player
Reviews.Author: burgs6
Reviews.Content: I received as a gift. I really love it. It's simple and very user friendly. Why not give it 5? No flash player. Adobe does not work and it limits the websites you can use. If they fixed that problem it would be a lot better. I haven't found a solution that works for me. But it's great other than that.

Reviews.Title: Spectacular
Reviews.Author: TRTUC
Reviews.Content: You didn't put up enough stars...I would clearly give Kindle Fire HDX a 7 or 8.  This is one of the finest pieces of electronic equipment that I have come across through the "maze" of all that is out there. Beautiful crystal clear images, spectacular sound quality, easy to use, and overall beautifully designed for the user!I usually am not moved to critique products in which I have invested my hard earned dollars, but in this case I am making an exception.  This product is definitely worth the investment.  Oh by the way, if you order one of these instruments be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime membership. Another good investment.Thanks for allowing me to comment.TRTUC

Reviews.Title: kindle fire Hdx
Reviews.Author: Savoria Coles
Reviews.Content: I already had the kindle fire and my son purchased the kindle fire HDX as a Christmas gift. I love it now I'm able to take photos and so much more. I could not have received a better gift.

Reviews.Title: I'm glad I bought it.
Reviews.Author: Beverly Bennett
Reviews.Content: Love it!!!  I bought mine without special offers.  The colors are so accurate and bright.  The web browser is so much quicker.  Wonderful~~

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9
Reviews.Author: Debbie Minarcik
Reviews.Content: Great product. Support is great and have had no problems with downloading games. Books are just as easy and the adjustable backgrounds and type size works great.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Katrina Ruckle
Reviews.Content: I have no problems at all with the Kindle Fire HDX that I purchased in December.The problem I had was there was no information on how to use the Kindle beyondhow to turn it on, unlock the screen, power it up and use the camera.  I had noidea how to find any other information on use.  I would have really appreciateda book or booklet on where to find the more advanced ways to use my Kindle. Onthe other hand, Amazon's customer service is very reliable and knowledgeable.I've never had a problem that a quick phone call to customer service hasn't immediatelytaken care of.  Since my phone call, things have definitely gotten easier and more fun.I will continue to shop at and recommend Amazon.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: nancy ibendahl
Reviews.Content: so fare love my kindle fire!  good size and has a lot of workability and function.  i would recommend it

Reviews.Title: outstanding product and fast delivery
Reviews.Author: jnaki
Reviews.Content: hello,  we ordered an original kindle in 2012.  we never opened the box and it stood around for a week.  relatives were all hyped on their kindle readers and wanted us to get one.  finally we sent it back.  no use for a reader as we are avid book readers.  but, we go through books rapidly and the used book store always had a large amount of our new books back in their stock.  this new kindle is better for us now as we are ready to use it.  we are not pressured into getting something that was pushed on us just to have something new.  the new 8.9 screen is outstanding in all lighting situations. touch a word and instantly it gives the meaning, usage, references to other literary works.  great for those that are english learners, too.  the kindle 8.9 hdx gives one accessibility to all kinds of books instantly, no large bookcase is needed for storage of quickly read books. there is an endless supply of books online anytime.  better than the paperwhite for us because it also has a color screen, search engine for web browsing, games, etc.  so far, it is only used for reading.  the light is perfect to read in the dark.  it is very user friendly.  now the used book store is not on our itinerary to give them our endless supply of quickly read new books... poor guys...we love the kindle and amazon service for the kindle.  yrmv  great product and service...yea

Reviews.Title: New Kindle Fire is Great!
Reviews.Author: Spider lover
Reviews.Content: I love this device. It's size is manageable, screen clear, content exceptional. While I am still a fan of paper books, for on-the-go stuff this can't be beat. And with magazines, internet content and games - it is a pleasure and joy to play with.

Reviews.Title: Loved my original Kindle Fire...and love this one even more!
Reviews.Author: jenn
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tablet is amazing! Also, love the help button. Saved me from having to call/email customer service when I had a few issues with video downloads. The folks on the other end of the help button were able to fix it almost instantly. Great product!

Reviews.Title: totally satisfied.
Reviews.Author: Bob Ness
Reviews.Content: Completely satisfied.the May day button is the greatest,and the camera takes sharp,clear pics very essay to share with friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tablet
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Agler
Reviews.Content: This has been all I had hoped for....I had loved my original kindle fire, but this unit is so much more and the screen is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: marie walker
Reviews.Content: so far so good. only had it for several weeks Like to look at books and play games. Spider solitaire are the best!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Karen Updegraff
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle HDX everyday.  The only thing I do not like about it is I have issues getting on some of the sites that require adobe flashplayer.  I don't think I should have to purchase this.  The clarity is great and the weight of it is as advertised.  I would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love love my kindle.
Reviews.Author: Julie Rettig
Reviews.Content: I love love my new kindle and I haven't even scratched the surface of what I can do with it

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Norma Cooksey "nc"
Reviews.Content: A gift to my husband for Christmas.  He is using it more and enjoying it more.  It does seem to need charging very quickly but this is only a minor inconvenience.  We would like to have received more instructions, an abbreviated manual perhaps, to be able to make use of all its capabilities.  It is a super little tablet!  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Spoiled
Reviews.Author: Guy Kincaid
Reviews.Content: I chose the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9" because of the aversion I have to pay more just because a product has an "I" in the name.  Also it's lighter and has already spoiled me to the ease of getting new books to read.  Can't hardly pick up an actual book anymore.

Reviews.Title: love kindle
Reviews.Author: roberta laughlin
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle. it does more then I realize. my reading experience has been wonderful. I love the apps and I can play my games,

Reviews.Title: The superior Kindle has finally arrived!
Reviews.Author: RST10
Reviews.Content: I've kept tabs on all the Kindles and iPads and many of the Androids since tablets came out. I'm a bit of an enthusiast and I'm an IT guy, so people come to me for advise. I've had one in each generation for a while now.I can finally say that the superior Kindle has arrived. This is the first Kindle Fire that has a screen truly better than anything else in the mainstream market. It is clear, bright, infinitely crisp and perfectly meant for reading. Reading on this may actually be better than a real book. I've liked other Kindles and iPads, but for the pure reading enthusiast this is a fantastic device.Thin, light, fast. Fast charging. Feels good in the hands. I have no hesitation to recommend this, though I did give it 4 stars instead of 5.I still want to challenge Amazon to keep innovating on their "home screen". I feel like they can do more, and do better. It's a small thing, but I think it really says a lot about the device to the user, and I feel like the current home screen, which hasn't changed much since Kindle Fires came to be, undersells the power of the device, but doesn't better sell any single function.That all being said, I have never been more strongly in support of the Kindle Fire line, especially for those who love Amazon and are huge readers.

Reviews.Title: happy,happy,
Reviews.Author: J. NELSON
Reviews.Content: I have nerve damage in left hand, I have the kindle fire,but as soon as I read this one was lighter ,I gave it a chance and glad I did. I am not as comp, or electronic savy. I mainly read,play games , surf internet. I love the turn on button and volume controls on the back. i can work them just by touch. i have trouble with reading long periods of time. so i do the whispersync ,where you can switch between reading and listening. i like where the speakers are on the top. i think i can hear my audio books better. i haven't had to use mayday button yet. picture is very clear.and yes it is a lot lighter , so i would say yes give this a try is as good as people say..

Reviews.Title: Love the storage space
Reviews.Author: Karen Hrdlicka
Reviews.Content: I used an iPad with a Kindle app previously. I love the way Kindle is set up. I am still exploring the features. I do find surfing facebook a little more difficult but love it for reading and storing ebooks. The help button is a great addition. I have used it a couple of times when I could not find the answer in the user's guide.

Reviews.Title: I am thrilled with this tablet.
Reviews.Author: Debra Adreon
Reviews.Content: Great fun. Beautiful graphics. So versatile. Mobile entertainment center! I am thrilled with this purchase. Games, books, communication of all types.

Reviews.Title: It was a Christmas gift...
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Jones
Reviews.Content: My husband had bought me a Kindle 3 years ago for Christmas. I had him to take it back because I didn't think I would use it. I'm not a avid reader, but I find my self using this Kindle more and more. I was against the games now I play Candy Crush (ha ha ha).I downloaded the Bible and I list to it and it helps me learn to pronounce words I can't say. Now I get on my treadmill more because now I can listen to my Bible as I walk. I love my Kindle!!!

Reviews.Title: Best source of entertainment I have ever had.
Reviews.Author: Nelda C
Reviews.Content: This was a gift but it is everything you could want in a Kindle and much more.  It is very easy to operate and has great capacity. Love the camera and the ability to download free games and books.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 8.9"
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: For what I wanted to do with it, it was a good purchase. Also appreciate that more books are sold at a lower price than Nook.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Adella Clark
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for myself and I love it. I wish I would have bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: No complaints!
Reviews.Author: Myia
Reviews.Content: It's amazing. My fiancé got my kindle for me for Christmas! I love it!! I take it everywhere with me! No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!!!!
Reviews.Author: Marcel Solorzano
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Easy to set up and use.  Great price.  Lots of apps to choose from.  Great for all ages from Kids to grandparents

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Queenie
Reviews.Content: Love it!! Only thing missing is the square reader!! I would like to use a it at work. Bigger screen than the phone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this when a discount was offered and was surprised with the versatility. I'm. able to play games, read, watch movies/tv and use the internet with speed. Would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: my best friend!
Reviews.Author: Freddy Arreola
Reviews.Content: Smooth and fast tablet!! Only issue is thAt it does freeze up every once and then. Love the Amazon cloud

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: annie mosley
Reviews.Content: It is a great product. I received it for Christmas and I am learning g to use it. It helps with being semiblind to where I can enlarge to see it better.

Reviews.Title: Almost a 5 but not quite!
Reviews.Author: Victoria E. Niemann
Reviews.Content: I would give it a five if I could access the Google search engine!  I am sure this is a proprietary thing, but I don't like it!

Reviews.Title: Bright and clear
Reviews.Author: Linda C
Reviews.Content: So far I love my new Kindle HDX 8.9.  The movies come out crystal clear.  So far the Wi-Fi has responded well.I did have a 7" screen but like the larger one better, much easier to read.

Reviews.Title: Get one
Reviews.Author: nannette marsh
Reviews.Content: I like its speed very intuitive to use picture quality is excellent fast download speed even where we live which is at the edge of 4g coverage

Reviews.Title: 2nd time around
Reviews.Author: julie marshall
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd one and love the extras on this one . The HD is fabulous !!! The only thing I have not figured out is to vidio stream hockey games but then I don't know if this one can .

Reviews.Title: I'm lovin' it....
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is wonderful!  It would only be better if it was 4g.....but, I'm sure that'll be the next BIG thing

Reviews.Title: Got it for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Brittain
Reviews.Content: Really enjoying the library books and games.Haven't order any magazines or music as yet. On and Off switch is awkward.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product
Reviews.Author: koinz
Reviews.Content: It's an amazing product. Though I bought it for my use but my wife won't keep her hands off it.......lol. Shopping on amazon made easy as well.

Reviews.Title: Magic machine. the best I have tried.
Reviews.Author: Richard Nebbett
Reviews.Content: This is a really amazing product. It's fast and the clarity is wonderful. Well worth the purchase price. The help button works well too.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT.
Reviews.Author: TROY G.
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the Kindle HDX.  in our household we have a couple of ipads a Samsung and two Kindles.  the Kindles are getting the most attention. easy to operate, good battery life, awesome display and just the right size.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: judy
Reviews.Content: Love Mayday they were so helpful and quick.  The tablet has met my expectations and so far everything has worked as it should.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Denise Cook
Reviews.Content: Can't put it down.  Seems like it is always wit me.  There are so many thing to do on it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Shyrel B. Green
Reviews.Content: I am loving everything about my Kindle Fire HDX. I have my email on it. I take pictures with it, it is great.

Reviews.Title: So awesome!
Reviews.Author: fibromar
Reviews.Content: I am beyond thrilled with my Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  The graphics are so amazing.  It's an upgrade for me from the basic Kindle model and even though I kept my old one (sentimental sake) it doesn't even begin to compare to this new version.  Just awesome.  I take it everywhere with me.  The battery holds so much longer than the old one.  It's lightweight and so easy to navigate.  I have used the HELP feature and that was a great experience to speak with a LIVE person and have that immediate assistance.  What a great feature.  All in all I couldn't be happier with it!!  Highly recommend it!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: PAveryt
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her Kindle Fire HDX 8.9. It has better picture quality and sound than the Apple iPad that I use. It also has lots of free apps you can choose from. This may be my next tablet instead of an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Overall a fantastic experience
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HDX 8.9" , easy to navigate and the Mayday button is the best in the whole wide world. Overall a fantastic experience
